comments: Best app for planning out there. Only 2 suggestions: 1. I prefer to edit times on the schedule planner by resizing, if I forget to choose "All Instances" when moving or resizing I can not undo my change. It is stuck as an exception unless I delete it or change it on a different day and select "All Instances". Please add a "Apply Exception to All Instances" button. 2. Select and move multiple scheduled events around on the scheduler. For example, if you woke up late you push it forward a bit.

This one of the best planners, it has a unique design and approach to planning. I love option of categories. What I disliked is that repeat option for events is limited. For example, I can't schedule some event on only workdays, I have to schedule it to repeat every day. Fix that and amazing app for everyday use! Edit: Turns out I didn't click where I was supposed to, thank you for your response! 5 stars from me!

This is a wonderful app and for someone who loves customization, this one really provides a lot of scope. Exploring the app was enjoyable in itself. I do have one urgent request which would make me want to buy the pro version. Currently, there is no way to see the logged activity for the day in the form of a hourly breakup (similar to the scheduled activities screen). I would really like to be able to have a glance at my day and see what all I've done instead of just seeing a pie chart. Please?

It's a bit complicated and slow to set up at first, but it really is an amazing app for planning your day, looking at how you spend your time, and being able to make better use of your time in the future. I have ADHD, and one of my biggest complaints with physical time planners is I can't move things around easily; this lets me move tasks and events around incredibly easily, and has an awesome feature which asks if you want to move the rest of the events for the day accordingly.

Overall it is a very good program and helps me be efficient and motivated. However the overtime logging option keeps resetting to disabled. This bug needs to be corrected because my time logging stops while working on something and then I do not know what time I need to add. I will give 5 stars if this issue is resolved. Upd: I Uninstalled and reinstalled to be sure. I have only one google account and still the overtime setting resets. The app needs debugging.

title: AIMS for Anger Management
description: AIMS is designed for Veterans and military Service members but can be used by anyone coping with anger problems. The AIMS app is based on the Anger and Irritability Management Skills online self-help course (http://www.VeteranTraining.va.gov/aims/). The app provides users with education about anger, opportunities for finding support, the ability to create an anger management plan, anger tracking, and tools to help manage angry reactions. Users can also create custom tools based on their preferences, and can integrate their own contacts, photos, and music. The AIMS app may be used alone, or in combination with the online course or in-person therapy.  AIMS was created by VA‚Äôs National Center for PTSD and VA‚Äôs Mental Health Services.

summary: anger management tools, education, and support
recentChanges:
* Updated the PDF export library
* Fixed a crash caused by editing triggers that have an apostrophe
comments: It's a very usefull apps. It helps me calm down even if just a bit everytime I'm feeling furious. The solutions this app have also helped me in calming down. Everytime I make an anger log, it feels like I'm telling or ranting out my anger to someone else except I can be more open about it since I don't have to worry about being snitched. And I can freely express my anger without having to hear some useless advices. Overall, this app has helped me in dealing with my slight anger issues.

A nice app that I use with clients I do Anger Management with. My only criticism thus far is the progressive muscle relaxation exercise is disappointing. The progressive muscle relaxation exercise in other VA apps such as CBT-i coach are much better. I hope this is corrected in a future update.
This is great app it really helps me calm down when I feel like I am about to take that next step

This app sucks. Every time you log you have to fill in 17 pages of info without skipping anything? If the point of this app is to make you angry at the app instead of real life then you were successful.

this is a FREE app, simple to use, very fast and accurate way to learn diy CBT. I would love this to expanded for All kind of options not just anger. full Mark's to developer teams. keep it up‚ô°‚ô°‚ô°

title: Diarize - journal self-care. Daily motivation
description:
Diarize it's a system of personal development tools to help you focus, be organised, productive as well as goal and action oriented. 

Diarize:
‚òÖ Help you elevate your life 
‚òÖ Guide you 
‚òÖ Give you some tips 
‚òÖ Improve your mood and self-esteem 
‚òÖ Motivate you every day 
‚òÖ Help you keep record of your achievements 

1. Journal
Record your daily achievements and daily progress. When adding them, specify the sphere, complexity and the time spent. 
The app will calculate the effort based on the input data, and display your performance in the form of a graph or chart. 
Diary strongly motivates you to maintain and improve the pace of self-development, improving your mood and self-esteem and reminding of priorities. 

2. Life assessment (circle of life)
Evaluate your current situation using a pie chart. Tracking how your life is balancing is important for your mental wellbeing and to reduce your stress and anxiety levels. After the assessment, you will be able to get recommendations helps you determine where you should focus your personal development efforts to become happy. When revising the spheres subsequently, you will be able to easily track the progress. 

3. Day planner 
Create to-do list for your goals. Schedule your day in advance. This increasing your productivity and improving your efficiency. 

4. Challenges 
Self-challenge is an additional tool for motivation and self-development. 
Reach a new level through new achievements, and improve your mood and self-esteem :) 

5. Statistics 
Track up your progress in an advanced way. Know your performance in detail and analyze your progress. In app provides you many different charts and statistics. 

Premium 
We offer a premium which contains many extra features and content that will help you grow even more.

recentChanges: üê¢ Fixed the calendar. Enjoy your use!
comments: LOVE it Something about the date is off though. I was logging something and the date was off and I couldn't figure out how to fix it... Other than that I really like it so far
Ok app. There is an area for improvement, like for example adding time option in the planning and reminder. Even only those obvious things would help a lot!

It's okay but it's not what I expected. It seems more focused on logging what you've already done and building graphs from that. Actually setting up a task or project would be good. Even if it's there it's hard to find and it doesn't look like you can see progress or add duration. Also, a dark/night theme would be great. Admittedly, some of the tips/troubleshooting pieces are nice, like suggesting how you might be setting the bar too high.

This app looks FANTASTIC!! I'm so excited I discovered it, and can't wait to try it for myself!!! I'm a highly visual learner, and was wondering if you had an example of your app in use? Or do you have any suggestions, tips, or instructions on how to fully utilize your app? I'll watch for your answer, but in the meantime, I wish you good luck!!üòÄ

I Have Had This App For Less Then 1 Hour, And It's Already Fustrating Me. When I Try To Add Something It Keeps Putting The Date As July 14, 2019! TODAY IS JULY 17, 2019! I Found An Area To Change The Date, I Tried Changing The Date To July 17, 2019, On The Right Hand Corner At The Top It Says Today, And When I Save The Entry, It Goes Back To July 14, 2019. I Tried At Least 5 Times To Change And Fix It Any Way I Can. I DON'T KNOW HOW THIS APP HAS A RATING OF A 4.6. WOULD RATE 0 STARS IF I COULD!

title: Make Me Better - Improve Personality & Motivation
description:
Make Me Better  is the most engaging and useful self improvement app to improve your personality, get motivated, and learn new things.

The Make Me Better app is like a daily source of personality development articles, self help tips, productivity ideas, motivational quotes, and life hacks to help you improve and enhance your personality. All the articles and life-changing stories are written in short and summarised form, which are easy to remember and practical in real life too. It is like a social media feed for self improvement, self help tips and intellectual knowledge.

‚òÖ Article that inspires you to be better
Our team curates and writes super engaging and highly effective articles on different topics. These articles are not boring and long, but to the point, very precise and are actionable too. 
There are already more than 350+ articles on leadership, time management, success, motivation, relationships, and psychology with actionable insights that you can use in your real life too.
And above that, more articles are being added every alternate day to keep you on your toes in the Self improvement process.

‚òÖ Collection of Motivational quotes 
We curate the best motivational and inspirational quotes. And these are not just random quotes, we pick the best quotes and design them to make them impactful to inspire you. You can scroll all day reading through best and unknown quotes here. We also post new quotes every day to keep you motivated throughout the day.

Haven't you heard it - "Dreams gets you started; motivation keeps you going."

‚òÖ Actionable daily Life Hacks
 To make the learning even more easy, enjoyable, and implementable we use interesting life hacks that will help you ease your daily tasks. Life hacks are simple and useful tips that help you improve your lifestyle. We keep on updating our life hacks section to add more useful life hacks every day.

‚òÖ We will remind you
The Make me Better app will keep you updated with all the new personality development tips and motivational quotes with daily push notification. Hence, you never lose your track on personality development.

‚òÖ Our take on Personality Development and Self Improvement
Personality development is not an overnight change, but a lifelong process and the app is here for just that, to keep you on track. With lots of articles, expert advice, productivity skills, useful life hacks, and motivational quotes, you are all set to become better and better every day. 

 ‚òÖ Learn Implement and improve
Make me better will help you in grooming your personality with easy to follow articles. And with our intelligent recommendation system, we pick the articles that will help you improve your personality in the best way. In the app, you will get articles on different topics like:-
‚òû Introspection
‚òû Self Motivation
‚òû Communication Skills
‚òû Goal Setting
‚òû Lifestyle choices
‚òû Habit building 
‚òû Career Growth
‚òû Family & Relationships
‚òû Personality Development tips

Make me better uses sets of specific expert advice with tons of useful tips, tricks, skill-sharing, and quotes to help you improve your personality and stay focused. The personality development app helps you to improve every aspect of your personality with tips, suggestions and actionable insights.

And in the end "Do the best until you know better, then when you know better, Do better."

Here so much is going on to make you better, so what are you waiting for? Install the app now to meet the best version of yourself.

Also, visit our Website and follow us on social media
https://www.makemebetter.net/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/makemebetter_app/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/makemebetterapp

comments: Great at first, but then I noticed repeat articles daily. New content is needed. And there is WhatsApp group people can join and get daily inspirations which I thought was great. Once I joined I started to get a lot of messages from random people. It became too much. I had to leave the group chat. Make Me Better needs to figure out a way to protect/hide users numbers. Maybe WhatsApp is not the right platform to use.

Hi, there are some part aren't loading? Like for the "quotes" area. Tried closing and opening multiple times but still the same. Thought there's a new update but there's none. No option to get help as well on the app. Would highly appreciate if we could get this fixed. Regards

Highly inspiring, reasoning & thought provoking: a motivation & good feel on reading; A suggestion is that notifications that pop-up off & on don't open the respective page [ unlike many other general app] but displays the app's home screen & it becomes cumbersome to search the noticed content in the whole Layout. This can be looked into for ease of users

This is my favorite app. It's organized for easy access to super fresh content. The articles are to the point and not too lengthy. If you're goal is to strengthen your weaknesses and work on yourself, you are in the right place. Enjoy!

I have have this app for a long time now, and I love it. This app has helped me a lot with the things I once had a hard time with in everyday life. Now, after following through with their teachings it has made all the differnts in a really positive way , and I have a much better understanding with the things that at times didn't make sense to me , my life has overall improved. I would recommend this app to everyone, cause I feel there's always something that everyone could learn, and here it is

title: Mantra - Daily affirmations reminder for self care
description:
Want to have a new mindset in this new year and change your entire future?
What stops you from achieving goals or becoming who you want to be? 

Boost your self improvement to develop the mindset and motivation you need to succeed, using personal affirmations in the most effective way.

Mantra can help you constantly remind you of who you are and the values you want to instill in your mind. Positive affirmations are simple messages. Repeated over-and-over, they begin to worm their way into your mind. Slowly changing both your thinking and your reality. 

‚ÄúIf you practice saying positive things in non-stressful situations, it‚Äôs been found that you can actually change your brain‚Äôs reactions‚Äù - Caroline Miller

Mantra is a FREE inspiring app helps to impregnate positive thoughts in your mind by giving you affirmation inspirational and motivational reminders on a daily basis. 

All positive affirmations are daily, fresh and continuously renewed. Instructions are clear: think positive and hold down the button! Your affirmation will glow and you will light up! Give it a try and watch how high you start the days! 

Features:
‚Ä¢ 10000+ Affirmations from 8 different categories
‚Ä¢ Unique affirmation for each and every day
‚Ä¢ Refresh if one affirmation a day is just not enough for you
‚Ä¢ Personalize with live or static themes, colors and fonts
‚Ä¢ Relax and calm your mind with the background sounds while reading your affirmation,

title: Timecap: Habit tracker & Self care
description:
Timecap is a unique habit tracker that tracks time-based, count, and simple check-off activities and habits. Get things done and be closer to reaching your goals today!

Timecap can help you reach goals like:
- Read more books
- Work out more
- Learn new skills
- Work on your side projects
- Floss your teeth regularly
- Meditate
- Fasting tracking
- Track where your time goes 
- Track your habits
- .. and anything else you can imagine

Timecap can also allow you to put limits on activities so you can:
- Smoking less
- Drinking less alcohol
- Limit the time you spend wasting on video games or TV 
- Any other bad habits you want to drop.

How can Timecap help to reach your goals?
- Individual tracker for all of your activities
- A Visual way to track your progress
- Useful reminders when coming just short to reach your goals before each period ends
- Useful notifications about reaching your limit
- You can create limits and goals for any period you want. Be it a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly.

Unlike all of the other habit tracking apps, Timecap actually makes you spend the time doing the thing to keep the streak going. Beautifully designed statistics will keep you motived. Even if you break the current streak (happens for the best of us), you can start over and try to break your own records.

If you really want to access the full features of the app, but can't afford them, send me an email, we can figure something out.

comments: Edit: Bumping this up to 5 stars since I was informed that there is a way to edit the times! - So far I love this app. The only thing I would like to see is the ability to edit start/end times for the times tasks. That way if I forget to start it, I can still input it correctly. Otherwise this is a fantastic app, and I'm highly considering purchasing the premium version

Great app! 5 stars if they would add a reset feature on the timers or, more ideally, allow you to select what time your timers reset each day. I stay up late so on some days I don't complete a task until after midnight which makes it count towards the next day. If I want to do that same task when I wake up, the timer is already completed and I have to make a duplicate of that task in order to time the task.

I've been using the app for a short time now, but I gotta say is amazing. There's a thing I've been struggling for a while and is keeping certain taks under a certain amount of time, I get perfectionist and things start taking time from other things. This app has a wonderful approach to time management using time limitis as either goals or limits, which allows me to make sure I am dedicating to each task the time I do want to dedicate. I love it.

Awesome and elegant interface. Easy to use, with history (calendae) to keep track of time. I have a suggestion though, can you please make me register my days missing? I have a streak in Duolingo of 150 days for example and just installed the app today. It would be great if I could check on the days missing. Other apps like Habits have this feature, and yeah, I would like to have all my favorite features in one app. Thank you!

Simple, clean and effective! No ads is a HUGE win! I belong to a goal setting group and have introduced this app to the group - several members are excited to use it. Hoping for a "to-do list" feature in the future. Thank you for this app!

title: No Excuses! The Power of Self-Discipline
description:
No Excuses! The Power of Self-Discipline by Brian Tracy.The book offers 21 ways to achieve self-discipline in all aspects of life, which will improve in the following three main areas: personal success, money, business, sales, and personal life. Through self-mastery and self-control, one can develop more personality, pride, accomplishment, and self-image. One way to achieve self-discipline:

1. Success: Imagine the ideal life you want to live. When you define what success means to you at the work, family, health and money levels, you'll immediately be able to determine what you need to achieve to achieve the ideal life.

2. Personality: The hallmark of personality is integrity. Honesty requires a lot of self-discipline to resist temptation and make good decisions. The real personality of one appears during crises or when one is under pressure. One can develop his character through study, teaching and practice.

3. Responsibility: Negative emotions stem from anger and rely on a human tendency to blame others, which is the easy way to justify failure. Accepting responsibility for self-success and achieving personal happiness requires a lot of effort and self-discipline.

4. Objectives: Set your goals and set a path to achieve your ideal life. Follow this method to achieve your goals: Select what you want to achieve, write it down on paper, and set a deadline for it. Write down a list of all the actions needed to get to the situation you want sorted by time and importance. Start immediately with these steps, and continue working every day, moving towards your main goal.

5. Personal Excellence: The most valuable asset you have is you. So one has to invest in himself and his career by developing his skills, so he can increase his value and increase his expected profits. It is important that this development be a priority throughout your life.

6. Courage: All of us are afraid of something, and most people are afraid of failure and poverty. Self-discipline helps to gain the courage to face problems and crises.

7. Perseverance: Nothing great is achieved in life without perseverance, which makes us overcome setbacks, frustrations, obstacles and even crises.

8. Work: Many people waste as amazing time in unproductive tasks. So you need to identify and focus on the most productive activities. A survey of CEOs was conducted and identified two characteristics that are the most important qualities they are looking for in their employees: "the ability to prioritize and work on high-value tasks", and "organization to work quickly and accurately"

Thanks for the info.It is an excellent app with simple directives and easy to read

title: Grid Diary - Journal, Planner
description:
Record mood, develop habits, improve productivity, wealth freedom, manage stress, self-care...
Have you ever thought that these challenges that every individual who wants to become a better version of themselves can be realized with just one tool?
Your journal contains power you never thought of.

# Grid Diary, to help you change your life and realize your dreams.
Grid Diary is committed to becoming the simplest, yet most powerful and effective personal growth tool. Since its first release in 2013, it has been fortunate to grow together with millions of users.
If you also want to make journaling as a lifelong habit, welcome to download Grid Diary and become one of us.

# Grid Diary, your ultimate personal diary system.
Whether you are a practitioner of morning diary, success diary, gratitude journal, or bullet journal, or simply want to record your feelings. Grid Diary provides rich tools such as template library, prompt library, habit check-in, writing reminder, etc. to help you customize the journal method that best suits your needs.

---

# Feature Highlights

1. Unique grid format
Grid Diary creates an original powerful and flexible grid format that focuses on things that are truly meaningful to you and helps you regain control of your life.

2. Professional writing guide library
Questions designed based on positive psychology will guide you to touch your true self. From the moment you write down an answer, you have already started to take the first step of transformation.

3. Day/week/month/year dimension
The rich time dimension makes your journal truly become the underlying system for personal growth. Choose your own rhythm to plan, act, and review. Build your own ritual. Break down and achieve your life goals step by step.

We believe that the journal is your private asset. In standalone mode, no private data will be uploaded to our server. If you choose to use the Grid Diary Sync Service, the data will be encrypted and stored on our server.
There is no venture capital and no advertisers behind Grid Diary. Our long-term development is based on the paid subscription of members. We never sell your data to third parties for profit.

developerAddress: No.13 Huaxin Road, Xiamen, Fujian, China
recentChanges:
- Now you can copy and move entries
- Now you can tap on the date in the entry view for a quick jump
- You can now save, share and view in the diary on the photo view
- New cancel button on search interface
- Optimized tags UI

comments: Good app, but all my data was lost when I changed my device. Extremely disappointed. (Edit : So apparently I was supposed to create a JSON backup manually on device 1 and then import it when I switched to device 2. So now all my words are gone. Very crappy system, in case someone gets their phone formatted or loses their phone. Very sad system for such a great app.)

Great app. I really like the grid premise and use of templates for day, week, month, and year. I like far more than a competitor. A couple things I think would make it significantly better: 1) Have a web app 2) Be able to setup a random gratitude question as part of a template. While you can select a random question, very few apply to gratitude.

I love this app! The journal system is revolutionary and helps me journal how I've always longed to. However, twice in the month I've been using it all my journal entries for a day have dissapeared. Once it happened was when I added tags, and another time it happened when I added photos. I updated the app today, so I will edit this review in a week or so if it seems improved. Grid Diary team, I LOVE IT! Thank you!!! I look forward to continuing with this app, thank you for your work on it.

This app is my favourite app yet, even without premium membership it is very much useful my only critique will be that sometimes it stops working, well atleast for me (its stops saving my entries) and i have to delete it and redownload it and then the syncing also erases more of my entries which is quite unfortunate however beggers cant be choosers ...i love it

It's okay as it is. It's just a simple app for journalising, keeping track of the progress of your goals, sticking to good habits, and there's always new generated quotes everyday to help inspire you. It's not an amazing app because there's better apps out there, but it's an okay app. I give it 5 stars for the simplicity.

title: Forest: Stay focused
description:
‚òÖ Google Play 2015-2016 Best App of the Year
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Editors‚Äô Choice Top Productivity App
‚òÖ Google Play 2018 Best Social Impact App Nomination
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Best Self-improvement app in Canada, Mexico, France, Russia, Brazil, Japan, Korea, India, and Thailand!

Can't stop scrolling? Keep off your phone with the cutest focus timer, and unleash your productivity along with 4 million satisfied paying users.

üåüWelcome to Forest, the place where procrastination does not exist!üåü

Staying focused has never been harder in this world of digital distractions. From phone calls to text messages, your attention is constantly being diverted. 

Plant a tree when you need to stay focused. If you commit to your task without getting distracted, your tree grows; if you cannot resist the temptation to use your phone, your tree dies. Over time, you will have an entire forest built from your focus and commitment. 

Free yourself from obsessive scrolling and achieve your goals!

GET MOTIVATEDüí™
‚Ä¢ Break phone addiction and form productive habits.
‚Ä¢ Earn rewards by staying focused and unlock adorable trees!
‚Ä¢ Grow your very own forest with each tree representing your efforts.
‚Ä¢ View your daily/weekly/monthly/yearly progress and learn about your own focus habits.
‚Ä¢ Concentrate on a daily routine and manage ADHD.

FOCUS LIKE A PRO ‚úçÔ∏è 
Activate Pro version and access more exciting features that will help you concentrate and procrastinate no more:

‚Ä¢ Plant real trees on Earth with our partner, Trees for the Future - We've planted over 800,000 real trees so far!üå≤
‚Ä¢ Set up a customized whitelist - 
leaving Forest and using apps added to the whitelist will not kill your tree.
‚Ä¢ Categorize your tasks with tags and see how you allocated your time.
‚Ä¢ Track your phone usage and screen time.
‚Ä¢ Compete with users around the world.
‚Ä¢ Plant with friends - If one of you fail to stay focused, you'll all get a dead tree!

Plant a tree and start building life-changing habits with Forest!

NOTICE
‚Ä¢ Forest is available for Android mobile and tablet devices, and can be accessed across all Android devices with Pro version. To download the non-Android version of Forest requires a separate purchase. However, by logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
‚Ä¢ Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. 

Permissions Explained: https://www.forestapp.cc/permissions/en/

CONNECT WITH US
Follow us on Instagram: @forest_app
Follow us on Twitter: @forestapp_cc

We also have a chrome extension. Find out more at www.forestapp.cc!

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Some bug fixes.
comments: I've been using this app for 2 years and almost unlocking all the trees. It was very helpful. After the new updates, it lost me as a user. Since I don't have "pro version" all the tress I had unlocked were refund and I lost all of them. The only ones I have are the free version trees. I am very upset and disappointed in changes. Not longer does this app care for their users, they only care about profits.

It's a great app as always. BUT for those who wanna update it to the latest version, DON'T DO IT. The latest system don't allow us to buy other species without paying for premium. Unlocking different type of trees is what keep motivating us to focus on the priorities. Without premium, there left only few typical trees in the store. As a student who's still financially independent like many others, I try not to spend any coins or cash on any apps no matter the price. I wish u can change it back.

Amazing app. Got me to focus during a very difficult time, and has continued to do so ever since. Well worth the cheap price for premium, but completely usable without buying. Brilliant support: Some of my data went missing at one point, and I had a friendly reply and full data restoration within 3 days. Suggestion: Being able to give a single tree multiple labels would be even better.

Simple, cool app. Nice visualization for staying on task for long projects. It's weird that the friends feature is only for premium users. I feel like giving that option to free users would encourage much more people to start using the app, considering how friends get people invested in competitions like this, but aside from that it's worth the download at least. That missing feature is the only immediate reason for giving 4 instead of 5 stars

Someone suggested the app the me and I recently started using it. I LOVE the concept and it's super nice to be able to be motivated to stay focused. However what makes me quite sad is not that I cannot buy different species of trees, it's more that without premium, we can't help to plant real trees... I wish they would allow all user the be able to plan real trees, even if we have to watch an ad for every tree, I think it would be worth it.

title: Mindvalley: Learn, Evolve and Transform Your Life
description:
Welcome to the new Mindvalley app, the world's leading education platform where you will find the best online courses in personal growth and self development.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ on TrustPilot
As mentioned in Forbes, New York Times, TIME, Entrepreneur, Business Insider, Inc and more.

Powered by cutting-edge learning technology, the Mindvalley app brings you a variety of classes and free lessons aimed for self improvement. All our masterclasses, programs and courses are designed to help you achieve the fullest potential of your mind, body, soul and career. With key topics such as Leadership, Productivity, Health & Fitness, Relationships, Public Speaking, Mindfulness, Happiness, Spirituality and more, Mindvalley is your one stop centre for personal development in all areas of life‚Äì your very own personal growth coach on the go.

---

What can you expect from the Mindvalley app?
‚Ä¢ Free Masterclasses on a variety of topics
‚Ä¢ Personalized learning curriculum based on your goals
‚Ä¢ Powerful insights in bite sized videos for people on the go
‚Ä¢ Gain access to world class coaches, trainers, entrepreneurs, etc.
‚Ä¢ Connect and learn with like-minded people from all around the world
‚Ä¢ Easy navigation for a seamless learning experience
‚Ä¢ Scientific learning design and methodology 

How you will transform with the Mindvalley app?
‚Ä¢ Increase productivity and improve performance at home and work
‚Ä¢ Learn to develop and live a healthier life with nutrition and fitness
‚Ä¢ Discover and find happiness, purpose and fulfilment
‚Ä¢ Reclaim your life and purpose, and increase impact in this world

From applicable skill building, intermittent fasting, fulfilment and purpose, to hypnosis therapy and Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT), Mindvalley's courses are powered by our revolutionary learning platform which combines community and daily learning to transform your life and daily habits. 

---

So... what's inside?

‚≠êÔ∏è Mindvalley MASTERCLASS‚Ñ¢
Now available on the app, Masterclasses are FREE online courses that aim to deliver the most value and impact in a single video. Each Masterclass covers key areas of a specific topic, and is delivered by a Quest trainer. If you wish to further pursue a Masterclass training, subscribe to our All Access plan to gain unlimited access to Mindvalley Quests.

‚≠êÔ∏è Mindvalley QUESTS‚Ñ¢
Master a new skill from home (or anywhere, really) from legendary teachers, leaders and experts. These online learning programs are designed to guarantee lifelong changes.

Gain full access to Mindvalley's best programs, training sessions and strategic advices from world renowned experts with the All Access subscription. Accessible at anytime, anywhere.

‚≠êÔ∏è Mindvalley MENTORING‚Ñ¢
Hosted by Mindvalley's founder and New York Times' bestselling author, Vishen Lakhiani, Mindvalley's Mentoring programme offers you leading-edge online trainings from the world‚Äôs best teachers, entrepreneurs, and visionaries. Over 100+ hours of curated online mentoring sessions for better success in health, fitness, love and relationships, parenting, business, career growth and more.

---

Subscription plans in app are processed via your Play Store account and will automatically renew under Google's terms and conditions. All in app purchases on your Mindvalley account will adhere to Google Play Store's payment, subscription and refund policies. You can manage your subscription plans in your Play Store account settings.

About Mindvalley: https://www.mindvalley.com/about

Terms & Conditions: https://www.mindvalley.com/terms-and-conditions

comments: Access to my purchased courses fails very often. Playback is stopping in the middle of meditations even if the app has no system restrictions to use power or whatever. The app is updated to the latest versions always. Some sound files are with disturbing backround noises ... like recorded in a office, kitchen or where ever. I would love to use this app but this renders the app useless.

Great app, superb content, paid version is much better, amazing looking videos, thought provoking ideas and lectures, yet to see an app that provides such width of content. Would surely recommend all who ask. Thank you Mindvalley team

I love having access to All Quests from my phone, i understand is a new app so the team is looking to optimize it. So far i experienced an error on the last remaining sec of lessons. So far so good for me and how i intend to use the app

The content is great, infinit stars for it but would be greate to have a search bar in the app and a section where we can view what we watched and a section with "continue watching". Also I have problems too with the last part of the videos and I have the latest version...
It really is the Netflix of personal development I overwhelmed in the most positive way by the format, accessibility, and variety. This will easily become the app I spend most of my time on.

title: Boosted - Productivity & Time Tracker
description:
Achieve more by improving your productivity with the Boosted - Productivity & Time Tracker app.  Understand your habits with insightful reports and improve your productivity and time management with various productivity tools like the Pomodoro timer and simple time tracking.

Understanding is the first step to progress
Improving your habits is the shortest path to self-improvement. The most effective way to do this is to understand them first. By tracking your time, you'll be able to understand your current habits and you'll be able to use this knowledge to build better ones.

Time tracking should be as effortless as possible
To spend the day effectively, you need to invest your time wisely. By using the productivity and time management tools in Boosted, you can make better use of your time.

We are constantly striving to make Boosted as simple as possible so that it works for you and not the other way around. Effortless time tracking - that's our goal.

Let's start the change
We want to help you reach your goals and we believe Boosted is a great tool for that. That's why we are constantly improving the app so you can have an awesome experience on your journey of self-improvement.

Here are some of the key features that Boosted gives you:
‚òÖ Single click time tracking for all of your activities
‚òÖ Stay organized by splitting your projects into smaller tasks
‚òÖ Pomodoro timer, countdown timer, and many other productivity tools
‚òÖ Export your data to CSV
‚òÖ Control your time tracking quickly from the notification bar
‚òÖ Keep your data safe with Google Drive backups
‚òÖ View detailed reports and statistics of all your tracked time
‚òÖ View all of your tracked activities in a calendar
‚òÖ Stay productive even at night with the Dark mode
‚òÖ No ads - stay focused without unnecessary distractions


We value your privacy.
Boosted doesn't store any of your personal data on our servers. All the time tracking data is stored on your phone.

You can optionally backup your data to a private folder in your Google Drive. These backups will only be accessible by the Boosted app.

You can also export your data to a CSV file and you will have full control over where that will be stored.

We love feedback!
You can always contact us at app.boosted@gmail.com if you have any questions or if you want something new in the app. We listen to all the feedback we get from you because we want to create an app that fits your needs!


Take control of your time by installing Boosted for FREE!

We want to help you reach your goals and we believe Boosted is a great tool for that. That's why we are constantly improving the app so you can have an awesome experience on your journey of self-improvement.

Here are some of the key features that Boosted gives you:
‚òÖ Single click time tracking for all of your activities
‚òÖ Stay organized by splitting your projects into smaller tasks
‚òÖ Pomodoro timer, countdown timer, and many other productivity tools
‚òÖ Export your data to CSV
‚òÖ Control your time tracking quickly from the notification bar
‚òÖ Keep your data safe with Google Drive backups
‚òÖ View detailed reports and statistics of all your tracked time
‚òÖ View all of your tracked activities in a calendar
‚òÖ Stay productive even at night with the Dark mode
‚òÖ No ads - stay focused without unnecessary distractions


We value your privacy.
Boosted doesn't store any of your personal data on our servers. All the time tracking data is stored on your phone.

You can optionally backup your data to a private folder in your Google Drive. These backups will only be accessible by the Boosted app.

You can also export your data to a CSV file and you will have full control over where that will be stored.

We love feedback!
You can always contact us at app.boosted@gmail.com if you have any questions or if you want something new in the app. We listen to all the feedback we get from you because we want to create an app that fits your needs!


Take control of your time by installing Boosted for FREE!
summary: Track your activities and take control of your time!
recentChanges:
Support landscape mode for large screen devices
Improve stability and performance
comments: I think this is a really great app with awesome features, even for free. I ended up purchasing the upgrade because I enjoyed the app so much in the free version already, and wanted to support the devs. However, I wish there was an option to mass delete records instead of going in 1 by 1, I was exploring the multiday record feature and accidentally gave myself 60 new records, which I had to delete 1 by 1.

Love this application, though it's simple still useful and easy to work with. But... Minus a star for not recognising Cyrillic characters - question marks in report files plus font size is too small for a 10" screen. Maybe developers don't know that there are users using tablets as well as smartphones. Also it would be nice to have 3 levels - project, its subs and their tasks and statistics for all of them (look at Gleeo Time). Task Start Area is quite narrow, in 95% cases it calls Task Edit.

Neat productivity app, a bit barebones in places and the UI isn't terribly intuitive, but it's simple to learn and very solid once you get the hang of it. I use it to keep track of time spent on different hobbies and it's nice to be able to keep track of time goals for each day and week and see cumulative time spent.
Love love love!!! Best time tracker app Ive tried. Its clean and easy to use. Some suggestions that would make me love it even more would be tobe able to show data for tasks per project.

Great App! I have been using it for a while now and am convinced that it is the best designed time tracking app out there :) What I do miss a little bit is to be able to mark projects as billable so it would make my work life easier. Also I would like to be able to set "goals", so I could say I would like to work 8 hours daily, I would get notified when I reached the 8 hours. That would be really cool! :)

title: Booster Buddy
description:
BoosterBuddy is a free app designed to help teens and young adults improve their mental health.

Manage your personal wellness journey and earn achievements as your sidekick guides you through a series of daily quests designed to establish and sustain positive habits.

‚Ä¢	Check-in with how you are feeling each day
‚Ä¢	Use coping skills
‚Ä¢	Keep track of appointments and medications
‚Ä¢	Get started on tasks
‚Ä¢	Follow self-care routines 
‚Ä¢	Increase real-life socialization
descriptionHTML:
BoosterBuddy is a free app designed to help teens and young adults improve their mental health.

Manage your personal wellness journey and earn achievements as your sidekick guides you through a series of daily quests designed to establish and sustain positive habits.

‚Ä¢ Check-in with how you are feeling each day
‚Ä¢ Use coping skills
‚Ä¢ Keep track of appointments and medications
‚Ä¢ Get started on tasks
‚Ä¢ Follow self-care routines
‚Ä¢ Increase real-life socialization
summary: BoosterBuddy is designed to help teens/young adults improve their mental health.
recentChanges:
-Added coping skills for Obsessive Compulsive Disorder, Disordered Eating, Persistent Pain and Urges to Self Harm
-Added journal section including ability to save specific written quests
-Ability to save favourite quotes
-Ability to switch between quests and come back to them later
-Improved medication scheduling customization
-Increased medication reminders to 10 per day
-Added notched device UI support
-Fixed UI on wider aspect ratio devices
-Improved performance and stability
-Fixed bugs
comments: I feel like this is a really good app, gives me a little bit of responsibility by waking up my buddy and gets me to go out and do simple but meaningful tasks. It also tracks everyday on a calendar so you can see how you've been doing feeling wise and has a journal page, etc. Wish I could interact with the buddy a bit more though. Great app, keeps me going, even on tough days.

I've been using this app on and off for years now, it's simple to use with no ads and a good paced system that engages you to check back every day. I personally love the nostalgic feel of the graphics + it's easy to run because it's not super detailed. it focuses where it matters most with gentle reminders here and there to make sure you're taking care of yourself. I would recommend this app to someone who needs it. if you're unsure, get it. you can uninstall if it's not for you. stay safe! <3

This is a good app for keeping yourself safe mentally, so I find it quite useful. However, I think that the designs of the buddies and UI isn't as clean and pretty as I would like which puts me off using it at times, but that's probably just the visual arts student in me being nitpicky üòñ

Great app. In the favorite coping method section, can they be sorted by category (like in the general list of coping methods, but it would only show your favorites) to make it easier to find what I'm looking for. Or at least not have multiple instances of a certain coping method. If the same method is in more than one category and I favorite them both, there is multiples of different methods and it gets cluttered and repetitive

I am blown away. First recommended to me by someone on a crisis text line. I've had it for a week and it is FANTASTIC. I have been keeping more healthy habits because the app makes me feel like I'm achieving something. The journaling section helps me to find joy in little things and expose me to self-commpassion, which is difficult for me. I also love that it has coping skills for almost EVERYTHING, plus a crisis plan. Oh and guys, this app is actually FREE! no in app purchases!

title: Questions Diary:One self-reflection question.
description:
Is this your first time using Question Diary? Question Diary will give you one question every day.

Are you happy right now?

You can answer the question, or choose not to if you'd rather not. You will get one question like this, every day. Then, one year later, you will be asked the same questions.

Are you happy right now?

If you were shown your answer from a year ago, and asked this question again, what would your answer be? Would it be the same as it was last year? Would it be a different answer?

Are you happy right now?

QnA Diary, life questions, Question Diary with questions that help me find myself,

An application that allows you to find your answers quickly, hand-written in a diary. All answers are stored on the server. Answers can been seen from anywhere, and the application can be used from anywhere.

I have another question for you today.

What were you thinking about the most today? What would you like to protect the most in your life? How is it to be an adult? What is the coolest thing that you can do now? If you had enough money, what would be the most worth-while thing you could do? If you could have a superpower, what would it be? What are your strengths? What challenges have you taken on recently? What do you think is the purpose of life? What is a 'better life' to you?


I hope that your life will become even just a little bit warmer.

recentChanges: Bug fixed.
comments: The questions are VERY interesting and I feel better after answering them. They are not just some random questions, it shows that they have been put a lot of thought in. And that makes me put a lot of thought in answering them. And the feature of locking the app is very useful, since my brother keeps playing with my phone. Also, if you're a teenager like me, I'd highly recommend this app. It really lets you reflect on yourself and makes you think about some very important things. I love it.

LOVE THIS APP. I do it before bed every night. I love the questions, they really make you think and reflect. Its a great app especially if your on a self discovery journey. I try to be as honest and real in my answers.. who knows maybe one day if something ever happened to me, my husband or kids might see this and get to know my inner thoughts and feel connected. ‚ù§
It's nice. The questions let you know more about yourself as you answer them.. I don't know what is the problem, but it has been atleast 3 days, it just shows "trying to connect to the server".

The first couple of months I thought the app was amazing. The questions where really interesting, and I would love to see how my opinion changes over the years. Suddenly they started to become really dull, or they assumed you are a childless single person. I like the fact that I can switch to community questions, but it's not enough. And some questions are so badly written. I can understand that some of the community questions lack good grammar, but the official ones should be properly written.

It's a great app for introspection. I am not able to write answers everyday so whenever I open the app, I try to answer 10-15 questions in a go and it feels like I am having a meaningful conversation with someone who really wants to know me. Apparently, I am that someone and this app has helped me so much in reflecting on my true self.

title: Do It Now: RPG To Do List. Habit Tracker. Planner
description:
Organize your life with Do It Now - fantastical to do list which helps you to add game elements into your everyday tasks, make schedule, add daily reminders and organize your life with built-in skills, characteristics and level ups.

üéÆ Gamify your things to do (gtd)
With our reminders app you will get virtual copy of yourself with be able to track your skills, characteristics and statistics. Every task can be bound to skills and characteristics. When task is performed in real life - your virtual hero will get skills and characteristics increased, gain additional experience (XP) and could level up life.

üß† Self improvement
Track personal growth in different areas with customizable characteristics. Increase your everyday productivity by creating flexible system with skills. Basic sets already added to organizer.
Gamify your routine to do list and improve yourself, your life and virtual RPG character with goal tracker. His skills and abilities will grow with yours. Make him more powerful and become more productive.

üìÖ Handy calendar
Get overview on plans for months, weeks or use a day planner, agenda planner, schedule planner. Find most suitable time to schedule your tasks with calendar planner. Stay as productive as you can with this reminder app and to do wunderlist! View the business calendar in grid format or use daily planner, weekly planner, time tracker. Enhance your time management.

üîî Sleek reminders
Our calendar app can remind you about critical tasks with notifications. Add up to 5 notifications to each task.

üìò Productivity organization
Organize your tasks in groups like in trello, taskrabbit, habitica, ticktick, habitbull, any do to separate different types. Keep it all organized and know what to do in daily to do list app free.
Use groups as to-do list, check list, reading list, bucket list, wishlist, all the lists to do! Add notes to any goals.

üîÑ Sync across your devices
Your tasks will sync within cloud or Dropbox so that you can view and manage them wherever you are for better goal achieving with task manager.
Or just save your entire progress to file on your device.

‚öôÔ∏è Flexible tasks setup
Productive habit tracker allows to add really flexible tasks. Setup custom repetitions (daily, weekly, weekdays, or monthly todoist), infinite repeats, finish date\time, difficulty\importance\fear, auto-fail or auto-skip on overdue, bind negative and positive skills, combine tasks in groups, add subtasks and much-much more. Prioritize goals and focus on the what really matters to do it tomorrow. Also lots of icons included to customize your tasks. Make goal setting easy.

üìà Statistics
Overview your progress with fancy charts. Use characteristics and skills charts to reveal your strong and weak sides. Customize your dashboard to show daily success charts with tasks, gold and experience.

üëç Habits
Generate useful habits. You can habitify any task, just enable habit generation for it. Use Do It Now as productivity app to generate any habit as in RPG game!

üí∞ Rewards system
Get gold from performed tasks and buy self-assigned rewards. E.g. you can add reward "Watch a movie" with 100 gold, buy it and indeed watch a movie in real life as a reward for hard work!

üòé Achievements
Increase you motivation with achievements. You can create your own achievement and bound them to tasks, skills or characteristics.

üé® Themes
Change app appearance with custom themes. Our task tracker app has a lot of them!

üß© Great widgets
Get easy access to your tasks and statistics by adding a checklist widget to your home screen. There are various sizes and types. Choose one that you like the most.

Maintain your daily motivation and develop your virtual self to make promotion and improvement in real life.

---
Connect with us at:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DoItNowApp
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DoItNowRPG
Email: support@do-it-now.app

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DoItNowApp
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DoItNowRPG

summary: Increase motivation, achieve daily goals, build habits, transform life into game
recentChanges:
üåü Added and updated a lot of images
üåü Added sound for item consumption with possibility to edit this sound via settings
üåü Fixed issue with in-app sounds playback when pop-ups are turned off
üåü Other fixes and improvements
comments: Almost perfect... I only wish it had more to do with the "game" aspect. It's basically a to-do list or planner. Sure, it gives you some "gold" and experience points based on your completed tasks, but they amount to nothing, as there is nothing to do with either once collected. No built-in items to purchase, no character creation or customisation... disappointing. That being said, the tasks are easy to create and customise. I feel more organised than usual. So, thanks, I guess.

This app is very customizable, which I definitely wanted in an RPG style To Do list. However, it does come at a cost, since getting everything set up how you'd like takes much longer than similar apps. Personally I think the trade is worth it (hence my rating), but be aware that if you're looking for something more simple, this probably isnt the app for you. If you want to really determine exactly how you want things to work, pick this one over the others!

Great, but it is missing a feature that honestly has me looking elsewhere. This app would be perfect for me, except that it seems that the app only provides a "Successful executions" graph for a given event with a time interval of _one_ week. I'm interested in the tracking of my successful executions of an event over a long period of time, and so not having an option for a graph over a longer timeline is a bit of a bummer.

It really helps with getting things done! Receiving XP, gold and different skills makes uninteresting tasks much easier to do. I like that - on the contrary to other apps - it is actually useful without having to get the premium version. Though the premium version is a nice addition. Suggestion: some rewards could already be existent so you don't have to come up with them yourself. I personally don't have many ideas for coming up with rewards and don't know what gold price would be appropriate.

It would be nice to have the ability to set an xp/coins decay until a particular task is completed. Also, would be nice to be able to more easily schedule an existing infinite repitition task for a particular time (rather than editing its time and resetting it, or duplicating it). Also, maybe add search ability for filtering icons (as there are so many).

title: Happify
description:
Happify‚Äôs science-based activities and games can help reduce stress, overcome negative thoughts, and build greater resilience by providing effective tools and programs to improve emotional well-being.
 
Our techniques are developed by leading scientists and experts who've been studying evidence-based interventions in the fields of positive psychology, mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapy for decades.

86% of people who use Happify regularly report feeling better about their lives in 2 months!

HAPPINESS ISN‚ÄôT JUST ONE THING. IT‚ÄôS EVERYTHING.

Struggling with everyday challenges and being gripped by negativity can be toxic to one's emotional and physical well-being, relationships, and performance at work. So when you start to turn the corner, and begin to learn the new habits of successful engagement with life, everything starts to look brighter and better.

SKEPTICAL JOURNALISTS TRIED IT FOR THEMSELVES, AND HERE‚ÄôS WHAT THEY SAID:

ABC World News' Mara Schiavocampo
"I gave it a shot for 5 weeks...it works!"

The New York Times
"Each track contains bite-size quizzes, games and activities that guide you to seeing more positive aspects of daily life."

The TODAY Show
"These are things you can do every day -- tasks you can complete and be rewarded for -- to feel better, reduce stress, live a better life, & actually be happy."

Katie Couric: World 3.0 on Yahoo
‚Äú[Happify] evaluates what's keeping you from a high happiness quotient, then you're given games and activities that will boost your mood, like Uplift, Serenity Scene, and Gratitude Walk."

YOU KNOW YOUR GOALS. WE KNOW HOW YOU CAN ACHIEVE THEM.

Choose one track. Choose them all.

* Conquering negative thoughts
* Coping better with stress
* Building self-confidence
* Fueling your career success
* Achieving mindfulness through meditation
* ‚Ä¶and 30+ more!

Happify is free to download and use. It‚Äôs a great way to get started, and discover why so many people upgrade to Happify Plus for access to even more:

* Unlimited access to 30+ tracks;
* Your 20-page character strength report, offered in partnership with the renowned VIA Institute
* Track your progress everyday and see how your skills compare
* and more!

Because we know that everyone has different financial resources, we offer Happify Plus in a variety of plans, for as low as $11.67/month.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off (by going to Account Settings) at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period.

Privacy Policy: http://www.happify.com/privacy
Terms & Conditions: http://www.happify.com/terms

Website: http://www.happify.com
Help: support@happify.com

recentChanges: We‚Äôve made a variety of accessibility improvements to the app for our vision- and hearing-impaired users. You can activate them by turning on accessibility mode in the Happify app Settings. Stay tuned for even more improvements in the future!
comments: This app is actually great! It helps me to communicate people, be more confident, and find my career. I like the videos and articles, it gives us empathy and change your skills. The activities are fun. I like that one game called "Negative knockout" because the game wipe out my worries. The other activity I like is the "Kindness Chain." because it really thoughtful to compliment people and get rid of negative thoughts. I love this app, it change the way I feel.

Your App works very slow, it's damn irritating, I am giving 1 Star without even knowing your features because I am already very frustrated with the way your app is responding. How am I suppose to use it's features when it has already Irritated me. This kind of App should be more convenient and must work properly, you are only frustrating people more. You may not be aware of this but now if you know please develope your App.

I have a strong philosophical gripe with some of the ideas this app presents, which I was unable to bring up with them because there is no way to contact anyone with questions. Then they hit me up for money, so I'm done.

Kept crashing and making me restart finished activities from the beginning, making my stress and anxiety worse. While I'm sure it genuinely helps when it's working correctly, I've not had a good experience with this app.
This app keeps me on track during these crazy times! I wasn't keeping up with journaling and Happify helps me stick to my destressing strategies in a fun and easy way.

title: Daybook - Diary, Journal, Note, Mood Tracker
description:
Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way.

WHY USE DAYBOOK? 

‚Ä¢ SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way and record memories in an organized manner.

‚Ä¢  GUIDED JOURNAL:¬† Supports guided journal for tracking mood and activities, Mental Health Journal for managing stress and anxiety, Handwriting¬†Scanner, Gratitude journal, self-improvement, and more.

‚Ä¢  JOURNAL INSIGHTS:¬† Gather insights using mood analyzer from your activity log & mood log.

‚Ä¢ SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected with diary with lock. 

‚Ä¢ EASY-TO-USE: ¬†It's easy-to-use journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience ‚Äî nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily.


‚Ä¢ FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on.

‚Ä¢ SPEAK TO WRITE JOURNAL DIARY : Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI.

‚Ä¢ MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases.
- As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life.
- As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly. 
- As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app.
- As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal.
- As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save!
- As a Class notebook: For educational purposes, use it as - ¬†homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures
- As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly. 
- As a pocket diary and a note keeper app: Record your life journey. Daybook is a life diary that works with multiple platforms such as Web, mobile, through voice Assistance.

Standout features:

- Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance. 
- Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant


Upcoming integration:

We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app.

- Daily Mood tracker for the diary
- Search based on tags or location
- Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup


To know more, visit us at https://daybook.app.

Follow us on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/DayBook.diary/


Feedback:
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at daybook.diary@gmail.com

comments: Really Nice... and Cool Features... but for a Price I was excited to start using this app. There have been many times where I get ideas for art projects, and experience feelings that can only be described in the given moment. It's easy to add entries and do quick check-ins multiple times a day and I was psyched to see the other journaling ideas... Until I saw that you have to spend $30/year for those features. So cruel to ad them just to say, "Pay us! Minus that, I would give it 5 stars.

The app has more intelligent offer than I expected. First, it is a great interface to use on any devices, web, phone, tablet so I'm happy to be able to access it any time. The note is simply minimal and well organized. I'm surprised that there are actually promt checkins and guided templates for different topics for journaling. I'm using more than I intended.

So far so good very simple to use and the design and layout is appealing. Better than most I've tried recently. Option to upload multiple photos in one go rather than individually would be handy, and the ability to upload videos would be nice. Great experience so far though.

it is a really good app, ive only just started using it and is very good compared to other diarys and mood journals ive had in the past. it is good even without the subscription as you have access to the diary feature, mood board and everything. the only reason im giving 4 stars is because i feel that the mood board could be a bit more in depth that just, "pick a face, what activities made you feel this way, any other notes." i feel it needs a little more but it is a great app and i recomend it!

Pay to use... Listen, If you guy offer this for free with a very LIGHT ad presence so you can get paid for the work out into creating this app, fine. If you want to offer the option to pay like 1 or 2 dollars to get rid of the ads, fine. Even if you roll out new amazing content, I mean serious content that you can't find elsewhere, not fonts, themes, backgrounds, photo insertion or that simple bs. But telling me to pay over $5 monthly when I can buy a $1 notebook? No, that is money grubbing.

title: Motivation - Daily quotes
description:
Whether you're dealing with depression, need an extra push to go to the gym, or simply like to share quotes in social media, Motivation has you covered.


Motivation contains a set of inspirational thoughts and sayings that will urge you to take daily action or if you just need a little dose of ‚Äúpick me ups" throughout the day.


These quotes will guide and inspire you for any occasion! Set many daily reminders for yourself and share the uplifting quote of the day with your friends and family, or use the image for Instagram or as a wallpaper.


Motivation contains hundreds of quotes with deep and rich meanings, with a continuous stream of new ones added daily!

+ Read through Hundreds of Quotes
+ Save or Share
+ Set Motivational Reminders throughout the Day
+ Change Font and Colors
+ Filter by Category

From quotes about working out to love and family, Motivation has them all! Browse our thousands of quotes organized by category:
- Motivation to work harder
- Love
- Motivation to train and work out
- Help for depression
- Boost your self-esteem and self-confidence
- Get over a break up
- Life lessons and sayings
- Sport
- Business, money, success and career
- Being present and mindful
- Philosophy from the best minds
- And many more!

comments: I think it would be great if you had more variety without having to pay, sometimes feeling better shouldn't have to come at a cost. Some of the categories are really good, however I think you should be able to get the MOST Important quotes for cheap and the 'more hard to find' quotes for normal price ü§î Really good app though for people who really need it üôèüôè Would totally recommend üòÅ
I like the app but for some reason the notifications stop working after a day or 2. If this could be fixed it would be better.
I love the inspiration delivered in the quotes..but I don't like the fact that in order to pick what type of inspiration or background you have to pay for it.

I really love this app. I am all about quotes and I love that you can customize it somewhat to make it visually appealing. Short 1 star because I wish you customize the widget more. There's only one full screen width for the widget which is not ideal, but I especially dislike that you always have the bold black bar on the widget. It almost defeats the ability to customize the widget.
Very inspiring and encouraging when one is down, I love it because it gets me through my challenges always. Good in times of distress

title: De-StressMe: CBT Tools to Manage Stress
description:
De-StressMe brings personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools to your phone. Now you can manage stress, get stress relief, and improve mental health with the click of a button. And it's free!

De-StressMe has 3 primary features: 

1) Education about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care. Every day for 31 days at a time you choose, you will receive a brief, 10 second lesson. Each lesson is designed to be quick and easy to understand allowing you to reflect on the lesson the rest of the day. These lessons also teach you how to use the app more effectively.

2) Stress management and preparation for future stressful situations. You can set self-care goals, reflect on personal strengths, count the positives in your life, write about your day in a Mood Diary, and create coping cards to keep yourself centered and balanced. 

3) Stress relief when you need it most. Just click the De-StressMe button and the statements you wrote to manage stress and the questions you answered in the tutorial get transformed and used for relaxation, stress relief, and improved mental health.

Free features include:
‚Ä¢ Personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy tools to manage stress. Includes over 12 different CBT techniques to center you when you need it most such as distress scales, credit lists, deep breathing and relaxation, imagery techniques, self-care goals, and more.
‚Ä¢ 31 high-impact, ten second lessons for learning self-care, coping skills, relaxation techniques, and CBT theories.
‚Ä¢ Sections for writing self-care ideas, things you are thankful for, personal strengths and coping cards to keep you centered. These entries are also used to improve the de-stressing tool‚Äôs effectiveness to maximize stress relief.
‚Ä¢ A mood diary for journaling about your day and mood.
‚Ä¢ Reminders to attend to self-care, social supports, and emotional wellness.
‚Ä¢ Password entry for your diary with a back-up security question to keep your information secure from prying eyes.
‚Ä¢ Suicide hotline number for calling and texting at high stress levels.
‚Ä¢ All of your information stays on your phone. De-StressMe does not take data from your phone.
‚Ä¢ And most importantly, no Ads! So nothing interferes with you getting your stress relief when you need it. 

For a limited time, premium features included free: 
‚Ä¢ 10+ bonus 10 second lessons based on Acceptance Commitment Therapy.
‚Ä¢ Over 35 pre-filled coping cards to help you cope with difficult situations such as problems at work, keeping boundaries around toxic people, and difficult changes in life.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 self-care ideas based on embracing your creativity, relaxing, being active, and being social.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 statements for giving thanks ranging from simple things to grandiose statements about life and success.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 individual strength ideas, inherent and physical strengths.
‚Ä¢ The ability to favorite and edit these coping cards, self-care ideas, personal strengths, and affirmations of thanks. This dramatically cuts down on the time you spend typing.

Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) has been found to be one of the most effective therapies to manage stress, strengthen coping skills, and improve mental health in a myriad of medical and psychological studies. However, therapy is expensive and there are often few options for good therapists in many parts of the world. De-StressMe makes therapy skills available to everyone. 

Your feedback is great for helping us achieve our goal of helping the most people. Please rate, comment, and share.

This app should not be used to replace therapy or medication for people with untreated or uncontrolled mental illness. It is not a medical treatment.

De-StressMe provides simple Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools for managing stress, stress relief, and improving mental health.

https://www.facebook.com/DeStressM3/

recentChanges: Badges section updated.
comments: This has been a great app, it's especially useful when you're having an anxiety attack and you can't help yourself or have anyone to go to. Even if things escalate (suicidal ideation, self-harm etc) it still provides help and resources.

I have a VERY HIGH stress level.This app helps with calming my anxiety,looking at things in a more positive light,and is just THE BEST all around app that is FREE and HELPFUL.TRY IT-you'll love it,too!!!

De-stress Me is a mental well-being app based on cognitive-behavioral (CBT) techniques. I am currently a graduate student in psychology, and as such, I used this app with a discerning eye. The first time I opened the app I was greeted by a rather minimal interface with several options on the bottom of the screen, and a big de-stressMe button in the center. The options along the bottom allow you to input information including your strengths, ways to give thanks, and self-care ideas. The information that you input is used when you activate the de-stressing tool. One of the primary components of CBT is cognitive restructuring which entails challenging negative and automatic thoughts. The app cleverly integrates the information that you input into the bottom menus in order to assist you in challenging negatively oriented thoughts that you may experience during times of stress. Additionally, the app may suggest a technique that I am familiar with from my training, diaphragmatic breathing. The app does a good job of teaching and applying the basic tenants of both strategies. Overall, the app was helpful in reducing my stress and is based on sound psychological principles. I would recommend this app to anyone looking for a convenient and cost-effective way to reduce stress in their life.
Lovely, well designed and effective app. A must for those prone to stress and anxiety. Particularly love the images of progressing up a mountain in de-stress mode.
This app is really helping me! It seems simple but is highly effective the more a person practices with it. I'm glad this app is available and is free!

title: I am - Daily affirmations reminders for self care
description:
How many negative thoughts have been endlessly repeating in your mind?  The daily affirmation help rewire our brains, build self esteem and change negative thought patterns. Empower yourself by verbally affirming your dreams and ambitions. Choose from many daily intentions and set reminders to be delivered throughout the day.

Positive affirmations not only do they help make major shifts in your mindset they also serve as prompts and daily reminders on what you are truly capable of, making sure you have an amazing day, everyday.

An affirmation is a simple but powerful statement that helps to strengthen the connection between your unconscious mind and your conscious mind.
The more you strengthen this connection the more resilient you will be when difficult or challenging circumstances.

As Buddha wisely said: you become what you believe.

And the best way strengthen your resilience is to practice affirmations every single day.
There are so many benefits of using the affirmation as part of your daily morning routine:

- They help increase your awareness of your thoughts and words making it easier to recognize the negative + self-doubt thought patterns holding you back. 

- An affirmation defines your focus. When you focus your energy on the things you want: achieving your goals, the positive, uplifting + good you are creating an abundance mindset and strengthening your resolve to make it happen. 

- They open you up to possibility. Too often we get stuck in the ‚Äòimpossible‚Äô mindset, but affirmations flip this on its head. When you begin to positively affirm what is actually possible, a whole world of opportunity opens up to you.

recentChanges: New features! Check it out
comments: The UI is beautiful, however most of the affirmations are unusable. They are just written the wrong way, in the negative form, with words like "struggle", "worry", "difficulties". Words carry energy, and the right way to write positive affirmations is in the positive form with positive words, not in negating the negative. Example. Instead of "I won't worry" effective positive affirmations should use "I will relax". I down voted so many of the negative affirmations but they're just too many.
It's a good app. I just wish the other themes worked. I try to view the free add for a new theme, but it never works. Other than that, it's chill app.
The themes are a scam. Why only 1 default? Then you have to watch an ad every single time you want to switch? Ridiculous

I really can't describe it. When I came to the app store looking for a daily affirmation app, I was skeptical, I was in such a dark place, but I got this app anyway feeling desperate to find something to help me. I had to force myself to repeat each affirmation through out the day at first because I was so depressed and self hating. Now, the notification pops up, I read it and I already believe, I am loving myself more and more daily and I honestly can't believe I got that out of a simple appüíú

This app is cute & helpful but riddled with ads and that defeats the whole purpose of the app. Who needs all those interruptions when you're trying to enter a zen-like mode? You might as well pay for the dag-on app if you truly want what you came here for. I'll see how I feel about it in a few days. I feel disappointed & played.

title: Self Improvement - Building Self Confidence

All of us would like to improve on certain areas in our life. May it be for personal or professional purposes, we want to be a better version of ourselves. This Self Improvement course will teach you how to discover and love yourself, improve your self confidence and show you the importance of gratitude.
