title: Calm Harm - manages self harm
description:
Calm Harm provides tasks to help you resist or manage the urge to self-harm. Get started by setting your password so that it's completely private. 
You can personalise it if you wish, by choosing the background colour theme and deciding on whether you would like some company using a variety of friendly characters. 

The app then provides you with four categories of tasks to help you surf the urge. ‚ÄòDistract' helps in learning self-control; ‚ÄòComfort' helps you care rather than harm; 'Express yourself' gets those feelings out in a different way and ‚ÄòRelease' provides safe alternatives to self-injury. 

There is also a ‚ÄòBreathe' category to help calm and get back in control. 

You can do the activities for either blocks of five minutes or fifteen minutes with a countdown for each minute. You will be able to track your progress and notice change*. 

Calm Harm has been developed for stem4 by Dr Krause, Consultant Clinical Psychologist using the basic principles of an evidence based treatment called Dialectic Behaviour Therapy (DBT)

(*Please note the app is an aid in treatment but does not replace it.)
descriptionHTML:
Calm Harm provides tasks to help you resist or manage the urge to self-harm. Get started by setting your password so that it's completely private.
You can personalise it if you wish, by choosing the background colour theme and deciding on whether you would like some company using a variety of friendly characters.

The app then provides you with four categories of tasks to help you surf the urge. ‚ÄòDistract' helps in learning self-control; ‚ÄòComfort' helps you care rather than harm; 'Express yourself' gets those feelings out in a different way and ‚ÄòRelease' provides safe alternatives to self-injury.

There is also a ‚ÄòBreathe' category to help calm and get back in control.

You can do the activities for either blocks of five minutes or fifteen minutes with a countdown for each minute. You will be able to track your progress and notice change*.

Calm Harm has been developed for stem4 by Dr Krause, Consultant Clinical Psychologist using the basic principles of an evidence based treatment called Dialectic Behaviour Therapy (DBT)

(*Please note the app is an aid in treatment but does not replace it.)
summary: Calm Harm provides tasks that help you resist or manage the urge to self harm.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I love this app a lot! I see nothing wrong with it. And it's very creative, when I downloaded this app there was a passcode and if you don't remember it, you may reset it by awnsering a simple question.. I do not remember what I put so I had to uninstall and reinstall but that is my fault 5/5 stars

They responded to my comment VERY fast and made it so that I could use the app again! I love this app because it helps me relieve my stress and keeps me safe. I would recommend this app to anyone who struggles with the urge to self-harm because it works wonders for me. If you struggle with the urge to self-harm, PLEASE consider this app!

The app has an amazing selection of helpful activities, however for some reason it struggles to load up initially, as well as loading up things like the log. I've restarted my phone, force closed the app and reopened it, my next option is reinstalling it but if that doesn't work then I'm forced to try other apps, which may not give me nearly as many options for calming myself down so I don't self harm.

Hiya! I just wanna drop by and thank you for making all these mental health apps. I rarely ever see good mental health apps like this and I'm just so thankful that you guys are doing it. Self harm is a very serious struggle and I'm glad that there's more apps to help with it. I'm espically glad that you are making it free because lots of people can't pay for it and by making free, you guys are helping so many more people. Thank you for helping out and spreading more awareness!!! <3

It's great but could you maybe make a 'hide' function? That would be awesome because a lot of people judge when they see apps like this on my phone. So could you maybe have an option to disguise it, like say a calculator.

title: ThinkUp - Positive Affirmations, Daily Motivation
description:
The most popular iPhone app for Positive Affirmations and Motivation is available for Android!
What stops you from achieving goals or becoming who you want to be? Build your own self improvement program to develop the mindset and motivation you need to succeed, using personal affirmations in the most effective way.

Our mindsets and thoughts have enormous impact on our motivation, self-esteem, health, prosperity, and happiness. Positive self-talk is a simple and proven technique practiced by psychologists and life coaches to overcome challenges and achieve goals.

FIND INSPIRATION
Select affirmations from a professionally edited list or just use them as inspiration and create your own.

PERSONALIZE YOUR AFFIRMATIONS
Record in the voice your brain truly trusts and understands - your own

SET NOTIFICATIONS AND LISTEN DAILY
It takes time to change wrong patterns that are deeply embedded in us. Focusing on the same set of affirmations helps developing new, positive thoughts and reduces negative self-talk

ADD MUSIC
Inspiring music makes the experience enjoyable and relaxing.

1000+ AFFIRMATIONS FOR:
Daily Motivation
Better Sleep
Self-Esteem
Positivity and Positive Thinking
Stress Relief, Relaxation, and Calm
Bipolar Disorder Help
Health and Mental Health
Body Image
Weight Loss
Pregnancy and Parenting
Overcome Anxiety
Overcome Depression
New Career
Love & Relationships
Affirmations Meditation
Success
Self-Care
Spirituality
Gratitude
Happiness
Self-Love
Sports Motivation, Student Motivation
Commuting to work
Mindfulness
Walking Meditation
Morning routine
Stretching
Entrepreneurship, Creativity, Affirmations for Women, Kids, and Students, and many more affirmations recommended by the top personal growth gurus.
We're grateful to Joel Osteen for recommending the Pray and Daily Devotionals Affirmations!
Thank you, Hal Elrod, for your Miracle Morning Affirmations!
Thank you, all our users for the amazing affirmations you send us daily and contribute to our "Recommended by users Category". 

FREE vs. PREMIUM
We offer a free access to hundreds of professionally edited affirmations as well as an option to create a sample recording in your own voice with four affirmations and one default music that all the users can record for a for life usage. For better results, we recommend upgrading to Premium and recording at least ten affirmations. Premium version also allows to change the background music and offers additional features to enhance your practice and achieve more. 
The premium plans are:
* Monthly subscription for $2.99 (US dollars, please check the pricing in your local currency)
* For life access with a one time payment of $19.99 

RECOMMENDATIONS AND SUCCESS STORIES
ThinkUp is recommended by top personal development specialists, business and life coaches, psychologists, and therapists. Please check www.thinkup.me for recommendations and reviews.

We encourage you to utilize what many already know; our mind is the key to a good, happy, and prosperous life. Finally! A wellness app that speaks to you... Literally.

BEST PRACTICE TIPS
- We recommend selecting at least 15 affirmations
- While recording your affirmations, mean it!
- Play your affirmations in a loop for 10 minutes, at least once a day before going to sleep. Morning practice is recommended as well for daily motivation boost
- Listen to the same set of affirmations for at least 21 days. Repetition makes all the difference
- Use headphones
- Watch this video for more details: www.youtube.com/watch?v=W0D5HD0U7p8
- Some great blogs and resources by our amazing community are availbale to learn about ThinkUp. Read more: http://thinkup.me/press/
- Think Up!

***ThinkUp needs access to:
* Photo/Media/Files - to use your favorite personal music
* Microphone - to allow recording affirmations in your voice
* Device ID & call information - to determine if there is an incoming call and automatically stop playing the recording
* In-app purchases

recentChanges:
*Bugs fixed* no abrupt stop

*New* A morning alarm! In Menu->Reminders, check the "Make it an alarm" and affirmations will play automatically. Or just set a morning notification. In this case you will receive a reminder, but affirmations will not play automatically.
*New* background songs

If you're seeing any issues, please let us know ASAP and we will fix everything. Thank you for understanding!
comments: Glad I purchased the Premium. Couple of feedbacks and preferences I've noticed since using this for a few weeks now. I wish there was a better way to construct different and multiple playlists. I have multiple playlists for very diff topics. Sometimes I wish I could play all of them while I sleep. Sometimes I wish I can play some. But it's designed to only play 1 playlist, and you can't modify it without changing the name of the affirmation altogether.

I love the concept for the app, however, there are a handful of small usability issues that become really annoying the more you use the app. 1) No filter or search on affirmation record screen 2) No way to select multiple hashtag playlist for playback 3) No integrated way to stream own music while listening to affirmations. Dropping music vol in thinkup and opening other app causes affirmations to not be loud enough. Still like it a lot, though.

*Edit: THIS APP DOESN'T WORK ON MORE THAN ONE DEVICE. There is no "restore purchase" option on my second phone when I download the app, because it DOES recognize that I've already got the premium plan. However, none of my recordings are there. I would have to re-record everything to use this on my other phone.This is a fatal flaw. Can you please fix this so the app can be used on multiple devices?

I like that I can record my affirmations in my own voice. There are a lot of affirmations to choose from and I can edit them to make them personal to me. It would help if there were suggestions given on what background music to use to reach your desired goal. You can also change the level of your voice to the background on the paid version but no guidance is given. Also, the Android version is much cheaper than the one for my iPhone which I thought was weird.

Unfortunately, the Android version isn't fully updated with all the features that the Apple version has. I hope you will update it asap. I bought the Premium version on Android and was dissapointed to see features missing: there is no option to control the speed of the loop of affirmations and there is no Stats tab with statistics about your progress. Such a shame!

title: Know Yourself Personality Tests by Excel At Life
description:
Test yourself and your friends to compare test results. The results are meant as a guide to help you improve your life and your relationships.

How compatible is your relationship?
‚Ä¢ Both you and your friend can take the tests and obtain compatibility info when you compare your results.
Purpose: To help discuss and analyze relationships.

Do you really know yourself?
‚Ä¢ Have a friend take a test about you and compare results.
CAUTION: Be prepared to learn things you might not want to know.

How Do You Compare to Friends?
‚Ä¢ Compare your results to friends who take the tests on the same device or input their final test scores into your device.

What Is Your Ideal Self?
‚Ä¢ Compare your results with your ideal results to see where you want to make changes.

Content
‚Ä¢ Includes over 40 tests covering more than 100 personality characteristics
‚Ä¢ Personality analysis
‚Ä¢ For self knowledge
‚Ä¢ For self-improvement/self-help
‚Ä¢ For love and dating compatibility - find out about issues that could cause problems in your relationship
‚Ä¢ For understanding friendships, relationships - quiz others
‚Ä¢ Examine self-esteem, work ethic, mental health and much more
‚Ä¢ Based upon psychological research

Some of the tests
‚Ä¢ Your Happiness Assessment - 14 characteristics of happy people
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Personality Test - 45 traits
‚Ä¢ Cognitive Styles Test -- 13 styles of thinking
‚Ä¢ How Social Are You?
‚Ä¢ Are You A Leader?
‚Ä¢ Are You Conscientious?
‚Ä¢ Perfectionist or Efficient?
‚Ä¢ How Rational Are You?
‚Ä¢ How Insightful Are You?
‚Ä¢ How Creative Are You?
‚Ä¢ How Romantic Are You?
‚Ä¢ Do You Have Anxiety?
‚Ä¢ Do You Have Depression?
‚Ä¢ How Optimistic Are You?
‚Ä¢ What Is Your Self-Concept?
‚Ä¢ Do You Forgive Easily?
‚Ä¢ Do You Have Anger Problems?
‚Ä¢ Self-Control Problems?
‚Ä¢ How Persistent Are You?
‚Ä¢ Do You Have Fear Avoidance?
‚Ä¢ Do You Live Life Fully?
‚Ä¢ How Stressed Are You?
‚Ä¢ Are You Ambitious?
‚Ä¢ How Do You Handle A Crisis?
‚Ä¢ How Mature Are You?

About the developer
This app is based upon research in personality psychology and sponsored by a clinical psychologist specializing in cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT). It is meant for self-help and personality assessment for personal improvement and determining relationship compatibility issues. 

Keep in mind that research-based personality tests may be repetitive, obvious, and even boring to take (especially the longer ones). The purpose is to help you honestly assess yourself and give guidance.

Test results are saved and can be password protected.

All about app is good but here some language problem is created when use this ...but all over the app is good even I more excited to know my self üòäüôÇ I really know much things about me I enjoyed this app üíñ

title: MindShift CBT - Anxiety and Panic Relief
description:
Break free from anxiety and stress using this free evidence-based anxiety management app. MindShift CBT uses scientifically proven strategies based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT). 

MindShift CBT is a free self-help anxiety relief app that helps you reduce worry, stress, and panic by following evidence-based strategies. Using CBT tools, you can challenge negativity, learn more about anxiety, develop more effective ways of thinking, be mindful, and relax.

If you are looking for anxiety, stress, and panic relief, you have come to the right place. Download MindShift CBT for free on your Android device, learn more about anxiety, practice cognitive behavioral therapy, and reduce the amount of worry, panic, social anxiety, and discomfort from phobias that you experience. 

The go-to app for anxiety management

MindShift CBT, the free anxiety relief app, comes with a clean and user-friendly design that allows you to learn and practice CBT strategies in an easy and intuitive way.  We have specifically designed the app to be your free and portable go-to tool for anxiety management.

Learn about the different CBT strategies, including writing thought journals, challenging yourself with belief experiments, building fear ladders, and doing comfort zone challenges. Listen to calming audio to reframe your thoughts, practice mindfulness, and stay grounded. All of the exercises are presented in small chunks with plenty of supporting information to help you naturally integrate these strategies with the rest of your life. 

To assist you, MindShift CBT includes additional features that help keep you on track. Stay accountable and track your progress with the check-in feature, which allows you to record and view graphs and journal entries. You can also set goals for yourself and get reminders. If you choose to, you can also easily export and share your data via email to streamline sessions with any therapists, counsellors, or psychologists you may be working with. 

Give MindShift CBT a try and find relief today!

MindShift CBT is packed with loads of evidence-based and trusted features to help you with anxiety management. With this app, we hope that you will be better equipped to manage anxiety, find relief from panic attacks, overcome your fears, and hopefully, ease your own mind. 

The app is completely free, so there is no harm in giving it a try and exploring the features for yourself. 

MindShift main features at a glance:
‚Ä¢	Clean, welcoming, and user-friendly intuitive design
‚Ä¢	Evidence-based strategies and tools based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) designed for anxiety relief and self-management
‚Ä¢	Daily check-in to keep track of your anxiety level and mood
‚Ä¢	Easy to follow guides on learning about anxiety
‚Ä¢	Facts and tips to overcome general worry, social anxiety, perfectionism, panic attack, and phobias
‚Ä¢	Goal setting tools to keep you accountable 
‚Ä¢	Coping cards and statements to help you ride out your anxiety (and the ability to add your own!)
‚Ä¢	Guided relaxation and mindfulness meditations to ground you and give relief
‚Ä¢	Belief experiments to challenge the beliefs that fuel anxiety
‚Ä¢	Tips and tricks for incorporating healthy habits into your life and minimizing anxiety naturally
‚Ä¢	Sharing and data exporting (if you choose) to streamline sessions with your counsellor, therapist, or psychologist
‚Ä¢	Finally: it is free to use!

So, download MindShift CBT on your Android phone or tablet/iPhone or iPad device now, and get ready to take charge of your mental health and find anxiety relief. Learn to be more mindful, incorporate CBT techniques in your daily life, and stay accountable and motivated on your anxiety management journey. 

Stay tuned for more updates, and let us know about any bugs, questions, feature requests, or any other suggestions. We are always looking to improve the app and we appreciate all of your feedback!

developerAddress: 311 - 409 Granville Street, Vancouver,  BC  V6C 1T2  Canada
recentChanges:
Thank you for all your patience and support! We have improved our app‚Äôs performance and made it bilingual (French and English).
Switch the language of your device to French if you want to use MindShift in French.
comments: A good app for very basic, grounded challenges people with simple lives might face. It's very lacking, however, when it comes to greater, more complex, interconnected challenges. At its core it assumes changing thinking or taking certain action will improve things, but that isn't always true. It's for mainstream issues. If you have some self-mastery, you'll need a better app, or this one will need upgrading. Many of the default options only scratch the surface. Great for teenagers/young adults.
This apps discusses the social anxiety disorder in great depth. It really works!
Unable to get anywhere.. the App won't download ~ this is worsening my anxiety.

This app is helpful for anyone because everyone gets anxious and often don't know how to deal with it well. This app gives you the tools to do that. You can label how you feel, explain why you feel that way, learn ways to reframe your thoughts using the coping cards and so much more. I haven't been using this for long, but I have a feeling this will change your life for the better if you using it regularly and take advantage of the resources on this app.

It started well, but today I faced the same issue as others: my checkins and experiences were removed 4 days in the past, and I only made summaries once a day. That was the most useful feature for me. Bummer.

title: Sanity & Self: anxiety stress relief, sleep sounds

Sanity & Self is THE #1 Self-Care App for Women! Manage your anxiety, reduce stress, get better sleep, heal heartbreak, and gain self-love!

comments: I love this app so much! It's a great source of positivity, focus, self-healing & overall happiness, health & empowerment for women. I'd slacked on using it for a while, & let me tell you... I was really feeling a lot better about myself & my life when I was consistently making time for this. I need to really shave my budget rn, & intended to cancel the Premium version, but I just used it again this morning, & it offers SO much. If you actually *use* it, I think $10/mo is actually a steal. ‚ù§
I was able to listen to 1 self help session. After that everything else you have to be a premium member for. It's very disappointing.

I have laughed and cried, and had major light bulbs go off... I have gone through over a hundred apps to find something that not only makes sense, but is more than affordable... I haven't slept this well in over 2 decades, and I can't remember when I felt this much hope. Thank you so much!

I have a few different categories chosen. When I entered the app today to continue my sessions there was a recommended lesson that wasn't there yesterday or the day before. I'm already listening to 4 different lessons, and the recommended lesson REMOVED a one that I was actually listening to DAILY, causing me to have to search the app for the lesson that was removed. I cant even remove the recommended lesson. If I wanted another lesson, I would search for it myself. I can't save my lessons :/

This is such a great app. Totally worth the membership! The experts are very relatable, self love, self care, self evaluations - you name it, it s there. All for YOU, about YOU! Thank you SS! Literally a life changer!

title: Stop Panic & Anxiety Self-Help
description:
LEARN TO CONTROL PANIC AND GET RELIEF FROM ANXIETY

Self-Help for Panic Disorder

The info in this app assumes that the user is suffering from panic attacks due to Panic Disorder. It may not be applicable to other forms of anxiety. It focuses on the fear of having a panic attack and the fear of the sensations when having a panic.

CONTAINS
***Articles about panic/anxiety and cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)
***Anxiety Cognitive Diary to learn to challenge fearful thinking
***Emotion Training Audio to learn to access calming states
***Relaxation Audios to learn deep relaxation
***Panic Assistance Audio to coach through panic attacks
***Password protection available

NOTE: All audios can be downloaded from ExcelAtLife.com

Use Panic Assistance audio to coach you when you experience a panic attack and to help you learn to tolerate and control the anxiety symptoms. Also, can be used to assist with exposure therapy for Agoraphobia.

The Panic Assistance audio is not a relaxation or hypnosis audio. It is meant to be firm so as to get your attention while having a panic attack. Relaxation or hypnosis audios are not very useful during a panic. They may be useful to prevent panic, but this audio is focused on reminding you that panic won't harm you and that you can tolerate the unpleasant sensations of panic.

Emotion Training audio can be used as relaxation or you can use it to learn how to access emotions such as calmness or strength when you need to. The audio trains the brain to pair the emotions with certain colors and once you have learned the process, you can elicit the emotions you desire by imagining the paired color flowing through you.

Links to articles at ExcelAtLife.com to help you understand the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) approach for anxiety and Panic Disorder. 

The general idea of CBT is to repeat rational statements that challenge the irrational fears until the rational beliefs become stronger than the fears. Since it is difficult for a person to do this while having a panic attack, the panic assistance audio in this app helps you to do this. This self-help method can provide the coaching many people need to cope with panic. However, some people may need therapeutic help in addition to this.

Use the relaxation audio to improve your anxiety management skills. Learn to reduce stress and to relax your body using Qi Gong and additional relaxation audios by Excel At Life.

Also, look for "The Worry Box" app for audio to create imagery to reduce worry and related anxiety.

Reason for permissions:
1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)
2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card
3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audios

recentChanges:
4.1.2 Fixed showing saved entry instead of new entry
Fixed date issue
comments: I use this app daily. In addition to informative articles, there are a variety of audios. I especially appreciate the one on anxiety attacks - I'm prone to them - and it works every time. In addition, there's also a cognituve diary/journal and you can have access to an online source as well. I highly recommend this app.

I just downloaded the app and haven't had a chance to use it, but what stands out immediately is that an anti-anxiety app should perhaps try for a bit calmer, simpler look. The font and colours are actually making me anxious. I'll still give it a shot, but a more minimal look would go far in improving user experience.

I have experienced real support from this app, when caught up in anxiety in middle of the night, as well as relaxing before going to sleep. Therefore very disappointed that it does not work anymore on my new phone...

This app has helped me so many times in calming me when panic strikes. Its as if Im sitting in the therapists office and she talking me through the entire attack. Wonderful self help tool and you choose if you want music or not, which I prefer not. It also has many different audios you can choose for your liking. I very highly recommend this app.
The best help for panic attack I've ever found! I use it for assistance and I'm learning to tolerate my bad thoughts and fisical reaction caused by panic attack. Thank you so much

title: Smarter Time - Time Management - Productivity
description:
Update: in addition to Windows and Mac computer clients, we have now added a Linux client for our open software users!

Boost your time management. Strike the right work-life balance. Control your phone time, improve your focus and your productivity. 

Effective time tracking is the best way to get your productivity, your focus and your happiness back. Smarter Time tracks your time around the clock, and adapts to your personal goals and needs.

We all lack time. Knowing ourselves isn't easy and time management doesn't come naturally to us. Bad time management leads to stress, burnout and bad work-life balance! 

Smarter Time is an automatic time tracker for all your time management needs. 
It‚Äôs a productivity app. 
It's a phone time control and focus implement.
It‚Äôs a self-improvement tool.
It‚Äôs your new personal assistant.

How it works:

1. Our learning brain guesses where you are and what you do.
2. It creates a detailed time log of all your activities, whether you're reading, sleeping, showering or watching TV.
3. You get precise analytics of your time use; a comprehensive, automatic time tracker at your fingertips.

Some of the ways you can use Smarter Time:

‚òÖ A time log of your daily schedule.
‚òÖ A phone time control tool to keep your focus in check.
‚òÖ Big picture analytics to properly understand your time use.
‚òÖ A productivity app to track the distractions that eat away at your focus.
‚òÖ A goal setter to build better habits.
‚òÖ A self-improvement tool to achieve proper work-life balance.
‚òÖ A time manager for your personal and professional projects.
‚òÖ A sleep tracker to make sure you always get the rest you need.
‚òÖ A time tracker to get back in touch with yourself.

It‚Äôs smarter time tracking and smarter time management for a smarter life!

Our privacy promise

Your privacy is very important to us. By default, all your data is kept on your phone, not on our servers, and if you don't activate the save/restore feature, it will never leave your device. Your time is the most private thing you have, and we intend for it to stand that way!

-- Lite version features --

- Automatic time tracking of all activities
- Comprehensive minute-level time log
- Detailed habit learning
- Place detection
- Movements and physical activity recording
- Google calendar integration
- Phone time control
- Time spent on computer
- Thorough analytics
- Weekly reports
- Goals
- Map view

-- Plus version features --

Everything in the Lite version, Plus:

- Detailed computer usage
- Room detection
- Custom category and activity classification
- Data save and restore
- Unlimited assistant usage


-- Known issues --

- Some Android 5.0 LG and Samsung phones do not give access to app usage stats
- Some phones (mostly Samsung, Huawei and Honor, Xiaomi) may kill the app frequently. You can add Smarter Time to a list of protected apps to keep the automatic time tracking working in the background.

-- Help us improve --

We're very keen on hearing from our users, and always ready to take their feedback on board! If you have anything you want to tell us, or any question you'd like to ask us, about automatic time tracking, time management or work-life balance in general, please drop us a line at hello@smartertime.com

title: ALL STRONG - Mind & Body
description:
ALL STRONG is a Community of peers dedicated to the improvement and self management of mental wellbeing, with a focus on physical activity, simple relaxations, and the power of peer support and exchange. 

This community highlights positive mental health and wellbeing as a primary goal in participating in any kind of physical activity. This powerful tool of self management, especially when combined with simple relaxations, and encouraged and inspired by a supportive community of peers, can form the basis of a strategy for the self management of a number of common mental health conditions, in addition to developing confidence and building resilience and coping ability. 

CONNECT, SUPPORT & INSPIRE, yourself and others to become and stay physically active for the benefit of your mental wellbeing! 

BENEFIT from accessing our exclusive community features: 
- private groups covering a range of wellbeing and mental health topics, recovery as well as physical activity interests 
- exclusive small support groups to help you share the journey, get started and keep going, with mutual motivation, sharing aspirations, struggles and achievements 
- inspiring stories with regular new content, including interviews, community stories, podcasts, livestreams

title: Gratitude - Journal App, Daily Zen & Affirmations
description:
The Gratitude app has the following features:
In the Free Version, you can:
1. Write unlimited Journal entries and Positive Affirmations in the app. Your data is completely private and is inaccessible by anyone but you.
2. Set Multiple Reminders for writing your Journal and Affirmations.
3. Add Images and Colours to personalize your Journal and Affirmations.
4. Set up a Passcode Lock using fingerprint or code to protect your data.
5. Export your Journal entries in CSV Format.
6. Receive Daily Zen with a Daily quote and an affirmation to motivate you on your Gratitude Journey.
7. Get beautiful Prompts as reminders to write your Journal.


In the Pro Version, you can:
1. Backup your Journal and Restore using your Google Drive account. 
2. Add Multiple Photos to a Journal Entry. In the free version, you can attach only one.
3. Save your favourite Daily Quotes from the Daily Zen.
4. Search through your Journal.
5. Export your Journal in a beautiful PDF format.

What our users love the most in the app:
1. Ability to set multiple reminders.
2. The Daily Quotes
3. Colors and the Ability to add Images.
4. Passcode protection.


The app was built out of personal need to bring a self-transformation. The basic nature of our mind is to dwell in the past or to worry about the future. Our lives have so become busy and stressful preoccupied with distractions that we let go our mind to enjoy the present. This results in helplessness, fear, negativity, depression and unhappiness. And the antidote to our unhappiness isn‚Äôt the newest thing, the latest diet fad, or the next achievement. The antidote is Gratitude. 

Here's how you can benefit from Gratitude Journaling. Keeping a Gratitude Journal and practicing Gratitude
1. Increases your happiness
2. Improves your Mental Health
3. Helps you savor Positive Experiences
4. Helps you to cope with major life challenges.
5. Fosters Resilience.
6. Boosts your Self esteem.
7. Fosters Empathy.
8. Gives you a better night's sleep.
9. Strengthens Relationships.

Being grateful & thankful for all of the blessings you have makes you feel good about yourself. You realize that there are so many reasons to be grateful, and your self-esteem is elevated. When you feel good about yourself & happy with who you are, you will find that this attitude also raises how you view your own life & the world around you. As such, gratitude creates positive emotions, like joy, love, and contentment, which research shows can undo the grip of negative emotions, like anxiety.

There are several incredible books like The Secret, The Magic by Rhonda Byrne, The Power of your Subconscious Mind by Joseph Murphy, Gratitude Diaries and Simple Abundance that have explained how Gratitude works wonders in bringing the change in our lives. There are several personal coaches, mindfulness coaches, yoga trainers & mentors that have found Gratitude journaling to be the best start towards self development and self love. It‚Äôs not always easy to effectively deal with tough situations like abusive relationships, financial crunch, grief, trauma, depression and attracting the wrong people and circumstances in our life. And at these times especially, it‚Äôs tough to bring a self change and change the circumstances. Keeping a Gratitude Journal and Practicing Positive Affirmations could be great start and baby steps towards shifting your negative energies to positive.

If you have any questions about the app or getting start with your Gratitude Journaling Journey, please don't hesitate to write to me at sankherpritesh@gmail.com

You can find the Privacy Policy for the app here: https://gratefulness.me/privacypolicy.html
Please find Terms & Conditions here: http://bit.ly/3077uoX

üìß Write to me with any feedback at sankherpritesh@gmail.com
comments: 10/2020 EDIT TO UPDATE: I took a brief break from the app. When I signed (about 4 months of this post) it won't let me access my old entries. I'd love to see my growth. Maybe I'm missing something.... this app has taught me how to be happy again. I began with 2 entries a day and now when I'm bored I get on just to journal. it's great therapy!

This is a really slick and effective app. Simple, like all the best things, and good at stimulating the habit of daily gratitude. I especially like the daily zen quotes - I come back for these and it helps me remember to write something positive too. Great job!!

Over time, this app has vastly improved my outlook on life! Every day I find myself appreciating so many things I once took for granted, and it is changing me into a happier, more peaceful person! Even during Covid + tense political scenario! I would give it 10 stars if I could!

I liked the concept. here are my suggestions..the affirmations can be made editable or removable. I couldn't change them or even the topics I want to see further once I chose them. I couldn't here the affirmations even though there is a play mode.
It's a really good app, the display is great and the reminders work fine. They should add the option of filling in a gratitude note at any time in the past and not just limit it to 3 days.

title: MoodSpace - Stress, anxiety, & low mood self-help
description:
Imagine something‚Ä¶
You're not feeling your best. You might call it stress, anxiety, depression, low mood, or something completely different. What you do know is that you want to do something about it.

So where do you begin?

Enter the world of MoodSpace
MoodSpace brings together techniques from cognitive behavioural therapy, mindfulness based cognitive therapy, positive psychology, and behavioural activation into a self-help space for mental wellbeing to guide you in managing and improving your mental health.
Techniques such as recognising three good things in a gratitude journal and balancing automatic thoughts in the cbt thought record are grounded in decades of research on what makes us happy.

Three Clouds 
Notice life's good moments by writing a delightful three good things in a gratitude journal and note the good things that are all too often forgotten.

Three Clouds is based on the gratitude journal from Positive Psychotherapy. By writing three good things each day the aim is to reduce worry, improve self-esteem, help cope with stress, and more.

Thought Diary 
Look at stressful situations in a healthy, balanced way. Prevent rumination by using the thought record to challenge automatic thinking and gain a new understanding of stressful situations.

The thought dairy (or thought record) is a tool used in CBT to reframe thinking. By analysing thinking patterns in the cbt thought record it helps you to recognise and balance unhelpful thought patterns.

Guided Meditation
Focus on your breath, re-focus, and become more mindful by learning to meditate. Take your first steps into mindfulness by listening to a selection of guided meditations. Or use the custom meditation timer with a selection of calming nature sounds. Cultivating this sense of mindfulness can help prevent rumination and help cope with stress. 

Day Planner
Schedule your time in this activity planner based on what brings you fulfilment. Rediscover what brings you happiness and make the plans that bring those things back into your life. Ensure your life has balance by making plans around work, fun, and rest to help reduce stress.

At your fingertips
MoodSpace techniques are designed to be as simple as possible to use.

The three good things technique can be used daily to keep track of the little things. And this gratitude journal can be looked back on in the future whenever you're in need of a smile.

The thought diary cbt is good to use at a moments notice when a stressful situation occurs. To quickly cope with stress and get back on with your day.

A wellbeing app driven by the research

If you suffer from anxiety or depression, you are far from being alone: It has been estimated that today, there are over 260 million people around the world dealing with depression and 280 million dealing with anxiety. 

MoodSpace takes its techniques from decades of research on what helps in dealing with anxiety and dealing with depression, and brings those techniques to your fingertips.

The app aims to create a self-help space where you will have the opportunity to experiment with techniques backed by research to see what works for you. 

Using this knowledge, we encourage you to carry out your own, further research into your favourite techniques. Your continued learning can build the coping strategies which enable you to cope with stress and manage low mood

The information to bring you happiness is out there but therapy is all too often prohibitively expensive or inaccessible. We think everyone should have access to these tools. 

You will never be alone, and we hope this app will provide the self-help tools which guide you to a happier life.

----------

MoodSpace isn't a replacement for therapy or treatment ‚Äì it's simply an introduction to mental wellbeing techniques and provides a self-help space to learn about yourself.

We always recommend you speak to your doctor to access the treatment available to you.

comments: *Update: Wow!! Only 4‚Ç¨ for a full subscription!! Thank you guys!! the new features are also great!!! *I don't know yet how affordable is this app, i fear i won't be able to purchase it after they reintroduce the paying plans. But i am really thankful for this free period, i feel it helps and i really needed a good tool to help me regain balance at this strange, unpredictable time. Thank you! Great and beautiful app! üôè

I initially installed it because of the aesthetic appeal. Recently I have been using the planne function regularly and it is really great to have the three subsections for work, play and test. It helps me make sure that these needs are balanced. I try to fill the three clouds when I remember, but I'm not yet regular with it. The Thought Diary function was immensely helpful in a difficult situation. Even my therapist was really impressed by this app. Thank you so much!

I'm currently using the free section but helps as have to think and find the positive in the day and why do I think its happend. It helps to re read when going through a rough day and realising that you have more good days if you find the good.

I like it so far. Would be usefull to have it on other languages. Really like the rabbit on app icon, It may sound crazy üòÑ but every day I remind my self to speak with rabbit, share my thoughts with him and try to stay positive. It is so easy to forget how much I have done before and go down by judging and critisizing myself for being lazy. Day planner helps to realize that this is just negative thinking. title: HelpMeFocus - Block Apps, Stay Focused.
description:
HelpMeFocus - Block Apps, Stay Focused is a distraction app blocker self control app that helps you stay focused by enabling app block. Give yourself an Offtime from digital distractions. With this timeful app, you can -
 
‚Ä¢ Reduce Distractions and Stay Focused during study time, work time or your productive time.
‚Ä¢ App block leads to increased productivity by staying away from distractions and being focused. 
‚Ä¢ Block Whatsapp, block Facebook, block Instagram, block Netflix, block Youtube or block any social media apps and stop procrastinating during productive time.
‚Ä¢ Increase self-control and overcome smartphone addiction and stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Limit app usage and stay focused by restricting yourself to use the locked app only for few minutes.
 
How to use:
‚Ä¢ Create a scheduled profile to enable app block and block notifications on selected days and time frame.
‚Ä¢ Limit any app usage time to configured time such as browsing Facebook for 30 min a day or using Instagram for 1 hour a day.
‚Ä¢ Block apps instantly by choosing the distracting apps and setting the timer count.
‚Ä¢ Enable/disable the app blocker profiles based on requirement.
‚Ä¢ Enable SuperStrictMode feature in the app block settings to prevent HelpMeFocus uninstallation.
 
Features:
‚Ä¢ Best App Block- Set motivating quotes to inspire you every time you try to access a blocked app 
‚Ä¢ Focus lock - Helps you stay focused by restricting app usage every time you get distracted 
‚Ä¢ Offtime - Block distracting apps for selected period of time 
‚Ä¢ Clear Lock - Security password restricts you and others from making modifications to app block profiles 
‚Ä¢ Notification blocker - Mute notifications from distracting apps and stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Notification history - Check muted notifications without having the need to open the locked apps.
‚Ä¢ Instantly block apps - Select distracting apps and lock apps instantly for a period of time (up to 60 mins).
‚Ä¢ Duplicate app profiles - Duplicate an existing app block profile and modify it as per your self-control needs.
‚Ä¢ Block the app blocker - Block HelpMeFocus application by choosing it in the application list to be blocked to enforce self-control and avoid profile/settings modifications.
‚Ä¢ Study helper app - Block all unnecessary distracting apps and notifications and concentrate on studies better. 
 
Premium Features :
 
‚Ä¢ Super Strict Mode to prevent app uninstallation and modifying active app block profile.
‚Ä¢ Instant Block Pro to block distracting apps instantly for up to 12 Hours.
‚Ä¢ Smart Unblock Pro  lets you use a blocked app for a brief period of time - 5 mins,10 mins and then restricts you from using the app.
‚Ä¢ Uninstall Prevention to stop you from HelpMeFocus app uninstallation when you're desperate to use blocked apps.
 
Permissions needed
 
‚Ä¢ Usage Access Permission- Required to identify foreground applications and restrict it from usage based on app block profiles.
‚Ä¢ Notification Access Permission - Required to mute notifications based on app block profile settings.
‚Ä¢ Device Administrator permission - Required to enable Super Strict mode and prevent HelpMeFocus app uninstallation.
 
Please be assured that HelpMeFocus - Block Distractions, Stay Focused will never use these permissions to access your private data.
 
IMPORTANT NOTE FOR HUAWEI/XIAOMI USERS Huawei and Xiaomi devices have task killer services that interfere with this app. To ensure it works properly you need to add this app to the allowed apps in security settings. 
 
In case of concerns with the app blocker, please provide feedback to - dsimpletools.helpmefocus@gmail.com. We will be more than happy to help you out.

comments: During password setup, the feature to have an email recovery for your password does not work, as it never sends out the verification token email (I have the premium version). Only rated as 1 star to get a reply and will adjust this to 5 stars immediately after that issue is fixed. This is a 5 star app otherwise and would definitely recommend.

Good app, I have a suggestion to create a profile that allow you to access the entire application on the profile only certain minutes/hour per day, it's like if I create a profile called "game" I only can play game for 1 hour, not for each game 1 hour but all the game is 1 hour total. But don't delete the current time limit profile, just add a new one (sorry for my bad English)

This app has helped me so much! I set a limit for not using social media apps starting an hour before I go to bed, so that i can start unwinding from my day and so that I am not up late scrolling. I have been getting so much more sleep since using this app!

This is an app I love as much as I hate. Blocks you from your constant tendency to pick up the handset and spend mindless time on various apps you don't need. For someone with low attention span like me, this app forces focus. 5 stars for that!
This is my favorite app blocker! Ill have to update again in a month after using it consistently hut this has been my favorite for a while now. The profiles make it so easy to set things up.

title: ethio Self Care
description:
Ethio Self care is an application that enables Ethiopian telecommunication customers to use Ethio telecom services, including charging air time, balance checking, buying Gebeta packages and so on, easily by aggregating the USSD and SMS based service delivery into one application.

Ethio Telecom provides many USSD and SMS based services. However, the traditional way of following through USSD interaction is not attractive and is complicated. Our app, ethio SelfCare, has integrated all these services into one; 
üëâ	It provides an easy and attractive interface for you to have a better experience and smooth interaction.
üëâ	It reduces the time spent while using Ethio Telecom services through manual USSD.
üëâ	It provides a better interface for Ethio Gebeta packeges in a way that is easy to choose and manage.

Features:
‚òÖ Services to manage your mobile balance: check balance, recharge balance, transfer balance, send call me back, and pay bills.
‚òÖ Buy Ethio Gebeta packages: Voice, Internet and SMS packages.
‚òÖ Credit service: Check eligibility for a loan, take a loan and know your debt.
‚òÖ Data plan: Integrated with the Internet Gebeta package, it lets you track your package plan.
‚òÖ Data usage: Monitor your data usage on mobile, data and WiFi.
‚òÖ Additional services: Call waiting and call forwarding.
‚òÖ Multi-language support: It supports ·ä†·àõ·à≠·äõ, Afaan Oromoo, ·âµ·åç·à≠·äõ, Somali and English.
‚òÖ Featured: Gives you an easy way to get to the service you frequently use.
‚òÖ History: track your service usage such as what you bought and requested while using the app.
‚òÖ Get Ethio Telecom services within few clicks and save your time by avoiding USSD hassle.

Every feature and services implemented in this app is provided by Ethio Telecom, what we did is provide an easy and stylish interface so that users can use Ethio telecom's services easily.

Your comments, reviews, and rating are always appreciated. Thank you for using Ethio SelfCare app. 

Bazeni Tech!

title: Bearable - Symptoms & Mood tracker
description:
‚úÖ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.  

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note. 
‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements. 
‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶

‚ûï Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether it's a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements. 
‚ûï Share and Export -  Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
‚ûï Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
‚ûï Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
‚ûï Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time.  It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with mental and physical health issues themselves.  With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.  Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most.  We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health.  If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to james@bearable.app.  We‚Äôd love to hear from you.

comments: This is absolutely the best of its kind. I have never seen such a comprehensive, customizable, well-designed app that serves as many functions as this one. I've already shown it to multiple friends/therapists. For those of you moaning about the cost... seriously, getting the subscription will set you back just over $2/month. I work professionally with highly impoverished individuals who do have to count every penny, but come on. Most people can shell out a couple bucks without harm.

The app lets you log your mood, any symptoms you are having, and a number of factors that you think may be affecting your mood/symptoms. The default categories to log are good, but you can add/remove/edit all of the categories to fit you better. It's super easy to fill out, even when I'm not feeling well. It (sometimes) feels like I'm logging meaningless information, but then when I click on the Insights tab, it shows me tons of relevant information about which factors are influencing my mood (or any other symptom I log!). Turns out listening to music and video chats work wonders for my mood--good to know! This is also a wonderful way to record how I'm feeling over time--it lets me easily decipher long-term changes in my wellbeing, which is great information to discuss with medical professionals.

I really like this app, it's easy to use and the design is nice and the ability to customize it to your needs is great. However, the syncing isn't very reliable. I have a phone and a tablet, and downloaded it on both, I tried to log in on the tablet, and only a few entries were visible. Later I went to look at the one on my phone, and half the entries are gone, and so are factors I added. I want to keep using this app, but if it's going to randomly forget things that's a problem.

I have tried multiple times in the past to find a way that I could easily log my moods in a way that felt nuanced and meaningful but also flexible and customizable, but this is the first app I have ever seen that got it right. For once, I am finding it convenient to do quick check ins and even monitor my food and water intake which I never thought I'd have the patience to do. You don't have to get premium, but it's well worth it at least to support a great app.

Brilliant App & well worth paying for. I wanted an app to record daily symptoms to enable me to give an accurate report to my GP. This app has everything I wanted & more. Being able to write notes by each symptom is so helpful & the insight reports are incredible. I did have a little snag when I first signed up for the free trial, but I made contact, explained the situation & James helped me to sort it all out. The app has been fantastic ever since. Thank you bearable team üôèüèªü•∞

title: TalkLife for Anxiety, Depression & Stress
description:
TalkLife is all about support. Our community is full of people who have also felt alone, battled depression or living with anxiety and needed somewhere safe to talk. TalkLife is a positive community where people have real conversations about how they feel - lonely, misunderstood, unhappy, or actually feeling alright. 

People use TalkLife to seek support for the bad times, but also celebrate the good ones. You, your thoughts, your feelings are important - don't keep them bottled up. You can even vent anonymously. 

You may feel bad now, but you're not alone, and there are better times ahead. TalkLife is here for you through the shiny and the muck, and they can really lift you. Download TalkLife and say hello. 

Download TalkLife and you can safely talk about any struggles and reach support across many areas including, anxiety, self-harm, living with depression, self harm, loneliness, PTSD, bipolar, suicidal thoughts, and many more. 

*Please note, if you are in a crisis situation, please seek emergency support as soon as possible. Peer support should not be used if you are in an emergency situation.

summary: 24/7 Support community for real conversations about how you feel. Let's talk!
recentChanges:
+ Added the ability to filter groups by topic.
+ Fixed lag loading on public group settings page.
+ Fixed crash on public groups.
+ Fixed notification drop down.
+ Fixed a few bugs & crashes.
comments: I've only been on for a less than an hour and I uninstalled. I can't stand the creepy/inappropriate comments. Honestly made me feel worse. The ads are annoying and the filters are so limited. I want to filter based on country and multiple age groups. I do not like how all the categories are merged together on my feed. I wanted to find a safe space to escape the toxicity on other social media sites and this is just as bad.

For the moment, you can actually converse with people. It's not flooded with bots, OF/IG farmers, or the casual hook-up crowd. There are edgelords, but for the moment.... It's great. Said after spending 10+ hours of near continual usage on the app. Further, in that time the mods/admins were active in discussing community issues, and pending changes in an open posting. Refreshing, and grateful that I stumbled across TalkLife. Keep it secret, keep it safe. ;)

Few things annoy me about it (full page ads every so often, not non stop though but they are hard to exit out of), can't quickly scroll to the top of a page and can't set unique backgrounds for a post. All in all though, a good, helpful app!

I'm using this app for 5 months and it helped me in a lot way, like making friends, taking care of my mental health and helping people. And the new update is so cool. Especially the groups we can moderate our own group and publicize it. So happy to see a community growing and being a part of it.

Im not saying this is a replacement for seeing a psychiatrist. But for peoplelike me sometimes its good to express yourself in a healthy way and receive support. This app honestly helped me stop crying and smile for the first time in a long time.

title: UP! - Depression, Bipolar & Borderline Management
description:
UP! is a highly automated mood diary. Track your personal warning signs of depression, mania and hypomania effortlessly when needed. UP! supports you in keeping a daily journal of your emotions and habits in the blink of an eye.  With UP!, managing, monitoring and analyzing symptoms of bpd, depression and bipolar just became easier.

Your Benefits
‚Ä¢ Increases your competencies to differentiate between normal mood swings and disease symptoms.
‚Ä¢ Sharpens your competencies to recognize early warning signs.
‚Ä¢ Supports you to better understand the psychology behind your mood.
‚Ä¢ The UP! mood diary is a valuable companion for your psychotherapy.
‚Ä¢ Supports a collaborative approach to respond on mental health issues even better.

Trilogic telemedical setup: Share your mood with your therapist & trusted people.
‚Ä¢ Document your state of mental health and simply generate reports about the past 14 and 30 days in PDF-Format. Discuss the mood diary in your therapy. You can print or directly send reports using your smartphone. 
‚Ä¢ Recommend the UP!Doctor web application to your psychiatrist. Connect to it by using a pairing code. Share information effortlessly.
‚Ä¢ Better together: Connect with a trusted person from family & friends using the partner app UP! Buddy.

The UP! Community
The UP! mood diary originally was designed for individuals with bipolar I and bipolar II.  Also, bipolar individuals with rapid cycling and mixed episodes are using the app to document their state of mental health. UP! is also used by people with borderline personality disorder (BPD), cyclothymia and recurrent depression. Since UP! in general is an asset to CBT, the app is also successfully used for other mental health conditions like major and recurrent depression, anxiety & panic attacks and post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD).

Highly automated: UP! ‚Äì the smart mood diary that writes itself.
‚Ä¢ The UP! mood diary automatically keeps journal of your physical activity, your work-life-balance, sleeping habits and your social activity. 
‚Ä¢ Your personal early warning signs for hypomania, mania or depression are automatically displayed when you report an unusually depressed or elevated mood to UP!
‚Ä¢ UP! provides customizable reminders for the fast mood input option and the detailed diary input option.

Advice for usage:
Become more mindful about your mental balance. UP! is designed to foster self-awareness and patient-empowerment. Use the evening for a detailed diary entry to document your habits and your mood but make this also a routine for introspection. Make use of UP! for self-reflection to better detect the connections between your daily life and hypomania, mania and depression. Identify your mood triggers and develop coping strategies for them. Become aware of negative behavioral patterns and establish positive & healthy new ones. Therefor, team up with a health care professional and share the knowledge and information‚Äôs gathered with UP!

The science behind UP!
UP! was developed with scientists to support people who must cope with a bipolar affective disorder (bipolar 1 and bipolar 2).  The app digitizes routines and concepts suggested by supranational treatment guidelines and implicitly implements psycho-educative & cognitive behavioral therapeutically (CBT) approaches.

Your feedback matters to us:
 We need feedback to constantly improve the mood diary. Problems, questions, suggestions, praise and criticism - tell us: info@netural.com

TAKE CARE AND DOWNLOAD NOW!

recentChanges:
Completely renewed auto recording. Place and activity tracking needs less power and is much more reliable now. UP! is now fully ready for Android O and Android P.

If you find any strange behavior or bugs please use the feedback functionality within UP! and contact us. That helps a lot to improve! Thank you!
comments: # 1): I have only used this application one time, just a moment ago, and I already like it! The only reason that I'm only giving this app three stars, for now, is for the simple reason that I don't know how well this application helps in long-term care. I believe it's got the potential to be very useful, but until I'm certain, I'm not rating four stars or more. If I find that this app is more useful than I expected, then I'll automatically rate it 4 stars, and possibly 5 stars, later on!

It tends to forget what day it is, so when I put in my sleep it is for the day before, but im trying to do today. And when I change the date it erases the previous day. Its very frustrating. I would like to have another mood meter saying something like mad and cool something like that. My warning signs are being angry, not so much being happy and sad. I had a good day and I put I was happy, and it said it was a warning sign but it wasn't and I put down a sad, and it didn't mark a warning sign.

It's a nice app the only bad thing about it is that you have to pay to look back on your previous months if you want to see if you are improving plus there is no option to send this data to your doctor via email I wish I could effort the pay version but I'm on disability and i have barely enough to survive on

I've only been using this for a week but it's really helping me keep track of moods and taking my medicine. However I do think theres room for improvement I think they should add more moods and allow you to note warning signs even if the server doesn't ask you to, I added an elevated mood and it didn't prompt me to enter warning signs and I can't find a way to manually mark them. Sometimes you have to adjust your sleep times. Otherwise great app!

App will try to force you to use location tracking, which seems absolutely unnecessary to me. Also, when I enter +2 anxiety, -2 energy and -1 self-confidence, it'll still say 'I feel okay', which is obviously not the case. I wish you could enter that yourself as well as the UI doesn't do a proper job with that.

title: TOBEE mindfulness coach
description:
By using the TOOBEE application for less than a minute a day, you will become a more relaxed and positive person over the long term. (Step by step, day by day, you will feel better)

Toobee reminds you to take regular short breaks, to take a breath, smile and enjoy a positive affirmation to feel good every day.
Toobee turns your phone into a free wellness coach using a method based on 4 recognized personal development principles that will help you become positive and relaxed, the way you always wanted to be. Easily put in place new habits by encouraging yourself to:
- have gratitude
- experience love for life
- be relaxed
- have self confidence

Why does it work ?
A reminder to take a short break
It takes just a few seconds to set up, and then you can forget about it: TOOBEE coaches and supports you. Embrace these regular reminders throughout the day. Each short moment allows you to be mindful and recenter yourself. This Kaizen method takes just a few seconds. With a few small steps each day, you will start to feel better.
Breathing and smiling
Breathing, listening to your body, being Mindful and recentering yourself. A deep abdominal breath relieves stress. Add a smile. You're already feeling better.
The amazing power of words
Words and thoughts are magical. By repeating positive affirmations to yourself, you will start believing in them and quickly start to embody them! That's the power of positive thinking and visualization.
Consistency gets results
The regularity of the reminders allows you to establish new habits, at your own pace. Your daily perseverance is key for this to work. Feel the change. Try to do your best every day, as encouraged by Miguel Ruiz and the 4 Toltec Agreements. 

There is even more with Toobee premium: ToobeeMe is unique and personalized
 
What would you like to do?

Choose among the 31 positive affirmations in the application‚Äôs 4 categories: select your favorites, and then use the one that is most appropriate for your current state of mind. Do you need to be calm? confident? joyous? hopeful? Your choice is there.

Do you want to write your own unique, personal affirmations? You know what will work best for you for any given point in your life. So go ahead and write it!

Looking to change the default Tibetan bowl tone? You have a choice between a joyous bird, a soft flute, an intense gong or a quiet bell.

comments: Love this app, but I noticed after a while of using it that I could hear the noise, but the reminder would not pop up on my screen... this is frustrating because it really helps with my anxiety to see these reminders every few hours or so. there is no other app like this one, so I would love to see this fixed.

I love the reminders throughout the day! It's nice to also be able to adjust the amount of times you receive your affirmation. My only downside is that this is the second time I've had to download the app because it stopped working the first time, out of nowhere. But I still love it, and it helps so much(:

A really nice app! A couple pointers.. Would be great if it had a graph/tracker to signify how many days you have used an affirmation. And I don't quite understand why the gender option is there and how it's relevant?
This app does what it says; sends affirmations every once in a while every day. Not a big intervention, but it definitely helped with my pregnancy blues.
Once the timer goes off, immediately I hear my affirmations in my head. I no longer have to look at my phone to read it. A great way to be in tune.

title: 365 Gratitude Journal ‚Äî Self-Care app
description:
THE BEST JOURNAL APP FOR GRATITUDE AND SELF-CARE

365 Gratitude is a science-based gratitude journal that makes self-care fun!

No more blank pages - we will send you a new personal gratitude prompt every day with stories that teach life-changing lessons to deal with difficult emotions, cultivate positivity, self-love and much much more.

Experience lower stress, less anxiety and enhanced well-being with our daily exercises, guided meditations and science-based courses.

And you are never alone - lean into the expertise of our community with 500,000+ self-care enthusiasts to learn new ways to cultivate optimism.

It's not really an 'app'. It's a family of gratitude warriors that want to improve their lives and I know it has helped to save mine many times over. Beyond wonderful.
Shannon Dohr-Andersen

Making a gratitude list is one thing, and having prompts to guide your writing is a whole different level! This is where 365 excels. The prompts are thoughtful and thought provoking.
Tony Fuentes

With dozens of lessons ranging from mindfulness meditation, self-care, compassion, body image, kindness, forgiveness and self-appreciation we are sure you will find what you are looking for in our science-based courses.

In just five minutes a day, you can change the way you think about yourself and the world with this powerful-yet-simple practice of self-care. 

Change your attitude ‚Äì and change your life! ‚Äì with 365 Gratitude.

developerAddress: 2315 Alassio Isle Court, Missouri City, Texas, 77459
recentChanges: As always, you can expect a new original gratitude prompt every day, new meditations every month and new ways to connect with like-minded people from around the world.
comments: This ap has really made a difference. The content is really good and the exercises are helpful in terms of facilitating insight. I really enjoy the positive social media stream which has no ads and is just people sharing gratitude for little things in their lives. I am actually happier having used it regularly than I was before. Thank God! It can be really hard to pull yourself out of a mental slump without outside content.

Well constructed app. I am grateful for someone took the time and put the effort to design such a good app that bring positive impacts on our life. A must have app if you are looking to rewire your brain for abundance and positivity. ‚ú®

Only been using for a few days but so far I'm really enjoying it. It really feels like each day your addressing a small area of gratitude from a slightly different angle to create this big picture at the end. It's already given me some perspectives on things I'd not thought of before. It is challenging to think about what you are grateful for in negative situations but honestly doing that has really helped open my eyes to how maybe things arnt as bleak as I initially thought!

Research has proven that practicing gratitude changes your mind set for good. 365 Gratitude gives you a jumpstart by suggesting things to think about in your practice toward grateful mindfulness. It's a great app, especially for the gratitude newbie! - Michelle

Awesome app! I never seen any like it because it is positive and everyone knows how to inspire and has courage to say things that's just pure gratitude, never seen anywhere before like I said! It is great!

title: Happego: Happiness, Motivation & Balance
description:
Feel happier, be healthier and create positive habits with little effort.  Happego is a motivational tool that works to help you achieve your goals.

It's like having a life coach, motivational speaker, and a therapist in your back pocket.  We'll work tirelessly to help you unlock your potential, reminding you of your true gifts and your goals.  Try it for free. 

Scientifically proven to help you:
‚è∫ Achieve your goals 
‚è∫ Improve your moods
‚è∫ Make good choices  
‚è∫ Develop positive habits
‚è∫ Enhance relationships
‚è∫ Balance emotions
‚è∫ Create a positive attitude

The setup is simple:  Download the app, intentionally choose a goal then you're done.  We will work tirelessly nudging your success by helping you visualize your goal.  No intentional effort required!       

It's simple!  You become what you think about.  The mind is working all of the time, even when we aren't paying attention.  We turn screens into a natural nudge tool to reinforce goal success!  Seamlessly priming healthy lifestyles all day, every day.

The longer you prime yourself, the better the outcomes!  You can even upload your own images to personalize your experience.  Improve bonds with loved ones by adding your favorite vacation images or motivate yourself to get back to your college weight by uploading images.  

Researchers found priming can help with things like diet, motivation & education.  It‚Äôs an easy tool to CREATE change in any area of your life.

HOW TO START:
Step 1: Install Happego
Step 2: Choose a goal 
THAT'S IT! 

Happego will start working immediately. You don't need to do anything else.
* Adjust or add goals & individual primes within the app. 
* Upload your own images to personalize your experience per your goals
* Upload images of family & friends to strengthen relationships
* New goal packs are added frequently so visit Happego often. 

We welcome your feedback and are constantly evolving to provide an easy & effective tool for positive change - without including advertising.

Priming has been shown to increase kindness, happiness, change problem behaviors, ease prejudices and lower stress.

New to priming? No problem, it's simple! We‚Äôll walk you through the setup and occasionally check in to see how it‚Äôs working. * We'll never sell your information. 

What can it do for you? 
‚óã Train your mind subtly with no effort required. 
‚óã Increase happiness & acceptance. 
‚óã Be healthier. 
‚óã Decrease stress & anxiety
‚óã Work on personal goals like creativity & self-control 
‚óã Create stronger bonds with loved ones
‚óã Clear the path to open communication & relationships
‚óã Supplement training in workplaces
‚óã Supplement therapy
‚óã Encourage education
‚óã Decrease bullying
‚óã Impact peace

SCIENCE - Recent research has found that: 
üê∂ Priming positive images, like puppies & families, improves mood 
üåè Serene nature images increases personal well-being
üßï Social priming reduces unconscious prejudices & biases
üíë Regular positive priming of loved ones strengthens relationship bonds
üëô Priming motivational images increases the likelihood of success  
üôå Kindness priming studies have been successful at bridging connections among cultures 
üôÇ Positive priming in labs has reduced stress and anxiety among individuals
üí™ Priming women in the workplace has increased assertiveness, balancing to match that of male co-workers

Successfully reach your personal goals by customizing your settings & frequency and even upload your own media. Stay relaxed & emotionally connected with little time or effort. Feel peaceful, be healthier, and increase belonging today. 

At Happego, we don't make self-improvement, we make self-improvement easier.   


Take care.

üåè Serene nature images increases personal well-being
üßï Social priming reduces unconscious prejudices & biases
üíë Regular positive priming of loved ones strengthens relationship bonds
üëô Priming motivational images increases the likelihood of success
üôå Kindness priming studies have been successful at bridging connections among cultures
üôÇ Positive priming in labs has reduced stress and anxiety among individuals
üí™ Priming women in the workplace has increased assertiveness, balancing to match that of male co-workers

Successfully reach your personal goals by customizing your settings & frequency and even upload your own media. Stay relaxed & emotionally connected with little time or effort. Feel peaceful, be healthier, and increase belonging today.

At Happego, we don't make self-improvement, we make self-improvement easier.


Take care.
summary: Feel happier and be healthier by effortlessly retraining your unconscious mind.
recentChanges: May we see more clearly & Love more dearly. We welcome feedback, hello@happego.app
comments: I LOVE the prime feature. It shows you flashes of images to remind you to do things like "exercise", "save money", "put your phone down", etc. I've been using it and primes truly work. I've been exercising more, saving money, and probably 5x more productive by not wasting time on my phone.

Tried to sign up for the first time but couldn't because they said they were upgrading their security. Tried signing up a second time a week later, still couldn't sign up. I emailed them again and no reply. One star.
You have to buy each and everything. If you have to even write your goal, subscribe. Pathetic! Uninstalling right away.

Initially I downloaded this app as a suggestion from a friend who happens to be a life coach. He told me if you want to focus on something start training your subconscious mind and it will take you to your goal very efficiently & I started using this app since. I have been using this app for 3 weeks and trust me initial goals are already 60 % (roughly) achieved. Can't be more happy. Thank you so much ,  looking forward to more addition to primes and updates down the line. Please keep doing good.
Can't login updated but no chane waste app

title: Control and Monitor: Anxiety, Mood and Self-Esteem

We have several activities to help in your anxiety crisis, make you calmer and improve your self-esteem.

* Good challenges: There are several challenges in order to improve your mood, your confidence and your quality of life.

I have adlut adhd and if i can remeber to log my emotions it really give your psych doc and therapist an awsome idea of how stable you are or if your gonna spirl out of control. Being socail isnt easy in person gor me so this app has been an amazing asset to me.

I'm going to give 5 stars because I have ZERO complaints and i love using this kind of app, its on the top of my list! I highly recommend downloading this app if you're looking for a good app like this one!
