comments: I love this app! It's what I've needed for a long time! I listen to the feed,...in my own voice...all night long. And I feel the positive effects it's having on my Life already! So thank you developers!!

The app is cool..I thought that recording my own voice was an option and if I did not want to record I would be able to hear a prerecorded voice. I found that I have to record myself in order to hear anything. Unless I am just not seeing any other option

Great app. Definitely helpful. However, does anybody else's voice sound a little blurry/fuzzy on their recordings? That is my only ever so slight niggle I have with this app. It's not my device as my other voice recording app works perfectly and clearly.
This app is useful. But online and local backup of data is missing and therefore necessary.
I like the daily affirmations and that you can choose affirmation areas that are relevant to you such as self esteem and health. A good app

title: Moodflow: Mood Tracker, Journal, Self-Improvement
description:
Mood Tracker ‚úÖ - Year in Pixels ‚úÖ - Diary ‚úÖ - Habits ‚úÖ - Gratitude Journal ‚úÖ - Routines ‚úÖ - Photo Album ‚úÖ - EVERYTHING YOU NEED FOR GOOD MENTAL HEALTH IN ONE APP! ‚úÖ

Moodflow is a beautiful, modern and FREE app that captures your emotions, moods, thoughts, and general well-being. In addition, Moodflow goes along with you throughout your life, and gives you a deeper understanding of yourself, not previously known to you. Ultimately, this will allow you to improve your mental health and help you become a better you.

ü§ó HOW DOES MOODFLOW WORK? 
You do not even need to write anything down to get a meaningful insight or to keep a diary.

This is how easy Moodflow works:
Fill out a quick survey every day and gain insight into the WHAT and HOW it influences you over time.

‚Ä¢ 1. Pick a rating for the day from 1 to 5.
‚Ä¢ 2. Pick the emotions you experienced.
‚Ä¢ 3. (optional) Write a note about everything important from the day.
‚Ä¢ 4. (optional) Pick the activities you did during the day.
‚Ä¢ 5. DONE! üòÅ

üëÄWHAT WILL THIS DATA DO FOR ME?
As time goes by, these short entries will gather insightful data about yourself that you will be able to analyze in many ways. On the one hand, a Calendar will be filled with colors that reflect your emotional well-being. This will allow you to get an eagle-eye perspective on your life that you never had before. On the other hand, Moodflow comes with data-analyzing tools, that will help you find relationships between a plethora of different factors and your mood. Moodflow will help you understand yourself better by allowing you to identify the things that bring you up ‚Üë or those that pull you down ‚Üì.

üëèWHAT ELSE CAN MOODFLOW OFFER?
Additionally, Moodflow encourages you to develop better habits by including 28-day challenges. These challenges have different levels of difficulty and will ensure that you create simple but powerful habits. As some have claimed: "We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is therefore not an act, but a habit".

More Features? We have them!

‚òÖ Multiple entries per day: Our mood fluctuates throughout the day. Therefore, you should be able to make as many entries as you want.

‚òÖ No annoying ads: Support the app by watching an advertisement. But only if you want to.

‚òÖ Gratitude Journal: Write something you are grateful for every day and benefit from the power of gratitude.

‚òÖ Routines: Use Moodflows in-built Routine planner to create your perfect routine and keep track of it. Step by step!

‚òÖ Statistics & Insight: Find relationships between multiple factors and your well-being with the multitude of charts offered.

‚òÖ Journal mode: Read all your entries at once as you would in a conventional journal.

‚òÖ Customize everything: Moodflow is a very personal app, this is why we give you the freedom of personalizing almost anything! 

‚òÖ Color editor: Create your own color palettes from scratch. Millions of possibilities!

‚òÖ Background: Make Moodflow your personal app by even personalizing the background video or image.

‚òÖ And a lot more!

üëá
Download Moodflow NOW!
It is FREE and always will be.

comments: Love this app! Just bought pro! There is a tiny problem though. Occasionally when a pop up that I can write in appears and I start writing in it, it disappears and I am unable to continue writing. One area where this is a problem is the routines section. When I go to add a custom item to a routine, the pop up that I would write it in vanishes as soon as I start writing in it. But other than that, I really really love this app. I anticipate it will help me discover patterns to happiness.

When it asks your name it glitches and types incorrectly but after that it is a great app, it doesnt force you to watch ads unless you are comfortable doing so. Mood journaling has really helped me. I highly recommend it, better than the previous apps I have tried. Edit:The update works fully no problems at all. It would be nice to have different themes :)

Really loving this app! I don't know if it's just me but there seems to be a bug whenever I try to add something to the gratitude journal section. Google keyboard flashes very quickly when I click on it but doesn't allow me to type anything. Otherwise the app. is fantastic! Edit: bumped my review to 5 stars. I was wondering if the latest Android update was the cause of the trouble. Glad to hear that that was the case and that it'll be remedied soon. Y'all are the best! üëè Edit: Update fixed it!

i love everything in this app. just a minor issue after the latest update, when i scroll down to see sleep tracking, gratitude journal etc., the scroll goes on forever, showing me sleep tracking over and over again. i can't reach to the end of the page. when i try to scroll fast, it glitches and turns back to the calendar. so i couldn't tap on the customise feed button. other than that, love the new features and the gradient mood colours are awesome. thank you.

Such beautiful layout. I'm in love even before using it. I love the pleasant and calming interface. I will update my review once I have used it for a month. Have been looking and trying many apps to track my moods but didn't enjoy. This noon, just happen to stumble on this one and we just connected. :D Happy.

title: Intellect: Create a Better You
description:
Embark on an entirely new way to work on your traits, habits and behaviors.

Intellect is a new form of psychological training developed by a team of world leading psychologists and behavioral experts, packaged into quick bite-sized sessions to help you work towards who you want to be.

Overcome personal struggles like procrastination, low self-esteem and anxiety, or develop yourself by becoming more assertive, sociable and confident. Restructure your personal, social or work life by tackling the root of your psychology through our proven scientific process.

Intellect is your new personal companion to creating a better you.
descriptionHTML:
Embark on an entirely new way to work on your traits, habits and behaviors.

Intellect is a new form of psychological training developed by a team of world leading psychologists and behavioral experts, packaged into quick bite-sized sessions to help you work towards who you want to be.

Overcome personal struggles like procrastination, low self-esteem and anxiety, or develop yourself by becoming more assertive, sociable and confident. Restructure your personal, social or work life by tackling the root of your psychology through our proven scientific process.

Intellect is your new personal companion to creating a better you.
summary: Embark on an entirely new way to work on your traits, habits and behaviors.
comments: First of all, it's completely free to use, and there are no ads. Already standing out from the crowd. The app itself is just really good. Only used it for a couple days but seems really good so far. Love the kind of "social media stories" layout think it works well apart from it goes back instead of forward quite often when tapping near the middle. Thank you!

Impressive, clarifying and insightful. This app is beautifully designed (not just visually, but also from a user design perspective). It's easy, small little tasks that are done in 2/3 minutes and give you a bit more insight or help you when your head is racing because of... F.e. stress. Give it a try. It's quite unbelievable it's free. I would love to pay a one time sum of money / small donation to use it!

Its been excellent so far. Not invasive, but still gives me incentive to go back to it. I like the way things are paced, and i've surprisingly really enjoyed the journaling feature (something I was pretty sure I was going to use exactly zero times unless forced). All in all just a calm space that i can go to once or twice a day to reflect and try to better myself a bit. Easily recommended.

This app was so wonderful! Compared to other apps which have limited things for free, this app has everything you need for FREE!! It has so many rescue sessions that help me so much! Every 3-4 days there are check-ins, and I definitely don't regret installing this app!! Sometimes the page takes a long time to load. But overall I LOVE this app and definitely reccomend it!!

Just wow... I've used apps making similar claims, usually disappointed in what I experience; ads constantly or gimmicky content locked behind Premium version. Not so with Intellect! It's free and ad free but more than that, it actually does what it claims. This app has and continues to help me immensely and I am going to say the craziest thing but, I'd like to pay for it! It's rare to find such value and I highly recommend Intellect to everyone. We all have things to improve. Thank you so much!

title: Self-Esteem Blackboard
description:
Do you have low self-esteem?
Does it affect your relationships?
Does it prevent you from being successful at work?
Are you unhappy with yourself?
Do you have problems with anxiety and/or depression?

Then, this app may be for you. This app was developed by a clinical psychologist using the methods of cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) to help improve self-esteem.

We all have a sense of self. Whether that sense of self is positive or negative is based upon our experiences in life and our perceptions and assessment of ourself.

WHAT IS SELF-ESTEEM?
Self-esteem is the regard or respect that a person has for oneself. A person with positive feelings regarding the self is said to have high self-esteem. However, self-esteem can refer to very specific areas as well as a general feeling about the self. 

WHAT ARE THE CHARACTERISTICS OF LOW SELF-ESTEEM?
1) Feelings of unhappiness. 
2) Feelings of anxiety.
3) Feelings of inferiority or superiority.
4) Impatience or irritation with self or others.
5) Externally oriented goals. 
6) Negativity. 

WHAT ARE CHARACTERISTICS OF HIGH SELF-ESTEEM?
1) Responsibility.
2) Goal commitment.
3) Genuineness.
4) Forgiving.
5) Internal values.
6) Positivity.
7) Self-improvement.

Contents:
***Articles about self-esteem and cognitive-behavioral therapy
***Test: What Is Your Self-Concept?
***Create positive self-talk on the the Self-Esteem Blackboard
***Review the affirmations on your blackboard
***Self-Esteem Assistance Audio to change self-talk created by past experiences
***Self-Esteem Blackboard Audio to help visualize changing your self-talk
***Relaxation audios

Features:
***Password protection
***Email your affirmation list and test results

Reason for permissions:
1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)
2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card
3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audios

Motivational rewards now available!
***Sign-up for AchieveMint.com and earn points to redeem for cash whenever you engage in the self-improvement activities in this app.
***This is an advertiser-sponsored program but you have control over whether you want to participate and you get paid for participating.

comments: Best app out there. Her voice is so soothing. I love how relaxing and educational this is.
Looks rough but contains a lot of useful resources. Highly recommended.

I just downloaded opened it and it wants my email address without even saying hello. My self-esteem is telling me you don't know anything about this app.DO NOT give your email address Before I get a little bit more information about this application Step in the right direction for my self-esteem. Correct? Have a beautiful day God bless and be safeüíñ
this is a great app!!

I'm amazed by the quality and real-world individual help this and any every other app the Developer has created for free. Paid apps don't come close to being the tool for ACTUAL RESULTS in my life. The website has enormous amount of material and I haven't had any issues with utilizing the apps on various mobile devices. THANK YOU!

title: My Daily Planner: To Do List, Calendar, Organizer
description:
APP INCLUDED 5 TOOLS:

- Daily Planner
- Calendar
- To Do Planner
- Reminders
- To Do List

MAIN FEATURES:

- planning day
- creating to do list on day
- creating subtasks
- creating
- creating reminders
- auto calculate progress
- grouping tasks with folders
- auto move tasks to tomorrow
- work without internet


DAILY PLANNER

App My Daily Planner allows create to do list on day.

Stop wasting time on paper daily planners, start using electronic. The application has a convenient day feed and calendar. You can:
- to edit tasks
- to move tasks
- to paint different colors
- to add tasks with voice


SUBTASKS

 Split tasks to subtasks with app My Daily Planner 

Often a person has a mess in his head, and he does not know where to start the task. By dividing the task into subtasks, you remove the confusion and can easily complete the task. In the application, the list of subtasks can be viewed in the form of a tree, or you can open the task and view its subtasks.


FOLDERS

Group your to do lists with folders

You have got a lot of tasks from different areas ? Will create folders to a better view


CALENDAR

View and create to do list and task list on day with calendar

With calendar you can view tasks count on day, add new tasks and edit created tasks.
Calendar have got 2 mods: Week Mode and Month Mode


REMINDERS

App My Daily Planner allows create unlimited reminders


For any task, you can add an unlimited number of reminders. Do you want to receive a reminder 2 days before starting a task? Will create it!


TO DO PLANNER

To plan your day with app My Daily Planner

You can create to do lists and add reminders to don't skip important tasks


ORGANIZER

Organize your time with app My Daily Planner

For the best organization of their time, you can do the following actions:
1. Create a to-do list
2. Add reminders
3. Cross out tasks as they are completed.

RECURRING TASKS

Create recurring tasks and you will optimize your time with organizer My Daily Planner

Do you want to go to gym every monday, wednesday? Create recurring task!


Tasks and projects

Create tasks and projects with My Daily Planner

Create to do list and project list and split it to subtask list. Then you will create detailed task or project description.  


TIME MANAGEMENT

Divide the elephant into parts

It‚Äôs hard for our brain to work with big tasks. Break large tasks into subtasks so that you yourself will facilitate the work of your brain.

comments: I 100% recommend this planner. It is so helpful in my everyday life instead of piling everything into my Memo's where it doesn't have daily separations. If you're thinking of getting a planner app, this one is great, but I do have a recommendation for the creator(s) to add. [Unless it's in premium, I don't have it.] I think we should have an "edit" option on things, incase we misspell something like that!

Very good, thanks ü§óüòÅüëç, appreciate the stability of the App and how it runs so smooth! This App has such intuitiveness and keeps me on-the-move with organizing my tasks. The card-type interface is really cool üëç, I especially like the dark theme. I bought it üß°üíõ‚ù§Ô∏è... Love how the numbers above the date number on the calendar page resemble a traffic light for task completion...! red-yellow-green, clever!

Re-reviewing because my last one was negative, but that was my own fault! ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I couldn't figure out how to rearrange tasks and thought it wasn't an option, but the developer very kindly got back to me and let me know how it was done. So with that in mind, five stars! I can't think of a thing that would make this app better. (Premium is also totally worth it, by the way!)

I just started using this app about two hours ago and I am overwhelmingly thrilled. It is easy to use, very user friendly, it offers all the functions we need for daily self- organisation in a simple way. It is excellent. This app makes the calender, a notepad and many more Android apps uselessüòâ. Thanks

I have ADD, therefore, staying on task is a problem for me. With this app, not only can I create a list of things that need to be done, but I can create sub-lists which is almost always a necesssity for me. Definitely a 5 star rating!

title: The Tapping Solution
description:
Over 2.5 million people have gone through online events, courses, and trainings of The Tapping Solution. Now The Tapping Solution app is making it easier than ever before to use tapping to lower stress levels, reduce anxiety, get motivated, get better sleep, eliminate negative emotions & much more!

Tapping has been recommended by top doctors, therapists, psychologists, personal development experts and mental health experts including Mark Hyman, M.D., Christianne Northrup, M.D., Wayne Dyer, Louise Hay, Cheryl Richardson, Ruth Buczynski, Ph.D., Dawson Church, Ph.D., Kris Carr, Gabrielle Bernstein, Eric Leskowitz, M.D., & many others!

Tapping is already simple and easy to do and these Tapping Meditations make it effortless for anybody to follow along, tap along, and get quick and lasting results. There is a huge range of topics!

TOPICS INCLUDE:

* Lowering stress about:
work, money, relationships, kids, weight, health, the world and more

* Getting motivated to:
work, exercise, write, eat better, get organized, get productive, change a habit and more

* Releasing negative emotions such as:
anger, sadness, fear, hurt, guilt, shame, resentment, rejection, loneliness, regret, self-doubt and more

* Supporting your body in healing from:
allergies, arthritis, asthma, back problems, high blood pressure, headaches, inflammation, tinnitus and more

* Pregnancy & women's health support for:
nausea, labor pain, information overload, stress, sleep deprivation, whole body relaxation and more

* Relationship support for:
singles that are lonely, breakups, releasing anger, overthinking, pre-date nervousness, forgiveness, difficult conversations, & more

* Weight loss and body confidence support for:
critical self talk, weight loss anxiety, getting back on track, excuse buster, eliminating sugar cravings, love and acceptance

* Sleep support for:
falling asleep, quieting the mind, big day coming up, nightmares, insomnia and more

* Releasing limiting beliefs around money
* Calming anxiety
* Turning a bad day around
* Feeling safe and grounded
* Stopping a panic attack
* Releasing overwhelm
* Quieting the critical voice
* And more!

You can track your daily results with before and after measurements on each meditation to see your results!  And you can track your daily streaks to keep the habit going.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS:

The Tapping Solution offers an auto-renewing monthly subscription at $11.99/month and an auto-renewing yearly subscription at $94.99 which allows you full access to all Tapping Meditations for as long as you maintain an active subscription.

The Tapping Solution also offers a lifetime subscription, which is a one-time only payment of $399.99, giving you unlimited access to all of the tapping meditations inside the app forever.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on your country.

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your Google Play account at the time of initial subscription purchase.  Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period.  Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period end date, and the cost of the renewal will be listed.  You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to My Subscriptions in Google Play after the purchase.

Read more about Terms & Conditions & Privacy Policy here:
http://thetappingsolutionapp.com/terms.php

summary: Guided Tapping Meditations
recentChanges: Performance improvements & minor bug fixes
comments: The tapping solution app is, hands down, the best thing on my phone. At any point throughout the day...no matter where i am...i can get relief from anxiety, instant motivation to move forward on a project, help with moving past any emotional baggage or blocks, or a peaceful way to move through any overwhelming emotion that might be triggered. Just knowing its there, always ready to use in an instant, is a comfort.

Free items were great and they had decent amt. However I was unable to access the premium items during the free trial and also after I was charged the yearly fee. I contacted support but everything they asked me to do didnt work. Their support was readily available but at times their questions were redundant. I eventually gave up and asked for a refund. (app kept saying to pay then when I clicked the pay button it would pop up showing already paid) Luckily, I was able to get a refund!.

Love this app but I had hoped that the downloaded sessions would play when the app goes down which it does from time to time. They used to but not anymore. And I have found lately they don't play even when the app is working so I have to go and find the session all over again. Downloaded sessions still not working. Wish they would fix this as the live session worked for 2 minutes then I changed session and can't get anything now.

This is a great app and a great style of meditation. I really like how it focuses on affirming feelings, then releasing them. My one complaint is that you can't choose which voice to listen to. Each video is only recorded by one person, so trying multiple meditations in a row can be a little jarring. I tried the paid version hoping it would include that feature, but it did not. (I only do the meditations by Jessica and unfortunately most of the meditations are recorded by Nick. No offense to Nick, just my preference.) Other popular meditation apps have a voice setting to account for personal preferences. Would definitely use this app every day if they added that feature!

I used The Tapping Solution for free to make sure I was committed to using it. After a week I decided to upgrade to premium. My body and mind feel like they are being slowly reprogrammed. For four years my right knee has been sore and painful. Walking up steps was a chore. I have begun to feel relief each day. I am thankful for this process and the Ortners. Don't be afraid to tap and begin to let go.

title: 7Mind: Meditation reinvented
description:
7Mind goes beyond ordinary meditation apps. Make your self-care a top priority, boost your confidence and feel empowered with expert-guided meditations that fit perfectly into your daily routine.

In addition to teaching you how to start meditating regularly, 7Mind helps you reprogram your brain to think more positively. Learn techniques to reduce moments of stress, anxiety, and frustration, and increase moments of joy, gratitude and happiness day after day.

Meditating is the best way to practice self-love and transform your mind. Step by step, with positive affirmations, breathing exercises and visualizations, you‚Äôll be able to silence your inner critic, listen to your intuition, and better connect to the present moment.

Thanks to over 10,000 recent scientific studies, we know that practicing meditation leads to many incredible benefits for our health and well-being. All you need to do is set aside a few minutes for yourself on a regular basis to feel the full benefits of the practice.

Join the growing community of over 1 million serene and loving 7Minders around the globe!

~WHY MEDITATE WITH 7MIND?~
Only a few of us succeed in making meditation a part of daily life. With 7Mind, practicing mindfulness becomes as easy and accessible as possible. All guided meditations are specifically designed to boost confidence and self-worth through breathing exercises, affirmations, and visualizations. Repeating affirmations helps create space for positive thinking and reduces negative automatic brain responses. A personalized coach dialogue will guide you throughout your journey and help you keep up the practice!

Simply sit down, close your eyes, and let yourself be guided on this journey by meditation teacher, personal development coach and published author Jonathan Lehmann.

~BUILD CONFIDENCE WITH THEMED MEDITATIONS~
‚Ä¢ Self-Love
‚Ä¢ Acceptance
‚Ä¢ Body positivity
‚Ä¢ Relationships
‚Ä¢ Confidence
‚Ä¢ De-Stress
‚Ä¢ Manage Anxiety
‚Ä¢ Vulnerability
‚Ä¢ Happiness
‚Ä¢ Sleep
‚Ä¢ Productivity
‚Ä¢ Family
‚Ä¢ Emotional Balance

And much, much more!

~WHAT ELSE IS INCLUDED~
‚Ä¢ Personalized coach dialogue to guide you along the way
‚Ä¢ Offline access to meditate whenever, wherever you want
‚Ä¢ Affirmations to rewire your brain to happiness and boost your self-love
‚Ä¢ 7Minders: mindful tips and inspirational quotes
‚Ä¢ Videos explaining the benefits of each course
‚Ä¢ Progress tracker and trophies to motivate you
‚Ä¢ Unguided sessions with a gong and calming sounds from nature
‚Ä¢ Gratitude and intention-setting exercises to deepen your practice

~ACCOUNT & SUBSCRIPTIONS~
Create a free account and get unlimited access to 7 guided meditations in the Initiation Course, as well as the unguided gong sessions. Invest in yourself and subscribe to access the full library of +150 themed meditations, so you can find inner balance and boost your cognitive abilities!

New guided sessions added to the library on a regular basis.

~WANT MORE?~
Unlock all 7Mind premium content with a 7-day FREE trial. Simply click Subscribe to begin. If you do not cancel the trial in your Google Play Store profile before the end of the 7 days, you will be charged for the yearly subscription.

1 year of 7Mind: $59.99*

*All subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the period. Log in to your Google Play Store profile to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal.

Download the app for free to get started. 7Mind also has versions available in French, German and Dutch. Set your smartphone system to the desired language and reinstall the app to meditate with 7Mind in another language.

Privacy policy and 7Mind terms and conditions: https://www.7mind.de/en/privacy

Questions? Comments? We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Send a message to feedback@7mind.de

summary: 7Mind already transformed the lives of over 1 Million people. Are you next?
recentChanges: We are continuously improving the 7Mind app with each update. This time, we made some improvements to the library. Happy meditating!
comments: My first day with the app was awesome! I'm taking advantage of the frequency (time& tone) within the app to maintain my daily practice. I haven't paid yet, but I've been practicing a few years; and the free version will do the trick for now. The voice and singing bowl effect is calming. I have a past with bipolar disorder and PTSD. I would recommend "7mind" to any of my friends or family. To anyone reading this: All is well and you're on the right path! Thank you, 7mind.

In general the courses are not bad. What I don't like: -No decent possibility to plan in advance and confusing categories. Beside the courses there's no way to plan several days in advance=>new decision necessary every time -No proper synchronizing when using the same account on both of my phones (phone 1 (2): 106 (82) meditations, 1055 (778) min, 3 (1) day streak. It seems so synchronise it partly, as on both phones the numbers change If my health insurance wouldn't pay, I'd never pay so much.
Everything superb. 5 stars if one can fast forward in a module. Atm I need to start from the beginning to get grasp of some Information, which would be better if I could directly jump to that point.
very calm voice, different tyles of meditations, helps a lot so far

The best meditation app i know and I'm so grateful for this app. The meditations are so awesome!!! 7 mind+ is sometimes also payed for by health insurance. Also thank you for making the app more stable and use less storage.

title: Headspace: Meditation & Sleep
description:
Stress less. Sleep soundly. Get happy. Learn the life-changing skills of meditation and mindfulness in a few minutes a day with Headspace. Choose from hundreds of guided meditations on everything from stress management and anxiety management to sleep, personal growth, and mind-body health. 

Simply download this guided meditation, mindfulness, and sleep app for free ‚Äî then sit back, breathe, calm your thoughts, relax, and be kind to your mind. Meditate anywhere, anytime ‚Äî and start living a more calm, healthier, happier life.

About Headspace
Headspace is your guide to mindfulness for your everyday life. Learn meditation and mindfulness skills from world-class experts like Headspace co-founder Andy Puddicombe, and develop tools to help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create balance in your life ‚Äî whether you need stress relief or help to get restful sleep.

What this meditation and sleep app does
The Headspace app teaches you how to meditate and live mindfully, with guided sessions on stress management, happiness, resilience, physical health, and more. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course teaches you the essentials.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of calm and rest. If you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle, Sleep by Headspace can put your mind to bed.

Courses:
Learn techniques to help deal with stress and anxiety, relax your mind, and more. 
‚óã Stress & anxiety meditation: Managing Anxiety, Letting Go of Stress
‚óã Falling asleep & waking up meditation: Sleep, Restlessness
‚óã Work & productivity meditation: Finding Focus, Prioritization, Productivity, Creativity
‚óã Movement & sports meditation: Motivation, Focus, Training, Competition, Recovery
‚óã Physical health mindfulness training: Mindful Eating, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Coping With Cancer
‚óã Student guided meditation: Dealing With Distractions, Leaving Home

 Focus:
From meditations for working from home to concentration-boosting music, the new Focus tab is your one-stop shop for changing the way you get things done. Tune in to the moment with Headspace‚Äôs Chief Music Officer, John Legend, and new music from groundbreaking artists, like Madlib. Or choose from 12 different Focus music stations, including Lo-Fi Times and Corner Booth Jazz.

Move Mode:
Release stress and tension through movement with Move Mode ‚Äî mood-boosting, at-home workouts led by Olympian trainers Kim Glass and Leon Taylor. Includes:
‚óã Quick workouts ‚Äì guided exercise videos for stress release, motivation, winding down, and more
‚óã 28-day courses ‚Äì build a mindful fitness routine with a trainer-led course
‚óã Audio-guided cardio ‚Äì mindful listening for your next run or walk

The Wake Up:
Start your morning happy with The Wake Up ‚Äî a daily video series designed to brighten your day. Includes inspiring stories, mindful advice from experts, and animations to make you smile.

Sleep by Headspace:
Create the ideal conditions for a calm, restful sleep. 
‚óã Sleepcasts ‚Äì original stories paired with relaxing sounds to help you unwind and calm your thoughts
‚óã Sleep music ‚Äì sounds and music create the perfect atmosphere for bedtime
‚óã Wind downs ‚Äì guided exercises to prepare your mind and body for sleep

Headspace Guided Meditation for Kids:
Designed for young meditators. Topics include: Sleep, Wake Up, Calm, Paying Attention, and more.

Headspace Plus subscription
Subscribe to Headspace Plus and access the full Headspace library ‚Äî including hundreds of meditations, mindfulness training, and calm, breathing exercises.
‚óã Over 40 meditation courses on topics like stress and sleep
‚óã Dozens of one-off exercises to add mindfulness to your day
‚óã Short, mini-meditations ‚Äî great for busy schedules
‚óã Full access to Sleep by Headspace and Move Mode ‚Äî bring mindfulness to every part of your life

The Headspace app teaches you how to meditate and live mindfully, with guided sessions on stress management, happiness, resilience, physical health, and more. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course teaches you the essentials.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of calm and rest. If you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle, Sleep by Headspace can put your mind to bed.

Courses:
Learn techniques to help deal with stress and anxiety, relax your mind, and more.
‚óã Stress & anxiety meditation: Managing Anxiety, Letting Go of Stress
‚óã Falling asleep & waking up meditation: Sleep, Restlessness
‚óã Work & productivity meditation: Finding Focus, Prioritization, Productivity, Creativity
‚óã Movement & sports meditation: Motivation, Focus, Training, Competition, Recovery
‚óã Physical health mindfulness training: Mindful Eating, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Coping With Cancer
‚óã Student guided meditation: Dealing With Distractions, Leaving Home

Focus:
From meditations for working from home to concentration-boosting music, the new Focus tab is your one-stop shop for changing the way you get things done. Tune in to the moment with Headspace‚Äôs Chief Music Officer, John Legend, and new music from groundbreaking artists, like Madlib. Or choose from 12 different Focus music stations, including Lo-Fi Times and Corner Booth Jazz.

Move Mode:
Release stress and tension through movement with Move Mode ‚Äî mood-boosting, at-home workouts led by Olympian trainers Kim Glass and Leon Taylor. Includes:
‚óã Quick workouts ‚Äì guided exercise videos for stress release, motivation, winding down, and more
‚óã 28-day courses ‚Äì build a mindful fitness routine with a trainer-led course
‚óã Audio-guided cardio ‚Äì mindful listening for your next run or walk

The Wake Up:
Start your morning happy with The Wake Up ‚Äî a daily video series designed to brighten your day. Includes inspiring stories, mindful advice from experts, and animations to make you smile.

Sleep by Headspace:
Create the ideal conditions for a calm, restful sleep.
‚óã Sleepcasts ‚Äì original stories paired with relaxing sounds to help you unwind and calm your thoughts
‚óã Sleep music ‚Äì sounds and music create the perfect atmosphere for bedtime
‚óã Wind downs ‚Äì guided exercises to prepare your mind and body for sleep

Headspace Guided Meditation for Kids:
Designed for young meditators. Topics include: Sleep, Wake Up, Calm, Paying Attention, and more.

Headspace Plus subscription
Subscribe to Headspace Plus and access the full Headspace library ‚Äî including hundreds of meditations, mindfulness training, and calm, breathing exercises.
‚óã Over 40 meditation courses on topics like stress and sleep
‚óã Dozens of one-off exercises to add mindfulness to your day
‚óã Short, mini-meditations ‚Äî great for busy schedules
‚óã Full access to Sleep by Headspace and Move Mode ‚Äî bring mindfulness to every part of your life
summary: Meditation made simple for sleep, stress, and happiness.
developer: Headspace for Meditation, Mindfulness and Sleep
recentChanges:
A steady meditation practice can calm the mind. But sometimes a bug appears in the app and it distracts us. We removed that bug from this latest version, and we already feel more at ease.

If you run into any trouble, let us know at help@headspace.com
comments: Its unfortunate that they dont advertise the Student discount. $9.99/year is astoundingly generous of them. Thanks! But I dont think anyone knows about this deal. I only learned about this when I accidentally stumbled across a YouTube comment from a year ago. Awesome app, great stuff for sleep. It do be crashing though. Just recently, so idk if it's just me or everyone else got the same problem?

This app was brilliant when I first started using it every day - especially during lockdown - but now that Headspace Plus is a thing, it's way too expensive to access to the soundscapes & meditations that I was using before. The selection available now, without Headspace Plus, is shockingly little especially considering I am already paying for the app! I liked a nice mix of things to help me sleep but now I can only listen to the same three things on rotation which isn't great. Not happy at all.

My 5-year old and I saw a commercial for this app which featured a cute animated video of a "robot" slowly shutting down its systems in advance of falling asleep. I thought this would be a great app for my kid to watch while doing bedtime, so I signed up for a (pretty pricey) subscription. Immediately was disappointed by the fact that no such cutesy videos are ACTUALLY part of the app (most of it appears to consist of streaming audio). Feels a bit like false advertising...

I only use this app for the Sleepcasts, they're very peaceful to listen to and I usually fall asleep after the first 15 minutes or so. A few months ago they offered 3 to listen to for free, but now they only offer 1, and all of the others are behind a pretty high pay wall - its incredibly frustrating, especially during this time and all the stressful things everyone is going through in their lives

Just updated the app for the first time in around a year. The new organization of meditation options is awful. Examples: you have a lot of activity-specific meditations, but the only way to access them is to remember what they're called and search. Also, i don't want to have to scroll forever, past lots of meditations that I'll never be choosing (e.g., kids), just to see what's available. Alphabetical organization of every option is tedious and difficult to get through.

title: Personality Development App
description:
Personality Development is a professional app focused on enhancing your personality through set of specific expert advice with tons of useful tips, training, skill sharing and quotes. Based on real-life survey, the app truly focuses on how to improve every aspect of your personality. Just read carefully, follow every advice and start a process of self-development and improve your personality significantly.

‚òÖ PERSONALITY DEVELOPMENT TRAINING ‚òÖ

The app can be your personality development training guide. There are a lot of how-to, real-life situations and expert advice that you can use in your real life. The development of a good personality that will win in every aspect of your life is not easy, but the app is here to be your specific guide! There are more than 500 topics included and each content you read can be shared directly via email or social media. Also available in Hindi language

‚òÖ LEARN, IMPLEMENT AND IMPROVE ‚òÖ 

The app is not specifically a book, but it can be rated as one of the best books for personality development. comments: It's really nice application i have ever used. I hardly ever give feedback. This is my first time giving because it is worth. I was having a problem to write new kind of contents and to make presentation, but i have no idea what to do. Cause of this app, i found solutions. Thank God.

It is an amazing app but the only reason I am giving it a 4 star review I because it only has portrait mode. I tend to use my tab for reading and I use it on landscape mode almost all the time but for this app I have to change the view, Please fix this.üôè

An incredible app that will not only develop you emotionally, but also how you perceive the world as a whole.It's extraordinary how after just some days of following to the latter it's content you find your behaviour having drastically deviated from the old bad habits you used to engage in and you start earning respect from those around

This is an amazing app. Whenever a notification popped up, the first thing I would do is read the article. It not only brought about a sense of consciousness related to various matters but also helped me appreciate myself and the world around me. Apart from personality development, it had also helped me to start reading and being consistent. But the English is very poor, possibly because these are articles sent by people and posted without assessing it further

Good ideas, very poor English. It was painful to read the daily short self improvement articles, not because of their messages, but because they used such poor English with so many errors. They read like they were crowd sourced to non-native speakers. This got in the way of what might have been an enjoyable daily experience and I uninstalled the app. I enjoyed most of the inspirational quotes with illustrations in background.

title: Dare - Break Free From Anxiety
description:
The Best Anxiety Apps of 2020 Healthline 2019 
The Best Anxiety Apps of 2019  Healthline 2019 
Best Mobile App Awards, platinum nominee** -  Best Mobile app Awards 2018    

** THE DARE APP **
    
The DARE app is an evidence based training program to help people overcome anxiety, panic attacks, worry, and insomnia. You can track your progress daily with the mood journal. Based on the best selling book ‚ÄòDARE‚Äô that helps people overcome anxiety and panic attacks fast.
   
Take the app with you wherever you go. Almost every anxious situation is addressed including driving, flying, eating out, health anxiety, intrusive thoughts, public speaking, at the gym, at the doctors, going on holidays and many more.

Download the free audio guides to help you feel like your old confident self again. Included are also a collection of meditations and sleep guides to tackle insomnia. 

If you suffer from anxiety or panic attacks, DARE will teach you an effective evidence based approach to get you back living life to the fullest.

     
** THE DARE APP **
100‚Äôs of free audios with a new audio added everyday. 
Free audio guides to overcome anxiety and panic attacks. 
Unlimited audio downloads to your private personal area
Unlimited entries in your personal mood journal
    
The DARE app will help: 
    * Ease Anxiety
    * Eliminate Panic Attacks
    * Reduce Worry and Stress
    * Calm Your Mind
    * Deepen Sleep
    * Break Cycles of Negative Thinking
    * Increase self-worth and confidence
    * And so much more...
    
    *DARE PREMIUM *
    * Unlock Dare and break free  from Anxiety with additional support.
    * Get a completely new ‚ÄòDaily Dare‚Äô every day to help you each and everyday. 
    * Unlimited audio downloads to your private personal area.
    v Unlimited entries in your personal journal.
    
Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.
    
We'd love to connect with you to hear about your Dare journey and experience. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us on social if you have any feedback or questions:

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/dareresponse
Instagram - @dare_response
or send us an email at hello@dareapp.co :)    
    
Read more about our terms and conditions here:
Terms of service:  https://dareresponse.com/terms-of-service-statement/
Privacy policy: https://dareresponse.com/privacy-policy/

recentChanges: We have added several new videos to the app in the success stories and the We DARE section. As always let us know what you think of these updates?
comments: This app is amazing. I love Barry's voice, its very calm, clear and soothing to listen too. I love the SOS section. I listen to this app every night in bed. It has helped me so much with my panic attacks and anxiety reducing the impacts to managing my Diabetes. I have highly recommended this app to my doctor, friends and my psychologist to help other people in my local community of regional Sydney Australia. A huge thank you to the Dare team :)

I must say that it's a great app and great initiative by the team , we live in a busy world n everyone is busy with themselves , but anxiety , crisis , depression are not rare , n even our dear ones sometimes do not constantly have the time to listen to our worries n be there for us , so this is where help like this is very important , i listened 4-5 audios n I m already feeling calm , n from now on I m gonna just put this on n drive away my anxiety n fears , I think it will be possible , thanku

Amazing App to help you conquer anxiety! Barry has a soothing voice and his audios are outstanding! I am so happy that I stumbled on this app. The content is extensive and super helpful. The Deep Release under Anxiety Relief is my favorite to truly feel peace and calm. Try it out!! You won't regret it.

I have extreme anxiety and panic attacks. This app has been amazing! Ive never felt so much peace and confidence in myself in handling anxiety as i do with this app. It has allowed me to accept my anxiety and beat it through meditation, acceptance, courses and building self confidence. It has allowed me to realize what ive been using as crutches and how to slowly wean myself off of them and realize i am my own safe place. The crutches hinder me and dont help me. And i feel much happier and free
I like that I can listen to the stories on loop for free. I love the SOS section that can talk someone through a panic attack. For free!

title: Self-Esteem Hypnosis - Positive Daily Affirmations
description:
‚óé A single daily audio session that is effective* in just 1‚Äì3 weeks
‚óé Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
‚óé Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
‚óé Hypnotic Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for receiving hypnotic suggestions
‚óé Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Hypnotic Booster
‚óé Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep
‚óé Repeat sessions or loop while you sleep
‚óé Continue listening to background sounds after the session ends

THE BEST SELF-ESTEEM HYPNOSIS APP AVAILABLE

Self-Esteem Hypnosis is free to try and effective* with the default settings. A one-time in-app purchase is required only if you wish to change the default settings. (Each of our free hypnosis apps includes its own in-app purchase; in-app purchases cannot be shared among separate apps.)

comments: Very relaxing and easy to listen to. Advise buying the app and listening regularly for it to really work. I have 3 of these apps installed and enjoy them all, but this is my favourite. The stop smoking app was the only thing that really managed to help me with smoking.

These apps are perfect. I use a few of them and it actually works, as well as teaching me about myself! I never used to be able to relax into hypnosis or meditation, but the ability to go back and try again with the same app the next day has me a pro! Have recommended to all family friends
The app has a recording that can only be paused and played. Every single feature is made to be unlocked with purchase. It's just not helpful unless you buy it.
I actually felt a boost in self esteem after the first time I highly recommend it because I had a good day that I know was a result of using this app.
Good app, relaxes me a lot, bit not for me. Didn't like too much talk! Ate too much of my expensive UK DATA at 35mb for just 2 uses! Hella NO! Deleted asap! UK REVIEW

title: Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life By Brian T
description:
The principles in this book have helped millions of people around the world take control of their thinking and make positive changes in their lives. And they can help you too. If you want to achieve wealth, happiness, and professional and person fulfillment, all you have to do is Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life. 

This book shows you how to change the way you think and open new doors to unlimited possibilities. Based on thirty years of experience sharing this philosophy with more than two million people, Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life focuses on the importance of setting goals, expanding your thinking, and imagining your own unlimited potential. It presents twelve powerful principles that will help anyone get on the road to a better, more fulfilling professional and personal life. These principles will show you how to dream big dreams, take charge of your life, become wealthy, and achieve every goal you can set for yourself.

Each chapter offers inspirational stories and principles that get you thinking, backed up with action exercises that help you train yourself to think and act like the successful person you truly are. Every principle helps you change your thinking in a positive way. Every exercise brings about a positive change in the way you see yourself, the world, and your future. Soon, you' ll begin to see unlimited possibilities in your future. You' ll learn to think and act like a successful, happy, and prosperous person- -- leading to incredible results.

"Every line in this book is bursting with truth, wisdom, and power. Brian Tracy is the preeminent authority on showing you how to dramatically improve your life. Let him be your guide. I've learned so much from Brian myself that I can't thank him enough!"
‚ÄîRobert G. Allen, #1 New York Times best selling author.

"Once again, Brian Tracy has written an incredible book which shows individuals how to delve into their inner resources so that they can not only identify realistic goals but develop a plan on how to achieve these goals. This book promises to be a best seller and to influence the lives of so many. It is must reading."
‚ÄîSally Pipes, President, Pacific Research Institute

"This book gives you a step-by-step system to transform your thinking about yourself and your potential, enabling you to achieve greater success in every area of your life."
‚ÄîLee Iacocca, Chairman, Lee Iacocca & Associates

"Outstanding! Brian Tracy's Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life is a must-read. Use the powerful 'mental software' program in this book to tap your vast inner resources and bring the life you've been dreaming about into reality."
‚ÄîKen Blanchard, coauthor of The One Minute Manager and Full Steam Ahead!

"This is a masterful book laden with wisdom and knowledge. It'll catapult you from intention to implementation. It arms you with the information and insights you need to achieve success and significance in your life."
‚ÄîNido R. Qubein, founder, National Speakers Association Foundation Chairman, Great Harvest Bread Company

"Brian's new book, Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life, will show you how to attract the people and resources you need to achieve any goal you set for yourself."
‚ÄîTony Jeary, Mr. Presentation, author of Life Is a Series of Presentations

"As usual, Brian Tracy has hit another home run with Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life. It's a must-read!"
‚ÄîMac Anderson, founder, Successories, Inc.

title: Todait - Smart study planner
description:
Todait is an authentic study planner to help you utilize 100% of your time and ace your exams. Todait is especially useful for students who need help with productivity and effective time management. Use it to prepare for the ACTs, AP Exams, ASVAB, PSAT/NMSQT, SAT, SHSAT, GED, DAT, LSAT, MCAT, PCAT, Bar exam, COMLEX-USA, NAPLEX, NBDE, PANCE/PANRE, NCLEX, BMAT, UKCAT, and A levels.


We strongly recommend this app for anyone who:
- has a massive amount of material to cover and has no idea where to start studying
- is preparing for a big exam, such as the LSATs, APs, etc. 
- wants to make a habit of routine studying
- wants to be productive and efficiently manage their time


Todait automatically plans and divides your study materials over a specific period of time while providing detailed feedback. All you have to do is enter how much you‚Äôd like to study for each subject as well how many hours you‚Äôd like to spend per week.


Todait‚Äôs Unique Functions:

- Emphasizes studying rather than planning
     - Automatic Distribution tells you how much you should study each day to achieve your goals within a chosen period of time
     - Automatic Plan Adjustment redistributes your study material based on whether you‚Äôre ahead of or behind schedule
     - The stopwatch allows you to measure and manage how long you study for each subject
     - The widget allows you to start studying right from your home-screen without running the app itself

- Gives feedback on your study habits that you can‚Äôt get on your own 
     - The Study Trend Graph shows your weekly progress and average study times
     - The time-table shows your study times for each day
     - The calendar keeps track of your monthly performance
     - An alarm reminds you to start studying at whatever time you set

- The Study Diary allows you to reflect upon your daily performance for each task
- Lock-out Mode prevents you from getting distracting notifications or using other apps while the stopwatch is running
- Can view all your tasks in a simple check-list layout
- Allows you to check and manage your study times on other devices
- Gives more feedback from Todait based on your progress and data
- The timeline motivates you to study by comparing your study times with your friends‚Äô (not updated yet)



Todait Inc.
üêùPreparing tutorials! : http://bit.ly/TODAIT_FAQ_eng
üíäPlease direct your questions and feedback to support@todait.com !

title: Self-Love Oracle Cards
description:
On every spiritual journey, the biggest lesson may be how to love yourself, your gifts, and your challenges. With self-love, you can unlock the power to heal yourself, to overcome your self-sabotaging habits, and transform your life. This 44-card oracle is suitable for both beginners and experienced seekers to use for accessing your own inner truth and wisdom.

The Self-Love Oracle features the fantasy watercolour paintings of Janet Chui, and her advice for self-care, setting your boundaries, loving yourself, and finding your peace no matter what the situation. Single card draws can provide quick advice, while complex spreads may reveal deeper issues of self-worth. Gift yourself the Self-Love oracle to embark on the journey of healing and self-empowerment.

You can use this app as a full-featured, ad-free and time-unlimited "Lite" version, or unlock the full deck for a small fee. 

Key features:
‚Äì A complete deck of 44 cards*, beautifully illustrated, covering many topics regarding daily issues
‚Äì 3 types of readings (1, 3 or 5-card readings)
‚Äì You can save your readings to a journal for further reference
‚Äì Share your readings with your friends, by email, on Twitter and Facebook!
*the full deck is available in the unlocked version
			
About the author: Janet Chui is an artist, editor and writer from Singapore. She was painting and writing about mythical creatures since childhood, but struggled with these abilities for much of her life, until she became a mother and fully embraced her intuitive and imaginative gifts. Since diving deep into meditation and healing methods, she helps others find their self-worth and develop their creative skills. The Self-Love Oracle features Janet's art and life lessons from over a decade of discovering her own purpose and the universal need for self-love and healing.

comments: Absolutely Beautiful original Art ~ always perfectly alligned with what i need to meditate on! Each card's artwork is one-of-a kind, with richness in detail. They beautifully cover a huge range of situations & emotions( my favorite = Corgi + fairy playfulness card!). will be purchasing full version. :)
Beautiful art work. I have found it very helpful at pointing out the specific self care needed at the time. Insightful and appropriate.
I love the artwork & messages ; beautiful. You get more if you pay but there's plenty for free.
This deck is sooo beautiful and exactly what I was looking for as an artist. And the app runs smoothly. What more could I want? 10 stars ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ

I wasn't really expecting much from this app but the cards are great. The app is very insightful and the readings carry substance. I really like that you can save your readings, especially when they resonate with you, it's nice to be able to look back on them. It's a simple and easy app to use when you're looking for a little guidance and reassurance. I have absolutely no complaints about this app, it certainly serves its purpose and I am quite happy with it! Thank you.

title: Self - Build Credit While You Save
description:
The Self credit app (formerly known as Self Lender) is a way to build credit history while you save*. Build credit with Self, even if you have a low credit score (or no credit score!)

Over 500,000 people have used Self‚Äôs Credit Builder Account to build credit and save more than $300 million. With the Self Visa¬Æ Secured Credit Card, you have even more opportunities to build credit after you get started.

How does it work? Think of it as a plan that builds credit while you save, starting at $25** per month.

1. Apply for a Credit Builder Account. Your money is safe and secure in a bank account.***
2. Pay off your Credit Builder Account in 12-24 months.** You can choose the payment term and dollar amount that best fits your budget.
3. Each on-time monthly payment builds credit history and adds to your savings*. Your monthly payments are reported to all three credit bureaus while the principal gets saved in a bank account.***
4. Unlock your savings. Once you‚Äôve paid off your Credit Builder Account, your money unlocks and comes back to you (minus fees and interest).

BUILD CREDIT. SAVE MONEY*
With an active Credit Builder Account, your payments are reported to all three credit bureaus.
 
CREDIT SCORE MONITORING INCLUDED****
With the Self credit app, you can check your credit score at no cost. The mobile credit tracker!
 
NO HARD CREDIT PULL
Self does not do a ‚Äúhard pull‚Äù credit check when you create an account. In fact, no credit score is required at all!
 
SECURE ACCOUNTS
All accounts use two-factor authentication, 256-bit encryption, and fraud detection to protect your money and private information.
 
UNLOCK THE SELF VISA¬Æ SECURED CREDIT CARD
Have an active Credit Builder Account in good standing, make at least 3 credit builder account monthly payments in full and have $100 or more in savings progress and you could unlock access to a secured credit card ‚Äì no extra deposit and no hard credit check needed.
 
WHY PEOPLE LOVE SELF
‚ÄúLove love love this program and this app! In eight months my credit went up a hundred and nine points Super happy and can't wait to renew once the first year is up‚Äù - customer Debbie G. Individual results may vary.
 
Featured on ABC News, USA Today, Newsweek, TechCrunch and NerdWallet
 
TERMS
When you download and use Self, you agree to the Terms of Service at: https://www.self.inc/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
You may review Self‚Äôs privacy policy at: https://www.self.inc/privacy-policy
 
*Savings are minus fees and interest. Results are not guaranteed. Improvement in your credit score is dependent on your specific situation and financial behavior. Failure to make monthly minimum payments by the payment due date each month may result in delinquent payment reporting to credit bureaus which may negatively impact your credit score. This product will not remove negative credit history from your credit report.
 
**Sample products are $25 monthly loan payment at a $520 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 24 month term and 15.92% Annual Percentage Rate; $150 monthly loan payment at a $1663 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 12 month term and 15.91% Annual Percentage Rate. Please check the pricing page in the Self mobile app or www.self.inc for current pricing.
 
***Credit Builder Account ‚Äî proceeds are held in a deposit account until maturity
 
****Credit scores will only be available to customers who our third-party vendor is able to validate.

All Credit Builder Accounts are issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender, Sunrise Banks, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender or Atlantic Capital Bank, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender. Subject to ID Verification. Individual borrowers must be a U.S. Citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and Social Security Number are required. All loans are subject to ID verification. All loans subject to approval.

The Self Visa¬Æ Credit Card is issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender.

recentChanges:
Thank you for using Self! This app update includes:
- Ability to update your phone number via your profile
- Ability to update your monthly income via your profile
- Other minor app improvements and bug fixes
comments: It's only been three months and my credit score has improved significantly by almost 100 points. Excellent app! Just wish there were more credit card offers other than Capitol One because they made a mistake on my credit score and won't accept me. Other than that it's great and I reccomend anyone needing to improve their credit to try Self. As long as u make your payments on time it really works.!

Love this App. It is helping me rebuild my credit and has raised my score by 33 points since my last payment and a total of 94 points since I started my Self Acct!!! I can't wait to see my score once I get my loan paid off. I will do another Self loan to keep building my credit once this loan is complete. Thanks Self!!! You are making a BIG difference in my credit and I would definitely recommend you to anyone in need of repairing or building their credit!!!

The savings account that helps you build credit is good. The card they offer you is a little bit of a scam. They do not tell you they take a deposit from what you have saved that you are not getting back for an undisclosed amount of time and they take more deposit than the credit limit they give you.

I was unsure of the impact this would have on my credit score. I signed up last month and have made my first payment about a week ago, and my score increased 68 points today! I'm very happy I read the reviews of others that have been having a positive experience using Self! Thank you for this great service, I'll certainly continue using it to help get me back to where I was a couple years ago!

Score went up 30 points in my first month. I set up auto pay for the last day of the month since they report to the credit bureaus around the 1st. Make sure you send the first payment in before the end of your first month, otherwise you'll have to wait another month before it gets reported to the credit bureaus.

title: Mint: Budget, Bills, & Finance Tracker
description:
Mint is the free money manager and financial tracker app from the makers of TurboTax¬Æ that does it all. We bring together your bank accounts, credit cards, bills and investments so you know where you stand financially.

With Mint, you can:

SEE EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
Mint is a budgeting app, bill tracker, and financial planner all in one. Get a more complete picture of your financial life whenever and wherever with our free budget app. We bring all of your personal finance essentials together, from account balances to credit health, debt management to bill reminders, spending to your free credit score, net worth and more.

MANAGE BILLS & MONEY TOGETHER
Track bills right alongside your account balances. You‚Äôll know what's due, when it‚Äôs due, and the money you have to put toward paying off your balances. Take advantage of monthly bill reminders, manage subscriptions, and keep tabs on your credit in one central location with our streamlined bill tracker.

SAVE TIME
With one place to keep track of your personal finances, there‚Äôs no need to log into multiple sites. Access your budgeting app from anywhere, on any device.

SAVE MONEY
Our personal finance app provides you with actionable savings tips, so you can budget better, build credit, and increase your savings. Reach your financial goals sooner, keep tabs on your net worth, and improve your credit health in one place.

BUDGET BETTER
Create budgets you can stick to with our free budget app. To help you save smarter from day one, we even make a few for you based on your spending. With weekly and monthly budget planning, you can stay on top of your bills, manage your savings, and build your personal wealth in one easy-to-use app.

GET YOUR FREE CREDIT SCORE
Get your free credit score, no credit card required. You‚Äôll learn how it‚Äôs calculated and get tips* for maintaining and improving your credit health. Take advantage of fraud and identity alerts, and receive updates when your credit score changes with free credit reports.

REFINANCE YOUR MORTGAGE LOANS FASTER
With our new in-app refinancing experience, you can digitally apply for refinancing loans; we‚Äôll prefill your application with your current Mint data, so you can lock in an accurate rate in as little as 20 minutes.

STAY SECURE
We‚Äôre serious about security and use measures like multi-factor authentication, designed to help you protect access to your account. Plus, Mint comes from the people who make TurboTax¬Æ, trusted by millions with sensitive data, and we participate in security scanning with VeriSign.

SYNC WITH THE MINT WEB APP
Mint‚Äôs great on-the-go, but you can also use the desktop version at Mint.com. Sync your bank accounts, credit cards, budgeting, spending and more across your devices. You can even export spreadsheets from the web, and more to make your personal finance management a breeze.

WHY DO MILLIONS TRUST MINT?
Time Magazine: The 50 Best Apps of the Year (2016)

PC Magazine: What to Do When You Go Over Budget in Mint.com (2016)

FROM INTUIT INC.

Mint is part of a suite of financial tools that includes TurboTax¬Æ, QuickBooks¬Æ, QuickBooks Self-Employed‚Ñ¢ and ProConnect‚Ñ¢. 

To learn how Intuit works to protect your privacy, please visit
https://security.intuit.com/index.php/privacy

By installing or using Mint, you agree to our Terms: https://www.mint.com/terms.
Mint currently connects to US and Canadian financial institutions only.

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I reinstalled this app after having not used in a couple years, and I'm unable to login. I've changed my password, thinking I had it wrong, but I still get the error "Unable to Login", not the "Password/login info is incorrect". If I want to make a new account I would have to make another email address, since this is tied to my email. It's really frustrating and I can only think that this is some sort of bug.

There is no way to track bills within the app. I can get to a "Bills" section of the app by following the link in the monthly email from Mint, but as soon as I press "back" there is no way to return to the bills section of the app (aside from using the email link again). Why would they add bills to the app, but not let you access it through the actual app? I've tried using budgeting to look after bills instead, but it's not intuitive enough for that purpose. ADD A BILLS TAB TO YOUR APP PLEASE...

Biggest flaws: When an account is replaced with a new card the account shows as if it's a separate account and for some reason certain transactions are showing on that account while most transactions were able to transfer to the new account. In addition, it shows that the credit limit for the new account is "N/A" or "$0". There's an issue also where I accidentally input inactive on one of the replacement card and can't change it back to active. No way to migrate the accounts.

I've been using this for a few months, but when I woke up today I had several transactions duplicated. I don't know how to fix this, and no Mint troubleshooting pages tell me how This is my second review, I think the first one was deleted which is unfortunate. A single transaction in my bank account turns into the seven of the exact samein mint, completely skewing my budget. I read reviews before I downloaded, and I heard of other people having issues. I guess I thought I was lucky. Help?

Was expecting more. Not much to the app. Too minimal. Unlike the website version I don't have access to spending, goals or budgets on the app. Waste of time.... Please add these features! Edit: Even though I have them all selected it still did not work. I had to uninstall and reinstall the app twice before the selected features worked.

title: My Vision Board - Visualize your dreams
description:
Making a vision board is a perfect way to bring clarity of desire and turn it into an achievable goals and vision.

Dashboard goal tracking will help users to quickly identify their progress of Vision strengths and weaknesses with all of their lifetime goals.

Manage your daily tasks with check/uncheck, mark important, task notes, drag and drop to reorder and more.

My Vision Board - Visualize your dreams App Features :
- Set your goal images, set a title and goal deadline
- Dashboard will help to progress of your goals and vision
- It helps strengthen your daily positive affirmations.
- It helps you to identify your vision of your life and give it clarity to vision.
- Keeps you always motivated and focused.
- Lifetime Goals of Life, Positive Affirmation, Self-motivation, Affirmative Goal Settings
- Visualize your goals in Viewing Mode with background music
- See daily positive affirmations, Visualize your dreams
- Law of attraction with affirmations, Life Purpose, Life Vision and Life Goals

- Add your own affirmation categories and affirmations
- Change background voice recording from settings
- Add your voice recording to affirmation while playing daily affirmation
- Start your day with prosperity and goals settings, My Affirmations

title: The Power of Self-Discipline
description:
Self-discipline is one of the most important life skills everyone should have. You need to have the discipline to effectively master many different life skills. Skills that are important for your success at work, at school, at home, or anywhere else for that matter. 

Achieving self-discipline is not easy. This guide will teach you the fundamental skills needed to attain full control of your mind, body and spirit through every aspect of your life. How to build mental strength to stop making excuses, resist temptation and finally reach your goals.  

Included in The Power Of Self Discipline
* What Is Your "Why"?
* Self Accountability and Making Yourself Accountable To Others
* Building Good Habits Lead To Good Self-Discipline
* Removing Obstacles To Disciplining Yourself 
* Taking Care of Your Body Is Necessary to Build Self-Discipline 
* Why You Need To Set Boundaries and Start Saying "No" Today
* Standing Firm and Staying Committed To Your Goal
* Rewarding Self-Discipline

If you are someone who lacks self discipline and wants to see positive changes in your life then this guide is for you. You can achieve anything that you set your mind to if you can be disciplined with your actions. 

Download our free guide today and be the master of your own destiny.

comments: Easy to read, makes sense, if you follow the steps...you will definitely see it works. I recommended it to my 18 year old granddaughter....I'm waiting for her opinion....I'm 62 years old so that saying "you can't teach an old dog new tricks" is not true!! I will have my granddaughter rate it herself...I'm praying she loves it! üôèüôÉ

Love the reading material but constantly get pop up commercials . These commercials are distracting and my concentration goes out the window. . Ok much too many distractions and I am only on chapter 2. Forget it. I am done!

Hmm, it's an ebook with very short chapters, and to read the next one you have to watch an ad, which in my case was about a lesbian dating gameüôÑ. The ads are very short but very distracting and irritating. I suspect they are the main purpose of the app for the developer. I also suspect that most positive reviews are fake. The content isn't bad but tbh it's nothing new and not particularly well written. However, if you're new to SMART goals and not bothered by the ads it might be of some value.
I find it helpful in providing lessons related to achieving self discipline which gives me a sense of confidence and comfort.
This App is awesome I love it. From it I've learn more than what I whas imagining of learning. Seriously this app is the best ever seen I really love this app.

Changed a thousand notifications settings and its still won't send me my positive quotes. :( Before: This app changed my life.... I've been on a journey of self discovery and self love and the messages at different intervals are so perfect to remind me of my goals. I often find myself sharing these with friends. I love the app, definitely worth the money I paid for it. One thing I would love to see in the future is the ability to add a few of my own affirmations in the mix along with the ones that you have chosen. Like, give me a blank (no text, just the pics/etc) template for each category and let me type in the words I would like to see in that category. That would be an amazing addition!

Love this app, recommended it. Just true texts, better than some affirmations because I totally agree with these truths. But please help me fixing it. Since I bought it, it doesn't work properly. Reinstalled it, restarted and resetted it too. Still doesn't work.

I absolutly love this app! It has helped me in more ways then I ever thought an app could! I highly recommend this app to anyone that needs encouragement or motivational words in there life. The fact that you can personalize it to have you name in the message you recieve makes this app even better bc its actually like your own personal message from your life encouraging you every step of the way. Thank you so much for help me im my journey of my recovery and bettering my life!. Nikki Morrisüíúüíõ

Love the app, and the reminders throughout the day. A couple things I'd change are giving us a gender neutral option for the language in the romantic sections. And there are some typos scattered throughout. Other than that I love it.

title: Self Esteem Building Guide
description:
This application give you an information about how to build self esteem. 

Self-Esteem has a big impact on how the person is behaving and performing? A positive self-esteem may cause certain people to behave confident and very competitive.

This app. is a self esteem builder and your ultimate guide to boost self esteem to achieve goals in life.

Self-esteem is what you see in yourself and how you evaluate yourself with what you see. 

Everyone evaluate themselves differently because everyone have different way of thinking. It can be either positive or the other way round. It's what you believe about yourself.

Building self esteem is so not difficult. Have fun!

Application Contents
Chapter 1: Be Optimistic for Happier Life
 - A Positive Outlook for a Positive Life
 - Know your self-worth
 - The benefits of using positive self-talk
 - How positive affirmations can change your life

Chapter 2: It‚Äôs All in Our Mind	
 - Focusing the mind on the positive
 - The sky is your limit
 - How to develop your creative side
 - Creativity Tips and Resources
 - Listen to your inner thoughts
 - Mental imagery works
 - Taking care of your mental health

Chapter 3: Overcoming Negative Thinking
 - Dispelling fears for a more positive outlook
 - Overcoming dissociation
 - Overcoming Doubt
 - Overcoming Feelings of Helplessness
 - Overcoming Inner Conflicts
 - Overcoming Intimidation
 - Overcoming the need to be in control
 - Overcoming Trauma

Chapter 4: Becoming an Optimistic Individual and Achieve Goals in Life
 - Developing your self-image
 - Change the Shape of Your Self-Image
 - How keeping a journal can help you succeed
 - Develop your intuition
 - Start Early To Combat Low Self Esteem
 - Stop underestimating your worth
 - Developing your full potential
 - Boost your Self-Esteem by Running

Application Features:
- Useful self esteem builder guide.
- You can share this guide to others.
- Easy to use.
