title: The Happiness Planner
description:
The Happiness Planner is a calendar and to-do list app to help you cultivate happiness by embracing the power of positive thinking, mindfulness, gratitude and self-development.

The practices in The Happiness Planner will help you adopt a positive outlook on life, build introspection into your routine, increase self-awareness, and feel more inspired and fulfilled from within.

In short, while using The Happiness Planner, you'll be encouraged to:

- Set goals that will maximize your happiness levels.
- Practice self-reflection so that you understand yourself better.
- Plan your life around things that truly matter with those who truly matter.
- Make changes to the things that make you unhappy.
- Set goals that you want to achieve and write down your action plans.
- Train your mind to always look at the positive side of things.
- Learn to master the art of resilience.
- Start each day with a positive and exciting thought.
- End each day with gratitude.
- Evaluate your health, happiness, energy, and productivity levels.
- Reflect on your month and the lessons learned. 
- Set goals for improvement.


FEATURES:

- Your Happiness Roadmap
- Monthly Goal Setting
- Monthly Reflection
- Daily Inspirational Quotes & Articles
- Daily Goal Setting
- Daily Schedule & To-Dos
- Daily Exercise and Meal Plans
- Daily Reflection and Positive Thinking
- Daily Gratitude
- Daily Notes
- Bucket List

Download now and start living a more inspired, positive, and happier life.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

The Happiness Planner is a free to download and free to use app. For the first 30 days, you will have access to all features including premium features. After that, you will be limited to only Schedule & To-Do features. In order to continue having access to premium features, you have to upgrade to become a subscribed member. If you wish to cancel your membership or subscription, you need to do so more than 24 hours before your renewal date.

Your Happiness Planner subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and will be charged through your Google Play account. Refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

title: Depression CBT Self-Help Guide
description:
LEARN TO CONTROL THE STRESS THAT CONTRIBUTES TO DEPRESSION

CONTAINS
***Screening test with graph to monitor severity of depressed mood
***Articles about clinical depression and cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)
***50 suggestions from CBT with a tracking feature to help focus positively and motivate
***Depression Assistance Audio to help understand clinical depression
***Cognitive Thought Diary to learn to challenge stressful thinking and provide positive feedback
***Emotion Training Audio to learn to access calming moods or emotions
***Relaxation Audios to learn deep relaxation
***Password protection available
***Customization of graphics

NOTE: All audios can be downloaded from ExcelAtLife.com

The natural management of depression involves understanding depression and the factors that contribute to the symptoms. Learning to manage stress in your life and engage in self-care behaviors can improve your symptoms and your mood.

This app contains a depression severity test, audios, articles, a cognitive diary, and a motivational points system that help you learn how to do this.

Reason for permissions:
1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)
2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card
3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audios

comments: The app talks a lot about using CBT techniques, but I have no idea what these techniques are, and they are not detailed in the app at all. It also talks a lot about "irrational thoughts", but what if I believe all my negative self-talk is rational truth? This app really needs a make-over.

This is the one. I've tried some other apps, but this one hit the spot. Read the articles, do the exercises, and use the diary. There's a lot of information packed into this app. It might not be the prettiest app, but the content is genuine.

I love this app. I've read the articles and I frequently listen to the audios. The audios are very helpful, I can use strategies to improve mindfulness, calm down or be uplifted and to help me fall asleep.
The most excellent mood tracker app! Truly helped me get through some really rough times!!! Un
Great app, but doesn't work with new gestures in Android 10. When you swipe to pull the menu over from the left, it just closes the app. I might have to find another cognitive diary.

title: Stay Focused and More Productive with BlockSite
description:
Make productivity your priority with BlockSite and start improving your time management, focus and overall potential today! Learn how to stay focused, take control of your screen time and remove distractions from your life in just a few clicks!

BlockSite is considered an awesome self control app to regain time control as it enables you to control your browsing content by blocking apps and sites when you need to keep focused.

All it takes is a few simple clicks once downloaded and you‚Äôll be able to avoid procrastination, increase concentration and stop wasting time.  You‚Äôll also be able to stay more engaged with the world around you and make time for what matters most, both online and offline. 

So whether you‚Äôre a student, professional in the workplace or just want to implement better productivity and time management in your life by improving your digital habits, we can help.

‚≠êÔ∏èFeatures‚≠êÔ∏è

Remove all distracting and harmful websites and apps from your life by blocking them while you need to stay focused and productive. You can even set yourself a focus timer and make sure you stay on track throughout the day while at work or school.

üë®üèº‚ÄçüíªWork Mode
The work mode timer feature enables you to control your time via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes followed by a short break. With ‚ÄòWork Mode‚Äô you can set times when to block websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary.

üîûBlock Adult Content
Ever wondered how to block adult content on your device? Well now you can...easily! With the built in porn blocker that blocks all known adult sites by default making sure that you don‚Äôt see any inappropriate content.

üìÖScheduling
Set up your own daily schedules and daily routines when you need to stay on track with the ‚ÄòScheduling‚Äô feature that enables you to set days and times when you can access certain sites and apps. It‚Äôs the best time management planner you could ever wish for, we promise!

‚è≥Time Management
Now your time management schedule will never look better! You‚Äôll be able to get all your work done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

üì±üíªSync
BlockSite is a cross-browser website/URL and app blocker that helps you to control your website usage and manage distractions and addictions. It is available on Google Chrome and can be synced between your desktop and mobile so you stay productive and have total control over your time wherever you are.

As one of the best productivity tools available, we can help you  procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You‚Äôll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

BlockSite helps you stay focused and avoid distracting websites and apps by using Accessibility services to block them from opening. As part of this process, BlockSite receives and analyzes aggregated de-identified information about your mobile data and app use. The work mode timer feature enables you to control your time via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes followed by a short break. With ‚ÄòWork Mode‚Äô you can set times when to block websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary.

üîûBlock Adult Content
Ever wondered how to block adult content on your device? Well now you can...easily! With the built in porn blocker that blocks all known adult sites by default making sure that you don‚Äôt see any inappropriate content.

üìÖScheduling
Set up your own daily schedules and daily routines when you need to stay on track with the ‚ÄòScheduling‚Äô feature that enables you to set days and times when you can access certain sites and apps. It‚Äôs the best time management planner you could ever wish for, we promise!

‚è≥Time Management
Now your time management schedule will never look better! You‚Äôll be able to get all your work done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

üì±üíªSync
BlockSite is a cross-browser website/URL and app blocker that helps you to control your website usage and manage distractions and addictions. It is available on Google Chrome and can be synced between your desktop and mobile so you stay productive and have total control over your time wherever you are.

As one of the best productivity tools available, we can help you procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You‚Äôll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

BlockSite helps you stay focused and avoid distracting websites and apps by using Accessibility services to block them from opening. As part of this process, BlockSite receives and analyzes aggregated de-identified information about your mobile data and app use. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy: https://blocksite.co/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://blocksite.co/terms/
summary: BlockSite helps you stay focused by blocking distracting sites and apps.
developerAddress: 1007 N. Orange St., 4th Fl., Wilmington, Delaware 19801
recentChanges:
We're always making changes and improvements to BlockSite.
To make sure you don't miss anything, keep your Updates turned on.

In this version:
* General improvements
* Crushed bugs that caused some crashes
comments: I like this app because it keeps you focused and on track by locking your apps (and websites) during the day. I have the schedule on when I am in school. I also like it because there is two settings. Work mode, which you can add more apps that you don't need while you are just doing work, but you woudl need during the day like texting. Overall a really good app!

Excellent for productivity. I can block YouTube, social media, etc. Whether they be the apps or the websites versions. The password feature is very effective so long as I make the password really long and inconvenient to input. I prefer this app to my last website blocker, BlockX, because BX was too puritan. They were overly concerned with blocking sexual content, to the extent that videos about "Spongebob: Battle for Bikini Bottom" were considered off-limits and forced me to turn off the app.

Horribly suspicious privacy policy. The app collects your browsing history information "in order to provide you insights about your usage." No, the app doesn't need to "give me insights." It needs to block spam & scams -- not to BE one. This app is a scam, stealing the information it's supposed to protect for you. Don't install it.

I have previously given a 2-star. I want to revisit and change it to 5-star, so that it can average out to 4-star. What I like: user friendliness, visuals, prompt customer support. What can improve: In the app description they should list down currently supported web browsers and software versions. I list down below for your convenience Android: Google Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Opera Mini and Brave. iOS: Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Aloha, Puffin, edge and Opera Touch. Extension: Chrome and Firefox

This app isn't a ad, pop up or something like that blocker, but it can block stuff that distracts you! You see, I've known stuff that kids don't need to know(basically 18+ stuff), and now I'm getting random 18+ pop ups from a website I never known about! I've tried tons of "Ad blocker" apps, but none of them work! Finally, I got this and now, I've blocked 18+ stuff, and it's literally my savior! I stopped getting the random pop ups. Thanks!

title: GG Self Esteem & Confidence
description:
Wish to build confidence and have higher self esteem? Want to learn how to become more successful and enjoy the power of inner-dialogue?

IMPROVING CONFIDENCE IS SIMPLE
Throw away your negative thoughts. Accept your positive thoughts. Learn to identify your inner conversation and respond to real life thoughts. Train daily and improve your self esteem and wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG apps.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, mood, and maladaptive behaviours. 

HOW DO I BUILD MY CONFIDENCE
The foundations of healthy confidence and self esteem are built upon beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that "everything in my life needs to be prefect", I won't be able to live up to these expectations and my confidence will decrease.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. With daily affirmations, we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self-talk. We can change our beliefs and get rid of thinking patterns that negatively affect our confidence and self-esteem.

HOW GG SELF-ESTEEM WORKS
The app is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of unhelpful thoughts
2. Train you to identify and challenge unhelpful thoughts
3. Increase your daily access to affirmations and positive thoughts
4. Increase the automaticity of helpful thinking
5. Provide daily affirmations for confidence and self-esteem boost

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining self esteem during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

KNOW YOUR THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes positive or neutral thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.
The more we train, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your confidence, start today! We believe apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 500 levels. Each level has a pool of self-talk thoughts. Users are required to complete a random set of 'thoughts' to complete the level.
To further strengthen learning of supportive self-talk, each level the player completes is followed by a memory game in which one has to identify a supportive statements that appeared in the previous level.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, positive boost, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, seeing the beauty, fear of abandonment, and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle maintaining low self-esteem.

WHAT IF I COMPLETED ALL THE LEVELS
The key to using the app is learning new topics, but even more importantly - training daily. There are levels designed as "daily training" for you to play once you completed your base course.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GG APPS
Visit our website: http://ggapps.net

OTHER APPS BY GG
GG Self Care
GG OCD
GGBI: Body Image Distress & Preoccupation
Good Blocks

New GG experience with loads more content and levels
500+ daily challenges
New psychological themes
Improved personalization
comments: I purchased the full version of the original app for ~¬£15 (which guaranteed lifetime access) , which I found quite helpful. I was highly disappointed to find out that the original app is no longer on my phone and has instead been replaced by an app that charges a monthly subscription. Fair enough if the creators want to follow this model but I do find it very unfair that the early adopters who paid full price for the original app no longer have access to it.

Updated review: The previous version was very good and I was finding it very useful. The new update locked the app for me again despite having purchased a full unlock and all my progress was lost. But I got help from a developer to unlock the app again and I will try the new one now from the beginning and see how it works for me.

I paid for the full version (which guaranteed lifetime access) before they updated it. Now they're saying I have to pay monthly? This feels like a scam and could potentially damage people who they've once helped. This is dangerous

I like this app, but it only let's you do three exercises a day, and no other way to practice during the day without having to start all over and then you find again at some point, you have to stop at three exercises. They need to have better instructions. There should be a clearly explained way to practice any time you want, as well as do the 3 main exercises a day.

A nice app, but I didn't get a feeling or indication from the app that it was going to be helpful and it's already asking for money. I hope you will let people see more of the app to understand what is happening with the questions we're answering and how everything works, and if it works. Still skeptical, just haven't seen enough yet. Thanks for letting me try it out!

title: Avocation - Habit Tracker
description:
Sticking to new habits or breaking old ones can be overwhelming and stressful. How about making it a fun experience? Yes, you‚Äôve read it right. No more exhausting streaks, self-restrictions and unreachable goals. Avocation is your offline pocket growth assistant that will accompany you on your way to a better version of yourself. Our goal is to show you that it is all about small things that only take a few minutes of your time throughout the day. Sounds simple, doesn‚Äôt it? Have a look at what we prepared for you.
 
Plan your day with Avocation: create your habits and organize your daily routines. Habits are visualized in circles to give you a quick overview of your to-do list. Customize habit colors, icons, and routines. Need a reminder? That's not a problem, you can schedule an individual notification for each habit. All set up? Tap the habit circle after completing it and view your progress. You are fabulous!
 
Track your progress with Avocation: complete habits and view the statistics screen to get your daily and weekly progress overview. It is simple and intuitive: progress is represented by a water bottle that fills up with every tap of habit circles. Forgot to tap a habit yesterday even though it was completed? Don't worry, your statistics is safe. With out time travel feature you can return one day back and make sure all completed habits are marked.
 
Grow with Avocation: complete your first habit and start growing your baby plant. However, plants need water: the plant will not grow if your statistics bottle is empty!
 
Learn with Avocation: have a look at the collection of short and enjoyable lessons about habits that we created for you. You will discover the science behind habit formation and development, learn how to analyze and prioritize your goals, set your mind on smart, efficient changes and much more. Our Avocoach will assist you along the way. 
 
Your free account is waiting for you, no registration needed! Unlimited access to lessons, up to 5 habits, time travel, custom reminders and much more! We are constantly working on new features. If you feel like becoming a habit pro or simply enjoy our app, you can support the development by subscribing to our membership. We offer you more custom habit colours, unlimited habits and bonus karma points:) 
                                                                                                   
We designed Avocation with passion to create a unique and enjoyable experience for you. We are looking forward to your ideas and feedback and working hard on making the app better. Drop us a line hello@avocation.app

Terms of use: https://avocation.app/terms

New:

comments: The app is cute but doesn't work properly. It only worked for a month. Then the app's reaction time slowed down significantly. When I wanted to tap on the habit it took about 10 seconds to do something and it was getting worse the longer I had this app. Today I am clicking and waiting and nothing's happening. I paid for a year and regret it. I only used it for 3 months. The last month the app was basically unusable. Stay away from this app. I am uninstaling it. No calendar/overview.

Easy to use and a very clean design. Although is not a bad thing, at first when I opened the app it gave me the option to set up habits according to different needs. Like if I needed inspiration or other activities but when I try to find those options again they don't appear anymore. I would like it if they are available again so I have a sort of 'guide' to now which habits I'd like to take up. But the fact that it gives me freedom to add the my own is good too.

I've tried so many habit apps, motivation apps, etc, etc. And none of them worked for me. But I love Avocation! It's a super clean format, user friendly, and adorable art. My only request is more icons to choose from. Other than that I'm thrilled I finally found an app that works!

Very fun concepts and excellent graphic design! Everything is laid out in a way that makes it easy to understand. Nothing bad happens if you skip a day and only needing to do at least one habit a day to grow the plant really helps combat my perfectionism. A widget and more detailed stats are apparently on the way, and I look forward to it! Pricing is reasonable & everything essential is free. The one suggestion I have is being able to repeat the tutorial where it gives you ideas for new habits.

Great app! Has really helped keep myself accountable for the habits I'm trying to maintain. Has a really beautiful and easy to use UI. And the plant feature is really lovely too. I just wish I could add more habits in the free version, but of course understand that the developers need to make money with the paid version. And that also means that there aren't disruptive ads!

title: Presently: A Gratitude Journal
description:
Practice gratitude with this simple, always free, and private gratitude journaling app. 

Presently lets you:
‚Åï Record daily entries of gratitude
‚Åï Reflect back on your past moments of gratitude
‚Åï Find motivation through quotes and prompts
‚Åï Set daily reminders to continue your gratitude practice
‚Åï Lock your entries with fingerprint or face id
‚Åï Search your old entries
‚Åï Share your entries with family and friends
‚Åï Export/import your entries
‚Åï Switch to your favorite color scheme

Presently is 100% free and ad free. All of your entries stay on your device and in your control.

summary: Celebrate your daily life with Presently, a free & private gratitude journal
recentChanges: We now support Croatian! Thank you to Antonietta for the translation.
comments: Recently, I went through an experience that really shook me. My pastor suggested thanking God daily in a deliberate, rather than my usual haphazard way, as a means of connecting with God less randomly. I found 'Presently' shortly after, and I make daily entries, reviewing them monthly. I have lots to be thankful for, and I am closer to God than before!

I really enjoy this app. I've been using it for a while now and it's simple, easy to use, and streamlined. It has customisation options which are great if you prefer apps with a "dark-mode", its otherwise uncluttered design and interface provide a calming and reassuring feel. I like the daily reminders and that it has milestones for how many days you've tracked. It's a nice way to reflect on my day and focus on the positives. Presently rocks, so please never change! You're already perfect!

Simple, focused & without advertising distraction. Colorful selection of background themes to choose from. Pithy quotes on gratitude, daily reminders & timely encouragements to develop the habit of gratitude. Pleasure to read & re-read past entries. Growing to be grateful for things past, thankful for the present and hopeful of the future - come what may, surely I can still find something to be thankful for. Simple app to build a lifelong, daily habit of gratitude. Highly recommended.

I've been using this for about a week and am really enjoying it so far. The best things are that it has a simple but aesthetic design and the fact that there are no ads. And although you can write whatever you want, being asked what you're grateful for is a great start and helps me begin positively which I struggle with but think it's good to do for mental health. I hope these things never change because it makes it so calming and stress free to use compared to other journalling apps!

Simple, easy to use, and convenient gratitude app. I love that it sends nightly reminders and there is nothing complicated about it. I look forward to getting my nightly reminders and I am now feeling so much more intuned to the things big and small I can show gratitude for daily. Love this so much!

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Journey: Diary, Journal
description:
Join millions of Journey users and create a healthier, happier mind. A sanctuary for your mind and soul, Journey will help increase your positive energy, be more grateful and a calmer mind by building healthy thinkings through journaling. 

We‚Äôre more than just a journal, or a diary; we‚Äôre your own motivational coach and happiness trainer. Let's embark on a fabulous journey of self-improvement today. 

Top Reasons You Need Journey:

comments: H meave been using this diary for a long time. It's excellent! But I'm finding many of the photos I added appear as duplicates. Very annoying having to delete and add them again. Why is this happening? It seems random. Can anyone explain why this is happening. Duplicate photos only appearing on my phone, the computer version is always perfect.

I was more of a pen and paper type, which I still do on occasion but I love the fact I can ad photos and that will autoadjust the location of my entry to match the photo so I can show and speak to the moment. I can also journal on my driving commute which is always where I'm unloading the days thoughts and feel inspired. It's so easy and will always be able to be found.

I tried to export the journal to a new email account; exportation is only supported with a premium account. So I signed up for a 7-day trial with auto-renewal in order to export my journal... but was unable to import the journal into the new email account. Now frustrated, I tried to turn off the auto-renewal so I wouldn't be charged for a functionality that didn't work. No dice. The link provided in the help desk was 404-ed, the link provided in the desktop app didn't work. In short, fraudulent.

I love this app. So nice that I can add pics, audios, videos, links to my entries. It's so personal and meaningful. I wish it hadn't deleted some of my videos though. They were working and now it shows the entry is empty. Overall, best app I've found.

At first I loved the app and made entries daily. Then all of sudden a question pops up in my head, "what if the developers reads these daily enteries". I never felt right since. I purchased the membership but I dont feel I have 100% privacy.

title: #SelfCare
description:
Hello. This is us! We're staying home for the day. We refuse to leave our bed. This is our space. Our shelter. Today, this is the whole universe! 

And it's okay. We're surrounded by our favorite sacred things. Each one has something gentle to offer.

And we'll be okay. Let's practice some #SelfCare together. Let's start with a little breathing exercise...

Breathing slowly connects us to our body and gives us life. Mmmmmm. We can breathe for as long as we'd like. There's no hurry. There's no end. We breathe and we listen to ourselves.

In this universe, our goal is simply to feel better. There's no winning, no failure, no score. No difficulty, no ads, no notifications. There is just us and our feelings.

Join us here, in this room, for a few moments. This room is our escape. <3

186-720 King Street West
Toronto, Ontario, Canada
M5V 3S5
recentChanges: Hello luvlies! We are busy working on some big changes which will take a bit longer, but have a collection of smaller improvements for you until the next big release. We've done some new work with the candle, to give you a space to set an intention or to let go of something. Finally, we've done many little bug and spelling fixes. Thank you for your help with catching them. We adore that you are on this journey with us. <3
comments: i love this app. the art style is beautiful, and not overly stimulating so it stays a calm environment. i love the unique personalisation features. i struggle a lot with stress and self hatred, and this app genuinely helps me. there's no stressful game i'm trying to beat, no time limits, no adds. it's so refreshing. i don't come rushing in trying to do ten things at once. i can take my time to complete my activities. and i can choose which ones to do. i love the items too. highly recommend.

When I have no one to talk to and I feel close to my lowest, if I have enough left in me, I'll open this app and start going through the activities. I always start off thinking they're stupid and pointless and full of lies. But I keep on doing it and always feel better enough, after a few minutes, to where I can think clearly and rationally again. I may not feel bright and cheery, but I don't want to cause myself harm anymore after some time on this app.

Perfect. I didn't know how much I needed this. Downloaded during quarantine and feel so much better all the time. I highly recommend. I love how the room is messy but after awhile it feels like home. It makes me feel at peace and validated. Best app I've found so far please download. Even if you think you don't need it I promise you that you do need it.

I absolutely love this app. However half of the things that helped me are no longer here. Paper flowers, picture puzzle, the locket, jar, journal, etc are gone. I figured if you check in daily they'd reappear. The moon, altar and the tarot cards did but that was it. I'd love to see them all back. So for that I did a 4 star instead of a 5. I loves the use of "we". It makes me feel like I'm not alone and my alters (DID) are included.

Hey all! I really love the app, it's incredible and so comforting to know we can indulge in our emotions, we can stay as long as we'd like and feel however we'd like and encourage ourselves with all the activities in it, it's so great for grounding and comfort! The devs were amazing too when I asked some questions, so I implore you to explore the kind and comforting minigames! I can't wait to see future updates and new games! Much love to the team, you guys are awesome!üíñ

title: AppBlock - Stay Focused (Block Websites & Apps)
description:
AppBlock - Block Disturbing Websites & Apps is an application that helps you (its users) block annoying apps & websites and bring down your screen time.

You can set a specific time and date in the app and once that period passes, the blocked apps or websites can be accessed again. There‚Äôs also the possibility to set up your profile to activate based on a specific wifi connection, your location. This way you can start blocking automatically for example as soon as you get to work.

What if your self-discipline isn‚Äôt of the strongest, you ask? Go for Strict Mode and you won‚Äôt be able to cancel your profile or remove the app.

Smart productivity app & self-control booster

Use AppBlock as your social media blocker, a do-not-disturb timer, screen time tracker, or generally as a versatile focus app to boost your productivity and limit app usage. Download the best website and app blocker for Android. Block social media websites or other distracting apps.

App usage tracker

If you like numbers, AppBlock allows you to track your usage of apps and the time you spend browsing the web. This way you can stay on top of how well you actually stay focused. And no worries... the statistics data is stored in your own device only and you can clear it at any time.

How to use it:

Our self-control app AppBlock - Stay Focused (App Blocker & Web Blocker) is a really easy-to-use productivity app. Download it & simply select the apps and websites that may distract you while you have important work to do. Being not only a social network limiter, you can also:

‚úîÔ∏è By using the app blocker self-control app, you can block any application and any website.
‚úîÔ∏è You can temporarily block your email & keep your email notifications off.
‚úîÔ∏è You can set an app or website a usage time limit for each day. For example, for social media apps, only 20 minutes of Facebook during work time or at school.
‚úîÔ∏è If you don't want to be able to change settings during blocking time, just use AppBlock Strict Mode, which will help you with your self-control.
‚úîÔ∏è You can disable other notifications for a specific time to help you concentrate.

Features:

Take a look at the app blocker & web blocker features of the AppBlock app and learn more details about how this utility and privacy protector app works for your work-life balance:

‚úîÔ∏è Block application & sites: be choosy and selective about app launch.
‚úîÔ∏è Select how long you want to spend in a particular application or on a website per day when a profile is active.
‚úîÔ∏è Block notifications from a specific application: you can avoid unwanted communications.
‚úîÔ∏è Create profiles with rules for groups of particular applications.
‚úîÔ∏è Use a timer and activate profiles for a selected time window.
‚úîÔ∏è Protect your AppBlock application with a PIN code.
‚úîÔ∏è List of blocked notifications, so you don't miss anything.
‚úîÔ∏è Profile lock (unlock only when the phone is connected to charger).
‚úîÔ∏è Strict Mode to lock your AppBlock settings.
‚úîÔ∏è The app can be used as a means of parent control.
‚úîÔ∏è There are web usage statistics and app usage statistics for those who like charts.

AppBlock helps:
‚òùÔ∏è increase your productivity and self-control
üë™ increase quality time with your family
üìµ with your phone addiction (phone addiction tracker)
üëá with digital diet - reduce time wastage
‚úåÔ∏è find peace (when you need offtime)
‚òÄÔ∏è to be more anti-social
üì¥ reduce screen time (phone usage tracker)
üí™ focus on important jobs, relationships, etc.
üå¥ with digital wellbeing
ü§≥ reduce your obsession with your device

Download AppBlock and stay more focused on your work.

ADHD
If you or your child suffer from ADHD, AppBlock will help you.

Uninstallation prevention
This app uses the Device Administrator permission to provide Strict mode functionality, which prevents you or your children from uninstalling the app.

SUPPORT
Email: support@appblock.app
Web: www.appblock.app

comments: Love this app. The premium is worthwhile. One problem though. The strict mode. I find myself disabling the regular mode every couple of days, so strict mode is fantastic. But it blocks the use of settings entirely. Whether you want to make a mobile hotspot, pair a Bluetooth device or just check something, the app block will stop you. Using strict mode even just for more than a day or two can be seriously painful and impractical if you use these things. Please try to find a solution to this!

Just noticed a little glitch. When you set an hourly limit, if you go over it it says 'you have no more time for TODAY' but then it resets the next hour. If they can fix this to say something like 'youve used all your time for this hour' I would change my review to 5 stars Unfortunately this is happening with all features. I have blocked certain apps from 1am to 9am and when I try to open it says you have used all y.our time for TODAY. which is not accurate

Helps me control what apps I want to be using during the productive hours of the day. One thing I would like to know about is how I can set a profile and leave it on indefinitely (so instead of a timer, it just stays on till I go to turn it off). Update: I contacted the support team and they helped me figure it out. Thank you!

I have a real problem with accessing certain sites too often and while I'm at work. I was using this app to great effect until I just started disabling the block when I didn't like it (oops). Well I just found the locking option! Now this is perfect for me. Thanks for helping me be professional at work :)

I've used the app for a couple of weeks and although it helped my productiveness, there are a couple of things I find really puzzling. For example, although it blocks notifications (which is great!), I can still see them in the app itself. If there's one thing that makes me desperate to go on social media again, it's seeing an incomplete message. Giving me some but not all information about what's going on feels immensely distracting. Also, Messenger is impossible to block. Why?

title: Asana: Your work manager
description:
Asana is the work manager for teams. But better. From the small stuff to the big picture, Asana organizes work so teams are clear what to do, why it matters, and how to get it done.

‚úî TAKE THE GUESSWORK OUT OF WORK
See who is doing what and by when across the whole team:
Coordinate plans, projects, and tasks in one shared space
Switch between list, kanban board, and calendar views
Organize and assign tasks; set due dates
Attach files to tasks so relevant info is easy to find

‚úî GET THE WHOLE PICTURE‚ÄîEVEN ON THE GO
Keep an eye on progress no matter where you are:
Instantly see if projects are on track, at risk, or off track‚Äîand why
Post status updates, or request updates from project owners
Drill down into tasks for more information

‚úî PUSH WORK ALONG...WITHOUT GETTING PUSHY
Make sure nothing falls through the cracks:
Clarify if tasks are high, medium, or low priority
Approve work or mark tasks for approval
Set tasks as milestones to establish critical checkpoints
Get notified when tasks are completed, overdue, and more

‚úî ASANA MOBILE + WEB = YOUR A-TEAM
Work efficiently whether you‚Äôre at the office or on the go: 
Automatically transcribe voice memos to tasks
Convert photos of whiteboards, charts, or diagrams to tasks
Instantly sync work between the app and web
Work offline without worrying about losing your data

Join more than 75,000 organizations and millions of users worldwide who trust Asana to stay organized and in control of their work. Download the Asana app now.

By downloading Asana, you agree to our Terms of Service, which you can find at https://asana.com/terms

comments: Ever since the update this app sucks outloud. The dashboard in the widget is useless, nothing shows up there. Things that were there before the update are gone. I have to check the calendar at best to find tasks, at worst I have to refer to the email I was sent. Making the app effectively useless. I can just use a calendar app. That way I can see the info i need at a glance without having to dig for it. UPDATE. I don't see ANY of my projects at all in the app. Just deleted the app. Thanks!!

Lot of issues of login. Very stupid idea login by email. You cannot login into your asana account without using the "magic email". There is no option to enter in your password and email combination. Since my email accounts are both Gmail I'd be obliged to logout and login back in each time or create a new account and lose my work. Is it really asking too ...

Chats in a task will better if it's like in WhatsApp or any similar apps. It's familiar and have all the details in the current chats in asana. Now it feels like a lost of msgs.. It's difficult to swiftly check who said wat inside a chat.. Improvement reuiqred..

Update 11.10.2020: After update not even start. After 2 weeks of use: Great app for task a partially also for project management in smaller teams and/or IT companies with agile approach. Not so easily usable for waterfall approach.
It refused to recognize the password I just created and wrote down. Then when I did log in the first time the profile creation just hits a dead end. Not worth wasting any more time on it...

title: 21 Days Challenge
description:
Create your ideal life with life changing habits.
It is estimated that it takes people 21 days to form a new habit. So it‚Äôs a perfect amount of time to change or introduce something new in your life. Choose the best challenge for you and do it for 21 days and you‚Äôre going to see how the habit becomes part of your lifestyle day by day.

Starting a healthy lifestyle, taking a break away from the internet, practicing gratitude, trying to be more productive, simple practices to find happiness and calm in your life, how to study effectively for all the students, ways to spread kindness and positivity, tips for fixing your sleeping schedule and daily positive affirmations are some of the challenges that you can find in the app.

Once you complete your daily task, you can mark as completed and collect the points (to customize your avatar). This way, you can use this app like a habit tracker.

In the gratitude challenge, you can write your thoughts and share them in the feed (you can leave anonymously too). Here you're going to see all the community answers and you can also give it a like on your favorite ones.

Complete tasks on your profile and do daily challenges to collect points so you can buy items for your own avatar like different hairstyles, eyes and mouth shapes and clothes.
Create a healthier and happier mind with journaling. With this app you can daily journal and choose your daily mood. Then you can track your mood in the calendar and see all your previous records.
You also a have a selection of positive wallpapers for your phone.

Enable notifications and choose the time to be notified to remind you to do the challenge every day.

Don‚Äôt forget to take care of your body and mind. It's the only place you have to live.

comments: I love it üòç soooo much. At first i thought that it only had the default challenges, and i was about to look for another app to complement it. But then i realized that you can set your own challenges and tailor them to your exact needs. That is when i jumped for joy. I have needed something like this all my life ‚ù§Ô∏è thank you so much and God bless you. Keep up the amazing work . Also after the 21 days are over you can restart the challenge ( with the same daily steps or change them).So flexible ‚ò∫

An update. I removed 2 stars from my review for the following reasons: 1. Volume control/mute doesn't exist in settings. The ads are very jarring and come by surprise. 2. I created my own challenge, and none of the days saved. Every scratch was blank so I deleted it. Finally, a habit tracker that I actually like! I like how simple and streamlined the app is. Not hard to use. Easy to adapt the challenge to your individual needs if the suggestion for the day doesn't apply to you.

A real app that you can use in life..I love the topics, the suggestions really work and you can tell it was made with very good intentions. I do not force myself to follow what comes up day by day, but I do return to all the unchecked ones and see what chances come to complete them in the flow of the day. A good balance between being in the flow and directing your life. I love it. Thank you.

I absolutely love this app. I use it every day and it makes me so happy; especially the the tiny motivational and heartfelt quotes that you get as notifications every day, it's so wholesome to hear "it's okay to be emotional, it's what makes you human, beautiful and powerful" (for example) after a rough day ^^ i always smile when i receive those notifications and it makes me feel so much better

My favourite thing is the daily little inspirational notification which sometimes comes at the best time to pick me up if my mood is not that great. I like the diversity of the challenges, the structure of them and although it might sound silly, I do like the idea of scratching a card to find out your daily task, it boosts the excitement and puts me in a good headspace to get the task done. Great job to the developers and implementers!! Also, I do really enjoy the colour scheme, very calming

title: Todoist: To-Do List, Tasks & Reminders
description:
üèÜ 2020 Editor's Choice by Google
ü•á "Todoist is the best to-do list app right now" - The Verge

Todoist is used by 25 million people to organize, plan and collaborate on projects, both big and small.

Use Todoist to:
‚Ä¢ Capture and organize tasks the moment they pop into your head.
‚Ä¢ Remember deadlines with reminders and due dates. 
‚Ä¢ Build lasting habits with recurring due dates like "every Monday".
‚Ä¢ Collaborate on projects by assigning tasks to others.
‚Ä¢ Prioritize your tasks with priority levels.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress with personalized productivity trends.
‚Ä¢ Integrate your tools like Gmail, Google Calendar, Slack, Amazon Alexa and more.

Available on any device, Todoist will quickly become your hub for getting work and life organized.

Why you‚Äôll love it on Android:
‚Ä¢ Stay organized from your phone, tablet and watch.
‚Ä¢ Drag the Plus Button anywhere to insert a new task.
‚Ä¢ Simply type details like "tomorrow at 4pm" and Todoist will recognize it all for you.
‚Ä¢ All the power from Android: lock screen widget, Quick Add tile, Assistant, and notifications.

Happy organizing!

‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢

Questions? Feedback? Visit get.todoist.help or reach out on Twitter @todoist.

*About Premium billing*:
If you choose to purchase Premium, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can choose to be billed monthly or annually. You can turn off auto-renew in your Google Play settings any time after purchase.

recentChanges: üêõ You‚Äôll once again see a note at the bottom of your screen when you check something off in task view ‚Äî if there was a mistake, you can quickly undo it!
comments: It really lacks a calendar view or better integration with Google Calendar (e.g. sync more than one project, add colors to tasks in Google Calendar according to labels or projects, etc.). Otherwise it has been great, I'm really enjoying the app! Sub tasks should show their parent in "Next 7 Days" and "Today", this would be super powerful for splitting a task over several days, it would be a game changer for me!

The new widget does not allow me to open the app directly, like it could before. Updates should never remove features. Knocking my review down - rest of the app is still great. Edit: this feature has indeed been fixed, however I can't raise the score because what drove me here was another bug/update. It seems that my tasks/items aren't visible on the widget. I tried a restart and everything. You can still interact with them, but the widget is just a white blank canvas where tasks should be.

Been using for years, and it worked great until 1 day ago. Lists using widgets on Android all have white text on white background now... So obviously unusable. Must have been in an update as multiple Android users are experiencing the same in the last couple of days.

I bet it would work for someone who mainly needs a list, but personally I need alarms and reminders to keep me on track. I was looking for one when I found todoist that was advertised as having a reminder setting. I was disappointed to find out that the reminder function was a paid function, so I uninstalled the app. I bet it would work for someone else, but not for me

Just downloaded the latest update, to find everything on the widget completely clear. All my project lists gone ! Luckily it's all still within todoist but not on the widget. Still nothing after deleting and setting the widget back up. Looks like I'll have to use the icon again !

comments: Horrible! You need to fix the app it's causing me problems. When I make a payment it doubles the amount and I have to be going back and forth between my bank and flow to have it updated. I am not sure if it's bugs or what but it is annoying the only thing I would give it a good review for is it show bills that's it.

It's slow to load. Doesn't provide enough historical or package details. I recently viewed my account via my app and somehow lost approximately $50.00 üò±. How, I do not know. Miraculously it reappeared August,16th, 2020 app request new login which I did, then it asked to install the app which is already installed. Now it ask yo link accounts which it already shows are linked and it will not proceed further. This app has become unstable and frustrating

I dont see the purpose of the app. I understand nth and moving around is a chore. What does the red exclamation mark mean? It takes forever to load into the app and it never Gail's to log out for no reason. For a company that's so widely requested your software sucks.

Tried to pay my bill on the app...when processing the payment it showed an error on the app but still took my money from my bank account. The money paid isn't even reflecting on my bill. Ridiculous. Regret using the app. Now it's going to be a hassle to fix on my bank's end

You guys should put more effort into this app. It's easy to use but guys should make it gorgeous to eyes at least, like the MyDigicel app. Also it's very annoying that I have re-enter my login credentials a million times because the app ALWAYS forgets it, ya feel me?

title: Self Healing Course
description:
Back to the days where people actually believed in love and looked out for their neighbors. We need to start loving ourselves again. We each need to be the change we wish to see in the world. We need to heal ourselves and start loving ourselves again.

Happy people are successful people. This is simply because being happy makes it easy to stay motivated to reaching your goals. Your thoughts have a very significant impact on the life you lead and the quality of the relationships you will have with family members, friends, and significant others. Some even reason than our thoughts and beliefs can have an even stronger effect on our health than modern medicine.

Self healing falls into the same category ad meditation, yoga, and reiki. All of these different forms of healing have an understanding an appreciation for energy and energy healing properties. A form of alternative medicine and a different approach on how to your body. This type of healing can also be thought off as spiritual healing. 

Our free Self Healing Course will give you tips and tricks on how to heal your body with your mind. Mental health and clarity is so important, especially with the fast pace of our society.

Including in this wonderful app are chapters on:

* Being honest
* Being Kind
* Being Forgiving
* Being Generous
* Being Yourself

Read and learn from this wonderful app and start your journey towards Self Healing today. 

The Self Healing Course is free to download. We have also included other bonus apps to help you in other areas of your life! Check it out today.

recentChanges: This is the newest release of Self Healing Course.
comments: I liked it! Also right to the point , explained the way people & things are & how to.overcome them easily without making yourself unhealthy or resentful. Being honest kind generous respectful only helps yourself be a better happier person. With a understanding of life and yourself.

Love this self healing app so much! It's been working to help me heal my body as it's been helping to heal my mind first. Just wish there was an option to listen to the content in the chapters as opposed to have to sit down and read it all as my "sit down time" is limited.

I can't get the app to fit my screen no matter what I do. Its content may well vastly affect my life and PTSD very positively but I may never know as I cannot read the words well enough. The SOLE setting has to do with syncing and naught to do with anything useful. I ll wait a little bit and see if its creator responds in any meaningful way.

Good starting point but...it only gives you an idea of where to start, but not what to actually do about it. For someone whos just starting to dig into their issues it could be a big help. But for someone like me who was looking for more ideas of what to do ("i already know i have to change things, but how do i start to do that?") It was a bit of a let down.
Every time I open a chapter, I read a half of a sentence and it takes me back to the main menu....am I doing something wrong?

title: Healthily by Your.MD - Self-Care & Health Journal
description:
Healthily by Your.MD is the self-care app. Decide when to see a doctor, manage your wellbeing step-by-step, discover vetted health products and services, and find clear, trusted information on 100s of conditions, including coronavirus (COVID-19).

**Questions about coronavirus? Find the latest information and check your risk with Healthily**

Did you know most visits to the doctor are for issues you can treat yourself? To do that, you need safe, reliable information to help you understand how you‚Äôre feeling, and what to do next.

Healthily by Your.MD is the first self-care app registered as a Class I Medical Device ‚Äì bringing you the expertise you need, in a way you can use every day.  

Join millions of people already taking care of their health with Healthily. 

HOW IT WORKS

ASSESS: Our friendly chatbot helps you decide if you need to see a doctor. Tell it how you feel and its Augmented Intelligence recommends the best next steps for your symptoms ‚Äì including self-care for issues you can treat at home. 

LEARN: Our Health Library, sourced mostly from the UK‚Äôs National Health Service, completed by our own medical team, is the simplest, safest and most comprehensive in the world. Includes the up-to-date guidance and information on coronavirus (COVID-19). 

TRACK: Our user-friendly, secure health journal and symptom trackers help you keep track of your health and store notes, in complete privacy. 

DISCOVER: We‚Äôve created OneStop Health‚Ñ¢ Marketplace, the first vetted directory of healthcare products and services offered by other companies. So you can speak to a doctor, find a medicine or discover the best apps for you.

Used every day or when you need them, our symptom trackers, health journal and health library make self-care simple, particularly during the coronavirus outbreak (COVID-19).

YOUR SAFETY IS OUR No.1 PRIORITY

Healthily Self-Care Health Assistant and Health Journal is classified as a Class I Medical Device registered with the Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA) and is CE accredited, which means that our services comply with European Union Medical Device legislation.

All our health and self-care content is reviewed and approved by our team of in-house doctors who are supervised by our Clinical Advisory Board, made up of world-renowned medical experts.

As your personal health assistant, we take your security seriously. Our self-assessment tool, symptoms tracker and health journal have the ePrivacy seal of approval, so you can be confident your data is private and protected.

WE‚ÄôVE GOT YOU COVERED
We help you find self-care information on a huge range of health conditions including:

‚Ä¢ Coronavirus (Covid-19)
‚Ä¢ Common cold
‚Ä¢ Throat irritation
‚Ä¢ Influenza / Flu
‚Ä¢ Sprains and strains
‚Ä¢ Hay fever
‚Ä¢ Thrush
‚Ä¢ Headaches




(*) SAFE USE
If you‚Äôre generally healthy and don‚Äôt suffer from any chronic or rare medical conditions, we can help identify less-serious conditions you can manage yourself and guide you on whether to see a doctor. Your.MD cannot consider all the information a doctor can and is not able to identify all conditions or symptoms. Your.MD does not provide diagnosis or medical advice.

Your.MD cannot be used for information about babies, children aged 15 and younger, pregnant women, people on immunosuppressive treatment, and people with complex or long-term conditions.

For more information read Your.MD Terms of Service and Safe Use Instructions.

INTRODUCING:

comments: This App is really awesome! And is so much help and helpful to motivate you and pay more attention to yourself and how your feeling. It's like a friend thats there to help you! Thank you so much it has been so helpful!

I have a headache today and app sent me almost strait to the doctor as a serious issue. Not sure one of headache is that serious and reason might be any. Also I would welcome dark version (theme) of the app. Headache and white screen is not good.
Very easy to use. Simple layout and bold lettering.
This is a great app that offers Daily insights, a helpful assistant, and a Symptom tracker, & a Health Journal where you can annotate anything you feel may be of relevance later. I love it!
It really helps to journal how I'm feeling so I can look back when I need to. Very handy & helpful app.

title: Plant Nanny¬≤ - Your Adorable Water Reminder
description:
üéâ Google Play Best App of 2019 
Google Play in countries around the world, from Taiwan, to Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Italy, and Spain, featured the app on its list of Best Apps of 2019.

üíöThe Cutest Hydration App üíö

Water is essential for life, but drinking enough of it is also one of the easiest things to neglect. Plant Nanny¬≤ keeps track of how much water you drink -- each glass also waters the app‚Äôs plants so you can both thrive! Every day you can collect and take care of little plants to get hydrated and grow together!

What‚Äôs so good about drinking water?
Do you want a healthier body and a happier, more stress-free life? Are you looking to improve constipation, urethritis, or other common health conditionsÔºü

‚úÖ About 70% of our body is composed of water, so how our body feels depends a lot on how much water we drink. Starting with just a single glass of water, you can begin to change your entire water consumption habits and effectively improve your health, lose weight, and reduce bodily fatigue and illnesses.

‚úÖ  Plant Nanny¬≤ will provide you with a customized plan using simple charts and interfaces so you can get a solid grasp on your personal water consumption. Collect cute plants and improve the way your body looks and feels before you know it! These little plants will boost your spirits, improve your health, and help you cultivate good habits for drinking water!

-‚ú®Customize the way you manage your daily water consumption goals üéØ

üíöThe Cutest Hydration App üíö

Water is essential for life, but drinking enough of it is also one of the easiest things to neglect. Plant Nanny¬≤ keeps track of how much water you drink -- each glass also waters the app‚Äôs plants so you can both thrive! Every day you can collect and take care of little plants to get hydrated and grow together!

What‚Äôs so good about drinking water?
Do you want a healthier body and a happier, more stress-free life? Are you looking to improve constipation, urethritis, or other common health conditionsÔºü

‚úÖ About 70% of our body is composed of water, so how our body feels depends a lot on how much water we drink. Starting with just a single glass of water, you can begin to change your entire water consumption habits and effectively improve your health, lose weight, and reduce bodily fatigue and illnesses.

‚úÖ Plant Nanny¬≤ will provide you with a customized plan using simple charts and interfaces so you can get a solid grasp on your personal water consumption. Collect cute plants and improve the way your body looks and feels before you know it! These little plants will boost your spirits, improve your health, and help you cultivate good habits for drinking water!

-‚ú®Customize the way you manage your daily water consumption goals üéØ
üíßSuggestions for appropriate amounts based on individual body data and exercise habits
üíßAutomated reminders/buzzers‚Äã when it‚Äôs time to drink more water to help you truly establish the habit of regularly drinking water by having this handy‚Äã daily water track.
üíßCustomize the volume of your water cup and easily set the appropriate units for each glass in either milliliters or ounces
üíßRewards for regular use and small missions encourage you to stay motivated and reach your own water consumption goals

üìà Simple charts and interfaces at a glance üìù
üíßGraphics that progressively track your daily water intake
üíßTrack your water consumption history and quickly view daily, weekly, and monthly trends
üíßSimple design and user-friendly interface, so you can easily build good habits
üíßOptimized for screens of all sizes for use on multiple devices


üåøA variety of adorable and lively plants ‚òò
üíßEach glass of water you drink also waters the plants, so you can grow and thrive together!
üíßAll kinds of special pots and containers. Develop your own cute plant family!
üíßUnlock and collect a variety of different plants, and even interact with mysterious new creatures!

‚ñºAny questions or suggestions?
You can go to Plant Nanny¬≤ > Menu > Settings > FAQ to quickly search for a solution.
If you‚Äôre still unable to find an answer to your question, tap the envelope icon in the top right corner to contact our ‚ÄúGarden Assistant‚Äù (customer service). :)

comments: It's a very cute way to track my water intake and has shown me that even though I thought I was drinking enough water, I wasn't! You have to go to the options and enable all the sizes otherwise it yells at you for drinking too fast when adding two 8oz cups in a row rather than 16oz if you drink a water bottle.

Took off a star because ot doesn't let me customize when not to get reminders. The app currently automatically excludes 10pm-8am from the reminder schedule for sleeping time. I wish it would let me set my own schedule for that. Other than that, the app works well and it's cute. Keep up the good work.

You basically feed your plant it's awesome and you can also get yourself a cup still this game is really awesome no ads just the drinking too fast a sign and don't drink too much water sign just for those inferences it's awesome so I just gave it a four star hope you like it too try this out it's free and you are going to like it

This app is a fun way to get me drinking the proper amount with cute plants and easy mechanics. Unfortunately the app notifications make no sound so I don't know to drink water unless I'm actively on my phone.

I love using this app, but for the past couple of days it suddenly won't open correctly. I have to open and close the app at least 5 times before it will stay open. Not sure what happened, my phone hasn't updated this week, so that's not the problem. *Update: tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Worked once, now back to the app closing every time I try to open it.

title: StayFree - Screen Time Tracker & Limit App Usage
description:
‚ú¶ What is StayFree?

StayFree - Screen Time Tracker & Limit App Usage is a Self Control, Productivity and Phone Addiction Controller app that allow you to show how much time you spend on your smartphone and helps you focus by restricting the usage of apps. You can set usage limits for your apps and receive alerts when exceeding those usage limit. You can also view the details of your usage and statistics on your usage history.


‚ú¶What makes StayFree special?

‚úî Highest rated Self Control & Phone Addiction app
‚úî Extremely fast and user-friendly interface
‚úî Most accurate usage statics
‚úî Quick customer support
‚úî Battery friendly
‚úî Totally ad-free!

StayFree - Screen Time Tracker & Limit App Usage helps you:
üìµ overcome phone addiction
üîã stay focused
üì± reduce screen time
üõ° reduce distraction 
üíØ boost productivity
ü§≥ unplug more often
üìà increase your digital wellbeing
üë™ spend quality time with family or yourself
üí™ reduce wasted time with digital detox


‚ú¶App‚Äôs Features:

‚òÖ App usage history: view charts and statistics of your usage history.
‚òÖ Over-use reminder: notify you when you are spending too much time in an app and start your digital detox.
‚òÖ Block mode: temporarily block any application that you are over-using and stay focused.
‚òÖ Export mode: export your usage history to CSV or Microsoft Excel file.
‚òÖ Inspiring quotations: show inspiring quotations that encourage productivity and less usage of your phone.
‚òÖ Interface customization: there are 5 themes - customize the app how you want!
‚òÖ Lock mode: requires a password to change the settings.
‚òÖ Widget: show most used apps and total usage on a nice widget.
‚òÖ Pie chart graph: view daily and monthly application usage percentages.


‚ú¶YOU ARE IMPORTANT

We'd really appreciate if you could rate us 5 stars here on Google Play. Rating is very important to us in establishing trust with our user base. If you have suggestions or want to see something improved, don't hesitate to reach out!


‚ú¶CONTACT US

We love hearing from our users and getting their feedback! If you run into any issues with the app or have suggestions on what we can do to improve it, please send us an email: hello.stayfree@gmail.com



This app is maintained by Sensor Tower.

recentChanges:
Get more useful insight into your app usage, right from StayFree's homescreen!

comments: Very insightful and useful. Provides interesting information regarding your device usage. From here you can decide if you have a usage problem. Nicely laid out data, with many options. You can easily set limits or alarms to apps that are being used too much.

It's a good app. I was shocked to find I spent 6 hours a day, but now I only spend 2 hours a day excluding online classes. The reason for the three stars is because the alarm doesn't work. I reinstalled the app, check for updates but it doesn't work at all. The alarm for exceeding daily limit doesn't work. When I delete them alarm and create another one, it shows, "you have exceeded your daily limit today, the alarm will activate tomorrow." Please look into this issue as soon as possible.

Best screentime app I have found. It tracks your time per app. You can blacklist apps so it doesn't track them. I blacklisted maps because I want to track when I'm actually looking at my phone. You can set alarms and notifications for usage time. You can even change the notification label such as "that's enough for today." I have cut my social media time in half. It reminds me that I want to do something else with my time, like reading or drawing.

I love it. But there's just one thing I'd like you to add. When the application is blocked because of the limit I sometimes cheat and change the timing so I add extra minutes. It'd be great if I couldn't do that. So when the application is blocked I can't change the timing for that day anymore. Anyway It really makes me realize I spend way too much time on my phone and that I need a break. I've also been noticing lack of concentration and stress so I'm trying to change that with this app.

Started using Space and the pop up notification got on my nerves quickly, found this one and immediately loved it, all the features that you need for this purpose are free but some extras are optional to buy. Best part of that? A points program as a reward system that will unlock those features too! Hey "Space", if you really want to "help" people, Don't make pivotal options for app usage cost $$$! You guys nailed it for me, very happy. (‚ó†·¥•‚óï ã)

title: Mindspa: Self Help 4UR Mental Wellbeing & Wellness
description:
Are you often feeling sad, lonely, doubtful, or frustrated? Are you also frequently emotionally burdened by guilt, distrust, jealousy, envy, shyness, apathy, and other complex feelings? 

Do you want to improve your life, increase your emotional intelligence and feel calm, relaxed, confident, and overall happier? If meditation, Yoga, and other mindfulness practices are not for you, it‚Äôs time to coach yourself a little psychology.

Welcome to Mindspa ‚Äì the all in one app for your mental health wellbeing.

Using a variety of psychology based self improvement articles, self assessment tools, mental wellness workouts, and life improvement courses, we help you cope with difficult emotions in order to make your life better.

Say yes to personalised and professional self development and see your life grow daily. 

üíØ SELF GROWTH & MENTAL WELLBEING ARTICLES
Find resources, mental wellness tips, and tools to familiarise with your emotions, to better understand your needs and to help you focus and to achieve your desires, for your personal life as well as your relationships with others. We provide practical advice and accessible tools to support your mental wellbeing every day.

‚úçÔ∏è PERSONAL DIARY & STATS
Use the in-built mood and psychotherapeutic diary to track your moods, emotions, or situations in your personal life that inspired you or make you feel down. Use it as a self assessment tool to improve your overall mental wellness. Statistics and analytics will help you identify the areas where you need to work more.

üí° PSYCHOSUTRA - SELF HELP WORKOUTS
As a self coaching app, Mindspa features mental workouts for many negative feelings such as shyness, envy, loneliness, apathy, anger, frustration, anxiety, resentment. All mental workouts are neatly divided and feature tasks that you need to perform for long-term self improvement.

üìñ PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT COURSES
Whether you want to develop a new skill like become more attentive or confident, or overcome mental conditions like anxiety or the constant feeling of negativity and sadness, the Mindspa Courses can be of great help for your mental wellbeing. 

üÜò EMERGENCY CHATBOT
Are you having a panic attack? Your anxiety is overwhelmingly high? Have you had an argument with your partner or a family member? Are you having troubles coping after a traumatic event? Do you need to vent away but no one is there to listen? Use the Emergency section and let's talk it over. We guarantee you that you'll feel better after a therapeutic chat. 

‚òëÔ∏è BOOST YOUR MENTAL HEALTH WELLBEING & EMOTIONAL WELLNESS WITH: 
- Articles, cases and tips, covering psychology themes and real life events;
- Diary, a psychotherapeutic journal with daily submissions and useful analytics;
- Psychosutra, an impressive collection of coping-skills techniques for working with feelings, emotions and specific conditions;
- Courses, enrollable online programs with psychotherapeutic tasks on dedicated topics
- Personality tests, to help you determine which tools are right for you;
- Emergency, a chatbot simulation to support you in critical situations;
- And much more...

Start a positive shift in your mental wellbeing now!

Psychoeducation is often the first step for mental health improvement, and it consists in providing information and support to better understand and cope with a certain condition or emotionally straining circumstance. While it does not substitute psychotherapy, Mindspa can be a powerful complement to classic therapy, and it can be a great tool where a psychologist help is not easily accessible or affordable. 

üöÄDownload Mindspa ‚Äì the best wellbeing coach for personal growth & emotional intellect!


In case of issues or questions, don't hesitate to get in touch with us - write us at contact@mindspa.me
