title: Exploring your Mind - Psychology and relationships
description:
Exploring your Mind is one of the most complete digital publications on psychology, neuroscience and personal development in the world in English. üåé

Enjoy in our FREE APP articles written by professional psychologists on emotions, relationships, health and wellness, work, mindfulness, psychology, depression and anxiety, stress, development and personal growth, emotional support , self-knowledge, neuroscience, and much more!

Explore our categories:üë©‚Äçüíª

PSYCHOLOGY
In this category are all those articles that are related to our world and mental health. It collects information in articles about how our feelings, thoughts, health and well-being, relationships, behaviors and emotions are related, to configure who we are and our learning. In addition to articles from the main exponents of psychology, well-being, stress, depression, anxiety, health and personal growth that will help you in the day to day of your routine and your work and in your relationships with your partner. Learning psychology is the best way to improve your well-being and health and start understanding the mind!

EMOTIONS
Emotions are a fundamental pillar in the life of every living being. Basic emotions such as sadness, joy, fear, anger, surprise and disgust, and their relationships with each other, together with the other emotions, shape our health and well-being and our day-to-day life.
Discover in this category how feelings are generated and controlled and explain your personal growth and your well-being and health.
Ideal to understand the emotional culture, your personal development, your relationships, your well-being at work, detect stress, depression and anxiety, your emotions and feelings with others and take care of your health wherever you are: at home, at work or anywhere thanks to our online psychology articles and personal growth and development courses.

CURIOSITIES
Human beings are naturally curious, so we invite you to read the less common topics on the web. Curiosities, rankings, lists and articles about culture and their relationships.
Curiosities on different topics of health, well-being and relationships that interest you and will enhance your knowledge and personal growth.

COURSES
Find interesting online courses in neuroscience, wellness, relationships, psychology and communication from renowned professors. The courses are divided into different categories: skills development, self-knowledge, health and well-being, relationships, coaching, neuroscience, education, mindfulness, meditation, learning, calculation, communication, psychology, personal development and teaching.
With the Exploring your Mind Courses you can learn about various topics, enhance your personal growth or personal development, learn psychology, well-being, relationships, improve your leadership skills, deal with stress, anxiety, depression, and much more, which can serve as a great complement to your work and have a healthy mind and relationships.

SHOP‚òï
Exploring your Mind's Official Store.
In it you will find different models of personalized mugs, notebooks, as well as pens, notebooks and diaries with curious and thoughtful phrases about relationships, emotions and more.

Learn about psychology, emotions, feelings, personal development, personal growth and personal development, mental health, depression and anxiety, mindfulness, relationships with others and with others, well-being, health at work, neurosciences and everything you always wanted to learn about psychology to help you at work and in your day to day.

You will enjoy themes from:
Health & Wellness; depression, stress and anxiety; relations; personal growth and development; reconciliation of work and family, etc.


CONTACT
Write to us at: contacto@lamenteesmaravillosa.com

title: Money Manager Expense & Budget
description:
Money Manager - the #1 financial planning, review, expense tracking, and personal asset management app for Android!

Money Manager makes managing personal finances as easy as pie! Now easily record your personal and business financial transactions, generate spending reports, review your daily, weekly and monthly financial data and manage your assets with Money Manager's spending tracker and budget planner.

* Applying double entry bookkeeping accounting system
Money Manager facilitates efficient asset management and accounting. It does not just record your money coming in and out of your account but deposits your money into your account as soon as your income is input and draws money from your account as soon as your expense is input.

* Budget and expense management function 
Money Manager shows your budget and expenses by a graph so you can see the amount of your expense against your budget quickly and make suitable financial inferences

* Credit / Debit Card management function 
Entering a settlement date, you can see the payment amount and outstanding payment at the asset tab. You can arrange the automatic debit by simply connecting your debit card with your account.

* Passcode 
You can check passcode so you can safely manage your financial review account book with Money Manager

* Transfer, direct debit and recurrence function 
Transfer between assets is possible, which makes your personal and business asset management more efficient. In addition, you can manage you a salary, insurance, term deposit and loan more easily by setting automatic transfer and recurrence.

* Instant statistics 
Based on the data entered, you can instantly see your expense by category and changes between each month. And you can see the change of your assets and income/expense indicated by a graph as well.

* Bookmark function 
You can easily input your frequent expenses all at once by bookmarking them.

* Backup / Restore
You can make and view backup files in Excel file and backup/restore is possible.

* Other functions
- Change of starting date
- Calculator function (Amount > upper right button)
- Sub Category ON-OFF function

* Paid version *
- No Ads.
- Unlimited Assets (In the free version, limited to 10.)
- Edit PC (http://youtu.be/5S4S3EQ3AZE)

You can view ‚Äò‚ÄúMoney Manager‚Äù application using Wi-Fi. You can edit and sort the data by date, category or account group on the screen of your PC. In addition, you can see fluctuations of your accounts indicated on graphs on your PC.

So, what are you waiting for? Download Money Money right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!

Transfer between assets is possible, which makes your personal and business asset management more efficient. In addition, you can manage you a salary, insurance, term deposit and loan more easily by setting automatic transfer and recurrence.

* Instant statistics
Based on the data entered, you can instantly see your expense by category and changes between each month. And you can see the change of your assets and income/expense indicated by a graph as well.

* Bookmark function
You can easily input your frequent expenses all at once by bookmarking them.

* Backup / Restore
You can make and view backup files in Excel file and backup/restore is possible.

* Other functions
- Change of starting date
- Calculator function (Amount > upper right button)
- Sub Category ON-OFF function

* Paid version *
- No Ads.
- Unlimited Assets (In the free version, limited to 10.)
- Edit PC (http://youtu.be/5S4S3EQ3AZE)

You can view ‚Äò‚ÄúMoney Manager‚Äù application using Wi-Fi. You can edit and sort the data by date, category or account group on the screen of your PC. In addition, you can see fluctuations of your accounts indicated on graphs on your PC.

So, what are you waiting for? Download Money Money right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!
summary: The #1 financial planning, expense tracking and personal finance management app!
developerAddress: 2nd floor, 19, Bongeunsa-ro 68-gil, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Korea  Realbyte Inc. 06154
recentChanges:
4.5.x
Dark theme has added.
White theme has added.
Minor bug fixed.

4.4.x
Memo ‚ÄúAdd‚Äù and ‚ÄúDisplay‚Äù features are updated.¬†
Fix other errors.

comments: Good app. Easy to use. Stats feature is very useful too. But would be good if there is a search function to search for past record easily. For example I recorded something with description 'xxxxx' few months back, and now if I type in 'xxxxx', if the record can be retrieved easily rather than having to go back and check past record one by one, that would be marvellous. Anyway, very good app.

I've tested at least 7 different money manager apps, and this one seems to be the best. The UI is awesome and so is the UX. Everything makes sense once you put some time into it. There is no option to sync with bank accounts/cards. If that is something you want, look elsewhere. The only thing stopping me from buying the premium upgrade is the lack of router-less access from a PC.

Just two things I'm missing: 1. Budgeting in different than the main currency. For example: I'm in a different country and I'm budgeting rent in different currency but still want to keep my main currency. 2. I expected much more from the PC Manager. It looks as being developed in 2005. It doesn't even relate to the actual app. But overall, the app itself is one of the greatest amongst all the others I've used throughout the years. The design and structure of the app are first class!

Two stars less for two draw-back. 1. Please add an option to enable notification to record the expenses daily with particular time set up. I usally forget to record the expense at the end of the day. But another money manager app which I use has this feature. It remember me daily at a particular time which I set up on the app itself. 2. Ads. Which is not irritating, but still it's annoying. Note : If it's solved, I would like to give 5 stars‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I have been using this app for about a year to keep tracking my daily expenses. I recommended to my girlfriend and she told that it was easy to get started with. No issue to transfer the data from old phone to new. As I saw from other reviews about the premium version is one time fee, me and my gf are going to support this app. Keep up the good works üëçüèª

title: Woebot: Your Self-Care Expert
description:
WINNER OF THE 2019 GOOGLE PLAY AWARD FOR STANDOUT WELL-BEING APP! 

Meet Woebot! Your friendly self-care expert Woebot can help you: 
-Think through situations with step-by-step guidance from Woebot using tools from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
-Learn about yourself with intelligent mood tracking
-Master skills to reduce stress and live happier through over 100+ evidence-based stories from our clinical team

Woebot sends over a million messages per week to help users with everyday stress and challenges such as symptoms of depression, anxiety, relationship problems, procrastination, loneliness, grief, addiction, pain management and more! Woebot checks-in with you every day and guides you through practical techniques based on tried and tested approaches such as Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Mindfulness, and Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT). Woebot is your very own coach who chats with you and offers insights and skills to help you grow into your best self. You can chat with Woebot as much or as little as you like ‚Äî they‚Äôre always available when you need it. Nobody will know that you‚Äôre talking with Woebot and the information that you share with Woebot will remain private & confidential. Plus, Woebot will make you smile! 

Always on-hand to have a quick chat whenever and wherever you need day or night, Woebot can help your through difficult moments. Have a friendly expert in your pocket work with you to improve your mental health!

Mentioned in the New York Times, Washington Post, Today Show, BBC, VICE, Lifehacker, The Guardian and many more! 
#1 - BuzzFeed's Amazing Apps For Anyone Living With Anxiety
#1 - Forbes' 4 Technologies Innovating in Mental Health

Backed by Research:

An initial study showed that in just two weeks people who spoke to Woebot felt significantly better than those in the comparison group.

To check out our studies with Stanford University and learn more, go to https://woebothealth.com/science/.

Crafted by Experts: 

Born out of research led by psychologist Dr. Alison Darcy, Woebot has scientifically demonstrated efficacy in a published randomized controlled trial. 

Dr. Alison Darcy - CEO & Founder
Stanford-trained expert in digital health technology for mental health

Dr. Athena Robinson - Chief Clinical Officer, 
Stanford-trained psychologist and expert clinician

Dr. Andrew Ng - Chairman
Leading AI expert

Casey Sackett - CTO
Experienced health app executive

Humans on Woebot:

‚ÄúBy stepping back and acknowledging the skewed lens through which I had been viewing my world, the days spent under a dark cloud grew fewer. I had become more aware of the flawed thinking that led me to feel down and be so harsh on myself.‚Äù - Nick 

‚ÄúI am not ‚Äúhealed‚Äù from anxiety, but I now can live my life not being controlled by it. Some days are much harder than others, but I know I will be okay in the end.‚Äù

Want to talk with a human?
helpcenter@woebot.io
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/HiWoebot
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/HiWoebot
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/woebot/

Terms of Service: https://woebothealth.com/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://woebothealth.com/privacy/

summary: Anxiety, depression, & mindfulness tools to reduce stress and feel better!
recentChanges: I love graphs, so I asked my creators to update your mood graph to show its full history. They also squashed a few bugs they found hiding underneath Jill the Printer.
comments: Amazing. So helpful! Really this is the best app I have on my phone. Its the best AI therapist I've ever talked to. It actually feels like it listens and responds appropriately. Woebot really helps you through things when you need help. Also, there are no ads and no in-app purchases, it's crazy awesome. I tell all my friends who I think would benefit from having this app, because I've found it very helpful. 10/10 app, thank you so much!!

This app is extremely helpful. A little robot, an anonymous person, to tell my worries to. The gratitude journal is super helpful too, I can look back on what's gone well. The lessons it provides are really helpful too. Sometimes, I open the app with just the intention of checking in my mood for the tracker, and i end up spending half an hour doing a lesson! They're always super helpful and make me feel better. HIGHLY recommend!!!

Came across this through work and during lock down. I have not noticed anything negative about it, performance wise. Overall it's a useful well being tool to help check in with yourself and offers some useful prompts and insights about impactful things on a person's mood. You seem to be able to converse with it when you have a spare few mins. Fairly easy to 'forget' it's A.I . you are conversing with.

The AI for Woebot sometimes misses what I am saying, but overall this app gives daily lessons on helpful thought patterns and tools. While not a replacement for therapy, it provides additional tools my therapist had not included as well as reinforcement of some of the tools I was already taught. I encourage other folks to try Woebot as a supplement to their self care routines and therapy.

I found the app very comforting and helpful during a stressful period. I'm familiar with CBT but it was still useful to be reminded of those skills. And although you know it's not a real person talking to you, knowing that a real person wrote the text originally is comforting, and shows that someone cares.

title: Memento Database
description:
Memento Database is a powerful and user friendly tool designed for working with any data, making it possible to store, organize, calculate and visualize information. It is more convenient than spreadsheets, more flexible than specialized applications. 

If you are looking for a program to organize your personal affairs, hobbies, or small or medium sized business, Memento is the solution

PERSONAL USE

Memento can replace dozens of apps, helping you organize your life and increasing your efficiency. 

‚òÜ Lists of tasks and goals
‚òÜ Personal finance and shopping
‚òÜ Contacts and events
‚òÜ Time management
‚òÜ Collections and hobbies - books, music, movies, games, board games, recipes and more
‚òÜ Travel planning
‚òÜ Medical and sports records
‚òÜ Studying
‚òÜ Home inventory

See the use cases in the online catalogue. It contains thousands of templates from our community that you can improve upon, or create your own.

BUSINESS USE

Memento allows building any business management system to meet your unique requirements. This could include:

‚òÜ Inventory
‚òÜ Project management
‚òÜ Personnel management
‚òÜ Production management
‚òÜ Assets management
‚òÜ Products catalogue
‚òÜ CRM
‚òÜ Budget 

You can connect all the components of the application and build the logic of working with data in accordance with your business processes. The Memento cloud allows all of your employees to work with databases, and provides a flexible system of access control. Small businesses with Memento gets the opportunity to create an ERP at low cost. 

NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS

In addition to businesses, Memento is successfully used by non-profit organizations, including schools, hospitals, rescue services, charity funds, and libraries.

TEAMWORK

Memento allows the synchronizing of data with the cloud and provides the following tools for teamwork:

‚òÜ A flexible system of setting access rights up to the fields in the records
‚òÜ View the history of data changes made by other users
‚òÜ Comments to records in the database
‚òÜ Synchronization with Google Sheet

If you work with sensitive information that should be stored only on your servers or exclusively in the territory of your country, then we have a self-hosted solution - Memento Private Server.

OFFLINE

Memento supports offline work. You can transfer data in the offline mode and synchronize it with the cloud later, when your devices connects to the Internet. By default your databases are not connected to the cloud, and are stored only on your device. 

WINDOWS & LINUX

You can also work with your data on a PC. This is convenient, if you need to enter or analyze a large amount of information. In addition, the desktop version of the application provides a powerful reporting system based on Jasper Reports. 

KEY FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Dozens of types of fields, including text, integer, real, boolean, date/time, rating, checkboxes, radio buttons, currency, image, signature, file, audio, contact, calculation, JavaScript, geolocations with Google Maps coordinates, and others.
‚Ä¢ Performing Data analysis, including aggregation, charting, sorting, grouping, and filtering entries by any fields.
‚Ä¢ Displaying data in the form of a list, a set of cards, a table, on a map, or in a calendar.
‚Ä¢ Synchronization with Google Sheets.
‚Ä¢ Cloud storage and Teamwork.
‚Ä¢ Offline data entry.
‚Ä¢ Importing and exporting CSV files, permitting interoperation with popular programs like Microsoft Excel, Filemaker.
‚Ä¢ Populating database entries at the touch of a button with data from Web services and other sources.
‚Ä¢ Scripting in Javascript (fields, triggers, scripted data source).
‚Ä¢ Password protection.
‚Ä¢ Searching entries in database by barcode.
‚Ä¢ Reminders.

Facebook: https://facebook.com/mementodatabase
User Guide: http://help.mementodatabase.com

summary: Track and organize anything with the extremely customizable database.
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ New field type - List. The List field is a set of text strings with checkboxes.
‚Ä¢ New field type - Tags. The Tags field is an editable text box where you can type in a word and perform search other entries by it
‚Ä¢ A new type of entries display ‚Äì Kanban.
‚Ä¢ Added ability to group entries by each value of a multi-select field.
‚Ä¢ Added ability to set a field as Unique.
‚Ä¢ Added ability to set the background color for the entries which will be depending on a field value.
comments: Great app and have used it for a long time. Have several different databases for different uses and it works well. WARNING if you use the app on different devices and do not update all devices to the latest version 4.9 you will not be able to restore backups from the new version to older versions. Something has changed that doesn't allow the older versions to open any backup created with the latest version. BEWARE!

I absolutely adore the app. (Though I use it rarely and i am still not familiar with all the possibilities - and there is quite a lot of them). It is so flexible and it fits my needs perfectly. I adore the way I can adjust absolutely everything to be exactly the way I want it. I use the app with Google synchronization to store recipes and list of books. Synchronization allows me to share the Google sheets with my family and collaborate with them on both libraries.

This is an extremely powerful way to keep records. I have only been using it a short time so there is so much more to learn. I have created a medical records library so far and the ability to actually design my own unique database is just fabulous. I have lots of wishes for new features but I am still such a beginner, you probably have them already. The app is so powerful and versatile, there is a steep learning curve to take full advantage. Keep up the great work!

I have been using Memento for well over 5 years now & the ease which one can create a useable database is unbelievable. Backing up my databases is a breeze, be it online or transferring to SD card. This program is pretty much perfect when it comes to functionality. I can't highly recommend it enough.

I don't often review an app on the day I install it, but this one warrants it. I was looking for a daily log to track supplements, calories, protein, sleep duration and quality, dream recall, and more. Everything I found in the play store is either too specific (i.e., only a dream journal or only a diet log) or too complex and not customizable. Memento is exactly what I needed, and now I'm thinking about what other apps it can replace. Nice work, devs.

title: QuickBooks Online Accounting, Invoicing & Expenses
description:
Log miles, create invoices, maintain finances and cash flow, and track your profit and loss reports. Organize your workday expenses and manage invoice tracking on the go with the QuickBooks Online Accounting app, trusted by over 4.3 million small business owners worldwide. 

You don‚Äôt need to be a tax accountant to budget your small business transactions and keep your financial reports in order. Stay on top of your business invoicing by creating, sending, and tracking invoices from viewed to paid. Access accounting solutions to know where your money is going and see where your business stands with financial reports. Small business bookkeeping is easy with QuickBooks cloud accounting software. Our bookkeeping services, along with business insights, make it effortless to stay on top of your business on the go. The Quickbooks Accounting app is here to simplify the lives of small business owners.

Automatic mileage calculator

Automatically track your business mileage using your phone‚Äôs GPS, without draining your phone‚Äôs battery.

Swipe to mark trips as business or personal to maximize your mileage tax deductions.

Easily manage your cash flow

Track your business finances in one place with the Cash Flow dashboard.

Forecast cash flow over 90 days and use Envelopes to set aside funds for business & payroll taxes.

Make informed business decisions using customized, data-driven insights.

Dashboard business analysis

Check your profit and loss to know what you‚Äôre making and spending, plus view your account balances.

Easily track expenses by category to track money in and money out.

See your open and overdue invoices at a glance for easy cash flow analysis.

Create invoices and get paid faster

Use the invoice generator for simple invoicing in multiple currencies so you always know who owes you and who paid you.

Get paid faster by credit card or bank transfer (requires a QuickBooks Payments account).

Manage payments, track sales and customers on the go

Get maximum tax savings by scanning receipts and attaching them to your expenses.  

Stay up to date on your profit and loss by connecting your bank accounts. Track finances and manage transactions quickly and easily.

Review transactions and add them to your accounting books with a tap.

Easily add your customers so you can keep in touch with them on the go.

Maximize online accounting

Customize online invoices and sales receipts with your logo, colors, and custom fields in minutes. 

Prepare for tax time with tax preparation services and get all the deductions you deserve by giving your accountant access to your QuickBooks data.

Add more tools with over 80 partner apps, including inventory management and advanced CRM, by going to apps.intuit.com

It‚Äôs easy to get started

Already using QuickBooks Online? Download the world‚Äôs #1 accounting app, sign in with your QuickBooks user ID and password, and enjoy the QuickBooks Accounting app for free!

New to QuickBooks Online? Download the app, create an account, and try QuickBooks free for 30 days! There‚Äôs no credit card required and no obligation to purchase.

Your free trial includes unlimited access to QuickBooks on the web and all your mobile devices. 

Not compatible with QuickBooks Desktop for Windows or Mac.

#1 Accounting Software for Small to Midsize Businesses
*Based on PCMag, as of November 2019

From INTUIT

Makers of QuickBooks Online, GoPayment, QuickBooks Payroll, TurboTax, and Mint.com

Visit:
https://www.intuit.com/privacy/ to learn how Intuit protects your privacy.
https://qbo.intuit.com/c1/Terms_Of_Service.html to read the Intuit terms of service.

Download today and start managing your small business easily on the go.

recentChanges: Thanks for using QuickBooks. We update our app regularly to improve performance, fix bugs and add new features so that you'll always know where your business stands.
comments: Constant problems! Fingerprint sign in consistently fails and locks me out. it's exceedingly embarrassing. There's no way to turn off fingerprint sign in unless you're already logged in. Every time I try to do a manual password login I have to reset my password because QuickBooks says I'm denied access. on the few occasions I do get it to sign in easily through my phone the app crashes and has to restart.

24-10-2020 Provided this review The app has a bug currently in version 25.4.1+1 where you cannot search and select invoices to match against bank payments. When you select them it's as if you have not selected any. The totals do not change. Update 28-10-2020 Received response from QuickBooks to uninstall and reinstall the app. I have tried this and there has been no improvement.

Quickbooks will not give an option to permanently turn off the option to allow clients to pay by credit card. You have to turn it off manually everytime. I sometimes forget and my client pays by credit card, and I an charged almost 3% for it. I am a small business with no need to accept credit cards so I loose money every time I forget to turn it off. Update. Now it turns out that on my android phone I can only see activity for each client for 1 year which is a BIG issue.

using qbs desktop since 2002. today i found qbs files in the trash basket. i hit restore and its totally gone now. been researching for 5 hrs to restore it . nothing. i tried online before. didnt like it, but guess its my only option since desktop 2018 will be gone soon. very aggravating. im at the point of creating invoices by hand. only 30 customers .

Used it on a sales call yesterday. Created a customer, emailed him an estimate. (I hope). Today I logged on QBO from my PC and the address was wrong. So was the phone number. Then I tried logging on to the app to run a test case and I got the "There is a technical issue..." type error message. There are other usability issues with the QBO software too. Edit: Yoshi has a review below and QB replied with a link. I just tried the link and it sends you to the help pages. Gee, didn't I think of that.

title: ThinkRight.me: Guided Powerful Meditation
description:
ThinkRight.me helps you become healthier, happier & confident by using powerful meditation & mindfulness techniques. It offers daily affirmations, a rich library of guided meditations & mindfulness tools. It helps you make a paradigm shift from stress to calm, anger to peace, anxiety to confidence, sadness to happiness, to create a more focused & joyful YOU!

Our exclusive daily journey provides you a powerful meditation every day and handholds you to reaffirm and live this meditation throughout the day. This unique daily journey is anchored by world renowned mentor and meditation master BK Shivani.

Other globally acclaimed masters and guides provide a range of goal-oriented guided meditations & mindfulness techniques.

Key Features: 
*Daily Journey with a powerful meditation for the day 
*Rich library of guided meditations for personal growth, self-healing, inner peace and sleep 
*Music to help you relax, focus & reduce stress *Mood Tracker to record & analyse your emotional fitness

Use the powerful daily meditation journey guided by BK Shivani to:

Follow the exclusive guided mediations by other globally acclaimed masters to:

ThinkRight.me subscription plan comes with access to our complete library of meditations and daily journey.

title: Block Apps - Productivity & Digital Wellbeing
description:
‚òÖ Block apps at specific times during the week.
‚òÖ View your app usage, going back up to 2 years.
‚òÖ Limit app usage. Set a maximum daily usage per app, customizable per day of the week.
‚òÖ Get weekly usage reports. See where your time went, and use it to stay in control of your phone usage.
‚òÖ Strict blocking: once an app block is active it cannot be stopped.

üí™ Boost your productivity, stay focused, and improve your digital wellbeing!
Block is an easy-to-use Android application that improves your self-control by blocking or limiting your app usage and giving you insight into how your time is spent on your phone. Whether you need to focus on your üéì study, don't want to get distracted at üíº work, can't go to üõå sleep at night, or want to be more üë• social, this app can help you out.


üïì BLOCK SPECIFIC APPS AT SPECIFIC TIMES
Select a group of apps and create a custom time schedule during which these apps will automatically be blocked. The schedule is fully customizable, allowing you to set different times on different days in the week, allowing you to create productive habits. An active block cannot be turned off so that it prevents you from using distracting apps.
‚åõ You can temporarily activate your blocks at any time for a specific duration. Great for when you start a study session or want to go to sleep. Often combined with a Pomodoro timer for increased productivity.

üìä VIEW APP USAGE
You can analyze your phone usage over different time periods, going back up to 2 years. See where your time is spent and take steps to improve your digital wellbeing.

‚è±Ô∏è SET DAILY USAGE LIMITS
Wasting time on social media, or watching too many YouTube videos? You can set a daily usage limit per app. When you reach the time limit, the app will be blocked for the remainder of the day. The limits are customizable per day of the week. For example, detox from Facebook by only allowing 30 minutes per weekday, limit Reddit to 20 minutes in the weekend, or block Whatsapp after 1 hour of messaging.

üìà RECEIVE WEEKLY USAGE REPORTS
At the start of each week, you will receive an overview of your app usage of the week before. This contains a detailed breakdown of where your time was spent during the week, allowing you to easily decide which apps to restrict. You will be able to have more quality time and reduce your phone addiction, resulting in a better digital diet.

üîí STRICT APP BLOCKING
By default, the only option to access a blocked app is to reboot your phone. If that is too easy, you can disable this in the app's settings, such that even after a reboot your apps will still be blocked. This app uses the Device Administrator permission. The permission can (optionally) be enabled inside the app's settings to prevent the app from being force closed or uninstalled, such that there is no way to circumvent a block. Procrastinators, this app is made for you.

OTHER
Additionally, you can place widgets on your home screen that allow you to start a block in a single tap. There is Tasker support to automate the starting of a block at any time.

Privacy
No personal information or app usage data is collected. All data stays on your phone.

Support
Please see the FAQ in the app for any issues with the app, or send an email to apps.wverlaek@gmail.com.

comments: I hope this is a temporary mistake but since the newest update (4.0+) where they've updated how blocks are structured, the free version is extremely limiting. 3 blocks allowed only, which used to be 3 scheduled blocks and unlimited app time limits. Now if I want to limit Facebook to 1 hour and YouTube to 2 hours, that's 2 blocks already. Very difficult to make this app useful now.

When i close my phone and again open it Blocked apps also opens..... When i go to the main app i.e, (block apps-productivity) it shows some notifications like ' some background apps are killing'...... Little disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è

It is a v nice app. You can really check how much time u actually spend on social media and you wont even realise. Once your timer ends u cannot open it till it gets unlocked. So your daily time can be saved and you can really focus on yourself family and studiesüåø

Its an awesome app! You cannot unblock everything as per your wish unlike the other apps. Kudos to the creaters! I am able to get rid of my constant habit of using the apps for no use. It also displays a quote so you get inspired and are not guilty about it. Love, love üíú

I've been using this app for about a year now and it's really helped me be productive again. Twitter, Reddit, Google News are distracting for me and block helps me stay focused on what's important during he day.

title: Improving your Management Skills

This includes effective communication, building and managing teams, presenting opportunities for your employees to build enviable culture, etc.

title: Serenity: Guided Meditation & Mindfulness
description:
Serenity: Guided Meditations allows you to learn a variety of meditation and mindfulness techniques that aims to bring a sense of peace, calm and happiness to your life.

Learn the basics with the free, easy to follow 7 day audio course. Gain the skills required to make mindful meditation a part of the rest of your life.

Foundations: Expand your skills and learn about mindfulness, self awareness, values and goals

Sleep guides: A selection of guided mediations designed to guide you to sleep using relaxation techniques, peaceful music and tranquil sounds

Stress relief: soothe anxiety with relaxation and mindfulness techniques to calm the mind and body

Quick meditations: short sessions to practice your skills or provide a sense of serenity and calm from the stresses of your day

Daily meditations - Different meditations each day to help maintain regular practice

Plus more being added to the app all the time

Other features:

No sign up/log in required - start meditating straight away

Ideal for beginners with over 2 hrs of free audio.

No subscriptions necessary -  extra content is available either through one time permanent purchases or unlock everything with a subscription

Easy to follow - serenity is ideal for beginners and more experienced mindful meditators alike

Silent mind - learn a technique to quieten the mind of thoughts

Meditation and mindfulness skills - Learn to separate thoughts from feelings to improve your emotional well being

Gratitude - Change your perspective on life by understanding gratitude and gain a new appreciation of the world around you

Plus

Set up daily reminders to stay on track

Stay motivated by completing challenges and unlocking more free sessions as you progress

Monitor your progress with stats and graphsSee if mindful meditation can improve your life - install now!

comments: I love the option of purchasing (not "borrowing") packs you want instead of a ridiculous subscription price. I will add more packs as I need, but it's a great feature for those of us who don't want to pay $250 a year for a garbage meditation app no one uses 99% of. I like the guide's voice and the daily progress, not just repeating trash over and over like most apps. If you've looked at the other meditation apps and laughed at how useless they are, this may be your app.

I have been using the app daily and it really has helped me to build a daily meditation routine. The instructions are clear, calm, positive. The process takes you step by step so you don't struggle while you build the foundations of your routine. You feel rested after the exercises. Day by day you start to feel changes in your mood, thoughts and energy.

This is a wonderful, helpful app. I appreciate the organization and accessibility of this app. The meditations are easy to follow, and the guide has a soothing voice. I'm new to meditating, and the instructions are clear and well-timed throughout the meditations. The dark mode option is perfect for doing meditations right before bed. Longer meditations would offer even more variety (hour long affirmations or guidance to self-compassion, etc). Thank you for continuously improving the app!

Very good app. I finally feel like I'm making progress and learning. I fall asleep relaxed and l'm calmer in heated situations. It's around 3.30e a month, so it's not a too bad, but I'm on week 2 and it feels a bit repetitive an you have to commit to 6 months. If I could pay monthly, I would be more inclined to go for it. You only get a week of free trial.

This is mu fourth meditation in Serenity (I tried other apps before) and it's so good. It has an amazing repertoire of guided meditations, with a very soothing voice, relaxing music and great techniques to improve gradually. I recommend it to some friends already. I hope it will continue being for free for quite long. Thanks Serenity!

title: Boost Your Self Confidence
description:
How successful we become and how happy we are in our lives are directly related to the way we act, our attitude and our outlook. People who are more positive in their every day lives and conducts themselves in friendly, energetic manner will be more open to opportunities that come their way rather than those who is always in a foul mood and seeing the negative in everything. 

Our Boosting Your Self Confidence app goes over not just why being optimistic and positive in your life is important but also many other strategies to help you become more confident in yourself.

Included in our Boosting Your Self Confidence App  is...
* Knowing your self-worth
* The benefits of using positive self-talk
* How to develop your creative side
* Listen to your inner houghts
* Mental Imagery works
* Taking care of your mental health
* Dispelling fears for a more positive outlook
* Overcoming Doubt
* Overcoming Inner conflits
* Overcoming Trauma
* Developing your self image
* Developing your Intuition
* Developing your full potential
* and much much more...

We also have an entire bonus section dedicated to learning other helpful skills such as Positive Thinking and Positive Affirmations. 

Download your free copy of Boosting Your Self Confidence today and start overcoming your fears and work on taking back control of your life. 

We urge you to start today and understand how important you are and how overcoming negative thinking will completely change your life.

comments: This is a great App and it can help anyone who is dealing with Epilepsy and seizures; illnesses; the aftermath of a stroke, or any type of mental illness or health problems!!

I love this app it has helped me more than i thought any app could. I have very low self-esteem to the point that I call myself down all the time in a mirror, to myself, and i don't think anyone could ever come close to saying mean things about me than my own self. To continue, most of the time I hibernat, and struggle to even get out to do even the simplest things in life...even the things I used love too do. Above all, I find that I do enjoy this app and will take baby steps to improve.
Well detailed and concise. The messages are well analysed and passed down for clearer understanding in each chapter. Its very good in developing self confidence.

just right now I'm changed instantly. for those who don't understand let me explain. First page is Chapter 1. if you wonder why you can't go to next page because there's chapter 1A, chapter 1B and so on. For those who gave 5 üåü in this app I love it. thank you so much. Reading your comments made me install this app.

This app is exceptional, just great it's everything to me. Very encouraging, truly inspirational, uplifting, and motivational. For me it's my source of positivity and empowerment. TO THE DEVELOPERS-- Thank you for sharing. Thank you for creating this valuable tool. Farina

title: Journal it! - Bullet Diary & Life Companion
description:
Combines journal, habit tracker, mood tracker, and planner in one app, Journal it! is one place to record, track, and plan for all aspect of your life.


Journal it! provides you with a powerful organizing system, advanced tracking tools, secured end to end encryption, easy to use UI, and effortless-realtime-sync.


KEY FEATURES
 * Real-time sync across Android, Mac, and Windows
 * Organize by journeys (stories), activities, people, tags, places,...
 * Mood tracker with detail feelings
 * Habit tracker
 * Notes, lists, and to-dos
 * Comment
 * Templates
 * Markdowns support
 * Dark theme
 * End to end encryption
 * PDF export
 * Highly interactive widgets
 * Weekly and monthly statistics
 * Offline first, automatically sync when network available
 * Export/import journal to your persistent storage
 * Minimalistic, beautiful, and personalized UI
 * Secure your private diary with fingerprint or password
 * Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal


Keep everything well-organized
 * There‚Äôre 6 ways to organize your entries, notes,...: journeys, activities, tags, categories, people, places
 * Journeys are your stories (eg: a trip, a project,...). They have starts and ends
 * Activities are things you do regularly (eg: Movies, Gratitude Journal, Reading, Workout... ) 


Track as many journaling topics as you want in the same place and still easy to manage. Starting a new entry can't be easier because there's no need to mention the context again for each entry.


Mood tracker
With each entry, attach your mood level (5 total) then add your feelings (ü•∞happy, ü§£funny,  üòÄexcited,...). You can create your own custom feelings with beautiful emojis.


Habit tracker
Schedule your habits by every day, every number of days, or specific days of week/month,... The app only reminds you of the habits on the scheduled days. 


Each habit can have up to 5 slots per day with separated custom reminders


Planner
What you do is also an important part of your memories. To-dos, notes, and lists will help you plan your next events, save information, manage your lists, and keep them recorded.


Get things done without opening the app
You can view to-dos, add items to list, check your habits, edit notes,... right from your home screen using app widgets. 


Journal it! is FREE to use even with real-time sync. Subscribe to premium to have:
 * Ads free
 * Desktop app (Mac and Windows 10 64 bit)
 * End to end encryption
 * Unlimited custom feelings
 * Markdowns support
 * Dark mode
 * Comment
 * Reminders
 * Insert photos between texts
 * Unlock all home screen widgets
 * Access Journal it! VIP community on Facebook where you can get quick support from us and the community


Secure and private
 * Text data is stored on our secured real-time database
 * Photos are stored on a hidden folder on your Google Drive


We treasure your privacy. Your data stays on the database and your Google Drive only. With end-to-end encryption enabled (disabled by default), you have total control over your data


Contact us:
We‚Äôd love to hear feedback from you. Contact us on any channel and we'll get back to you within 1 business day. Follow our Instagram for weekly updates on development progress:
 * Support email: thanhhai08sk@gmail.com
 * Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/destudiosite/ 
 * Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
 * Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to subscribers only

60 days refund:
All purchases are eligible for refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just email us with the order number (GPA) that Play Store emailed you after the charge.

* There‚Äôre 6 ways to organize your entries, notes,...: journeys, activities, tags, categories, people, places
* Journeys are your stories (eg: a trip, a project,...). They have starts and ends
* Activities are things you do regularly (eg: Movies, Gratitude Journal, Reading, Workout... )


Track as many journaling topics as you want in the same place and still easy to manage. Starting a new entry can't be easier because there's no need to mention the context again for each entry.


Mood tracker
With each entry, attach your mood level (5 total) then add your feelings (ü•∞happy, ü§£funny, üòÄexcited,...). You can create your own custom feelings with beautiful emojis.


Habit tracker
Schedule your habits by every day, every number of days, or specific days of week/month,... The app only reminds you of the habits on the scheduled days.


Each habit can have up to 5 slots per day with separated custom reminders


Planner
What you do is also an important part of your memories. To-dos, notes, and lists will help you plan your next events, save information, manage your lists, and keep them recorded.


Get things done without opening the app
You can view to-dos, add items to list, check your habits, edit notes,... right from your home screen using app widgets.


Journal it! is FREE to use even with real-time sync. Subscribe to premium to have:
* Ads free
* Desktop app (Mac and Windows 10 64 bit)
* End to end encryption
* Unlimited custom feelings
* Markdowns support
* Dark mode
* Comment
* Reminders
* Insert photos between texts
* Unlock all home screen widgets
* Access Journal it! VIP community on Facebook where you can get quick support from us and the community


Secure and private
* Text data is stored on our secured real-time database
* Photos are stored on a hidden folder on your Google Drive


We treasure your privacy. Your data stays on the database and your Google Drive only. With end-to-end encryption enabled (disabled by default), you have total control over your data


Contact us:
We‚Äôd love to hear feedback from you. Contact us on any channel and we'll get back to you within 1 business day. Follow our Instagram for weekly updates on development progress:
* Support email: thanhhai08sk@gmail.com
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/destudiosite/
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to subscribers only

60 days refund:
All purchases are eligible for refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just email us with the order number (GPA) that Play Store emailed you after the charge.

comments: I use this app as my basic organiser. It's good enough that I've bought the lifetime subscription. The latest redesign is amazing. It's flexible and intuitive. A bug or two remain but they're minor and don't interfere with the strengths of the app. One thing I'd like to have is the ability to remove old entries, say with some sort of archiving to a file. Anyway, well done.

It's really amazing, I wish we could record voice and save them as voice clips. I've looked for such a journal app but didn't find one. plus It would be cool if they had voice in to text option. And I really wish we could change fonts for free. Atleast a limited number of fonts. Other than that this is the best journal app from the ones I've tried! üòå I'm editting this because I don't like the new UI of the timeline nopeeee!!!!! It was wayyyy more prettier before!!! üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠

great app for journaling. I took away one star because while the new timeline view has some benefits like showing multiple photos and improvement to how the habits are shown the loss of the gradient effect is a step backwards in my mind. it used to look so unique. If you can bring back the gradient effect and incorporate some of the other improvements to the timeline you've made I think that will be a win-win.

I've been using some top ranked Journal Apps to find what suits & best for my needs. One reason I used this App was its previous design; it had the best & most beautiful timeline interface, especially the gradient background color of the entry adjusting the attached image's main color combined with timelines connecting entries, but not anymore. I prefer the beautiful better old style design than the new simpler modern design. Another drawback: No Lifetime Payment. ‚Ä¢ A Monthly Subscriber.

Ive really liked this app, it helps me stay organized but this newest update REALLY messed it up. I dont even know how to check off something on my to-do list anymore. Its so cluttered now. I preferred being able to see next weeks to-dos right away as well. I would really like to go back to the last update please.

title: Recovery Path: Addiction Recovery & Addiction Help
description:
Your personalized recovery journey companion. Suitable for people struggling with or recovering from substance or alcohol addiction.

Built on research. Made with love and compassion.

Recovery Path incorporates aspects of Motivational Therapy, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and Community Reinforcement to boost your treatment and recovery plan.

Use for self-help or link with your treatment team‚Äôs Recovery Path Clinician App, Sponsor/Mentor App and/or Friends/Family App.

Easy to use: Launch the app and get started in minutes
Secure and reliable: All industry-standard security practices are met

Overcoming addiction is tough and, to get results, you need to put in the work, but it can be the most rewarding thing you ever do in your life. Recover Path makes the journey a little bit easier.

What can Recovery Path help you do?

Link with your care team: 
Clinicians, Sponsors, Family & Friends Apps 
- Easily share your progress 
- Collaborate on identifying triggers and risky situations, and celebrate in the little victories
- Create an extra layer of accountability
- Receive motivational messages and images from your team

Meeting Finder: 
- Search for community meetings based on your location
- AA, NA, Refuge Recovery, CA, SMART Recovery options all listed in one place
- Save meetings and sync to calendar on your phone

Check-in‚Äôs: 
- Morning and evening check-ins help keep you aware of your motivation, progress and strengths of the day.  
- A check-in often takes less than 1 minute. 

Daily schedule: 
- Keep track of daily tasks, hygiene routine, treatment activities, enjoyable plans and risky situations.

Places to Avoid Feature:
- Add places that are important to avoid in your recovery
- Customize messages to send to yourself if nearing a place to avoid
- Receive alerts when approaching location
- Option to notify your team, sponsor and family/friends

Beacon Messaging Feature:
- Send a message with the help of RP in moments of need
- Pick from pre-selected messages or create your own
- Send via SMS or WhatsApp to friends, family and sponsors

Recovery-oriented Activities:
- Reasons to Recover
- Words that Describe You
- Enjoyable Activities Planner
Abstinence calendar

Supportive Suite of Apps
- Recovery Path for Clinicians
- Recovery Path for Sponsors & Mentors
- Recovery Path for Family & Friends

Learn more at https://www.recoverypath.com

summary: Technology enabled addiction recovery and relapse prevention
recentChanges: Usability improvements.
comments: Now that I realized all the features they have like recording my thoughts and documenting my experience each day, I've found it to be much help in my daily life. I enjoy checking in everyday and one day will be able to look back on all my progress to hopefully help other addicts on they're new journey. Thank you all for ypur support. -Alyssa

Love this app because not only does it have a sobriety counter but it also has a meeting finder that has a lot of listings for both in-person meetings of all kinds and zoom meetings. You can go to a meeting every hour. Not to mention that this app has a daily check-in as well as the option to record your triggers and cravings and you can keep note and a daily motivational affirmation picture oh and you can create your own affirmations put your own pictures behind it

Have tried multiple recovery apps but this one is the best by a long shot. It's phenomenal! With the ability to record my feelings, any cravings, thoughts, and so much more, and share them all with my family and other support I feel like I'll finally be able to overcome my addiction. I'm not one for calling my support team but this app allows for them to comment on a log entry, message me 1-on-1, or send group messages. I highly recommend this app!

This is really the BEST app I have ever used! It's better than i even hoped for, really. I have tried almost 30 other, I can't even say similar, apps but they are no contest! this has everything available all the time any time for any reason! you need to talk to somebody, or to find a meeting, or if you want to read resources or reach out to other people going through the same thing you are, this is the perfect app! I love it! Life changing amazing! thank you for creating it!

Have not had this app very long but what I have got from this app so far i give 5 stars i love everything about this app when I tell me self oh I can do a certain part of my daily program which has been set outside of this app, it seems to fall right on time that this app reminds me that it's time to check in with myself and my recovery and this app prompts me to check in with a heck of a lot more than what I would normally ( but should be doing normally) so its a god send for me

title: OurHome ‚Äì chores, rewards, groceries and calendar
description:
OurHome is a new and simple way to organize your family. Kids will be motivated to do chores and take responsibility while parents can reward them for their effort. There‚Äôs a shared grocery list and a family calendar to keep everyone coordinated. And it‚Äôs free to use with no ads and no hidden costs.

Key features:

- Assign and schedule tasks and chores
- Motivate kids with rewards and goals
- View personal progress and activities
- Add items to the shared grocery list
- Enter events into the family calendar
- Send messages and set reminders
- Stay in sync across unlimited devices

A TRULY TRANSFORMATIVE TASK SYSTEM.

The house is tidy. The pets are fed. The kids are studying quietly. All this without even being asked! Whether it‚Äôs housework or homework, OurHome‚Äôs gamified tasks system keeps your family humming.

REWARD RESPONSIBILITY. MAXIMIZE MOTIVATION.

Motivated kids are successful kids. By introducing responsibility from an early age you improve your child‚Äôs chance of future success. With OurHome, your kids build self-esteem while completing tasks and achieving goals!

CHECK THE CALENDAR. STAY IN SYNC.

Calendars keep everyone coordinated, all batting for the same team. With a monthly view that‚Äôs actually made for mobiles, the OurHome calendar is the coordinating companion that you can count on.

SIMPLIFY SHOPPING. GET ALL THE GROCERIES.

Everyone likes returning home to a full fridge and a well-stocked pantry. With OurHome you can easily add grocery items and swipe them off at the store. Save time in the supermarket and never forget the milk again.

A HANDY TOOL, TAILORED TO FAMILIES.

Smartphones are only as smart as their software. So it‚Äôs about time families had a handy tool tailored to their particular needs. And a tool that only grows smarter as OurHome learns your family preferences.

We love hearing from our users. If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, please email us at support@ourhomeapp.com, or visit http://www.ourhomeapp.com/support

And don‚Äôt forget to like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/ourhomeapp

recentChanges: This update includes a few bug fixes, namely issues with resetting passwords, entering negative points, having the tasks screen dynamically update and the formatting of photos. We‚Äôve also made some improvements to the tone of our inactivity reminders. This update also fixes the rewards issue that occurred in the last update. Thanks for your patience with these issues and especially to those who brought them to our attention.
comments: I just downloaded this app today. After a few hours poking around and setting up my kids chores for the week. Here is what I found. Pro's: 1. This app is very clean and organized. 2. Easy to add tasks to either a single profile or multiple profiles. 3. Can set daily, weekly, or monthly repetition or rotations for task. 4. Very easy to organize task by profile or date. Con's: 1. Can't organize the task list very well. Neither Alphanumeric or Due Date changes the list correctly. 2. Cant' create rewards right now either. Hope this gets fixed or the app is not really functional or worth keeping. I did email the support team. Will update if I receive a response.
Major error, the rewards stopped showing up and it has a continuous loading . The rest of the app is functional and has good visuals and the system works good with kids 15 and under in my experience
We love this in my family, but the last few days the rewards page won't load for anyone in the family right now. This makes the app's effectiveness much less. Please fix!
Unreliable. Half the app rarely works. Constantly have to close and reopen the app, but even that rarely works. Cannot get the Rewards page to open at all.
I love this app Soo much. Its reward feature was not opening for last few days but it is working. I am very happy. Thank you üíï OurHome support for fixing the bug

description:
The Moon Calendar is a productivity tool to help you organise and align your life, and manifest your highest intentions using the Moon's cycles.

recentChanges: Make saving journal items more stable on spotty internet connections
comments: Just downloaded and ought the membership, looks good however features in the journal do not work, it seems im supposed to be able to change font and colour of text but I cannot.
This app is excellent. Its packed with information on recipes, spells, crafts, diy projects, tarot, and of course - ASTROLOGY.

I really love the concept of the app, especially the daily readings and being able to keep a journal. However, the journal needs some work. Sometimes the journal entry delete - and losing these is upsetting because I often can't recall what I went through a few days earlier. Also, you can't change the font and colour of the writing until you have written something and highlight it. Overall, the idea is lovely - just needs so minor touch ups from the tech side of it and it will be perfect!

Overall good. The formatting in the journal could use some work, maybe provide the option to change the background color of the journal, the stark white is a bit unpleasant. What is urgently needed are repeatable tasks!!! I don't use Google Calendar, and have no desire to. Basically if the tasks and calendar functions aren't more fleshed out in this app, I won't be renewing my subscription when the time comes. It's nice, but I shouldn't have to rely on three or four apps just to be organized.
Beautiful, and well put together. I feel like it could use a little more content .. but all in all it is a solid way to keep up with the moon and all of its phases and impacts on you or others.

title: Dbt911
description:
Do you need access to a skill quickly? With this app you will quickly get a random distress tolerance skill to do. In addition, for each module, Mindfulness, Emotional Control, Manage relationships and Distress tolerance, are the skills represented and tutorials for these. Contains over 150 different suggestions on skill exercises. There is also the opportunity to create your own crisis list so you will always have it with you. An optional module for validation has been added as desired by participants. The application is designed in collaboration with the participants in DBT treatment.

Dbt911 can never replace professional help, but can serve as a tool for DBT training.

recentChanges:
Update 4.2.7 includes:
* Russian translation.
* The menu is lifted out to a tab, to allow access for those phones without a physical menu button.
* Diary card: Tension scale and mani added, and pdf layout changes.
* Small bug fix with affirmations and language.

Thanks to Anastasia Sorokina, Mikhail Kalashnikov and Insitute of Organizational Psychology for providing Russian translation.

Thanks for all encouragement to continue developing this app!
comments: Love it. I struggle to fill out paper diary cards for therapy, this makes it way easier and the descriptions help me fill out the skills section. Only thing is I'd like to be able to print off a weekly report instead of the individual ones for my psych to read. Otherwise its brilliant.

Great and useful information but app. won't save what I 've typed in. This makes it impossible to use with my therapist. Maybe I will just have to use paper and pen, but then my therapist won't have a copy. Please fix this!!! Thanks in advance.

Very easy and convenient to use. It offers a diary section to keep track of skills, emotions, vulnerabilities, self validation and so on. it also provides text boxes for comments.. There are several sections with reminders of skills to use in a crises, validation, and affirmations. This is a well thought out app and incorporates most aspects of dbt therapy. So nice to have at my finger tips; pretty much ensures that I'll practice and use dbt skills everyday.

I love it! I have personality disorders and this app really helps me remember and keep track of my behaviors throughout the day. I used to just journal at night, but I've learned it saves your progress throughout the day. I'll go my diary card in the morning after my meditation, sometime mid afternoon or after lunch, and then again at night, sometimes twice. I'll also go while in crisis. I have really learned to stay more on track, using the various skills. It's great. I use with my therapist.

I like it the best of all the diary cards because its neater and cleaner. My only issue is that I can't seem to send the diary card to my DBT coaches without having to download, save and send each day individually. I would prefer a more seemless way to forward and email the cards. Aside from that its a total game change for me to keep track of my skills.

title: Fun Routine - Visual schedules
description:
The Fun Routine is for children with Autism (ASD) to help with daily chores that seeks to help parents with children who have some form of difficulty understanding activities that are daily, such as children with Autism (ASD). With the help of this tool, it is possible to organize the child's daily chores, tasks and routines, where he or she can view a visual schedules and mark their chores as completed.

The Fun Routine is educational and encourages communication by providing a visual representation of the activity. It is quite simple, which makes it very easy to use, both for the parent and the child.

It is important to note that it was designed for children with ASD, but it is suitable for any child, or even adults, who want to control their daily chores, assist in verbalization and / or encourage performing chores through reward.

Fun Routine Visual Schedules The Autism Helper
Children with Autism often have difficulty to structure their live and daily activities. 
The sometimes have difficulty to give meaning to what they experience. A day can be full with separate incentives.
Pictures help our children make meaning of the words we are telling by providing a visual representation of the activity.
Even readers benefit from the use of pictures
Activities are lined up in the sequence they will be done.
It uses¬†visual¬†strengths and therefore provides a receptive communication system to increase understanding.
It helps the individual to learn new things and broaden their interests.
Helps remain calm and reduces inappropriate behaviors.
Provide spoken texts for people who have difficulty with reading
Help keep focus on the task at hand

Our mission is to make working with visual day schedules fun, easy and simple.¬†Try it our yourself, no obligations!

Fun Routine is daily planner for your chores and tasks. Set personal goals, track progress, and motivate yourself.
Fun Routne is not only a visual schedules, it‚Äôs an attitude, a commitment, a planner and achiever.
Join Fun Routine now and receive a marvellous self. Who knows the potential?

Top features
Registration of daily chores at their due times with the option to mark them as completed. The system provides some chores previously registered, but it is possible to register your own chores and include the desired image.
Notification of chores, tasks, routines, stating that it is time to perform the activity.
Report of chores, tasks and routine performed.

Rewards
Reward systems rely on positive reinforcement to encourage good behavior. Here's how to make reward systems work for toddlers, preschoolers, and school-aged children.
Rewards can encourage your child‚Äôs good behaviors.
The way you respond right after your child‚Äôs behaviors makes the behavior more or less likely to happen again. Rewards can help get your child to do more of the things you want her to do. Rewards that happen right after a behavior are best.
Rewards can improve your relationship with your child.
When you give a reward to your child, you and your child are both happy. You are happy because your child has done something you like. Your child is also happy because she is getting something she likes.
Reward system, where each completed chore is worth stars that can be exchanged for prizes registered by parents.

PECS - Picture exchange communication system, which when touching the image, the application speaks the related word. The system provides several previously registered figures, but parents can register their own figures.
PECS is based on the idea that children who are non-verbal or with limited functional speech can be taught to communicate using pictures.
The adult begins by teaching the child to exchange a picture of an item he wants. For example, if the child wants a drink, he will give a picture of a drink to the adult who will then give him a drink.
The adult will then teach the child progressively more difficult skills, such as using pictures to make whole sentences or to express preferences.

The Fun Routine is for children with Autism (ASD) to help with daily chores that seeks to help parents with children who have some form of difficulty understanding activities that are daily, such as children with Autism (ASD). With the help of this tool, it is possible to organize the child's daily chores, tasks and routines, where he or she can view a visual schedules and mark their chores as completed.

The Fun Routine is educational and encourages communication by providing a visual representation of the activity. It is quite simple, which makes it very easy to use, both for the parent and the child.

It is important to note that it was designed for children with ASD, but it is suitable for any child, or even adults, who want to control their daily chores, assist in verbalization and / or encourage performing chores through reward.

Fun Routine Visual Schedules The Autism Helper
Children with Autism often have difficulty to structure their live and daily activities.
The sometimes have difficulty to give meaning to what they experience. A day can be full with separate incentives.
Pictures help our children make meaning of the words we are telling by providing a visual representation of the activity.
Even readers benefit from the use of pictures
Activities are lined up in the sequence they will be done.
It uses¬†visual¬†strengths and therefore provides a receptive communication system to increase understanding.
It helps the individual to learn new things and broaden their interests.
Helps remain calm and reduces inappropriate behaviors.
Provide spoken texts for people who have difficulty with reading
Help keep focus on the task at hand

Our mission is to make working with visual day schedules fun, easy and simple.¬†Try it our yourself, no obligations!

Fun Routine is daily planner for your chores and tasks. Set personal goals, track progress, and motivate yourself.
Fun Routne is not only a visual schedules, it‚Äôs an attitude, a commitment, a planner and achiever.
Join Fun Routine now and receive a marvellous self. Who knows the potential?

Top features
Registration of daily chores at their due times with the option to mark them as completed. The system provides some chores previously registered, but it is possible to register your own chores and include the desired image.
Notification of chores, tasks, routines, stating that it is time to perform the activity.
Report of chores, tasks and routine performed.

Rewards
Reward systems rely on positive reinforcement to encourage good behavior. Here's how to make reward systems work for toddlers, preschoolers, and school-aged children.
Rewards can encourage your child‚Äôs good behaviors.
The way you respond right after your child‚Äôs behaviors makes the behavior more or less likely to happen again. Rewards can help get your child to do more of the things you want her to do. Rewards that happen right after a behavior are best.
Rewards can improve your relationship with your child.
When you give a reward to your child, you and your child are both happy. You are happy because your child has done something you like. Your child is also happy because she is getting something she likes.
Reward system, where each completed chore is worth stars that can be exchanged for prizes registered by parents.

PECS - Picture exchange communication system, which when touching the image, the application speaks the related word. The system provides several previously registered figures, but parents can register their own figures.
PECS is based on the idea that children who are non-verbal or with limited functional speech can be taught to communicate using pictures.
The adult begins by teaching the child to exchange a picture of an item he wants. For example, if the child wants a drink, he will give a picture of a drink to the adult who will then give him a drink.
The adult will then teach the child progressively more difficult skills, such as using pictures to make whole sentences or to express preferences.
summary: Helps parents arrange their children's daily routines with visual schedules

title: Clear Fear
description:
Clear Fear provides you with a range of ways to manage anxiety. 

Developed by a clinician co-collaboratively with young people, Clear Fear uses a Cognitive Behavioural framework to help you change anxious thoughts and emotions, alter anxious behaviours and calm fear responses.

It also has helpful descriptions of the different ways in which anxiety shows, resources and a grit box to boost resilience.

It is recommended for the ages of 11-19 years but can be used by a younger group with the support of a parent or carer. 

Clear Fear compliments, but does not substitute for the assessment and ongoing support of a mental health.

comments: I would give it 5 stars but when I went to look at the gifs in the "smile" section I was met with a dog flashing some cartoon teeth, it meant to look cute like "haha look at that he has a smile on its face" but that just spiked my anxiety even higher, make sure that the gifs you use don't have any triggering things in them, even very small stuff can trigger some people that are more sensitive. Also the mindfulness section only has 4 things to look at, it would be nice if more were added.

i used clear fear for a while now and im so glad i found it because its really helping. i would give 5 stars if there wasnt this little problem that gets super annoying after while. if you log into the app the first time you answer some questions like selecting which part of the world ur from, set ur passcode and a security question and all of that stuff and i confirmed everything but if i open the app i have to answer all of the questions again, like i havent answered them. please fix that!!

Good app, just two notes. When I try to type a text I cannot scrol the screen down enough to keep seeing the textbox. It disappears behind my keyboard. And I would like some excercises in it that are also in calm harm. It seems that app contains more coping strategies than just cbt and a breathing excercise it also has more interaction than clear fear. But it is a bit weird to read about harm when it is about anxiety. Another option would be to choose in the harm app what one is using it for.

This was an ok app but there are only two things you can do to calm you down. A breathing activity and the same recording of a person telling you how to calm down. Other than that it's just an app to write down goals. There is also no option to record an attack after it happened and instead you must go through one of the activities and say that it helped so that you can record something. Even then it'll not show up for awhile until the week ends. There could be many improvements but its ok.

I was recommended to this application by my therapist, and found the resources in this application helpful. However, I do realise that there is a bug that doesn't save your information when you close out of the application. Therefore, I would have to manually key in all my details from startup again. Other than the issue I mentioned, the application overall is great.

title: Primed Mind - Motivation, Mindset & Life Coach
description:
** APP OF THE DAY **

Primed Mind channels your stresses and anxieties directly into achievements.

A world full of distractions has given rise to the popularity of mindfulness and meditation. So it makes sense that many apps now aim to help you center yourself.

Primed Mind's special focus, is focus. The app aids relaxation and concentration by preparing you for specific challenges - especially personal, sporting and business. By putting a mindset coach in your pocket, it gives you access to the sort of focus preparation that is usually only available to high-level athletes or business executives.

Hosting a library of free audio clips that are designed to help you visualize and achieve your goals, Primed Mind frees your mind from distractions to make you single-minded about success.

The app's emphasis on goal-realization is what really gives it an edge. Rather than treating mindfulness as an abstract way of freeing yourself temporarily from the pressures of day-to-day life, it wants you to channel your stresses and anxieties directly into achievement.
For those who find meditation and relaxation challenging, Primed Mind manages to make it feel grounded and purposeful.

Find your focus, achieve your goals with Primed Mind mindset coaching!
Reach your goals, be ambitious, be ready for anything with Primed Mind mindset coaching. We like to help you with mind and body to be more relaxed, motivated and focused. You will experience the same visualization, goal-setting and hypnotherapy techniques used to train the world‚Äôs most successful people. With the guidance of your personal mindset coach Elliot, his voice will allow you to experience transformative visualization, goal-setting and relaxation techniques. Dive into powerful multi-day Mindset Courses to develop confidence, growth, focus, control, health, communication and recovery skills. Improve everyday with quick Primers for your daily habits, personal goals, business, studies, sleep and social settings. Up your game, crush your competition, and beat your personal best with exclusive Pro Primers, created with the expertise from world-renowned champions and visionaries. Are you ready to reach your potential? Get Primed.

LISTEN, LEARN, GROW
With the guidance of your personal mindset and life coach Elliot, you will gain clarity and motivation. His voice will allow you to experience transformative visualization, goal setting and relaxation techniques. 

MINDSET COACHING
Dive into powerful multi-day Mindset Courses to develop confidence, self-control, growth, determination, health, communication and recovery skills.

HABIT IMPROVEMENT 
Improve everyday with quick Primers for your daily habits, personal goals, business, studies, and social settings. 

ACHIEVE YOUR GOALS
From personal goals, to entrepreneurial dreams; Primed Mind helps you better visualize and focus to create the right path towards your success. 

BEAT YOUR ANXIETY
Anxieties can hold you back from realizing your dreams. With our Conquer Anything channel you can start overcoming different anxieties such as; stage fright, fear of flying or any general anxiety. 

COMPETE LIKE A CHAMPION
Up your game, crush your competition, and beat your personal best with exclusive Pro Primers, created with the expertise from world-renowned champions and visionaries.

PERSONAL MINDSET, MOTIVATION & LIFE COACH
Meet the voice of Primed Mind, Elliot Roe. With his guided voice and deep mindset coaching expertise you will experience the same techniques he has used to train Olympic Athletes, UFC Champions, High Stakes Poker Players, Traders and C-Level Executives.

MINDSET PROS
- Fedor Holz, Professional Poker Play:
Fedor is widely regarded as one of the best poker players in the modern era and currently 7th in the world for all time money list. Developing the right mindset was key to his success.

Are you ready to achieve your goals? Get Primed Mind: Mindset & Life Coach.
