comments: Love this app! Lots of free content about lots of different subjects and a good length for busy people like me!

I read description of app and downloaded it with excitement. I was EXTREMELY disappointed when I could not "Sign-up" or "Log-In" at all, no matter all the methods I tried. I even uninstalled and downloaded again. Much to my dismay, I am now UNINSTALLING this app for good now. *UPDATE*I received 2emails, so at least an ATTEMPT was made to fix problem. But after 1st attempt failed, I communicated this back to developers, and have not heard/received any response.

If you are looking for a select few mediations and not to pay anything-- THIS IS NOT THE APP FOR YOU. It first requires a account before it lets you in-- giving up privacy rights and my email-- when getting in-- it is like I could use YouTube for this small selection and not have the additional app space taken up. Uninstalled and unsubscribed.

New to the world of meditation and I'm immediately impressed and feeling great! The courses available are plentiful, whether you have a couple minutes or much longer, there is a topic and length for everyone. Very happy that I made the decision to invest in myself and will be recommending Primed Mind to everyone I know. There's something to benefit anyone. Don't hesitate, go for it! You won't be disappointed!

Loving this app. Use it pretty much every day. I would give 5 stars, some tweaking needed. When finishing a course, I am told it's completed - fine. But, a lot of these courses I would like to do again. I can,but I do not get the daily reminder/bookmark to show how much progress I have made on the repeated course. This is more than a little frustrating. Also, it would be nice for the app to bookmark more than 1 course concurrently. Finally, folks, I would call this a hypnotherapy app, not meditation. Good app.

title: Insight Timer - Meditation, Sleep, Music

The number 1 free meditation app. Guided meditations and talks led by the world's top meditation and mindfulness experts, neuroscientists, psychologists and teachers from Stanford, Harvard, the University of Oxford and more. Music tracks from world-renowned artists. Join millions learning to meditate on Insight Timer to help calm the mind, reduce anxiety, manage stress, sleep deeply and improve happiness.

With 100+ new free guided meditations added daily, more meditation is practiced on Insight Timer than anywhere else. Great for both beginners and experienced practitioners.

FREE FEATURES:

comments: although the free version has plenty of options it is extremely difficult to find them. it makes it seem almost as if you have to pay for it as soon as you open the app. I almost just straight up deleted it instead of trying it out or exploring it. The only reason why I explored it further was because my therapist reassured me it was free. and I do indeed enjoy it just would like it to be more user-friendly

Every update hides the free features more and pushes you even further to purchase the yearly subscription. I love using this app but I get more and more frustrated at the difficulty of using it. The new UI is clunky and annoying, and even though it's my favorite meditation app, I recommend it less with every update. This is especially problematic for emergencies like panic attacks.

New update messed it all up. Loved it before, now not much I have been subscribed for about 8 months and using it daily several times...now new update messed it all up. Of course they updated it and made me adapt...darn...lol I love this app. Back to 6 stars. ADDED. I've noticed if I leave it running all day when not using it...it eats my battery, so remember to turn it off after use.

Correction 10/2020: I still love the app and still use it, but last update caused me so much frustration. My most used filters are gone: "most listened" and "only misic".Please please return these . This is my most important app! I use it every day for almost 4 years and it's only getting better and better! Absolutely essential for both those, who are just starting the meditation practice and those, who already have one. This app contains an amazing variety of all possible meditation practices.

pLEASe update the keyboard in your app. I cannot use predictive or emojis since your last update. Not happyüò† I have been using this app now for about 2 months. I was told about it from my yoga instructor and I love how much free content and huge selection there is. I do wish you could search emotions using your own words, not their preselected words. But this app has so much variety and it's free!! ‚ù§Ô∏è Last update in October 28, has messed up sending messages "thank you for mediating with me"

title: Gratitude Journal
description:
If you find a bug on your android / phone version, please email me (blissjournal@gmail.com) with a description and the model of phone you are using and I'll fix ASAP.


Bliss increases happiness, motivation and effectiveness with scientifically proven techniques from top researchers.

Psychologists have developed a collection of exercises, or "interventions," which have been proven to increase happiness and other desirable mental traits.

Bliss packages these exercises up for you in one application so that you can easily incorporate them into your life and reap all the benefits from decades of psychological research.

Exercises are scheduled for completion on a recurring schedule ‚Äî allowing you to build the habit of positive mental transformation.


Bliss works like a daily diary or gratitude journal that allows you to record thoughts and meditation on the previous day. Each journal entry helps you increase mindfulness, find inspiration, and build self-confidence.

Bliss goes beyond self-help and self-improvement to offer writing exercises that have been proven to work in rigorous scientific studies.

As you continue writing notes in your gratitude journal and completing the other exercises you begin to change your outlook to focus on the positive, get more enjoyment from life, and become more effective at everything you do. 


Why use Bliss?


*Become Happier* - Bliss rewires your brain for positivity. Over time, as you continue to complete your daily exercises, your mental outlook becomes more positive, you enjoy life more, you find more meaning and satisfaction in your work, you strengthen your relationships and you come closer to being the best possible version of yourself.


*Become more successful* - In The Happiness Advantage, positive psychologist Shawn Anchor details the research showing the crucial role that happiness plays in all aspects of success. Happier brains are more creative, resilient, and even more alert. Where a negative brain sees problems, a happier brain sees possibilities. New avenues to success open up and you find creative solutions to help you reach your goals faster than you ever dreamed possible.

*Become a better parent, spouse, or friend* - Happiness is contagious. When you rewire your brain for positivity and meaning, everyone you encounter benefits. You find yourself reacting more kindly and patiently and learn to help the people you care about most live happier, more fulfilling lives.

*Become more charismatic* - Happier people are viewed as being more likeable, more trustworthy, and more attractive. As you increase your confidence, self-image, and personal power, people are drawn to you. You develop the infectious, optimistic outlook of a leader who always finds a way to lead the group to victory, even in the most dire conditions.

*Find more meaning in your work* - Happiness is not just about "looking on the bright side." It's also about identifying what's important to you and figuring out ways to increase those aspects of your life. When you clarify your values, your life is driven with meaning and purpose.

comments: I have no words to describe how much good this app has brought to my life. It's indeed a "bliss". I'm not a huge fan of the interface, but this small drawback doesn't compromise the actual positive efect of the well thought-out menu.

I love writing down the reasons I'm grateful every day and this app reminds you to do it daily. There are also options for you to outline how something could be worse, or ultimate goals, and its a powerful way for you to train your brain to find the good in everything.

I really enjoy this app. I love it. Thank you! One thing that I would like added is daily goals, so that I can write in a few simple goals for my day every morning. I do the gratitude exercise at night and use the other prompts randomly.

I have had this app for several years now. I love its features and content. However, I have not used it for weeks at a time since the notifications do not work at all since the beginning. I have tried reinstalling the app, i chose personalized times for notifications, i checked my phone settings for allowing notifications, everything should work, but i still never get any reminders.This has been quite frustrating as I would love to get reminders. I also could not contact through the email.
Just awesome, handy, powerful tool. I use it myself and recommend it to my patients, it helps developing optimistic perception habits

title: Daywise: Schedule Notifications. Be calm & focused
description:
üèÜ ‚ÄúThe 25 best new productivity apps for 2019‚Äù - Fast Company
üîÆ "Future of Android notifications" - ComputerWorld
üïê Saved people from more than 50 million interruptions, thousands of hours!
üòá Top work from home productivity app - Yahoo! Finance UK and Mirror UK

Daywise is like a smart post box for your notifications. See only important notifications instantly, view the rest later on your time. 

People who get notifications in batches are more focused and calmer. 

Incubated at Behavioral Economics lab at Duke University. 

Improve your focus, get more done with Daywise

With Daywise, in the next few days, you will:

* Enjoy long stretches of interruption-free work, without distractions
* Enjoy peace and quiet during your personal, bedtime hours
* Feel calmer, less stressed and anxious
* Build a harmonious relationship with your phone
* Improve your self-control and track your progress

Whether you‚Äôre a student or a working professional, Daywise will help you develop the focus and self-control to start performing at higher levels. Soon, you‚Äôll start feeling more relaxed, more in control of your time and ready to win the day! 

What you get with Daywise: 

*Instant & batch apps recommendations  - Daywise analyzes every app on your phone and categorizes them into ‚ÄòInstant‚Äô and ‚ÄòBatched'. We do the heavy lifting, you add the finishing touches.

* Choose VIPs  - Choose which of your friends can interrupt you during work hours, batch the rest for later. You decide who gets your attention. Grant "Contacts" permission to unlock this feature.

*Flexible batch timings  - Choose the times of the day when you want to get notifications. Protect your work, sleep and personal time!

*Notification bundles  - We'll send you a Daywise notification bundle of all notifications you got while you were working, sleeping and relaxing.

* Notification Inbox  - Your batched notifications are neatly organized all in one place. See notifications when you want to, not when apps want you to. 

* Create custom rules  - Set which kind of notifications you'd like to see instantly, never see. Personalize it as much as you like, make Daywise your own.

* Improve your digital wellbeing  - Learn how much time you spend on your phone and away from it. Find which apps interrupt you the most and batch them!

Privacy by design
All your notifications are stored only on the device. We don't send anything to our servers.

Got any questions or feedback? Please write to us at support@synapse.ly.

recentChanges:
- You can now get instant notifications from your favorite WhatsApp groups: Tap on the 3 dots ‚ãÆ of the group notification you want to mark as instant for more options.
- Share: Now let your friends and colleagues experience the benefits of reduced interruptions by sharing the app with them!
- Troubleshoot: Facing any issues with the app? Try troubleshooting (Options -> Feedback) to fix immediately.
comments: Helpful app. Now my phone does not bother me unnecessarily during the day. Removing 1 star because the app is not detecting 'Microsoft SMS Organizer' app, which is a bummer, because I cannot whitelist it to show its notifications immediately. As a result, I cannot see the SMSes as they arrive if I've set Microsoft SMS Organizer as my default messaging app.

A useful app that empowers me to control the time to receive and read the notifications (especially those from the news apps). There is a bug that somehow pressing the notification items in the Daywise inbox does not open the corresponding app properly for some apps. If the bug could be fixed, the app will be perfect for me.

Loved this app for a long time, really helps me be productive despite mental illness, and it actually helped my anxiety by not having notifications cluttering my phone, yet I wouldn't miss important things and could decide when to deal with them. However, i just cannot afford the cost and i just don't know how I'm going to get by without this app.

This app is helpful and I paid for a subscription, but this morning the notifications I have set to receive in a batch started popping up instantly on their own. I triple checked the settings and nothing has changed. So basically the app isn't working today.

Previously gave 5 stars for this great app, but there was a notice that the app would go paid subscription in 6 days. I understand that developing the app isn't free, and I'd be happy to support by paying a one time a fee, but I am unwilling to pay a subscription for this app. It's possible that you'll again increase the cost going forward. I'll be uninstalling and searching for alternatives over the next few days...

title: Pluck It: hairs and emotions
description:
Pluck It is a game about going through a weird journey of hair plucking. In this journey, you will experience all kind of emotions as you pluck hairs. Do you remember when was the last time you felt these emotions?

Some hairs are moodier and you will need to use your creativity and imagination to pluck them. Can you calm down a hair on fire? Can you stop the hair from crying?

- You pluck a lot of hairs. A lot.
- Experience over 30 different emotions.
- Your creativity and imagination will be tested. Can you stop a hair from procrastinating?
- There is a secret easter egg in the game? Are you CURIOUS?
- The game is completely free with no advertisement. Pay what you want.

*** NO hair is harmed in the making of this game ***

Pluck it is made with the purpose of promoting self-awareness and emotional awareness of people's everyday life in the information age.
‚Äã
In this busy digital era which all kind of things try to attract our attention, sometimes we have little or no time to understand and take care of our emotions and mental health. Pluck It brings this topic to you in a fun way.

recentChanges: Version 1.6
comments: This game helped me relax with no ads or nonesense and I feel like they really do care about you, even if you don't play it. It was a tad hard to pluck the hair but it made it a lot more fun. I'd recommend this game if you like relaxing stuff, unless you hate plucking hairs. The arm and hair is fine but everything else has a bit of black on it though if i had to knock it on anything it would be that. Thank you for reading this!

It's kinda weird you pull out hairs and it's about emotions. The graphic is terrible but that adds to the feeling of this app and the voice is so endearing. This whole app is endearing. It feels like your pure friend trying to cheer you up with cheesy remarks and jokes. Sorry I can't give you guys any money but keep it up. Also, no ads at all.

For me its hard to find games like this and i love games that are different for popular games and games that most people know about. But this game is super cool i know it might seem like you just plucking hair but its actually a really nice game so i hope you guys enjoy it as much ad i do.

I thought this game was very creative and calming to play, it was a short game, but a very enjoyable game, and i loved the voice it was very funny to hear and helped to convey what they were saying!!! I also love how there were no ads, except for maybe twice the entire game to ask me to donate, so they can continue with no ads!!! So thus game is definitely amazing!!!

Game seems broken. Very first thing to do and it doesn't work. Colored point to tap appeared, tapped it, then I couldn't do anything. Couldn't pull down, couldn't pinch with two fingers like the image showed, nothing but move it to one side.

title: DotHabit - Management of habits, goals, routine
description:
‚óÜ Google Play Best of 2019 Personal Growth Category winner in Thailand, Hong Kong, Taiwan!

"A good life comes through a good habit." 

If you become a good person every day with good habits,
you will gain a good life. 
Let's start a good habit from DotHabit! 

DotHabit makes daily habits visible with dots.
You will get a sense of achievement and you will be encouraged to continue.

Features of DotHabit

#  "Continuing Self" can be visible with dots

DotHabit fills the dots as you achieve your habits.
By doing this, you can have a sense of achievement at a glance and encouraged to continue.

# Add records and feel the results

It is hard to notice one's change. Because it is difficult to compare with oneself. 
However, if you can compare it with yourself in the past, you will be able to notice your growth.
In DotHabit, you can have a record of your habits in writing.

Finally

We will wait for the opinions and requests of users.
We accept from within the application.
We will surely go through a received voice.
Thank you!

recentChanges: - Minor bug fix
comments: So far so good. No limit to goals to track, each day can add note. Simple UI. Free version comes with ads. But, no export tool, and I might be bias but I still prefer Timecap UI.

Nice and easy to set up! Visually clean, not cluttered. Needs a backup pdf or Excel or something for export to my own Dropbox etc. .... App works great, but on my "pretty please" wishlist I would request, weekly, number of times per week, and number of specified days per week/month. Also change sort order, such as frequency, color, and alphabetical/numerical. Categories too.

Simple, nice interface. The functionality is basic, just enough to track your daily habits. The free version allows for many habits, and if you sign in you can get your data backed up. I wish the size of the squares/grids could be adjustable, would love to fit more habits within the screen without scrolling. Would prefer a one click-done function instead of going into specific habit page to mark it done, so you can check multiple habits at once.

Love love love the simplicity of this tracker so far. It's the closest thing to exactly what I need that I've found so far. I would enjoy some refinement and further features, as well as some way to remove advertisements, but still great so far.
Fantastic app . Its have ability to organise more habits that's too freely. This feature is unique when compare to other free apps.

title: Wellness Coach
description:
The Wall Street Journal ‚ÄúIts Peloton meets Zoom Video meets coaching‚Äù, Also featured on Forbes, CNBC, Fortune magazine, Bloomberg‚Ä¶
Why Wellness Coach? Wellness Coach is a holistic wellness platform designed to inspire you to become the best version of yourself.
 
Every month you can join hundreds of live and interactive wellness classes and feel the sense of community & belonging. Share your experiences with others, ask our coaches for real time help and track your progress on the app.
 
Wellness Audiobooks are now included in your premium membership
 
Looking for employer paid access to Wellness Coach? Please introduce us to your HR/Benefits team and we will work with you to make the case. Please email info@wellnesscoach.live
 
Wellness Coach membership covers all essentials of wellness including:
- Mental Wellbeing
- Physical Wellbeing
- Sleep
- Fitness (Cardio, HIIT..)
- Nutrition & More
- Parenting And Family Life
- Relationships
- Managing Debt
- Retirement Planning
- Rainy day funds and more
 
WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL GET (with Premium membership)
* 6-8 Live and interactive coaching classes during weekdays to cover overall wellness. What's unique? Ask questions with our expert coaches and share your journey with the community. (think Peloton with Zoom functionality!)
* 50+ coaches to talk to and learn from
* 1000+ on demand classes
* Wellness audiobooks (up to $100 in value)
* 2 Additional Licenses included to share with your friends and family ($140 value)
* All future premium features and classes
* New classes daily and several new on demand classes weekly
* Sleep meditations, Yogic Sleep and Bedtime Stories
* Self Timer with various sound options
* Youtube, Facebook and Linkedin Live for select classes
We save your wellness sessions to your Apple Health app.
Testimonials
‚ÄúVery helpful visualizations. Love the positive mindset and words of encouragement and motivation. Great app!‚ÄùKerry Oct 24th 2020
‚ÄúExcellent app I've tried a few different ones but this has been by far the best 1.‚Äù Blair Aug 24th 2020
‚ÄúI really think the free fundamentals is a strong foundation. Consistency is the key. Wellness encompasses mind, body, spirit, health, sleep. This app covers it all. Free training and group meditation, free yoga, conditioning, and stretching. It's a great service, after a few weeks you may upgrade to premium. Just be sure to practice this 10 minutes in the morning, 10 minutes before bed. Don't make excuses for yourself. ‚Äù Levy, July 8th 2020
" After many searches and trials with several apps I have come to realize that this is the best app for meditation. I am new to meditation and love the open and friendly environment that Meditation.live offers. Coaches are very knowledgeable and provide on the spot answers to our questions" - Remmy
***Subscription pricing and terms***
We offer an auto-renewing yearly subscription $69.99/year to provide you with premium features of the app that you can use as long as your subscription is active.
Payment will be charged to the credit/debit card connected to your Play Store Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to account settings after the purchase.
Read more about our terms and conditions here:
Terms of service: https://www.Wellnesscoach.live/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://www.wellnesscoach.live/privacy-policy

title: How to Build Self Esteem
description:
Are you somebody who struggles with self-confidence? Our How to Build Self Esteem Course will help you to overcome your fears and increase your self love. There are so many reasons why it is so important to have and maintain high self-esteem. Here are some of the reasons below. 

* Confidence helps you to be able to influencing another's opinions or behaviors in a positive way.
* Be able to communicate feelings and emotions in a variety of situations.
* Approach new situations in a positive and confident manner.
* Exhibit a high level of frustration tolerance.
* Accept responsibility.
* Keep situations (positive and negative) in proper perspective.
* Communicate positive feelings about themselves.
* Possess an internal locus of control (belief that whatever happens to them is the result of their own behavior and actions). 
* Being assertive lets people know that you cannot be pushed around. 

But the most important question to ask is: How do you improve your Self Esteem?

Our How to Build Self Esteem course contains amazing information that will help you increase your Self Esteem in a positive and influential way. We will help you understand the importance of self love and self worth. Our guide works on overcoming low self esteem through positive thinking strategies and self awareness techniques. Here are some of the wonderful things you can expect to read about. 

* Where Does our Self-Esteem Come From? 
* What is Self-Esteem? 
* Do I Have Low Self Esteem? 
* The Inner Voice
* Positive Affirmations 
* Self-Nurturing
* and much much more

It can be a struggle for many people who suffer from low self esteem. If you think you have low self esteem, and it is impacting your life, you can quickly and easily download this great book and get the tips today. Get this awesome guide of How to Build Self Esteem. A great book with many powerful tip and habits to implement in your own life. 

The How to Build Self Esteem course is absolutely free, so be sure to download this app and start working on your self improvement, self confidence and self motivation. Positive thinking and self worth are so important in being emotionally stable and confident.

title: PBC Foundation Self-Management
description:
The PBC Foundation exists to serve people affected by Primary Biliary Cholangitis, currently serving almost 9500 members in 76 countries worldwide.

Core to this service is providing patients with the most reliable, up to date and entirely comprehensive information available. As such we have developed this app, through which you can access all the content in the compendium and more, including a calendar of events and news updates from the Foundation.

The greatest ally which anyone diagnosed with a condition has is reliable information and knowledge. This app aims to put exactly that resource quite literally at their fingertips. Not only will you be able to access the information you need, wherever and whenever you want, you will also be able to benefit from that content always being relevant and current.

 Through diary pages and news feeds we will be able to ensure that very few people miss the opportunity to take part in clinical trials, fundraising events, self-management workshops and much more besides.

title: MoodTools - Depression Aid
description:
If you are feeling sad, anxious, or depressed, lift your mood with MoodTools! MoodTools is designed to help you combat depression and alleviate your negative moods, aiding you on your road to recovery.

MoodTools contains several different research-supported tools. They include: 

Thought Diary - Improve your mood by analyzing your thoughts and identifying negative / distorted thinking patterns based on principles from Cognitive Therapy 

Activities - Regain your energy by performing energizing activities and tracking your mood before and after, based on Behavioral Activation Therapy

Safety Plan - Develop a suicide safety plan to keep you safe and utilize emergency resources during a suicidal crisis

Information - Read information, a detailed self-help guide, and find help with internet resources

Test - Take the PHQ-9 depression questionnaire to track your symptom severity

Video - Discover helpful YouTube videos that can improve your mood and behavior, from guided meditations to enlightening TED talks

------

MoodTools was designed in collaboration with multiple mental health professionals. MoodTools is free, contains no advertisements, and is a purely non-profit venture aimed at helping people suffering from clinical depression. Thank you for supporting our efforts with your positive ratings and reviews. Please send any requests, questions, or feedback via email to moodtools@moodtools.org and we will be sure to respond to each one. 

Disclaimer: This mental health application is not intended to be a replacement for treatment nor any sort of medical intervention. Treatment is, by far, the best way to overcome clinical depression or other mental illnesses. Therapy and antidepressants have been shown to effectively treat clinical depression and anxiety. This application will only aid you on your path to recovery from depression or anxiety. In addition, if you are not in treatment, talk to your doctor or therapist or use this app to find resources that can connect you to treatment. 

While MoodTools is designed as a self-help mental health application to help people suffering from clinical depression, it can also assist people without mental illness or people suffering from other mental disorders / mental illnesses such as anxiety, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), bipolar disorder, seasonal affective disorder, dysthymia, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), panic disorder, generalized anxiety disorder, or schizophrenia.

Privacy Notice: This app uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage data. Exactly what information is tracked is available in the privacy policy.
descriptionHTML:
If you are feeling sad, anxious, or depressed, lift your mood with MoodTools! MoodTools is designed to help you combat depression and alleviate your negative moods, aiding you on your road to recovery.

MoodTools contains several different research-supported tools. They include:

Thought Diary - Improve your mood by analyzing your thoughts and identifying negative / distorted thinking patterns based on principles from Cognitive Therapy

Activities - Regain your energy by performing energizing activities and tracking your mood before and after, based on Behavioral Activation Therapy

Safety Plan - Develop a suicide safety plan to keep you safe and utilize emergency resources during a suicidal crisis

Information - Read information, a detailed self-help guide, and find help with internet resources

Test - Take the PHQ-9 depression questionnaire to track your symptom severity

Video - Discover helpful YouTube videos that can improve your mood and behavior, from guided meditations to enlightening TED talks

comments: I love this app. it's my "turn to" app when I am feeling out of sorts. keeps things clear in my mind when I need it the most. highly recommended.
Very detailed and thought out app.

Honestly, I haven't even gone through reading all the texts in the information section, and I can say that I already like the app! üòä The explanations and the amount of information that is given are excellent and I think that this app could be really beneficial for anyone struggling with these problems. In the least, it could help with putting one's thoughts into perspective, which is a great aid in itself.

Good resource, but it needs to also include positive moods and their effects so people don't fixate on the negative or develop the sense that things are always bad. I was peaceful sitting outside in the sunshine but had no way to log this and remind myself how to achieve peace or conjure positive memories.

this app is very useful in controlling and helping negative thoughts by guiding you into logical reasoning. soon, you'll learn how to stop your own spiraling thoughts. probably saved my life a half a dozen times. :)

title: Instant - Quantified Self, Track Digital Wellbeing
description:
Instant is an automatic time tracker for the time you spend on your phone & apps usage, fitness, places, sleep and travel time. 
Dashboard for your life with actionable insights on your tracked data. You can interact with your Insights, Instant Coach & get weekly reports to understand your data. Also, with Goals to help you improve your productivity and have a healthier life! Keep track of all your screen time addiction for Digital Wellbeing, moves & places throughout the day. Instant lets you track & analyze your activities on a dashboard!
Award Winning App Grand Prize Winner of Google Fit Developer Challenge!
All of Instant's data is private & remains only on your phone. Top rated Quantified Self app with automatic time tracking! 

Key features of Instant
1. Automatically track your phone usage time (screen time) & how many times its unlocked
2. Track your app usage
3. Integrated with Google Fit, Fitbit & S Health to track your fitness and travel time
4. Create geofences to track time spent in places like home and work
5. Set goals for steps, sleep & set limits for phone usage time
6. Widget for quick tracking
7. Android Wear supported
8. Track your sleep automatically
9. Unplug and spend quality time with your family

As seen on TechCrunch, The New York Times, Gizmodo, Android Central, Times of India, Android Authority, Phone Arena and Huffington Post. #1 on Product Hunt & Featured on Google Play.

Instant works seamlessly in the background tracking how much time you spend on your phone screen & apps everyday, how much you walk, how much you travel, how long you sleep & how many times you unlocked your phone. Additionally reminders can be set according to your daily limit. It is a great way to stop your phone addiction. 
Instant is the World's leading Quantified Self & Lifelogging app.


Instant journals your entire day automatically. Recommended by Quantified Self and Lifelog enthusiasts. Rescue your time with Instant. App usage tracking on the dashboard is for Android only. For more information visit us on: http://instantapp.today

For Research, API & SDK queries contact: shashwat@emberify.com

comments: It's great for tracking activities such as sleeping and walking, however the location data isn't very accurate. If you move a couple of meters from a location it will mark it as a new location, so you should be able to merge different locations that are only some meters apart. Also I'd love to see a pie chart of the total amount of time spent on different activities (sleep,places etc) today, this week, month, year or all time. If this can be implented i think this app deserves a 5 star rating!
Crashes constantly Everything i click map the app crashes, paid for the pro but still after all this time (several years) the app still isn't worth the money I paid for the pro version...shame.

really wish a beta group was available to join to be able to make suggestions on how to improve the app. Sleep data hasn't been accurate on my phone. Judging by the way some of the other ratings I breifly read through...other phones seem to be having specific data related discrepancies as well. Perhaps a way to manually to manually enter data ourselves and a breakdown of how it's recording or measuring its data so we could manually edit its data would be a way to mitigate the common issues...
Crashes everytime you click anything about the paid pro feature. For God's sake it's so annoying. Would be a good app if only didn't crash out so much.
Really cool app! However, sleep times are incredibly inaccurate. It said I got 4 hours of sleep and I got at least 7... how is sleep tracked and how can I get more accurate readings?

comments: I absolutely love the app. I use it every other day. I share it among my friends. When it gets fixed , will give the previous 5 star rating. This used to be a good app
This app is amazing! there is a lot of things that you can learn. Everyday theres something. Maybe some clever ideas for anything.

Love quotes for better relationships. Parenting tips & quotes. Karma quotes for better decision making. Tips to boost your confidence. Tips to handle failure. Quotes to stay positive and hopeful. Daily quote notifications will keep you motivated every day! Share to WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter and many others,  New quotes added every day.

comments: There are many inspiring quotes in this app. I'm giving it a 3 because there are too many quotes from Millionaire Sayings, and money does not buy happiness, peace of mind, love, or good health. A second reason for giving a 3 rating is that some quotes are repeated 2 or more times on a list. Currently, I'm still viewing quotes, however I may stop because a lot of the Millionaire Sayings do not meet my values.

I can't even explain how excellent is this app. Too good. I am very thankful to developer and teams of this app who made this beautiful app. Whenever I used to loose my hope and develop negative things on my mind. I just used to open this app and feel energetic. I don't have word to say thanks. But also very very very thankyou from the bottom of my heart.üëèüëèüëè

The app is great there are lots of great quotes. It would be nice to read more than five at a time before being trapped in a window demanding I rate it!!! So here's your friggin rating, sorry I couldn't give you a half star. Perhaps now I can be left alone to enjoy the app!!!

Takes a really long time to load the quotes when you open the app, The graphics that come with the quote are quite distracting. It also doesn't give you the option to not like a quote. I might keep the app if it weren't for the terribly show load time.

The quotes are varied and they certainly open one's eyes to the knowledge that you are not the dirst to feel what you feel, you won't be the last, and you will persevere. Inspiration and lessons that has stood the test of time. Love this app!

title: Self Confidence and Healing
description:
Self-Confidence and Healing is an app intended to assist you in developing your confidence by providing helpful articles and inspiring quotes.  My intention is to help you approach this in a new light, not by aspiring for more and more things that will bolster your self-esteem, but by healing your sense of self-worth which should be firmly anchored in the love of God.  

"You are not your past nor your wounds nor your fears. Let no momentary setback keep you from fulfilling God's best plan for your life!"

-Use the ‚Äòshare function‚Äô to share your favorite quotes via Facebook, Twitter, SMS or other applications.
(To share with Facebook, use the copy button first, then click the share button, choose Facebook and paste through long-press)
-Native app. Can be used even when offline or not connected to the internet.
-Can be saved in SD card, hence saving memory.
-This is not a widget and will not crowd your home screen.
-Can use the ‚Äòrefresh‚Äô function whenever you like. You don‚Äôt have to wait for the next day to read the quote for that day.
-Keep it handy for easy reference and sharing.

title: Rootd - Panic Attack & Anxiety Relief
description:
Rootd is a female led app for those struggling with panic attacks & anxiety. Helping you overcome anxiety & regain confidence üí™üèº

‚ÄúI‚Äôve suffered from panic attacks for almost 10 years. I‚Äôve done CBT, medication, meditation, but nothing helped me in the moment when that panic attack hit, until I downloaded Rootd. Rootd makes it feel like someone is with me, even when I‚Äôm alone. I owe my continued stability to this simple genius app. Its a MUST for all who are facing the same type of war with anxiety.‚Äù 
@RainyNally

Overcome panic attacks and anxiety the moment they strike with Rootd‚Äôs proven lessons, panic button, breathing tool, and exercises.

Finally, an app for conquering panic attacks and anxiety that blends a guided process for both immediate and long term relief, with clean and engaging design. Get Rootd to always have panic attack and anxiety relief right in your pocket.

We set out to build Rootd after suffering from debilitating panic attacks and anxiety for several years. The only help resources we could find were too expensive, ineffective, or poorly designed. Our mission has become to help others overcome their panic, fear, and anxiety, and to end the stigma against those affected.

Rootd‚Äôs core features and content are completely free, and always will be. This includes:

The Rootr

Always there to help anytime you feel overwhelmed by an anxiety or panic attack. After activating the Rootr with the press of a big red button, you are presented with two guided paths to relieving the panic: one for when you‚Äôre ready to face the panic attack head-on, and another for when you just want to find comfort as quickly as possible.

Understanding Lessons

Find some peace of mind by learning about where anxiety comes from, how our bodies and minds experience panic attacks, and why this all might be happening to you.

The Breathr

The perfect tool to practice deep breathing daily and find calm during times of stress.

The Visualizr

Guided body scans and visualizations to get rooted when feeling anxious.

Emergency Contact

For when you need to hear a friendly voice, you can immediately call a friend, family member, or nearby help center directly from the Rootd app. 

Personal Stats Page

Take pride in your healing progress and gain appreciation for how far you‚Äôve come with a personal stats page that tracks your number of panic attacks survived, lessons completed, and overall ‚Äúwarrior points‚Äù.

SHORT TERM & LONG TERM LESSON PACKS ARE NOW AVAILABLE

When you're ready to begin permanently changing your relationship with panic attacks and anxiety you can now upgrade to unlock Rootd's Short Term & Long Term lesson packs.

Short Term Lessons

Learn changes you can make and exercises you can perform in the short term that provide relief, manage heightened anxiety, and instil a calm mind. Short term lesson topics include Diet, Social Media Anxiety, and a new guided Deep Breathing exercise.

Long Term Lessons

The ultimate goal is to permanently change our relationship with anxiety, and live panic attack free. Rootd's long term lessons guide you through the remainder of the journey to lifelong relief. Long term lesson topics include Learning to Sleep Again, Resistance vs Trust, Self Labelling, and Meditation.

What mental health professionals are saying about Rootd

"I appreciate the simple, factual, and yet caring approach of Rootd that makes it an inviting, interesting, and easy to use tool. Its easy to read and affirming statements at the end of each section are true and encouraging to readers. I endorse this for individuals looking for support and tools for managing anxiety and panic attacks."
Wendy Marion-Orienti - Licensed counsellor at PRH International School of Adult Education and Research

Follow Rootd
Instagram: @rootd_app

Rootd - Panic attack and anxiety relief right in your pocket.
descriptionHTML:
Rootd is a female led app for those struggling with panic attacks & anxiety. Helping you overcome anxiety & regain confidence üí™üèº

‚ÄúI‚Äôve suffered from panic attacks for almost 10 years. I‚Äôve done CBT, medication, meditation, but nothing helped me in the moment when that panic attack hit, until I downloaded Rootd. Rootd makes it feel like someone is with me, even when I‚Äôm alone. I owe my continued stability to this simple genius app. Its a MUST for all who are facing the same type of war with anxiety.‚Äù
@RainyNally

Overcome panic attacks and anxiety the moment they strike with Rootd‚Äôs proven lessons, panic button, breathing tool, and exercises.

Finally, an app for conquering panic attacks and anxiety that blends a guided process for both immediate and long term relief, with clean and engaging design. Get Rootd to always have panic attack and anxiety relief right in your pocket.

We set out to build Rootd after suffering from debilitating panic attacks and anxiety for several years. The only help resources we could find were too expensive, ineffective, or poorly designed. Our mission has become to help others overcome their panic, fear, and anxiety, and to end the stigma against those affected.

Rootd‚Äôs core features and content are completely free, and always will be. This includes:

The Rootr

Always there to help anytime you feel overwhelmed by an anxiety or panic attack. After activating the Rootr with the press of a big red button, you are presented with two guided paths to relieving the panic: one for when you‚Äôre ready to face the panic attack head-on, and another for when you just want to find comfort as quickly as possible.

Understanding Lessons

Find some peace of mind by learning about where anxiety comes from, how our bodies and minds experience panic attacks, and why this all might be happening to you.

The Breathr

The perfect tool to practice deep breathing daily and find calm during times of stress.

The Visualizr

Guided body scans and visualizations to get rooted when feeling anxious.

Emergency Contact

For when you need to hear a friendly voice, you can immediately call a friend, family member, or nearby help center directly from the Rootd app.

Personal Stats Page

Take pride in your healing progress and gain appreciation for how far you‚Äôve come with a personal stats page that tracks your number of panic attacks survived, lessons completed, and overall ‚Äúwarrior points‚Äù.

SHORT TERM & LONG TERM LESSON PACKS ARE NOW AVAILABLE

When you're ready to begin permanently changing your relationship with panic attacks and anxiety you can now upgrade to unlock Rootd's Short Term & Long Term lesson packs.

Short Term Lessons

Learn changes you can make and exercises you can perform in the short term that provide relief, manage heightened anxiety, and instil a calm mind. Short term lesson topics include Diet, Social Media Anxiety, and a new guided Deep Breathing exercise.

Long Term Lessons

The ultimate goal is to permanently change our relationship with anxiety, and live panic attack free. Rootd's long term lessons guide you through the remainder of the journey to lifelong relief. Long term lesson topics include Learning to Sleep Again, Resistance vs Trust, Self Labelling, and Meditation.

What mental health professionals are saying about Rootd

"I appreciate the simple, factual, and yet caring approach of Rootd that makes it an inviting, interesting, and easy to use tool. Its easy to read and affirming statements at the end of each section are true and encouraging to readers. I endorse this for individuals looking for support and tools for managing anxiety and panic attacks."
Wendy Marion-Orienti - Licensed counsellor at PRH International School of Adult Education and Research

Follow Rootd
Instagram: @rootd_app

Rootd - Panic attack and anxiety relief right in your pocket.
summary: Overcome panic attacks and anxiety with Rootd's lessons, tools, and exercises.
recentChanges:
In honor of World Mental Health Day we've released an update that allows users to play sounds or vibrations in our popular breathing tool!

This update also contains bug fixes, performance improvements, and introduces a way to share your progress and invite your friends and family to the Rootd app.

If you're enjoying Rootd and the progress we're making, please take a moment to leave a review on the app store, and get in touch anytime at team@rootd.io.
comments: I have only been using this app for a few days and it has been very helpful. The meditations and breathing exercises are short and sweet with option sound and vibrations to help keep you on task. I am very happy with the journal as well! I like the option to pick emotion stickers for the day and answer simple questions vs freestyle (although you have 2000 characters for that too).

I've been using this app for a little under a week and have been finding it pretty helpful so far. Haven't had the need to try out the panic button yet, so I can't comment on that aspect, but the rest of the app seems helpful. That said, I am very confused as to how I can have a "20 day Journal streak" when I've only had the app for about five days. It's doesn't impact the function at all, but it is a very strange glitch on the gameification side of things.

I have read through the information provided and found it very useful. It is very clear and easy to understand how to use the app. Even though I haven't yet taken out their paid subscription, there are still activities you can do for free. I have found so far, this to be the best Anxiety/Panic Attack App I've come across.

Absolutely love this app. Would be rad if there was a chatbot like woebot or self-education quizzes to help understand ourselves & our issues. Only thing I'd change is hiding the stuff only paid users can access. Maybe prevent accidently clicking on a premium feature by having all the free features in 1 area? Being reminded we're too poor to access features that could help us, is depressing & anxiety provoking.
Had an issue signing up but the rootd IT team was quick to resolve my issue. The app is very helpful and I would certainly recommend it to others that are struggling with anxiety and panic attacks.

comments: I am using the paid version and I love it! I love the reminders and the lessons. I especially love the recipes and the fact that you have a TON of vegetarian options. The only reason I rated it 4 stars is that recipes get removed! I plan my meals a week in advance and I went today to prepare one and the 3 of the recipes are gone! There also isn't an option to download a .pdf to save for later. Please fix this and i will rate 5 stars!

Great app. I've experimented with IF in the past, with great success. However, with COVID and working from home, it's a lot easier to slip up and eat whenever you want to. This app pops up periodically reminding me that I need to drink water. It's nice to have a reminder, which should prevent me from mindlessly eating when I'm not scheduled to. My first foray into IF was about 2 years ago, and I lost 85lbs in total. I'm not quite where I was before, but I'm still dealing with about 50 extra lbs. This app is highly recommended, as long as you use it as intended.

Great app, takes a little learning. I was initially confused by the words encouraging me to 'End Fasting' when I was only hours into current fast. This resulted in a few badly timed fast records, but the ability to edit fasting start and end times saved me. I often forget to record my water intake, despite the much appreciated reminders from the app. The retroactive edit ability for water intake does not allow me to click on a day and edit. No response when I try to select a day's water record.

Easy and Convenient app. I love that I can see my progress so easily!! I wish I could connect to my community though. It disappeared as quickly as it appeared???? I also wish I could communicate with my fasting buddies, at minimum send them an emoji or something. I use the paid version so I'm not sure what I'm getting that's any different than the free version... I don't use the recipes or the tools, I just use the trackers. All in all I'm happy I have the app though to stay on track.

Love this app. I'm using the free version. There are enough features to get you started on IF. You enter basic info about yourself & they suggest a plan. You can modify the IF hours. Cool feature shows start/stop times. During fast you can see at a glance how long you've fasted/and time left. Reminders to drink water w/place to log amount. Didn't rate 5 stars because I wear an off brand fitness tracker (not listed on app) so steps are not recorded & no way to manually enter steps taken.

title: goalmap - SMART goal setting to stay motivated
description:
‚ñå 300,000 people are reaching their goals on Goalmap, the self-help app. Download the app and stop procrastinating!

Aren‚Äôt you tired of taking resolutions that you then break due to a lack of motivation? Wouldn‚Äôt you like to build new habits that actually stick and introduce more well-being in your life? Then try Goalmap!

Goalmap is a self-help app which helps you set, track, and reach your personal goals. Whether you want to start meditation, read more regularly or have a better sleep, Goalmap offers you a science-based approach for building good habits and reaching your goals.

With Goalmap, all your personal growth goals are in one place. Stay motivated and fight procrastination to build a better work-life balance. 

Why setting goals? ‚ÄùA goal properly set is halfway reached.‚Äù, said Abraham Lincoln. People who set clear goals in their lives (SMART goals) have twice more chance to reach them! Bring the power of goal-setting into your life!

Here is how Goalmap works:

‚òÖ  SET CLEAR, SMART GOALS - Define your long term vision, set up your action plan and choose your good habits, for example exercising 3 times per week or meditating 15 minutes a day. Dozens of life goals are waiting for you, in all areas of personal growth: Sport, Well-Being, Productivity, Knowledge, etc. Once you set SMART goals, you‚Äôre ready to introduce positive changes in your life! 

‚òÖ STAY MOTIVATED WITH OUR COACHING LIBRARY - Get access to our coaching library: 7 or 21-day programs, podcasts and videos with leading experts, inspiring user stories. New well-being and personal growth podcasts are uploaded every month. 

‚òÖ  BUILD GOOD HABITS - Following your progress on the Home page helps you stay motivated and focus on what remains to be done. Goalmap helps you build good habits - and fight bad ones. You just found the app that will make you stop procrastinating.


‚òÖ NO MORE PROCRASTINATION - All along your self-help journey, Goalmap supports you with cheerful reminders and motivating quotes to help you reach your well being goals. You will stay motivated and get things done.

If you have any questions, send us an email at feedback@goalmap.com, we're always here to help. 

Download Goalmap now and start your personal growth journey!

See you soon,
The Goalmap team

recentChanges: Correction of the 401 error encountered by some users
comments: Simple & easy to use, but the main problem for me is that I can only choose for how often I set my goals for. For example, if I have the goal "Get to work before 8am", there is no way to manually unselect the days/weeks when the goal does not apply such as holidays, sick days... If I leave those days unmarked (=did not reach the goal) they will falsify my statistics. It's so bad for me that you don't have this feature. :-( Please fix it! Also I need widgets for the home screen & progress bars!

Seems to meet my needs. However the "My Goals" should have an add goal button. The "Goal Store" tab is silly and unintuitive. You're not buying a goal your setting them. When I see my list of goals I should be able to add one without having to go to another tab. It would also be useful to add categories. Something like setting a house cleaning goal doesn't seem to fit into the three provided categories. Also please let me put in a percentage of how much is done when I add a task.

This app used to be good. Far more flexibility and way of tracking progress under the free version. It then had a revamp and took many things off the free version and I lost one of my goals which I had been following for some time, when the developers cut the free version from 5 goals to 4. I understand they may have done this to boost their income: that's fine, but by making the free version worse, this is no invitation to pay for the premium. A big shame.

When I first signed up it was great, I set notifications to come up to remind me of my commitments and keep me accountable. Now the notifications no longer work it's pretty pointless. I've contacted the developer both in the forum and by using the contact email address and got no response and no fix. Shame really as it was useful before this all stopped working.

Love it! I deducted 1 star because the app doesn't have widgets. A suggestion to the developers: the ability to set a period for a single habit (e.g. I want to brush my teeth two times a day for 3 months) cuz I want to build a habit to do it constantly forever, but I don't want to track it forever. Would be nice to have a progress bar for the period as well. Overall, love the app. I would totally recommend it.

title: PTSD Coach
description:
PTSD Coach was designed for Veterans and military Servicemembers who have, or may have, Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD). This app provides users with education about PTSD, information about professional care, a self-assessment for PTSD, opportunities to find support, and tools that can help users manage the stresses of daily life with PTSD. Tools range from relaxation skills and positive self-talk to anger management and other common self-help strategies. Users can customize tools based on their preferences and can integrate their own contacts, photos, and music. This app can be used by people who are in treatment as well as those who are not.

PTSD Coach was created by VA‚Äôs National Center for PTSD and DoD‚Äôs National Center for Telehealth & Technology.

recentChanges:
3.4.2
* Fixed a bug that affected saving edits to the safety plan on some devices.

3.4.1
* New feature: A self-guided safety plan for suicide prevention is now available from the lateral menu. The safety plan form adheres to the US Department of Veterans Affairs format.
* Bug fixes and performance enhancements
comments: Found a pamphlet with this app on it as a PTSD resource at my VA behavioral health clinic nearly a year ago. Checking it out was the best decision (other than treatment) I've made. It provides the ability to schedule regular check-ins with tracking over time and various tools and learning resources for the individual, their family, and their support network. I'm grateful for this app everyday for helping manage my symptoms and maintain regular check ins between psych/therapy appointments.
This app has really good tools to help you deal with trauma symptoms, like guided mediatations, body awareness, and soothing sounds.
I like that I can customize it like the soothing images I can change. What I find calming and soothing is not the normal of most.

A great tool for those who have anxiety. The guided meditations are a great help. I highly recommend this application. I have already made a recommendation within our group. This is a must have tool for any PFA toolbox.
I like that there are so many different types of activities to try out and see what works. Then I can favorite the ones that really help. Also, it's free and doesn't collect personal data!

title: SuperBetter
description:
Resilience Training. Powered by the Science of Games.

Join nearly a million people who have played SuperBetter so far to build resilience, achieve goals, and tackle challenges including anxiety, depression, stress, chronic pain, concussion recovery and more. We make the Original SuperBetter available for free to anyone around the world.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Message from the SuperBetter team

We‚Äôre a small but mighty team and our reality means prioritizing resources on alliances to bring SuperBetter to new populations. That‚Äôs how we keep the lights on and grow our impact. We do our best to maintain the Original SuperBetter as a free service, but the apps can sometimes be buggy. If you have issues on your device, try the website.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Everyone has heroic potential

SuperBetter builds resilience - the ability to stay strong, motivated and optimistic even in the face of change and difficult obstacles. Playing SuperBetter unlocks heroic potential to overcome tough situations and achieve goals that matter most. 

Created by award-winning game designer Jane McGonigal, SuperBetter is powered by the Live Gamefully¬Æ method; a framework that activates the psychological strengths of game play to build resilience and be stronger for life. Proven results in just minutes a day.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Why play SuperBetter?

Here are some reasons people are using SuperBetter:

- To adopt a new habit, learn or improve a skill, strengthen a relationship, make a physical or athletic breakthrough, complete a meaningful project, or pursue a lifelong dream.

- To beat depression, overcome anxiety, manage stress, cope with chronic pain, heal from physical injury, or recover from post-traumatic stress.

- To overcome a life challenge like finding a new job, surviving divorce, dealing with a career or school setback, or grieving a loss.

- To help others - therapists refer SuperBetter to patients and educators bring the method to campuses and classrooms to build student resilience and social-emotional learning. 

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ What does it mean to Live Gamefully?

To Live Gamefully means bringing the same mindset and psychological strengths naturally displayed when playing games ‚Äì such as optimism, creativity, courage, and determination ‚Äì to real life. It means having the courage and openness to try different strategies to discover what works best. It means collaborating with allies, and building up the resilience to tackle tougher and tougher challenges with greater and greater success.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ SuperBetter is backed by science

SuperBetter is validated in published studies to build resilience, improve mental health, and support recovery. 

In a randomized controlled trial at the University of Pennsylvania and a clinical trial at The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center, playing SuperBetter improved seven pathways to higher resilience including optimism, self-efficacy, perceived social support, life satisfaction, less anxiety, fewer symptoms of depression and less hopelessness. 

In a meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials evaluating smartphone apps for depression, SuperBetter had the greatest effect among 22 apps for reducing symptoms of depression. In a similar meta-analysis, SuperBetter had the greatest effect among 9 apps for reducing symptoms of anxiety.

You can find links to the studies at SuperBetter.com/Science.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Features

‚Ä¢ Identify and go for epic wins
‚Ä¢ Adopt a secret identity
‚Ä¢ Recruit allies for support
‚Ä¢ Choose PowerPacks or design your own activities
‚Ä¢ Activate power-ups, battle bad guys, and complete quests each day
‚Ä¢ Build and track four types of resilience
‚Ä¢ Join the SuperBetter Official Community Group

Live Gamefully.

SuperBetter builds resilience - the ability to stay strong, motivated and optimistic even in the face of change and difficult obstacles. Playing SuperBetter unlocks heroic potential to overcome tough situations and achieve goals that matter most.

Created by award-winning game designer Jane McGonigal, SuperBetter is powered by the Live Gamefully¬Æ method; a framework that activates the psychological strengths of game play to build resilience and be stronger for life. Proven results in just minutes a day.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Why play SuperBetter?

Here are some reasons people are using SuperBetter:

- To adopt a new habit, learn or improve a skill, strengthen a relationship, make a physical or athletic breakthrough, complete a meaningful project, or pursue a lifelong dream.

- To beat depression, overcome anxiety, manage stress, cope with chronic pain, heal from physical injury, or recover from post-traumatic stress.

- To overcome a life challenge like finding a new job, surviving divorce, dealing with a career or school setback, or grieving a loss.

- To help others - therapists refer SuperBetter to patients and educators bring the method to campuses and classrooms to build student resilience and social-emotional learning.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ What does it mean to Live Gamefully?

To Live Gamefully means bringing the same mindset and psychological strengths naturally displayed when playing games ‚Äì such as optimism, creativity, courage, and determination ‚Äì to real life. It means having the courage and openness to try different strategies to discover what works best. It means collaborating with allies, and building up the resilience to tackle tougher and tougher challenges with greater and greater success.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ SuperBetter is backed by science

SuperBetter is validated in published studies to build resilience, improve mental health, and support recovery.

In a randomized controlled trial at the University of Pennsylvania and a clinical trial at The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center, playing SuperBetter improved seven pathways to higher resilience including optimism, self-efficacy, perceived social support, life satisfaction, less anxiety, fewer symptoms of depression and less hopelessness.

In a meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials evaluating smartphone apps for depression, SuperBetter had the greatest effect among 22 apps for reducing symptoms of depression. In a similar meta-analysis, SuperBetter had the greatest effect among 9 apps for reducing symptoms of anxiety.

You can find links to the studies at SuperBetter.com/Science.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Features

‚Ä¢ Identify and go for epic wins
‚Ä¢ Adopt a secret identity
‚Ä¢ Recruit allies for support
‚Ä¢ Choose PowerPacks or design your own activities
‚Ä¢ Activate power-ups, battle bad guys, and complete quests each day
‚Ä¢ Build and track four types of resilience
‚Ä¢ Join the SuperBetter Official Community Group

Live Gamefully.
summary: Resilience Training. Powered by the Science of Games.
developerAddress:
SuperBetter, LLC
222 Merchandise Mart Plaza
Suite 1230
Chicago, IL 60654
comments: Awesome concept. Recommend to all my friends. Feedback: (1)Be able to edit/remove power-ups. For example: "playing with my cat that is no longer alive for 10mins" is triggering to see. (2)Allow multiple resilience slots for quests and power-ups. Example: "having a hard conversation" is both good for emotional & mental. (3)More variety of completion music. The fanfare is annoying. (4)More artwork & personalized avatars. It helps our imagination and reward centre when we see our imaginary selves.

Cute, and great for people who want to improve something but may struggle with motivation. Everything is pretty well detailed and explained, and even the science behind it, but in a way that's not overwhelming at all. Honestly I'm amazed.

This app is everything. I first found it a few years bc of Mcgonigal's TED talk and now, after finishing up my psychology degree, it's the first thing I reach for to get me through, well, everything. Brilliant design to gamify your life/sanity.

The gamification works really well as a concept but the execution really needs work. Obvious bugs like not calculating user's resilience points correctly really destroys user experience. Hope you guys will fix the app soon.

Pushing people to register and without Google plug, will give you pretty good bounce rate..why I suppose register if I don't know if I will like it. People only register if they have clear need, or they know the app already so they are inspired to do it.

title: 30 Days Makeover - Beauty Care at Home
description:
‚Äú30 Days Makeover ‚Äìbeauty care at home‚Äù is an app that serves as a 30 day beauty challenge or a 30 day beauty guide for both women and men all over the world. Here you will find a well-planned sequence of beauty care methods that will help you achieve your beauty related targets like full body care,  wrinkle lift,  healthy hair, dandruff control, acne control, fair skin, glowing face, split end termination, party ready regime, pre-bridal routine and others.

 The biggest USP of ‚Äú30 Days Makeover ‚Äìbeauty care at home‚Äù app is that it suggests you the most appropriate daily beauty care sequence that too using only simple homemade methods that include basic kitchen ingredients like turmeric, lemon, ginger, garlic,  basil, potatoes, tomatoes, butter, olive oil, vinegar, fruit pulps like papaya, cucumber, banana, apple etc. It even offers you choice of ingredients.

Features:
1.	Records your daily process
2.	Audio based instructor that guides you through the process
3.	Timer aided activities
4.	Dashboard with percentage display
5.	Know your skin type
6.	Contains diet, exercise and yoga tips

Regimes offered:
1.	Full Body Care
It consists two plans - easy and PRO that differs in intensity level,  that helps you take care of your entire body including your skin, face, eyes, lips, nails, hair, arms, elbows, hands, knees, legs and intimate parts. 
2.	Wedding Ready
Intentionally designed for the brides to-be that offers you a combination of facials, body polishes, massages, manicures and pedicures, intimate area care, hair spas and all that a perfect pre-bridal routine must have. This is a better, cost-effective and organic replacement to the expensive pre-bridal packages offered by the beauty parlors.
3.	 Healthy Hair
Carefully curated plan for imparting the hair a natural shine, volume and bounce.
4.	Dandruff control
Expert plan meant to reduce the occurrence of dandruff in 30 days
5.	Acne Control
For all those struggling with breakouts, acne and pimples this is really an effective plan that offers you a clearer skin in 30 days
6.	Fair skin
An amazing and easy beauty care routine created for people who like to get a few shades lighter. Though we admire dark skin equally!
7.	Glowing face
An appropriate sequence of beauty care, diet, rest and night time care can help achieve a natural glow on your face. 
8.	Split Ends Repair
Toughest hair problem after dandruff is split ends. This can make your hair look frizzy, dry and dull. This plan aims to treat split ends and reduce the future appearance giving you gorgeous locks. 
9.	Event and party ready
Sometimes you need to prepare yourself to be the charm of the party. This regime helps you treat your skin and hair with a perfect combination of beauty care, diet and exercise.
10.	Wrinkle Lift
Reverse the impact of age with this regime that works most effectively on your fine lines, wrinkles, dryness and spots of aging.

DISCLAIMER
The content and images contained in the app is collected from online sources, we do not claim the authority of the same.
The content on this app is provided as an information resource only.
Please consult your doctor in case of any health related problem. Pregnant women & children should consult a doctor prior using these remedies as a precaution. XT Apps expressly disclaims responsibility, & shall have no liability, for any damages, loss, injury, or liability whatever suffered as a result of your health on the information contained in this app.

title: Freeletics Training Coach ‚Äì Bodyweight & Mindset
description:
Europe‚Äôs #1 fitness app lets you work out anytime, anywhere with the best digital personal trainer - no gym required. Whatever your fitness level, achieve your goals quickly and build healthy habits with personalized HIIT workouts and audio coaching. Losing weight, gaining muscle or improving your fitness has never been so simple. 

WHY FREELETICS? 
- Freeletics means freedom. Work on yourself and your fitness free of excuses like time, equipment, space, money or know-how. Join 42 million others doing their workout whenever and wherever they want. 
- See fast results with the most advanced digital personal trainer and effective HIIT workouts. Your AI personal trainer tailors everything to you, learning from each exercise and piece of feedback to create your perfect workout, every time. No two people get the same workout plan - this is fully personalized fitness.
- We follow a holistic approach to fitness and self-development. We combine HIIT fitness, mindfulness, knowledge and motivation to help you perfect your training and build a strong foundation for life-long positive change.
 
The free version of the app contains 20 HIIT bodyweight workouts, 25 exercises, 20 audio sessions, workout spots and a community of millions. If you want to set yourself up for long-term success with the guidance of a personal trainer every step of the way, you can sign up for the Freeletics Coach with a 14-day money back guarantee. 


What you get by upgrading to the Freeletics Coach:

TRAINING 
- Enjoy your own AI-powered personal trainer, who puts every HIIT workout together based on your experience, goals, fitness level and preferences.
- Travelling or short on time? Need to be quiet? Stuck without equipment or can‚Äôt go for a run? No problem. Tell your personal trainer what‚Äôs going on and it will adapt your workout to suit your needs.
- Your workout plan will be compiled in a ‚ÄúTraining Journey.‚Äù Choose from 20 Training Journeys in the app, each with a different fitness focus. Look out for our limited editions by professional athletes.
- Choose your workout style. Whether it‚Äôs running, bodyweight HIIT or weights in the gym - or a combination of these - there‚Äôs a Training Journey for you. Fitness will never be boring again.
- Progress in your training with thousands of HIIT workout variations and over 180 exercises.

The Training Coach is included in the Training, Training & Nutrition and Body & Mind bundles.


MINDSET
- Add audio coaching to your personal trainer, helping you build a strong, balanced mindset and find lasting motivation to improve your health and fitness. The perfect complement to your HIIT workouts.
- In 5 to 20-minute sessions, learn how to build habits, boost weight loss, de-stress and improve your focus, training, recovery and sleep. The perfect foundation for real success.
- Courses include focus, stress, sleep, fitness, nutrition and motivation.

The Mindset Coach is only included in the Body & Mind bundle.


SUBSCRIPTIONS AND TERMS
We offer 8 auto-renewing subscription options:
- Training (3 / 6 / 12 months)
- Training & Nutrition (3 / 6 / 12 months)
- Body & Mind (3 / 12 months)
 
The Nutrition Coach is part of the Freeletics Nutrition app.

By purchasing, you accept our Terms of Use (https://www.freeletics.com/en/pages/terms/) and Privacy Policy (https://www.freeletics.com/en/pages/privacy/).
 
Contact us at support@freeletics.com or follow @Freeletics on social media for daily workout inspiration. Your personal trainer is ready when you are. Happy training.

recentChanges: We squashed some bugs. Let us know if you find more. Our developers will fix them faster than you can do an Aphrodite.
comments: I went to the gym for years but I have achieved the best shape of my body thanks to this app! It gives you the motivation, discipline and helps you build the proper technique. I would never imagine an app being that much effective. Instead of paying crazy amounts to the gym, you should download this app and enjoy sessions at the comfort of your home or by the sea or in a park

Updates spoilt the workouts. Pull ups became monkey pull ups. Stretches became a bunch of stuff that need equipment such as bars and benches to complete. The main workouts are still good. The demonstration of the workouts became poorer. With more technique required for stretches, I think they need to add a "it was too difficult, I couldn't do it" option. If you don't have the mobility required, it is a matter of just waiting for the time to past.

Really cool app! I enjoy the training so far. The only thing is that you can't say you can't do XY exercise for XY reason. So you're stuck by saying you completed the exercise but you didn't perform well. Or try hitting the "adapt session" button and create a hole new training for the day while I only wanted to change 1 exercise.

Always exactly the same exercises day after day, week after week. Lunges, squats, lunges, squats, reverse lunges, cossack squats... its harrowing to say the least, my knees feel like i may as well be 78 in the shade they click more and more each day because this app thinks that leg day is every f#@$%ng day. Tried a different training journey using weights, and the first thing they asked me to do was, surprise, lunges with the himalayan mountain range resting on my shoulders. Ffs im a beginner.

*FREE*Letics?... So I entered my goals, height, age etc and opted for the free version. I was given a workout programme which looks perfect for what I need (Hybrid Strength), only to then be made to pay to see the exercises and details? Absolute joke

title: Self Cure home remedies for disease and illness
description:
From healing an abscess to treating yeast infection, Self-Cure Home Remedies App provides health information of remedies, reliefs, treatments, procedures, cures and cares for all kinds of disorders, diseases, illness, symptoms, ailments and conditions.

Many treatments are natural cure and home remedy like using herbs, essential oils, nutrition supplements, change of diet and life styles and other nontraditional, alternative medical procedures such as Chinese or Ayurveda medicine, acupuncture, massage, yoga, etc. For each of the listed remedy, it includes general description, usage & dosage details and popularity and effectiveness rating of remedy. It also lets user add and view comments from other to share health knowledge. 

Self-Cure is an online community which its goal is to find remedies, reliefs, treatment, therapies, cures and cares for every condition, disorder, ailment, illness, symptom and disease using the power of knowledge from social networking and data analytics. The short term goal is to build an easy to use platform for users to share health information and use scientific methods to analyze and obtain useful data for consumption. The ultimate goal is to establish a social community offering health related knowledge and promote healthy livings of human being.

This App is a ‚Äúreal‚Äù free App. This is a full featured version with no advertisement. The publisher also has no affiliation or association with any parties that provide health care or materials mentioned in the contents. title: Grocy: Self-hosted Groceries Management
description:
Grocy is a self-hosted groceries and household management solution for your home. Go to grocy.info for more information about the project.

Grocy for Android uses Grocy's official API to provide you a beautiful interface on your phone with powerful barcode scanning and intuitive batch processing, all what you need to efficiently manage your groceries.

This app requires a running self-hosted instance of the grocy server application. It is a companion app, therefore it cannot run standalone or manage products itself!
You can try and test all features using the demo option available on the login screen.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Stock overview
‚Ä¢ Shopping lists with offline support
‚Ä¢ In-store shopping mode with big UI elements
‚Ä¢ Fast barcode scanning
‚Ä¢ Consume and purchase with app shortcuts
‚Ä¢ OpenFoodFacts implementation
‚Ä¢ Master data editing
‚Ä¢ Intuitive batch processing
‚Ä¢ Dark mode

Furthermore:
‚Ä¢ Open-source: github.com/patzly/grocy-android
‚Ä¢ No ads, analytics or in-app purchases
‚Ä¢ Low data usage
‚Ä¢ Animated icons
‚Ä¢ Material Components
‚Ä¢ Tiny app size (~5MB)

Contribution:
If you run into a bug or miss a feature, feel free to give feedback in the app, send us an email or open an issue on GitHub.
Like the grocy project, Grocy Android can be translated, too. Please go to our GitHub page for more information.

Compatibility:
Grocy Android requires at least grocy 2.7.0 on your server.
It is also possible to use the grocy Add-on on a Hass.io server. Our in-app help explains how to do that.

Self-signed certificates are not supported at the moment. Right now, the server certificate has to be signed by a certificate authority (CA). This CA has to be public and trusted by Android.
To meet these requirements, you can use a free certificate from letsencrypt.org for proper https encryption.

We'd like to thank the developer of Grocy, Bernd Bestel, without whose great work this app would never have been possible.
