comments: I have tried many shopping list / pantry management applications in the past few months, and Grocy combined with this application turned out to be the most convenient solution. The shopping mode is awesome, and the barcode scanner - which, for some reason, I thought I would never use - also works really well. And to top it all, this is all open source. I love it. Thank you for creating and maintaining this application!

Please add ability to attach pictures to products. It seems to be supported by the server, but not this app. EDIT: I am not familiar with the API. I take it does not expose ability to upload pictures?

Intuitive to setup and works like a charm. Great helper when dealing with barcodes and Grocy inventory. Offline shopping list support!!! Under active development so new features (and occasional bugs and their fixes) come regularly.
Seems to work well, unfortunately can't use it as the app doesn't seem to like ports other than port 80. Please allow us to change which port is used!
Hi, I cannot connect the app to the server. I have this message : An error occured. URL is ok. I can reach the site via a web browser on the same device. API Key is Valid to. What happened please ?

title: Don't panic - Depression and panic help
description:
The app has sevenbasic modules: depression, anxiety & panic attacks, self-harm, suicidal thoughts, mood monitoring, eating disorder and professional help resources.

The module DEPRESSION contains the WHAT CAN HELP ME feature, including suggestions that could help the user feel better (e.g. exercise, meditation, listening to music, watching videos, drawing, guided relaxation). ACTIVITY PLANNER, which motivates the user to create a to-do list of tasks (check off, edit or delete the accomplished goals anytime) and WHAT MADE ME HAPPY to help the individual focus on the positives of the past day.

The module ANXIETY & PANIC ATTACKS aims on helping the user overcome intense feelings of anxiety and panic attacks. It includes two types of breathing exercises, designed to immediately help the individual to calm down. The first exercise focuses on deep breathing only ‚Äì switching between inhaling and exhaling. The second exercise is focused on the ‚Äöbox breathing‚Äò technique‚Äì full inhale, holding your breath, full exhale and again holding your breath.

Another feature included in this module is COUNTING of simple mathematical equations to help the user focus on something other than the anxious thoughts and physical reactions that accompany each panic attack. The equations are automatically generated and include addition, subtraction and multiplication of numbers 0 to 9, and are immediately corrected. The last feature in this module includes more suggestions on what to do when feeling anxious (e.g. breathing exercise, count from 100 to 0, watch your favourite film etc.)

The module SELF HARM tries to distract from the urges. Once again it provides two breathing exercises. The feature WHAT CAN HELP ME includes suggestions what to do instead of hurting yourself (take an ice-cube or red marker and move it across your skin where you would usually hurt yourself, write down your emotions and describe how you feel and then destroy the piece of paper, scream, exercise or try to diffuse the intense emotions through painting or guided relaxation).

The SUICIDAL THOUGHTS module provides a list of reasons and activities and which could prevent the thoughts or at least show the value of one‚Äòs life. The users create their own EMERGENCY PLANS. The app enables the user to make list of safe activities as an alternative scenario to follow in crisis. The plan includes: who will I contact, what will I say/write, what will I do or where will I go in case of an emergency. It is ideal to create the plan when one is able to think rationally or with the help of another person. This feature also includes a list of people who care about the individual and would potentially be hurt by his actions.

In the REASONS TO STAY ALIVE section, users can create a list of people, things and activities they like or care about enough to stop them from committing suicide. There are a few default entries in the list for users to have an idea what kind of reasons they might put in. And again ‚Äì the breathing exercises are included in the SUICIDAL THOUGHT module.

In the last module ‚Äì PROFESSIONAL HELP RESOURCES ‚Äì there is a list of phone numbers with the option of directly calling the ambulance, hot lines and crisis centres. We also included links to chat rooms in case anyone prefers typing over speaking.

Thank you to Nevypus≈• du≈°i for supporting our app.

The app is open-source with source codes available here: https://github.com/ichlubna/mind

comments: 2 minutes is all you need to distract you from anxious thoughts. The breathing exercises helped me also.
Doesn't help with panic or anxiety to tell us to eat chocolate or do math games. These are only distractions - not the slowing down of the nervous system we need.

I like this app a lot. I would like to see a widget from this app, maybe it can have some positive quotes or motivational fact and statistics, or maybe suggestions like "if you dont feel well maybe a cold glass of ice water will help"

I really enjoy this app. As a person with several mental disorders, I can only recommend it. The colour scheme is nice, there are great advices, exercises are helpful and a lot of them - something for everyone.
It helps me so much! I love this so much, it reminds me that Im not alone and dont have to be afraid to ask for help!

comments: I love this app, but there is so many ads!!! I am using the app less now because of it and I'm now using another app instead, which I admit isn't as good, when i try to read picture quotes a 5 second ad will pop up after every one, haven't experienced any bugs or crashes or app shut down, just an overload of ads, annoying!! I will give it some time, if ads are still an issue, I will probably delete, I wouldn't mind paying for premium, with no ads, but currently not an option.

I love this app. I dont usualky rate apos, but have found this one worthy of a rate. The ads are not to annoying, but the quotes are really amazing, inspiring and very relevant at times üòÇ I love how you can listen to various types of hypnosis' and meditations, whether guided or musical, that cover a varitety if topics. Would definately recommend this app!!

I really enjoy these. The updates have helped with the crashing. I wish those with music would keep repeating like they did briefly but an update stopped that. They have been very helpful to overcome abusive brain washing and help me to better use the law of attraction to change my life. I love it. Thank you!

I use this app pretty much every day. It has a variety of wonderful tools to help me heal and grow. There are options to suit everyone & new content added regularly. All you need to get the most from this app is an open mind and a willingness to change for the better. I am grateful to the developers. I would love to have the option to upgrade to an add free version. The adds really detract from all the wonderful aspects of the app.

Since the update, it crashes during the hypnosis, which makes you have to start over. The ADS omg!! Now I cant even choose the hypnosis I want to listen to because of your ads in the way of very important hypnosis. Very disappointed

Their videos are just unreal...the message is so deep it instantly gets you fired up... subscribed on YouTube as well....well done Team Fearless and thank you

title: Hidden Self Personality Test
description:
Hidden Self is a nonverbal projective personality test based on the Szondi Test, a tool developed by the Hungarian psychiatrist Leopold Szondi in the 20th century.

The aim of the test is to reveal the deepest repressed impulses of a person on the basis of sympathy or aversion caused by the specific photos of psychopaths. Each photo is supposed to be a stimulus apt to detect the psychological drive tendencies of the examinee, from which the main personality traits can surface.

The test is based on the general notion that the characteristics that bother us in others are those that caused aversion to ourselves at an early stage of our life and that‚Äôs why we repress them. The results of test are not permanent, they will be different if your psycho-physical state is changes.

Also Szondi's research and career test showed that profession choices are determined by the dynamic and structure of the psyche.

comments: Take this test, just do it. You will legit be surprised. The accuracy of this test is like what you expect to get from a mind or palm reader that actually could read minds or palms. I learned a lot about myself. Highly Recommend!
The app asks you to rate a certain set of photos and then uses it's analysis to determine your personality. I found it's analysis to be intriguing and accurate. Easy to use and well designed app.

Amazing. It just asked to choose pictures form a set and the results were pere amazing and kind of accurate. I don't know how it did but definitely one should try at least once, you will be surprised.

It's scary that they can point out all the things you are good and bad at with precision Damn app gave me goosebumps But never the less it was easy to use and not time consuming. The only problem is it was made for previous versions of android
Pretty good, but I wish their was a easier-to-read layout at the end. Overall I would recommend this app, as it was pretty accurate

title: Elevate - Brain Training Games
description:
Elevate is a brain training program designed to improve attention, speaking skills, processing speed, memory, math skills, and more. Each person is provided with his or her own personalized training program that adjusts over time to maximize results.

The more you train with Elevate, the more you‚Äôll improve critical cognitive skills that are designed to boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. Users who train at least 3 times per week have reported dramatic gains and increased confidence.

Elevate offers a 7-day free trial as well as a free version. To access the free version, tap the X in the upper left-hand corner after you sign up for an account. 

FEATURES

* 35+ brain games for critical cognitive skills like focus, memory, processing, math, precision, and comprehension 
* Detailed performance tracking 
* Personalized daily workouts that include the skills you need most 
* Adaptive difficulty progression to ensure your experience is challenging 
* Workout calendar to help you track your streaks and stay motivated 
* And more!

IN THE NEWS

CNET
‚ÄúElevate comes out ahead‚Äù in the battle of the brain training apps.

Wall Street Journal
Compared with other brain games, ‚ÄúI prefer Elevate the most.‚Äù

Washington Post
Elevate is a ‚Äúcognitive pick-me-up‚Äù with games that are ‚Äúgood for mental breaks throughout the workday.‚Äù

RESEARCH BEHIND ELEVATE

Elevate's brain games are designed in collaboration with experts in education and are based on proven educational techniques. Elevate‚Äôs brain training algorithms draw from cognitive research in attention and memory studies to develop a personalized training program for each user.

developerAddress: 1390 Market St, Suite 200, San Francisco CA 94102
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ New content added to Commas, Detail, Diction, Extraction, and Processing
‚Ä¢ British and Canadian English support for Transitions
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes and improvements
comments: A useful app, keeps the mind active, although I have two main observations: the first is that the training 'games' are in fact testing your knowledge in relation to 'speed'. All tasks are time sensitive, and you are encouraged to answer or respond to actions in as short as time as possible. I'm sorry, that is not necessarily going to improve an individuals grammar or math in any way. Secondly, there should be a way to choose your level, (or beginner to advanced)

Love it! So good! Currently doing maths and English at college so this in my spare time or just whenever I fancy a little phone time is ideal! Unfortunately I don't wanna buy the full version yet! Quite pricey! But I'm sure i will at some point! Maybe if it had a little monthly subscription I'd be more up for it. But yea, for now I will enjoy the free version until I can splurge out. I'll keep an eye out for a price drop also

I wouldn't necessarily say it is a brain training app, more of what you understand at a point of time. Due to the timer in the games, you never really take in the mistakes you make, so nothing gets retained. Also, some of the games are really boring, I lose interest half way through a lot of the times and I have to restart them.

This is very sophisticated, very artful, beautiful to see, and fun. Good algorithm's for challenging you based on your progress - just enough to keep you egaged and learning without being discouraged. There is a large number of activities . VERY clever design of games. I "train" (play) daily. I have learned things that I have used elsewhere. I am 67 years old too.

This is a really good app! I have to say it's never crashed my phone before and it uses very little battery. However recently I've had to change this review as my training streak had mysteriously disappeared even though I have done my session everyday. It was up to about 130 days so I am hoping you will put it back as I have emailed twice. You said you have replied to me via email however I have not received an email on the dates you have said to have said to have sent one.

recentChanges: Fixes a crash when deleting an entry
comments: Really disappointed waiting over a year for ability to use it on the computer as well. Instead of development for individual browsers. Just make a website so one can prep an entry. From there would be happy to edit on the phone... This really isn't something that should be in the pipeline. It's a must until you can provide individual browsers support.

This is a good Journaling app. It's an amazing one on iOS. There in lies the frustration for most. We see what it can be, and feel almost cheated that the Android version is missing features. Maybe create a Beta version to allow users to test things out for you, or perhaps better communication with your customers here. There should be a clear laid out road map on when features will be included. This is to appease your users, plus hold yourselves accountable. Here's hoping for the best.
The only thing that could make this app better as far as I am concerned is the ability to print books from the Android user face I looked forward to the day when that can happen.

Coming from ios this is completely disappointing. It's almost unusable... can't see myself renewing subscription for such a broken port. I see responses mentioning forming an android team and building s roadmap and having news in two months. Sorry guys it's too little far too late and how you've managed to neglect this product for so long whilst asking people for money to maintain a yearly subscription is beyond me. Extremely poor business sense.

I've used this app for a couple years now. I paid for the annual subscription so that I could store photos. Due an entire year, the subscription cost is completely with it to me. It has some quirks though, like how it has never handled lists with much finesse, and auto detecting when it should capitalize a word on a newline or on a list isn't always correct. Still good overall though at the this time of writing.

title: Life Hack Tips - Daily Tips for your Life
description:
This life tips app is a free and easy-to-use application contains tons of life tips in different categories such as technology tricks, health and drinks, money savers, etc. With these life tips you can learn a lot of knowledge and tricks to make your life easier and happier. You will find this app very helpful, and also you can share the life tips with your classmates, or friends via Facebook, WhatsApp and other social apps easily. Here are some tips for example:

1. Take a sip of coffee before adding sugar, you won't need as much sugar for it to taste as sweet afterwards.
2. Using your phone while it's charging can damage the battery. This is why the cords for chargers are so short.

Core Features: 
‚òÖ Tips with different categories.
‚òÖ Easily browsing tips.
‚òÖ Daily life tips for you to learn them easily.
‚òÖ Beautiful user interface.

Tip Categories:

‚òÖ Technology Tricks
‚òÖ Food and Drinks
‚òÖ Health and Fitness
‚òÖ Money Savers
‚òÖ Life Tips
‚òÖ Party

‚òÖ Travel

‚òÖ Pet Hacks
‚òÖ Car Hacks
‚òÖ Productivity

‚òÖ Clothing Hacks


Just enjoy this app and if you have more life tips and you want the share them with others you can send them to us (email: fireshooters@foxmail.com), and we can add them to this app and help more people.

recentChanges: Stability improvements
comments: Nice idea, could improve. Some of the hacks are common sense, others are really useful. It would be good to have the option to save or pin your favourites in one place. At the moment you'd have to choose the category and go through them all agon to find the one you want. I also don't like that it doesn't link directly to Google play to leave a review, unless you give a thumbs up and say that you're going to give 5 stars so think reviews may be biased.

I love reading the tips. To repeat, some are obvious but some, I cant believe I hadnt thought of them. I have tried many. Im confused on one in the pet tips. It says "Heres recipies for.. " i tried a few things to see if I could be transferred to another place, including sending the tip to myself and opening the app that way. Any recipies? I would lower stars for a few things besides this but I think this app is awesome in general. Research, probably trying everything, I love reading them.

I use this app more often than I'd like to admit lol... My only issues are: #1 I have daily tips turned on but I don't always get a daily tip & #2 when I get a daily tip that's long worded it cuts off & then if I click on view more the app opens to the main categories selection page & then it's hard to find the tip I was reading My ideas for improvement are: #1 Tips should be easier to find & #2 The view more button should open the app to that specific tip/hack Still thanks for a great app!!

Certain Area's and Sections of this application need to be Updated. For Example: the "Self Defense" section of this APP. needs Updating. I will say that I think This is a great app. but it needs to be kept "current" especially with all the similar Competing Apps. that are like your application. Thank You for the work you've done to make this application. üôÇ A few tweaks & Updates and I'd give you 5 üåü's for sure. ( :

It's pretty good,and then you guys can still improve knowing that all the wonderful effort you made putting these marvelous app together will definitely be challenged since many relatively the same apps are in circulation, thus the need for improvement on certain areas such as self defense among others. Well-done and God bless.

title: Relax & Sleep Well: Hypnosis and Meditation
description:
Glenn Harrold is a very experienced therapist and the recordings are high quality, professional studio productions that initiate deep, healing transformations in users.

There is no sign up required, just instant access to four free hypnotherapy and meditation recordings and a choice of over 110 in-app purchase options covering insomnia, stress, anxiety, mindfulness, sleep, weight-loss, confidence, self-esteem, the solfeggio frequencies, binaural beats, spiritual healing, phobias, addictions and much more. 

All recordings are high quality professional studio productions. Glenn records each meditation through a Neumann U87 microphone and the very best analog to digital converters.  

The app includes a playlist feature, a manage storage feature to control the size of the app and an easy to navigate interface with detailed descriptions for each title. 
All enquiries and support issues are replied to within 24 hours.

Relax & Sleep Well is now helping well over 3 million people to sleep well every night!
Download Now to find out why this app has been number 1 in over 50 countries!

Relax & Sleep Well Free by Glenn Harrold was placed 1st in Healthline‚Äôs list of the Best Insomnia Apps of 2019! "Healthline‚Äôs editors carefully selected each winner based on quality, usability and contribution to the community." 

The free tracks include Relax & Sleep Well, which is a full 29-minute hypnotherapy session that will take you on a relaxing journey into the deepest levels of self-hypnosis. The subtle soundscapes supporting Glenn‚Äôs calming voice will help you connect with a profound feeling of relaxation and mindfulness. It will also help you to alleviate stress and anxiety, overcome insomnia and encourage healthy sleep patterns. 

The next free track is a 30-minute lite version of the stunning 639 Hz Solfeggio Sonic Meditation, which is based upon the ancient Solfeggio musical scale. When you experience this powerful healing meditation it will give you an idea of what the full range of Solfeggio Meditation titles sound like. Overcome insomnia stress and sleep well with this dreamy, relaxing meditation recording.

The latest free track is a lite version of the Mindfulness Meditation for Releasing Anxiety. This meditation will put you in a very present state and help you to feel mindful.

This app also includes Glenn's free guide to self-hypnosis eBook, which shows you how to use self-hypnosis to help you in many areas of your life. 

Glenn is one of the world's most successful hypnotherapists. His recordings have sold millions and he is a published author of 7 self-help health books. 

On each hypnosis recording you will hear special background sound effects, which have been recorded in specific keys and frequencies to help guide you into a deep state of mental and physical relaxation. At the deepest point in the session you are given a number of post-hypnotic affirmations and direct suggestions to help you with the healing process relating to the title of the recording.

You will also hear a number of background affirmations, which echo and pan from left to right across the stereo range. This deeply relaxing and powerful method of delivering multiple suggestions simultaneously to the unconscious mind can facilitate positive changes very quickly.

All of Glenn's Hypnosis and Meditation Recordings Feature:

‚Ä¢ The very latest hypnosis, mindfulness, healing and meditation methods combined with state-of-the-art recording technology.
‚Ä¢ Glenn's highly acclaimed hypnotic vocal techniques guiding you into a deeply relaxed state.
‚Ä¢ Background sound effects recorded in specific musical keys and frequencies to compliment the hypnotic suggestions and deepen the relaxation effect.
‚Ä¢ Stereo-echoed affirmations, which pan from ear-to-ear across the stereo range - a deeply relaxing and unique effect.

Glenn has 20 years of hypnotherapy experience and has worked with many celebrity clients.

comments: Best app of its kind. I initially got the app for binaural beats and have slowly built up my inventory. I've been using Glenn's meditations for about 2 yrs now and love every one. I've notice improvement in any area I use these for with nightly, consistent use. Highly recommend for inner balance and higher quality of mind and life.

Thats fantastic, it would be nice to have more of a selection of like binaural tracks and meditation music you can play after a hypnosis track. And I wish the tracks were a little cheaper because I won't run my bill up hundreds to download the entire content but I am very interested in hearing them..

I use this app all the time it works I do have a request though. It would be much better.. When you select to repeat your selection over and over;. please fix it so it doesn't start with disclaimer for driving while listening or descrobing what you expect.. I'm usally relaxed or asleep at that point and it startles me when it starts over. If repeat is selected I suggest forwarding it to a soothing point of the session. 5 stars if done. Thanks either way love your work.

I made a Playlist of important tracks followed by the relaxation and sleep track with a sleep ending. I am a worrier and have never been good at falling asleep. However, I have noticed a huge improvement in my sleep habits. I will be sharing this app with my team of doctors because one had asked me who I use. I'm really pleased with the app! The price isn't bad, either. I bought a few hypnosis CDs, too. These tracks are more effective and cheaper than the CDs.

This app gives a wonderful feeling with all its musical effects and suggestions.. My heart rate was reduced considerably at the end of session which means am getting really relaxed. I heard some of them were not able to listen to the complete audio as they fell asleep within 10 mins. Keep doing good job.

title: Control Your Mind
description:
Learn to take control of your mind and hence control your own life and your destiny.  Control your mind through self-hypnosis. Learn how your mind works so that you gain mastery over it. Read through ten very informative chapters that can change your life if you decide to master it. Soon, you will be able to program your mind to achieve only good things in life.

Through mind control, develop the ability to do the following:

# develop your talents
# become rich and successful
# improve your memory
# increase your physical stamina
# overcome your phobia
# overcome your addiction
# manage your health
# reduce stress
And many, many more!

‚ÄúTHE BIGGEST BLOCK TO ANY MAN‚ÄôS SUCCESS IS FOUND IN HIS HEAD‚Äù

Keywords:
Power of the mind, power of the subconscious mind, self-hypnosis, mind over matter, brain power, mind control positive affirmations, law of attraction, secrets of the mind, mind mastery, brain power

recentChanges: A new update is released to improve user experience.
comments: I so wish this would have worked for me! When I try to go on to this app and press open 1 through 10 I had tried all of them and it would switch me over into an ad which they were all for Penn state and then it would say it could not open the file so either this app is a hoax just trying to get all my information or something was seriously wrong because I do believe I'm updated and everything :( So sad because I was really looking forward to learning about this subject & more about myself too!!

so far so good. I'm disappointed it is an ebook. I would live to be able to open it in audible so I could listen on my hour long commute. maybe an option for an update? even a computerized reader would be nice. thanks!
It's the best app I have ever installed. I recommend it for all who desire to improve their brain power capacity.

it has very great content. But I wanted yo know the authors more. kindly add a tab for their information. Also, the swiping to turn the page is a little bit annoying. can you make it so that one tap can turn the page?
l was enjoying this book until half way through the third chapter. After closing the book and then opening again it says pdf file not found, even after the recent update...

title: Rently Self-Guided Tours
description: Rently is an innovative app that helps renters look for and view apartments and homes for rent on your own through our pioneering self-guided tours, agent tours, rental listings, online property matching, application and more.
descriptionHTML: Rently is an innovative app that helps renters look for and view apartments and homes for rent on your own through our pioneering self-guided tours, agent tours, rental listings, online property matching, application and more.
summary: Apartments & Homes for Rent
recentChanges: Fixed ID upload issue.
comments: Awesome idea and very convenient tool for self touring, just poor execution on functionality. Wife and I used to use it often without issues, but recently I made another account and when I try to enter a property im told my account is suspended for suspicious activity? On the same day I made it?? Anyways, wife downloaded it on her phone and it wouldn't send the code to her #. Tried to contact customer service and got no help there either.

The ability to tour houses on your own time is great. Good selection, at least in a metro area. App has some bugs but overall works well. Knocked off a star because I got randomly locked out of my account when trying to tour houses. Have to wait 72 hours because of "suspicious activity" with no way to speed up the approval.

Concept is cool, implementation and customer service are a disaster. Went to a property, had a rently account asked for I'd photos. App had no method to input them. Try their customer service chat, they told me to download the rently app that I was texting them on. Tried to call their customer service number, was told to simply email them tried their sales line, got a repeat message of" you have reached the sales office" I lost money today, and it is because of rently.

Requires photo ID and matching selfie and won't let you upload them. Did all troubleshooting and submitted a support request and they said they fixed it and it still had the same problem. I had others try and they had the same problem. This app is garbage.

Property Management companies should be cautious. Rently has too many errors. It's extremely frustrating. I spent hours with tech support, being told they reset my account...and continue to have the same problems.I used Rently on 3 different phones. I was relocating and drove 6.5 hours 2x to view a house before I could apply. Rently told me to contact the leasing company...Mainstreet Renewals referred me back to Rently. I opted to use an agency not associated with Rently.

title: Goodbudget: Budget & Finance
description:
Goodbudget (formerly EEBA, the Easy Envelope Budget Aid) is a money manager and expense tracker that‚Äôs great for home budget planning. This personal finance manager is a virtual update on your grandma‚Äôs envelope system--a proactive budget planner that helps you stay on top of your bills and finances. Built for easy, real-time tracking. And, sync across Android, iPhone, and the web to share your budget with your budgeting partners. Keep everyone on the same page with household finances!


The best income and expense tracking tool. Ever. Yup.

Not yet convinced?

‚Ä¢ Recommended by Experts. Google. The New York Times. Forbes. LifetimeTV. Boston Globe. About.com, Lifehacker, the Register, Verizon Wireless, Leave Debt Behind, yada yada yada.
‚Ä¢ Top quality. Ranked #3 in App Quality across ALL finance apps in both major app stores. [1]
‚Ä¢ Downloaded over 3,000,000 times

And loved by users everywhere
...which, after all, is what matters most‚Ä¶

CHOCK FULL OF FEATURES

SYNC ACROSS MULTIPLE DEVICES (AND WEB)
‚Ä¢ Automagically syncs across Android, iPhone, and the web
‚Ä¢ Stay on the same page about finances with loved ones
‚Ä¢ Data is automatically and securely backed up to Goodbudget‚Äôs website

PERSONAL FINANCIAL MANAGER FOR LIFE ON-THE-GO
‚Ä¢ Expense tracking optimized for speed!
‚Ä¢ Check Envelope & Account balances
‚Ä¢ Save for the future with Goal and Annual Envelopes
‚Ä¢ Scheduled transactions and Envelope fills
‚Ä¢ Split expense transactions
‚Ä¢ Save time with smart payee and category suggestions
‚Ä¢ Easily transfer funds between Envelopes and Accounts
‚Ä¢ Search for transactions
‚Ä¢ Add income
‚Ä¢ Choose budget period to match real-life
‚Ä¢ Add and edit Accounts
‚Ä¢ Location-based widget! Enter common transactions in exactly 3 touches. Control in Settings. (Note: widget will not be available if you move app to SD due to Android limitation)
‚Ä¢ Edit budget as needed!

INSIGHTFUL REPORTS
‚Ä¢ Analyze spending with Spending by Envelope Report
‚Ä¢ Monitor cashflow with Income vs. Spending Report

ALSO ON THE WEB
‚Ä¢ Download transactions to CSV
‚Ä¢ Bank account statement import in QFX (Quicken) and OFX (Microsoft Money) formats with auto-matching to manually entered transactions
‚Ä¢ Clear/reconcile transactions
‚Ä¢ Even more reports!

BASED ON PROVEN ENVELOPE SYSTEM
‚Ä¢ No physical envelopes...only virtual ones!
‚Ä¢ Roll unused funds over to the new month to reward your amazing self-control!
‚Ä¢ Plan finances ahead of time to keep budget on track
‚Ä¢ Live within your means
‚Ä¢ A darn cute envelope mascot

Ad-free, Free Forever version includes 10 regular envelopes & 10 annual envelopes. Use envelope budgeting to plan your spending, not just track it!

SUBSCRIBERS GET MORE FEATURES!

‚Ä¢ Unlimited Envelopes AND Accounts
‚Ä¢ Sync up to 5 devices
‚Ä¢ 7 years of transaction history
‚Ä¢ Personal and friendly email support

Looking for a finance manager, money tracker, checkbook ledger, or household budget planner? Try us out!

Goodbudget: Budget well. Live life. Do good.

Features, bugs? Please email us at support@goodbudget.com! We're happy to help!

[1] https://goodbudget.com/2018/04/goodbudget-top-finance-app/

1224 Fairfax Avenue
San Francisco, CA 94124
USA
recentChanges: Notes can now be viewed, created, and edited on Transfer transactions. Transactions connected to deleted Envelopes and Accounts now appear in the Reports.
comments: I have now been using this app for 7 or 8 years (back when it was EEBA). I absolutely love it. My husband and I have it on our phones and can easily look and make wise decisions financially. We also have our own envelopes that we can spend money out of without talking to each other. That makes it nice when you just want to pick something up at the craft store. We literally saved over $30,000 and paid off our house in 7 years. Thanks!
Only online. No offline options. Sync issues. Outdated UI. Many features missing.
I downloaded subscription, deleted, and then decided to try again, and my phone says I resubscribed, but when I put in my email it says no account exists. üò©
Very useful envelope budget. Very good.

It's seems like a decent app that will help me budget. Many positives, but one major problem... When I try to schedule the filling of the envelopes in advance, it shows the envelope fill and deposit right away. For example, I put in 8/6 as the date for the paycheck and envelope fill, but it shows immediately in my checking balance and envelopes. Why have the option for a future date if it shows it immediately? This will make reconciling my checking account with the app's balance more difficult.

title: BetterMe: Meditation & Sleep
description:
Meditation for people who can‚Äôt meditate!
Take just a few minutes out of each day to bring yourself to a state of calm and wellness and balance your life using a combination of guided meditations and mindfulness techniques. The techniques are a simple, practical relaxation method for anyone.

You will learn to manage the stress in your life and improve your overall health using a tool you always carry with you: your breathing. The deep breathing exercises we present in our app stem from the Pranayama approach. Pranayama is a Sanskrit word referring to regulating your breathing for health benefits. It is an ancient Indian practice which is broken into 3 phases of breath manipulation. The phases are inhalation, retention, and exhalation.

A 2014 study in the ‚ÄòJournal of Diagnostic Research‚Äô showed a connection between both slow and fast pranayama and reduced stress and improved overall cognition including attention, retention, and speed tasks combining vision and physical action, like video games.

With our app, you will have the opportunity to set goals for yourself like reducing your stress and anxiety, sleeping better, and improving your concentration. You will work to meet these goals by personalizing your program based on your mood and using the daily mindfulness meditations provided.

If you‚Äôre looking for ways to be in better control or your stress and anxiety and have a more positive outlook, our app will help you. Maybe you‚Äôve tried other mindfulness apps with no success. It‚Äôs time to try BetterMe. Our app is a simple and manageable solution to beginning the journey to managing your stress and changing your outlook, and all you need to do is engage in our 3-minute meditations.

Rather than try to force yourself to focus for long periods of time, which is difficult, especially if you‚Äôre new to meditation, BetterMe provides short but effective science-backed meditations, which are personalized on a daily basis to increase your happiness. You have the choice to engage in guided meditations according to your mood or allow yourself to be freer and enjoy the fun, unguided meditations using sounds from nature.

Let BetterMe accompany you on your journey to managing your stress and anxiety.

Why You Should Choose BetterMe: with just 5 minutes each day, you will improve your quality of life by relieving stress and improving focus.

Benefits of BetterMe: Meditation

‚Ä¢    Improved clarity and focus throughout your day.
‚Ä¢    Stress and anxiety reduction helps you stay calm and relaxed.
‚Ä¢    Better sleep leads to less stress and anxiety.
‚Ä¢    Broader perspective and deeper self-awareness.
‚Ä¢    Improve leadership skills.
‚Ä¢    Deeper and more natural breathing.
‚Ä¢    Enhance mindfulness in all situations.
‚Ä¢    Winding down at the end of the day becomes easier.
‚Ä¢    Develop your listening skills.
‚Ä¢    Face obstacles in a calm and clear manner.
‚Ä¢    Enjoy improved relationships.
‚Ä¢    Feel happier, calmer, and more relaxed overall.

developerAddress: FLORINIS 7, GREG TOWER, 2ND FLOOR, 1065, NICOSIA, CYPRUS
recentChanges: Small product improvements.
comments: I started and got very aggravated immediately. The guided meditations are extremely rushed. There is no break in the talking to allow you to find the "safe" place she is talking about, or to take the second deep breath before she is on to the next topic. Far from relaxing. SLOW DOWN that is the point. There are better meditation apps available. Don't waste your money on this one. Disappointed üòû

There's just not a lot of variety when it comes to the content. I expected way more when you sign up for a subscription. Also, for what you DO get, the meditation are average at best...... Money wasted üòï

Love meditating! This app really helps me focus on the meditation as it guides you through the process for each one. I do however, think that the prices are very costly and I am on low income budget. As traditional medications either do not work, have too many interactions with other medications, and having extreme adverse reactions to medication, I do use meditation and other integrative therapies. Also, I would like to see muscle relaxation meditations.
Wish there was ZERO STAR option. Terrible business. Created a "plan" for me and once I paid to get said plan, the plan needed me to buy EXTRAS to access "plan"!!! SCAM. SHAM. SHAME ON YOU!!
Very calming, and I enjoy the fact that it's timed and they walk you through the whole meditation!

title: Water Time Drink Tracker & Reminder
description:
Main features of our reminder app:
üíß Tracker and diary of drink‚Äôs intake
üíß Simple and comfortable interface 
üíß Caffeine rules
üíß Reminder with alarm
üíß Record your daily water intake
üíß Free drink constructor

‚ùóThe app now supports Wear OS.

Do you drink enough water daily?
Do you need to track and record your water intake?
Do you need a reminder or alarm to keep your daily hydration?

Water tracker ¬´Water Time¬ª will remind you to drink water in time. Friendly assistant will motivate you to drink water regularly. Proper hydration will keep body and skin healthy and help you in lose weight process. You just need to enter your current weight and our reminder app will automatically calculate the amount of water you need per day. Remember, drink water is a good habit!
We‚Äôve made this reminder for busy people. Our simple tracker will remind you to drink pure water at a time that you set yourself. Don‚Äôt worry, we will not bother you at night ‚Äì the reminder sleeps with you. Besides water, you can track also other drinks ‚Äì tea, coffee, juice, milk. Or create your own drink!

What can daily water intake do for you?
üíß Maintain the level of hydration
üíß Improve health and metabolism
üíß Clear your skin
üíß Help you to lose weight ‚Äì water is calorie free
üíß Improve your mood

Drink water, unleash the power of aqua, because your health is worth it! And our reminder ¬´Water Time¬ª will help with this :3

developerAddress: Russian Federation, Saint Petersburg, 5-ya Sovietskaya st. 19
recentChanges:
Friends! Despite all the "surprises" of 2020, we continue to improve the app:
- redesigned the opening;
- corrected the calculation of the daily water allowance;
- fixed notifications;
- fixed minor bugs.
Wash your hands often and don't forget to drink water! Stay healthy :3
comments: The app is easy to use and intuitive, the assistants are very cute and the free version of the app is super ok. This app really helped me with drinking more water.
Encourages you to drink more which in turn helps in weight loss especially if you are already dieting or following an eating plan. All drinks can be logged including hot drinks.
Love it even with the free version üòÉ I dont personally see many ads so that's a plus for sure. It definitely helps to keep me motivated to drink water more often an stay on track

I thought the app was awesome when I first got it and was more than happy to pay to unlock extra features. Now I've come back to using it after a break and found that despite paying for the additional features I now no longer have them and have to wait to unlock them. Cool app, but if I pay for a feature I should keep it, even if you update the way the app works.
App was nice until they've changed the subscription to a monthly one. I've previously paid for the full version only to have it revoked with their new subscription system.

title: Life Changing Secrets of Success
description:
200 Secrets of Success & the Pillars of Self-Mastery by Robin S. Sharma 


If you are interested in achieving happiness and success Download this app!


Note: This app is FREE

The Top 200 Secrets of Success and the Pillars of Self-Mastery by Robin S. Sharma (you might remember his book, ‚ÄúThe Monk Who Sold His Ferrari‚Äù), is a wonderful list of practical ideas that you can incorporate into your own daily life.

The booklet has 200 top actions to support living a more focused, relaxed and powerful life.


The world has changed greatly over time and still continues to change today. However, some things remain the same, such as key tips for lasting happiness and success. If you are interested in achieving happiness and success, then you should know some of the key daily habits and tips of truly happy and successful people that have timeless application. Here are the top daily tips of successful people that can make you truly happy and successful if you apply them in your own life.

What‚Äôs the secret to success?

How to Be Successful and Satisfied?
Always be positive. Think Success, not Failure. Beware of a negative environment.

How many times have you heard somebody claim they know ‚Äòthe secret of success‚Äô only to find out somebody else has another secret completely different from the last secret you heard?
 Which secret is right? Who knows THE REAL secret? ‚Ä¶ is there ‚Äòa real‚Äô secret? If so, just how many secrets are out there?! But most importantly, who‚Äôs secret advice do we follow to ensure our personal success??

Download the secrets to success to learn more!

The secret to success:
Do what you say you‚Äôre going to do.
No need to read any further really.

Secrets of Success is not one single, pithy tip. The ‚Äúsecret of success,‚Äù if there is one, is that success is brought about by a combination of smart habits, a tenacious spirit, and a whole lot of luck. Making a few conscious changes to your behavior and attitude could prove to quite rewarding.


Why delay? Start downloading the application Secrets of Success and share it with your near and dear ones. Feel free to review and rate the app. It will certainly help us to upgrade our app.

comments: The moment I set my eyes on the 1st lines of chapter 1, I felt like swallowing the whole book at once I couldn't stop myself from reading, even though I rushed through and did not finish I already feel like doing the first step an so on...its just a shame i didnt read the introduction but il go there you know.. i feel alive already like my life is gonna change to victory

It is a really nice, inspiring and motivational app to change up your life and make it a successful and the best life of yours. All must download this app, it has ever topic that how to change and make it a better life.. Every topic or theme has its own power to Ek-knowledge our mind thinkings. Everything is there inspiring and motivating quotes by APJ. Abdul Kalam, Swami Vivekananda and many more . Habits that can change up our behaviour.. I hope you have got my words ... I am really inspired.

title: Timo Kids Routine Timer - from Morning to Evening
description:
* No more morning or evening chaos. No shouting!

With Timo's help, parents and children can create and maintain healthy habits, routines and activities that organize their child's daily schedule - morning, afternoon and evening.

* Children and parents enjoy dynamic timers that are visual, audible and fun!

Rewards will keep your children motivated and on task. The end result? More opportunities to spend quality time between parent and child/ren. 

Easy to use, intuitive ... and did we say fun?!

* With Timo as your friend, you can:
   -  Tackle To-Do lists with ease.
   -  Create a visual list of activities for parent and child.
   -  Set countdown alarms for all routine tasks that are challenging and fun to beat.
   -  Drag, drop and rearrange tasks to suit your family rhythm.
   -  Keep an ongoing record of successes and suggestions to improve.

* Children LEARN & PRACTICE to:
   -  Organize their activities
   -  Focus on one thing a time
   -  Practice healthy habits
   -  Finish on time
   -  Self-care
   -  Help others
   -  Take Responsibility

* Get started for FREE today.

The Timo timer is fun for children to race. But most importantly the Timo timer helps free up time for you and your children to spend together.

Can you say quality time instead of struggling to get simple things done?

* Bonus:

Enjoy FREE weekly newsletters with advice on best practices for using Timo from experienced parents... and other parents just like you! 

TIMO will offer tips and best practices for your family. You will learn from others who share their stories. 

You can interact with the Timo team by emailing us anytime at timo@withtimo.com. We read EVERY email.

* About us:

We are real people here at Timo. We feel the same pain and the same joys that you do. Our team is made up of professional educators. 

We also face in our daily lives with our own children the same struggles as you. We have parents on our team who have raised their children and share richly from their own experiences. 

The TIMO team loves our users. We want you and your children to be happy in your daily routines and activities.

title: Online Therapy, Emotional diary, Mindfulness tools
description:
Online therapy for anxiety, depression, stress and couples with top psychologists.

ifeel: THERAPY FOR OUR TIMES 
ifeel helps people overcome the challenges of everyday life with the support of licensed and specialised online psychologists. Something worrying you or creating feelings of anxiety or depression? Going through a tough time in your relationship? Is your self-esteem a bit low lately? Are your work or studies a source of stress? At ifeel you‚Äôll find the help you need and deserve. We created ifeel so everyone can have access to the best personalised, professional, affordable and confidential psychological online therapy.

GREAT PSYCHOLOGISTS, TINY PRICES
Psychological support can be crucial during many periods of our life. For this reason at ifeel we want you to have access to professional help whenever you may need it: it‚Äôs a bit like having your licensed psychologist in your pocket. You‚Äôll be able to talk to your dedicated psychologist through a chat or videocall - whatever works best for you - anytime and anywhere.
Online psychology allows connecting everyone with the professional that is best suited for their individual needs, increasing the possibility of a successful therapy process. At ifeel we think everyone deserves dedicated and customised attention. You can subscribe to our online therapy plans from ‚Ç¨ 24.99/week and start your therapy right away. Online therapy offers more convenience, higher flexibility and much more affordable prices. You won‚Äôt need to worry about scheduling a session, commuting or arranging your day around a face-to-face meeting with your psychologist.

HOW IT WORKS
At ifeel we believe therapy should be an ongoing and seamless process. Once you are assigned your dedicated therapist, you will enter an online therapy ‚Äúvirtual room‚Äù created specifically for you. This room will be open 24 hours a day and is a completely private and confidential space, where only you and your personal psychologist will be able to communicate. This is the virtual space where you and your dedicated therapist will work together to achieve your objectives.
All the professionals on our platform are licensed psychologists with years of experience in online therapy. They undergo a rigorous selection process and receive periodical training. They also constantly attend supervision and follow-up sessions.

HOW CAN ifeel HELP ME?
Our online psychologists have helped our patients in these areas:
‚òÜ therapy to overcome depression without medication
‚òÜ therapy to learn how to deal with anxiety (e.g. social anxiety, phobias, panic attacks, etc.)
‚òÜ solve relationship issues with our couples therapy
‚òÜ relaxation techniques to manage and relieve stress
‚òÜ techniques to improve your social skills and effective communication
‚òÜ methods for self-improvement and many more‚Ä¶

NOT READY FOR THERAPY YET?
Asking for help takes courage. If you‚Äôre still not ready to take the step and need a little help you can start by using our free tools. We offer a vast array of free exercises to reduce stress, control anxiety, different relaxation techniques, a breathing assistant, relevant blog articles and mindfulness exercises. All the tools are designed by licensed, clinical psychologists with the aim of supporting you throughout the day-to-day challenges. All the tools are completely free and for you to use at your own convenience.

CONTACT
Any questions or feedback? Please reach us at info@ifeelonline.com. We will always try to get back as quickly as possible.

title: Depression Test
description:
This Depression Test is designed to help you evaluate the severity of your depression with just nine simple questions. This app uses the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9), an empirically-based, self-test questionnaire. Clinical depression is a mood disorder in which feelings of sadness, loss, anger, or frustration interfere with everyday life for weeks or longer. Clinical depression generally responds positively to treatment, so it is important to seek treatment if you are concerned about your mental health. 

New Feature: Keep your results private with a passcode lock! 

DISCLAIMER: This self-test is not meant to be a diagnosis for your depression. Remember that this app should not be used as a replacement for professional treatment or guidance.

[1] Kroenke, K., Spitzer, R. L., & Williams, J. B. W. (2001). The PHQ-9: Validity of a brief depression severity measure. J Gen Intern Med, 16, 606-613.

--
Want more? 
Depression Test is one of six components of an application suite called MoodTools. MoodTools aims to create a free, convenient, and easy-to-use Android smartphone application suite that provides empirically-supported tools to combat clinical depression on a large scale.

comments: Love this app. I started using Joseph's hypnosis app fine years ago with the onset of severe panic attacks that were disabling my life and ability to function. I also use therapy and mindfulness to manage my mental health along with the app. Years later I still use and recommend to everyone.

I love the hypnosis tracks, but they don't play correctly. I can't play them through my audible account and the Google music freaks out whenever I try to turn off my screen. I didn't have this problem until about a year ago and it really makes this hard to use.
Tried the 2 of the free audios which are very good. But none of the audio from the Free Tab will download, keeps saying not enough free space, check sd card.
I've been using it for years! I recommend to all my friends who are dealing with stress along with all my high school students especially now dealing with the covid 19 pandemic.

I was very impressed with the free trial sessions so I bought some of the longer sessions. Yesterday the app started crashing repeatedly and I have been unable to listen to purchased sessions. Very frustrating...... However, having contacted Joseph Clough by e-mail I received a response very quickly with a suggested fix.

title: Self Motivation
description:
*** Self motivation is the incentive that drives you to act, and leads to success. Self motivation means self-provocation for action and improvement. How will you motivate yourself? Find tips in our application for motivate your self. *** 


If you want to make things happen the ability to motivate yourself and others is a crucial skill. At work, home, and everywhere in between, people use motivation to get results. Motivation requires a delicate balance of communication, structure, and incentives.

Some people are capable of many great things but really struggle to follow through unless they are being "pushed". With them the motivation is external and most of the time they're looking for someone else to keep them going. A much more empowering way would be for them to learn some of the techniques for self motivation and that way they would not only achieve more but they would have a far stronger sense of achievement.

Self motivation tips application will help you to develop some of the internal skills that lead to you achieving much more in life.

**************
Features
**************

1) Great list of Self Motivation Tips.

2) User-Friendly Navigation

3) Email any Tips to your friends and relatives.





We are constantly working on making the content and functionality of our apps better. We are always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please share with us at: http://apps-ticket.com

Completely fallen in love with Self-help audiobooks. More people need to connect with these literary classics,...full of the much needed wisdom to help better humanity! Thank youüòä

title: Anger Management Quotes
description:
Amazing collection of Motivational and Inspirational Quotes for Anger Management.  Quote reminder (Daily quote notifications) is the simplest and most powerful tools for mental growth. It‚Äôs all about keeping the right thoughts top of mind from the get-go every day, so they‚Äôre readily available on those hard days when you need them most.

Whether you're going through hard times, need an extra push to get stuff done, or like sharing inspirational quotes in social media, Motivation has you covered.

Share the uplifting message of the day with your friends, or use the image for Instagram or as a wallpaper.

The app includes a wide range of topics such as self-esteem, relationships and dealing with stress, as well as a selection of carefully designed themes to choose from - updated every hour.

+ Set Motivational Reminders throughout the Day
+ Save your Favorite Quotes
+ Filter Quotes by Category
+ Search quotes
+ Save directly to the device
+ Beautiful quotes to uplift your mood
+ High+quality chakra videos to meditate
+ Beautiful wallpapers
+ Stress relief
+ Anger management
+ Helps with anxiety


No sign ups. A clean interface to help us keep the experience soothing for you.

Anger and depression are more closely related than you think, and losing anger can now make it more difficult to overcome depression later. Learning to control your depression often depends, in part, on how you can control your anger.

How anger management quotes can help you?

You might think that venting your anger is healthy, that the people around you are too sensitive, that your anger is justified, or that you need to show your fury to get respect. But the truth is that anger is much more likely to damage your relationships, impair your judgment, get in the way of success, and have a negative impact on the way people see you. That‚Äôs where anger management comes in.

The goal of anger management?

Many people think that anger management is about learning to suppress your anger. But never getting angry is not a good goal. Anger is normal, and it will come out regardless of how hard you try to tamp it down. The true goal of anger management isn‚Äôt to suppress feelings of anger but rather to understand the message behind the emotion and express it in a healthy way without losing control. When you do, you‚Äôll not only feel better, you‚Äôll also be more likely to get your needs met, be better able to manage conflict in your life, and strengthen your relationships.

The app provides users with education about anger, opportunities for finding support, the ability to create an anger management plan, anger tracking, and tools to help manage angry reactions.

+ Anger Management For Teens
+ Coping Skills For Anger
+ How To Deal With Frustration
+ How To Deal With Angry People
+ Anger Management Guide
+ Anger Management Techniques
+ Anger Management Exercises
+ How To Control Anger Outbursts
+ How To Control Anger And Stress
+ How To Deal With Anger
+ How To Release Anger
+ Anger Management Tips
+ How To Control Your Emotions
+ Anger Management For Kids
+ Anger Management Therapy
+ How To Stop Being Angry
+ How To Calm Down When Angry

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We‚Äôre here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced‚Äîthere are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as ‚ÄúWorks with Google Fit‚Äù,‚ÄúTop Developer‚Äù,‚ÄúClear Your MindÔºå Engage Your Body‚Äù, ‚ÄúKeep Calm & Carry On‚Äù in Google Play, 
Voted as‚Äù Best Yoga App‚Äù of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the ‚Äú5 Addictive Fitness Apps‚Äù.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal‚Ä®
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don‚Äôt like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits¬†
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it!‚Ä®

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.
3. New Courses in November: Winter Energy Flow-Intermediate Element Yoga, Easy Morning Yoga.
Monthly Golden Day, Thanksgiving, and Black Friday are coming!
comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. üò≠

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

title: Mind - Expand Your Consciousness
description:
Learn the life-changing skills in just a few minutes a day with the Mind. Find lessons and tools on astral projection, lucid dreaming, remote viewing, dreams, meditation, subconscious and more. Download Mind to expand your consciousness and explore your spiritual and psychic self beyond your wildest imagination!

LEARN
Learn about many different topics about the body, spirit and the Mind, with the help of our 5-minute lessons.

PRACTICE
We have a set of tools that will help you practice and improve your psychic and spiritual skills - from intuition to lucid dream and so much more!

EXPERIENCE
Keep a detailed track of all your dreams, lucid dreams, psychic visions, spiritual experiences, astral projection and more with the help of our journal and see how you improve over time.

TOOLS
* Create Your OBE Technique
* Meditation Tracker
* Habit Assistant
* Lucid Dream Reminders & Reality Checks
* ESP Trainer
* Shamanic Journey
* Daily Practice Targets
* Ideogram Drill
* Vocabulary Trainer

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
* Daily Journal
* Detailed Stats

TOPICS
* Meditation - learn to calm your mind and body while having lucidity, a must-learn for all spiritual and psychic exploration
* Dreams - a reality created by our subconscious mind, without lucidity
* Lucid Dream - a dream in which you become aware you are dreaming
* Out-of-Body Experience - OBE, astral projection, astral travel - separating spirit from the body, while maintaining lucidity
* Extrasensory Perception - ESP, intuition, being psychic
* Remote Viewing - a scientific psychic (ESP) protocol that anyone can learn.
* Shamanic Journey - ancient spiritual practice of traveling to the spirit (or astral) world
* Psychic Healing - heal yourself and others using the mind alone
* Afterlife - what happens with our spirit at the end?
* Spirituality - non-material spirit is part of who you are
* Religion - all religions are built on the spiritual knowledge and astral projection (OBE) of their leaders

Mind is free to download and use. There are no ads. Part of the features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription.

title: The 48 Laws of Power
description:
The 48 Laws of Power is the first book by American author Robert Greene.
The 48 Laws of Power is the first book by American author Robert Greene. The book is a bestseller, selling over 1.2 million copies in the United States.
Law 1:  Never Outshine the Master.
Law 2: Never put too Much Trust in Friends, Learn how to use Enemies.
Law 3 : Conceal your Intentions.
Law 4: Always Say Less than Necessary.
Law 5: So Much Depends on Reputation ‚Äì Guard it with your Life.
Law 6: Court Attention at all Cost.
Law 7: Get others to do the Work for you, but Always Take the Credit.
Law 8: Make other People come to you ‚Äì use Bait if Necessary.
Law 9: Win through your Actions, Never through Argument.
Law 10: Infection: Avoid the Unhappy and Unlucky.
Law 11: Learn to Keep People Dependent on You.
Law 12: Use Selective Honesty and Generosity to Disarm your Victim.
Law 13: When Asking for Help, Appeal to People‚Äôs Self-Interest,
Never to their Mercy or Gratitude
Law 14: Pose as a Friend, Work as a Spy.
Law 15 : Crush your Enemy Totally.
Law 16: Use Absence to Increase Respect and Honor.
Law 17: Keep Others in Suspended Terror: Cultivate an Air of Unpredictability.
Law 18: Do Not Build Fortresses to Protect Yourself ‚Äì Isolation is Dangerous.
Law 19: Know Who You‚Äôre Dealing with ‚Äì Do Not Offend the Wrong Person.
Law 20: Do Not Commit to Anyone.
Law 21: Play a Sucker to Catch a Sucker ‚Äì Seem Dumber than your Mark.
Law 22: Use the Surrender Tactic: Transform Weakness into Power.
Law 23: Concentrate Your Forces.
Law 24 : Play the Perfect Courtier.
Law 25 : Re-Create Yourself.
Law 26 : Keep Your Hands Clean.
Law 27: Play on People‚Äôs Need to Believe to Create a Cultlike Following.
Law 28 : Enter Action with Boldness .
Law 29: Plan All the Way to the End.
Law 30: Make your Accomplishments Seem Effortless.
Law 31: Control the Options: Get Others to Play with the Cards you Deal.
Law 32 : Play to People‚Äôs Fantasies.
Law 33 : Discover Each Man‚Äôs Thumbscrew.
Law 34: Be Royal in your Own Fashion: Act like a King to be treated like one.
Law 35: Master the Art of Timing.
Law 36: Disdain Things you cannot have: Ignoring them is the best Revenge.
Law 37 : Create Compelling Spectacles.
Law 38: Think as you like but Behave like others.
Law 39:  Stir up Waters to Catch Fish.
Law 40 :Despise the Free Lunch.
Law 41: Avoid Stepping into a Great Man‚Äôs Shoes.
Law 42: Strike the Shepherd and the Sheep will Scatter.
Law 43: Work on the Hearts and Minds of Others.
Law 44: Disarm and Infuriate with the Mirror Effect.
Law 45: Preach the Need for Change, but Never Reform too much at Once.
Law 46 : Never appear too Perfect.
Law 47: Do not go Past the Mark you Aimed for; In Victory, Learn when to Stop.
Law 48 : Assume Formlessness.

Law 6: Court Attention at all Cost.
Law 7: Get others to do the Work for you, but Always Take the Credit.
Law 8: Make other People come to you ‚Äì use Bait if Necessary.
Law 9: Win through your Actions, Never through Argument.
Law 10: Infection: Avoid the Unhappy and Unlucky.
Law 11: Learn to Keep People Dependent on You.
Law 12: Use Selective Honesty and Generosity to Disarm your Victim.
Law 13: When Asking for Help, Appeal to People‚Äôs Self-Interest,
Never to their Mercy or Gratitude
Law 14: Pose as a Friend, Work as a Spy.
Law 15 : Crush your Enemy Totally.
Law 16: Use Absence to Increase Respect and Honor.
Law 17: Keep Others in Suspended Terror: Cultivate an Air of Unpredictability.
Law 18: Do Not Build Fortresses to Protect Yourself ‚Äì Isolation is Dangerous.
Law 19: Know Who You‚Äôre Dealing with ‚Äì Do Not Offend the Wrong Person.
Law 20: Do Not Commit to Anyone.
Law 21: Play a Sucker to Catch a Sucker ‚Äì Seem Dumber than your Mark.
Law 22: Use the Surrender Tactic: Transform Weakness into Power.
Law 23: Concentrate Your Forces.
Law 24 : Play the Perfect Courtier.
Law 25 : Re-Create Yourself.
Law 26 : Keep Your Hands Clean.
Law 27: Play on People‚Äôs Need to Believe to Create a Cultlike Following.
Law 28 : Enter Action with Boldness .
Law 29: Plan All the Way to the End.
Law 30: Make your Accomplishments Seem Effortless.
Law 31: Control the Options: Get Others to Play with the Cards you Deal.
Law 32 : Play to People‚Äôs Fantasies.
Law 33 : Discover Each Man‚Äôs Thumbscrew.
Law 34: Be Royal in your Own Fashion: Act like a King to be treated like one.
Law 35: Master the Art of Timing.
Law 36: Disdain Things you cannot have: Ignoring them is the best Revenge.
Law 37 : Create Compelling Spectacles.
Law 38: Think as you like but Behave like others.
Law 39: Stir up Waters to Catch Fish.
Law 40 :Despise the Free Lunch.
Law 41: Avoid Stepping into a Great Man‚Äôs Shoes.
Law 42: Strike the Shepherd and the Sheep will Scatter.
Law 43: Work on the Hearts and Minds of Others.
Law 44: Disarm and Infuriate with the Mirror Effect.
Law 45: Preach the Need for Change, but Never Reform too much at Once.
Law 46 : Never appear too Perfect.
Law 47: Do not go Past the Mark you Aimed for; In Victory, Learn when to Stop.
Law 48 : Assume Formlessness.
summary: The 48 Laws of Power is the first book by American author Robert Greene.

comments: I recommend this app to anyone who who's attracted to power and influence. This app is the incarnation of the adage Never judge a book by it's cover. Though the app as some defects but the content ( the wisdom) is over whelming and testable. It explores difference strategic aspect of power and people in general. I rate the app 5 stars for detailed, structured and creative. The developer as my full support , keep on the good work. If you don't believe download the app , and see for yourself.

I just got this app and I read some of it and I like it and it makes a lot of sense to me and I will continue to use it everyday dating and I need power of prayer and I need it now more than ever I have good experience with this in this as I go on I'm going to like it even more thank you for that

so, this is a abbreviated version of the actual book. the original is actually very interesting to read as it provides a historical analysis and examples which this one does not. just the rules, better off to just read the table of contents. YouTube the audiobook. of course living in this way is a sad way of living, but I think that reading about it is no different than reading machiavelli or Lao tso.
Great reading but I wish I could type in what Law to go to specifically rather than scrolling forever to get to the last one I left off on.

I actually downloaded this app because I wanted to say something about what I read just previewing the app and I'm definitely not impressed! Unfortunately this is the kind of ugly thinking of people in this world! Not to say it doesn't happen all the time but it's exactly what's wrong with this would not what's right! If everyone in the world thought like this what an awful place it would be! If you want something to live by try the good book! You can get a copy anywhere! It's called the BIBLE! Now that's the laws to live by! You can have power by being good as well as bad! It all depends on who you serve in this world God or Satan!

title: Habits - Law of Success, Prosperity, and Happiness
description:
Habits app is an educational, learning, and research app to help you build healthy and winning habits, and discover your vision and purpose in life to produce success, prosperity, and happiness. 

With daily contents of in-depth knowledge and extensive research on developing good habits, improve confidence, cultivate positive thinking, success and abundance mindset, you can build a life full of health, wealth, and happiness. 

These habits are proven to help many successful people with self-improvement, living in abundance, healthy, and happy. If you apply these same habits in your own life, without a doubt, you will get things done, achieve your dream, and make your life richer and happier than ever before.

‚òÖ Important: How To Use This App For Maximum Results ‚òÖ
üëâ¬† You will receive daily update with one (or more) articles to help you identify and develop new good habit or break old bad habit.
üëâ¬†¬† Spend 1-5 minutes every day to read/skim the article. If the article interest you, bookmark it for easier find later.
üëâ¬†¬† When you have more time in the day, you can dig deeper to do more research into the subject to help you build new good habits or break old bad habits. Use your daily journal to make some notes as necessary. You can spend 15-30 minutes on this.
üëâ¬†¬† In the weekend, as part of your weekly planning, use the habit tracking tool, to plan on developing 1-2 good habits or breaking 1-2 bad habits in the coming weeks.
üëâ¬†¬† Make this as part of your daily/weekly rituals, and you'll be amazed at the transformation happening in your life.

comments: Disappointing! I downloaded this app and expected a tool which helps me to build good habits, builds a structure by tracking them and so on. What I got was basically an archive of articles how to build habits. I don't need an app for that. I read a book "The power of habits" or search the internet. There is some sort of habit tracking functionality. But it's totally unclear. There is no tutorial explaining the app. Somewhere in the menu is a Habit Tracker under which you find some options which is just an unclear list of strange names. They need to explain better what they are offering if anything beside a collection of articles.

I love starting out my day by reading two articles in an area I want to focus on. Lately, it's been habit formation, increasing productivity, and business growth. I love this app archives all these articles for me so I'm not spending valuable time looking for them myself. Instead, I just need a lot of coffee, read the articles, and set my goals for the day. I love it! I can already start to see a large difference in my life. I'm sure my clients can too.

I was impressed with the thoughtful, thorough reviews that were clearly genuinely posted by users of the app. What prompted me to download however was developer's response to one obviously phony 1-star "review" clearly planted by a troll. The app itself is simple to use and everything an individual striving to live his/her best life could hope for. Interesting, positive, motivating, and informative articles to start every day out on a positive note, in a couple of minutes a day. Great work!

One of the best app ever!!! It has really good positive articles, gives a boost to my mind at any given time. Everybody should definitely give it a try, it's a much better idea to invest your valuable time to read something useful other than the usual gossips or not required demotivating matters

not matter what habit you may be trying to change, or even trying to start, this app breaks it down, providence simple step by step guidance that makes so much sense, i almost can't so no to at least trying one or two of the things i wanted to change... and over the course of a few weeks i gradually actually starting DOING what i sat around and had been "trying" to do for months!!! I KNOW that was a big run on sentence, but if you do what is advised...and you want it....you will understand!!
