title: Textra SMS
description:
Want a beautiful, super fast and highly customizable alternative to your stock Android messaging app?

Well today is your day. Textra is simply outstanding!

Comes with a bunch of great features, notably 180+ material design theme, bubble & app icon colors. Dark, light & auto-night modes, multiple bubble styles, scheduled (future) SMS & MMS, stop during send, slide to delete, slide to call, quick snap camera, multi-select picture gallery, quick reply SMS popup, awesome MMS GROUP messaging, quick voice memos, GIFs, 21 text sizes, message blocker / blocklisting, pin-to-top, automatic video & picture compression, plus heaps more!

Customize your preferred theme & bubble colors, signatures and notifications (icon shape, LED color, sound, vibration, privacy, reminders and muting) PER CONTACT as well.

Get all the latest (3000+) Android, Twitter, Emoji One & iOS style emojis including diversity (skin tone). Just pick your preferred emoji style and express yourself!

NEW: Copy Partial Text inside a bubble, tap a bubble to check out this great new feature!

It's pretty special; try it, tell your friends, shout from the treetops, but most of all enjoy it.

Fully compatible with Pushbullet, MightyText, Android Wear and Android Auto (car) for enhanced notifications and quick reply.

All Textra features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to make a once only in-app purchase to remove ads forever.

Support, Knowledge Base & Feedback @ https://textra.uservoice.com

Simple. Beautiful. Fast.

comments: Hello I enjoy the app and feel it is one of the best out here. However, I would love to see the simple features of being able to: 1. Set the back ground image to an image of my own choosing like you can on Android phone's home screen or lock screen.  2. Allow you to like someone's text in a group chat.  3.  Allow you to add an remove ppl from group chats without having to create a new group.  Thanks

Years after my last review, I still use this app daily. This really is the best messaging app out there. Still doesn't support sending videos, for some weird reason, but it's a solid app, backs up messages directly to the Android message store, allows you to customize the background, foreground, text bubbles, even the app icon. If you're one of those people whose default messenger doesn't let you send you send full-sized images, Textra is the only one I've found that lets me do this.

Textra is the ONLY messenging app I will ever use! It's easy to use. You can customize EVERYTHING. Like the colors you use for every contact. You can set up Textra exactly how YOU want it to be. You can change the ring tones for every contact. There are 3 types of emojis you can use. I use IOS even though I have an Android phone. If you have an idea that you think might make Textra better, send them your idea and they may use it. If you need support-it's there. I love, love, love it!

I have been using textra for years, always loved it, but here within the past day or so, chat heads are now popping up for new message notifications while I'm currently in the middle of messaging someone else. When you click to open the chat head it doesn't allow you to do anything, so you have to drag it to bottom to close it. Please how do I disable this feature, it's unpleasant and unwelcomed.

When switching phones I ended up having trouble sending mms messages. When Textra support was contacted they were prompt in answering and emailed back and forth with me to try and fix the problem. Ultimately it was the cell providers/SIM card that was causing the issue. I have used the app for many years and on several different phones. I will continue to use this app and recommend it to everyone. Thank you for the help and a great app. Special thanx to Mandy and Maxüëçüëç

comments: Used to be good. But the non stop ads with annoying loud noise everytime you open an image is unbelievably a waste of time. Its non stop and continuous. Uninstalled. Edited: Thanks, at least the auto noise is disabled but now, every time you try to edit, there's a pop up ad, even if you are still editing the same picture. That's just too inconvenient and waste of time. Too bad. Found new app that at least lets user "use" their app without interfering.

I loved this app so much that I paid for a yearly subscription only to be told that after three months I needed to repurchase. I followed the instructions and tried to contact the developer with no response. Stupidly I purchased again for the 2 year subscription ( stupid I know) only to have the exact same problem. I tried to problem solve again with no resolution to this problem. Tried to contact someone with no response. I am out nearly $40 and very frustrated. Won't make this mistake again

Money grabber, of course. Allows you to use premium features that it doesn't label as such and THEN hits you up to start a free trial. $25 a year is not horrible, but I like the apps that give you a GOOD free version. And this one doesn't seem to have a good free version. I haven't decided if I want to support this app or not. I'll keep looking for sure. It also makes you sign up immediately with no guest option that I saw.

I like this app , it's amazing and easy to use. It's very creative, adjustable, let.you choose from alot of different veiws how you can design your photo. I just really like it , I'm glad I finally found an app for my photo's I'm always looking for photo apps. I really.enjoyed working with it.

title: Moodtrack Social Diary
description:
Graph your moods on the fly. Track as little or as often as you want (mood-swings? no problem!), whenever you want (at home, on the go, and even without Internet!), and look back to see your moods over weeks, months, and years to learn about yourself.

See what others are going through and optionally chat anonymously. Form instant friendships and support networks.  Get help when you need it, and give support when you feel like it.

An optional upgrade is available to keep your journal private. Everything else is free.

- Works offline, and syncs when you‚Äôre online (must turn on sync)
- Share with a counselor or friend
- Track as often as you want, whenever your want
- Daily reminders
- View on your computer
- Perfect for fun, support, self awareness, and self discovery
- Perfect for tracking health, depression, bipolar disorder, anxiety, pms, and monitoring symptoms
descriptionHTML:
Graph your moods on the fly. Track as little or as often as you want (mood-swings? no problem!), whenever you want (at home, on the go, and even without Internet!), and look back to see your moods over weeks, months, and years to learn about yourself.

See what others are going through and optionally chat anonymously. Form instant friendships and support networks. Get help when you need it, and give support when you feel like it.

An optional upgrade is available to keep your journal private. Everything else is free.

- Works offline, and syncs when you‚Äôre online (must turn on sync)
- Share with a counselor or friend
- Track as often as you want, whenever your want
- Daily reminders
- View on your computer
- Perfect for fun, support, self awareness, and self discovery
- Perfect for tracking health, depression, bipolar disorder, anxiety, pms, and monitoring symptoms
summary: Anonymous mood tracker with optional private upgrade
recentChanges: Due to popular demand, you can now find anyone by username with the new "Search" button on the public feed.  Find your friends in real life or ask your counselor or therapist to find you.
comments: Still getting used to it. A little disappointed; I thought there'd be a tutorial, but instead you tweet your help-me question & never hear back..? I had also heard that I could set it up to prompt me throughout the day & go back to edit mood changes in the near-past, but I guess not. Or maybe these features are available, just not on the free app? Anyway, I like it well enough & will continue to use it. Would be happy to increase the # of stars if someone could get back to me on these questions!

I had this app on my ipod yes i know ipod but that how long i been with this app and to me it bee very helpful because im able to find other that are helpful. I totally recommend this if you have no one to talk to or dont want to talk to people you know

Really great. Journaling/venting in this is very comforting knowing it's going out instead of staying locked away in secret. It makes me feel less alone. This app has helped me through extremely hard times. It's also helped with a therapy and psychiatry as I can go back and relay my mental health or events that happened. I'd also like to credit this app for helping me get my diagnosis with BPD and Bipolar 1 Disorder. If I hadn't been tracking my mood, it might've taken me much longer.

I love this app. i have been trying to find mood tracker and my search stopped with this app. it can store moods for long periods of time. we can logout n it works as pin. it has a unique feature that we can also read entries of strangers. only 1 disappointment, we have to pay for private entries. everything is public here.
I like the app. The downside is there is no way to export or print your data. I like private diary best.

title: Goalist: Daily Planner, To-Do, Time & Goal Tracker
description:
Dynamic Self-Adjusting To-Do List ‚Ä¢ Reminders ‚Ä¢ Scheduler ‚Ä¢ Daily Planner ‚Ä¢ Time Organizer ‚Ä¢ Time Usage Statistics ‚Ä¢ Goal Setting ‚Ä¢ Goal Monitoring ‚Ä¢ Goal Tracking ‚Ä¢ Arbitrary Data Logging ‚Ä¢ Sophisticated Alarms ‚Ä¢ Checklists ‚Ä¢ Widgets ‚Ä¢ 3 Types of Notes For Each Task ‚Ä¢ Recurrent Reminders

Have you realized that small tweaks don't work in the long run? And that you need a radical change to see a radical improvement in your life? Goalist offers you a path that's undeniably different.

It doesn't merely remind you to do stuff - that's simple and ineffective. It's too easy to just postpone a reminder. You end up with a bunch of annoying to-dos...

Goalist helps you determine what to do and why and then provides flexible tools to plan and realize the plan. It helps you transform into a highly effective Time Management Master.

Unsuccessful people use lack of time as a good excuse. Successful people have the exact same amount of time as anyone. They just manage it well. And as a goal achiever you know you cannot manage it if you don't measure it and plan in advance. Goalist allows you to create very detailed daily plans. And if anything changes Goalist adjusts the plan for you. It respects the unchangeable fact that a day has 24 hours. Unsuccessful people see taking the responsibility for each minute as too much burden. Successful people know it's the only way to get the most out of every day.

If you're diligent enough to create a complete plan every day, you'll see 24 hours is actually a lot. Based on your schedules you'll be able to generate and analyze useful stats, graphs and notifications. It will help you understand your current habits, set goals to improve them and stay motivated. You can monitor not only your time usage, but also other kinds of data that you put into a log.


Goalist is extremely flexible and has a plethora of features:
‚òÖ Personal  organizer. Helps you manage time and daily life better.
‚òÖ Time tracker. You can assign tags and create graphs to look at your time usage from various angles.
‚òÖ Routine statistics. Analyze your distribution of time, detect time leaks, increase your productivity.
‚òÖ Personal notes. Each task can have unlimited notes.
‚òÖ Routine planner. Tasks can be grouped into Task Sets for fast & easy planning.
‚òÖ Reminders. Schedule activities that don't fit in a routine: one-time activities or tasks with an arbitrary repetition cycle.
‚òÖ Checklists. Each task can have a list of things you don't want to forget about when you perform it. Eg: a list of things you always want to take to the swimming pool.
‚òÖ Free planner - most functionality is available for free.
‚òÖ Timeboxing / time blocking
‚òÖ As your routine manager
‚òÖ As your task reminder
‚òÖ As your timetable planner
‚òÖ As your habit creation tool
‚òÖ As your productivity enhancer
‚òÖ As an agenda for routine tasks
‚òÖ Most powerful & customizable planner for Android. Features grouped into Modules.
‚òÖ Absolutely unique, life-changing approach to planning
‚òÖ Lets you specify your life values and goals, and group your tasks according to them or arbitrary categories.


Sign up for a video training with deep insights about time management: https://www.goalist.club/


Unless you know a shortcut or trick - simply tune yourself week by week!

recentChanges:
Fixed voter registrations, ability to vote and Special Codes in newer versions of Android.
French translation corrections (thank you, Sandra!)
Other bug fixes and minor improvements.
Please always make a backup before upgrading!
If you don't like this release you can download older versions from bit.ly/goalist-apk
comments: This is a trial and needs a paid subscription. Their prices are the most expensive of any subscription on the play store. Why would you pay thousands of dollars for modules that no longer work

Fantastic lifechanging app. I am so happy I found it and although I am still learning on how to use it best, I have already noticed several improvements using my time and getting things done. The additional training provided by mail is great as it gives you a lot of ideas and information to think about. Very impressed by all the thoughts put in the app and how well it works.

Nice, but OVERCOMPLICATED! Not for the average user. It feels very personalised, like it is someone's life or brain that they have laid out in an app. The idea is definitely there, but it needs some simplification. I really want to use it, but trying to get my head around setting a goal, then adding a task, which category or value it goes in?? By the end of it feel more confused than hopeful I'm so sorry to say. Just some constructive feedback for the designers, and nothing personal.

Wow!! Love Goalist! I'm not using all of the functionality yet but it's helped me tremendously for the past month. Already have my level 3 subscription and will continue to use it. Be patient with yourself at first as the scheduling is different than how most are used to. Believe me though it's worth it!!

Functionality could use a lot of work. Creating tasks doesn't feel simple and you end up in a rabbit hole of submenus. Also, Goalist seems grossly inaccurate as the app focuses on micro managing each and every day, only showing one day at a time. I don't see a list of goals in the future and accessing them is very difficult. Then there's your notifications being read out by some automated reader, not easy to disable either. Trial, full access, but I don't feel like buying anything. Too complex.

comments: It's a great app. But it has a serious problem that some of their screen types do not rotate on Arduino devices, including on Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e and S6 that I'm using, or on the A71 and S20. It's extremely important that all Monday screen types do rotate landscape & portrate properly to make it usable. Yes I have already sent you screen shots. In apps such as Calendar, Zoom, Office, WhatsApp, Gmail etc etc all screens rotate properly, but not in Monday. Hope you'll fix it soon.

Update: Previous issues have been resolved, thanks! I'm having a few other problems though - when adding new items to the board I can't subscribe other members to this item (I can do this on my computer so I have the permissions), also tags not activating on updates, and I can't find the option to edit updates. Thank you!
Just when I was setting up the boards and telling my team to download this amazing app. Barely 30 mins in, it decides to delete my board and stop working. All my work down the drain.

By far the best project/team management app I've used. The way it integrates the columns together and the ability to switch between different views are excellent features I have yet to see on any other platform.

The inability to customise the date format is very frustrating and leads to confusion as the ROTW uses dd/mm/yyyy but the app is locked into American style. Please add this feature, it's available on the desktop.

title: Simple System Monitor
description:
*** UPDATE regarding CPU usage for Android Oreo and up ***
So Android Oreo added yet another restriction disallowing access to the CPU usage stats. Thus, CPU usages unfortunately won't work on devices with Android Oreo. I have released a beta version of the app accommodating the rooted Android Oreo devices where it should work just fine. Do post feedback or send me an email if the BETA version doesn't work on your rooted Oreo device. Thanks!
*** END UPDATE ***

*** UPDATE regarding Active Processes monitor on Android Nougat and up ***
I have released a beta version of the app with Active Processes monitor working on devices with ROOT access. You'd need to become a beta tester in order to install it. It may be a bit buggy. Any feedback is appreciated, thanks!
*** END UPDATE ***

*** NOTE*** 
Some features of Simple System Monitor does not work properly with android version 6.0 and up because of the underlying system changes.
Also, as of Android Nougat, Active Processes tab will show only one app, Simple System Monitor itself. This is because Nougat has restricted access to /proc directory where information about running processes are retrieved from. Please bug Google about this issue instead of me :)
*** END NOTE***

Simple System Monitor, as the name suggests, is a clean and simple system monitoring app for your android device. It graphically shows usages of various system components.

Features:
‚Ä¢ CPU usage and frequencies for each core
‚Ä¢ Total CPU usage and average frequency
‚Ä¢ CPU frequency graph for each core
‚Ä¢ Time spent on each CPU frequency state
‚Ä¢ GPU usage and frequency*
‚Ä¢ RAM usage and ability to clear RAM
‚Ä¢ Network activity
‚Ä¢ Disk I/O activity (internal and SD card)
‚Ä¢ Test disks' read/write speeds (internal or external) 
‚Ä¢ File browser with support for basic operations (copy,cut,delete)
‚Ä¢ Cache cleaner (optionally requires ROOT)
‚Ä¢ View list of active apps and processes and their CPU usage, RAM usage, network activity, PID and UID. 
‚Ä¢ Kill processes as ROOT (only works on rooted devices)**
‚Ä¢ View temperatures of all of the thermal zones
‚Ä¢ View battery health and temperature
‚Ä¢ Ability to keep running in the background despite being swiped away from the recent tasks list
‚Ä¢ Floating mode - shows system monitor data on a little floating window on top of other apps
‚Ä¢ Dark UI theme


If you see "..." for one or more CPU frequencies under the CPU monitor graph, restarting the phone should solve the issue.

*Only Adreno GPUs are supported at the moment. Sometimes the GPU stat information may not be available/accessible in the kernel even if the device has Adreno GPU. In such case, "..." will be displayed instead of a frequency. If you don't see the GPU monitor, then your device's GPU is not supported. 

**Using ROOT to kill processes is not recommended and should be used very cautiously. I do not hold any responsibility if something bad happens to your system or device because of it.

If you find a bug, please send me an email at dparajuliapps@gmail.com. Any feedback is much appreciated. 

App permissions used/explanation:
android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES:
     needed for clearing the RAM
android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and android.permission.WAKE_LOCK:
    needed for checking the storage space and also performing the r/w speed tests
android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW:
    needed for Floating mode

Devices used for testing:
Nexus 7
HTC One m7
HTC One m8
Samsung Galaxy Note 3
Samsung Galaxy S6
Nexus 6P


Thank you for checking out this app :)

summary: Simple system monitoring tool
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I've been using and developing Android for years, and I've never seen this app! Very useful, especially the floating graphs. I use AIDE to prototype on my device itself, and this compliments it very well. I want to run it through its paces, but I'll buy the developer a pot of coffee if it works as well as I think it will. Thanks....

This app shows much higher ram usage that it does under developer options ( which I would tend to trust more ) in developer options it gives an average of 4.1 GB pretty consistent thought the day. This app says 5.77 GB to 6.1GB why?
Great, everything works as described. I especially like the floating windows. I will happily buy the developer a coffee.

This is by far the simpliest, beautiful system monitor I installed. Easy to use, has draw over app window, and visually appealing graph. It can monitor from gpu utilization, cpu utilization, network, ram, all you can possibly think of. Overall the best. Kudos!
Great app, monitors phone systems and more, lots of info.

title: AppDetox - App Blocker for Digital Detox
description:
Get more social time for your life, block apps and notifications and spent less time on the phone!

AppDetox helps you to calm down your mobile app usage, and take a digital detox. You are able to set your own rules for your apps and notifications to detox from some heavy usage and stop procrastinating and phubbing. Lock your apps with this applocker.

Every time you violate one of your own rules, AppDetox will remind you to take a break and stop your heavy app usage. You can also keep track of these violations in a log. Some people are using AppDetox for parental control of their kid's screen time.

Get your dose of AppDetox now!
Any kind of feedback is welcome!

summary: AppDetox is an applocker that helps you to block apps and take a digital detox
comments: Great app! I use it to limit how much I zone out on Reddit, the little toast notifications keep me more mindful of my usage. I like how flexible the rules are, and that you can stack them for a single app (e.g., limiting both time and launches). The fact that you can pause rules as well is useful for me, because there are times when I want to have free access, and times that I don't (though you can also disable this feature if needed).

Loving the app to help control my constant need to be entertained by Instagram Twitter Facebook at every moment I feel I deserve a break, which are far toooo many times in the day. Really like that it gives me options as to how I would like to control my usage... From blocking an app during certain hours of the days or how much time I spend on it etc. Very effective!

OMG this app is superb.. It has easy to use as well as so good for removing addiction to an app for sometimes. Would have been better if there was a permanent lock would have been added for a certain time which doesn't allow pausing rules.

Great concept, doesn't work on my device The idea is great especially the concept of having different types of detox, but on my Xiaomi phone none of the detox rules are enforced. It will sometimes give a very very small message and the bottom of the screen but nothing else

I downloaded this app a few hours ago and so far I like how it functions from the little bit I've used it. However, this whole time its had a notification badge and notification icon at the top of my screen. I can't figure out what it's for when looking through the app, so I can't clear it. This alone is annoying enough to want to delete the app if it's not resolved.

title: EssentialPIM - Your Personal Information Manager
description:
This is an Android version of highly popular on Windows platform personal information manager - EssentialPIM. It allows you to manage Calendars, Tasks, Notes, Contacts and Passwords. All your data is interconnected and in one package!

- Synchronize all your data
Syncs with Windows version of EssentialPIM (Free and Pro). Synchronization with Google Calendar, Google Tasks, Google Drive (for Notes and Passwords) and Google Contacts is also available.

- Powerful calendar views
Colourful, easy-to-read day, week, week agenda, month, year and agenda views.

- Hierarchical tasks structure
Flexible structure that organizes tasks into multiple trees, with sub trees and leaves.

- Tree-like multilevel notes structure
Multiple views allow quick notes preview, management and location of data.

- Conveniently organized contacts
Wide selection of fields and unlimited number of contact groups that can be organized hierarchically.

- Secure passwords list
Self-locking mechanism offers safe and convenient way to store all your passwords and other sensitive data.

- Beautiful and functional widgets (some available through in-app purchase)
Make use of Calendar (agenda and month views), Tasks, Notes and quick add new EPIM items widgets. Place shortcuts for EPIM modules on the home screen for quicker access.

- Organize your data with tags
Create as many tags as you wish and assign them to any items within the app to better organize your information flow.

- Attach files to items
You can now store any external files attached to items (appointments, notes, tasks, etc.) you need to keep handy.

- Password protect the whole app
Keep your personal information safe and secure, lock it down with a password and/or your fingerprint. Data is encrypted with a random 256-bit AES key.

- Data backup and restore
Backup EssentialPIM data to your device or to any online service. Restore the backup data with ease onto the existing or any other Android device.

Key features:
- Includes Calendar (day, week, week agenda, month, year and agenda views), Tasks (custom fields, hierarchical structure), Notes (tree-like multilevel structure), Contacts (groups and unlimited custom fields) and Passwords (secure, self-locking mechanism) modules
- Customizable widgets (calendar month and agenda views, tasks, notes, quick add new items, modules shortcuts)
- Flawless synchronization with Win EPIM works over Wi-Fi, cellular networks (4G/LTE), Bluetooth or USB cable
- Automatic synchronization of all your data with Google services: Calendar, Tasks, Drive (for Notes and Passwords) and Contacts
- Ability to assign tags to items, which is always a great way to better organize your data and its usage scenarios
- Storing attachments linked to any types of items
- Lock the app with a password and/or fingerprint for security purposes
- Data backup/restore option
- Fast and responsive user interface with light and dark themes
- Ads free

EssentialPIM Pro (paid version) exclusive features:
- Beautiful Calendar (Agenda and Month views), Tasks and Notes widgets
- Ability to show Tasks in Calendar
- Lock time zone setting for Calendar (allows users to lock their events at a time zone they were created in)
- Automatic upload of backups to Google Drive
- Password protect the whole app

Support and feedback:
If you are looking for help or have any questions or ideas, please contact us by tapping on the Send feedback link in Settings->About or using the following email address: androidepim@essentialpim.com.

About translation:
Seeing EssentialPIM not being fully translated into your language? We would like to invite you to take part in the translation process. It‚Äôs easy and fun. And if you aren‚Äôt ready to do translation just yet, you can still review the existing one for mistakes. Please contact us at androidepim@essentialpim.com and we will reply back with an invite. 
As a token of appreciation, all active contributors get free EssentialPIM Pro Android and Windows version licenses.

summary: Powerful and full-featured personal information manager.
recentChanges:
- Option to turn off auto-conversion of numbers in the text into clickable links
- Ability to copy notes for different types of items without going into the editing mode
- Optimizations regarding search in all modules
- Improved sharing feature
- Drag&drop of appointments now works correctly in Calendar for any time scale setting
- Fixed synchronization with Google Calendar and pictures in notes with Google Drive
- Other minor fixes and improvements
comments: When Editing an entry, the screen keeps losing focus, especially when the keyboard appears & then is no longer needed. You have to keep pulling the page up manually, to see what has been typed. This is very annoying & slows down efficiency. A small software tweak should fix this, at which point I would change my rating from 3 Stars = Neutral, to 5 Stars = extremely happy with the program.

I use EPIM as my Digital Bullet Journal, mainly because all other software that is available for bullet journaling is half baked. It either works well on one platform and is a total disappointment on another. So far EPIM has worked very well for me. Though I do wish that tables would sync as they were intended to look instead of changing them to a list format. That might be an Android limitation, I am not sure. I'm no coder. Overall very pleased with the outcome.

I love Essential PIM Pro and have been using it for many years in your practice. The mobile app can only sync when in the same network, but even then my app will frequently not sync for days. Obviously that creates issues with duplicate bookings. If the syncing can be improved, then it would get 5 stars.

Great app! Lifetime member/user. If you send a newsletter to many users as I do, this app is essential plus they continually keep it up todate and permit READ RECEIPTS to multiple recipients at same time which helps keep your address book up to date.

I've been using EPIM for Android and Windows for over 10 years following a review of various alternatives when I transitioned from Psion PDA devices to a smartphone. It's great and is continually being updated and improved by the software team in response to user suggestions.

title: Relationship Advice & Help: Emotional Support Free
description:
Olymp is a social app that helps to find new solutions in difficult üòì psychological situations (relationship advice, marriage issues: divorce or breakup). Get real ‚ù§ emotions and have an üéØ advice from other app users in a common or private way. All stories, comments and messages are FREE and ANONYMOUS.

WHO AM I?
I'm the only developer, the founder and the author of the project Olymp.
https://instagram.com/star.ivanov
https://vk.com/star.ivanov

WHAT?
‚Ä¢ üì© Leave anonymously your story
‚Ä¢ üéì –°hoose anonymously the best advice or opinion from users or experts
‚Ä¢ üéÅ Get anonymous supportive messages privately from those who want it completely free of charge

WHY?
‚û§ üí¨ You can talk out or discuss anonymously with other members of community your situation or talk privately with those who are willing to hear out
‚û§ ‚òπ Feeling depression or anxiety, lonely or stress because of divorce, break up or troubles in marriage, relationship or lost love - leave anonymously your sadness here
‚û§ üíî If you are sad being unliked - try this app to skip these problems: give anonymously someone a little ‚õµ get more tomorrow üëë

DETAILS
Sometimes in life circumstances come that we do not expect and it seems that I should be where in another place at another time but no - I'm here right now. Meet lonely. It is at such moments that you want to turn into someone, do something incredible and find a secret in the hidden treasure chest of life. You can go to therapy or talk with friends, girlfriends, but not always for this there are forces. So I made this application, which is easy to install and it's easy to give something to another simply by clicking on the button. And if the forces suddenly wake up the worried heart, you can write your story, stress or depression. Give it to the world as a boring game, look at what happens through the prism of human emotional responses and amazing tips. From the point of view of a specialist, a look at the situation in all manifestations is called awareness of the situation. This is far from a magic pill, this is the first step in order to recognize some aspects and make, start planning life anew, on coals of not simple situations.

Are you an aspiring psychologist? Your direction is psychology, psych, psychotherapy in the field of cognitive-behavioral therapy, positive therapy, Gestalt therapy? Then try to help people here! Emotional intelligence develops by realizing emotions and giving them place.

*You can write story in room only English but you can use any languages in private chat
**If you feel *uicidal or high anxiety - please ask for help for therapists; there are no people in app to handle these so risky cases.

THEORY
Emotional self-regulation or regulation of emotion is the ability to respond to the ongoing demands of experience with the range of emotions in a manner that is socially tolerable and sufficiently flexible to permit spontaneous reactions as well as the ability to delay spontaneous reactions as needed. It can also be defined as extrinsic and intrinsic processes responsible for monitoring, evaluating, and modifying emotional reactions. Emotion self-regulation belongs to the broader set of emotion-regulation processes, which includes the regulation of one's own feelings and the regulation of other people's feelings - self help.

FUNCTIONS
‚Ä¢ üí¨ Texting privately like dating game
‚Ä¢ üíï Collect the best discussions and new quotes in the tracker diary
‚Ä¢ üéÅ Gift anonymously your heart balance to support people üíù
‚Ä¢ üîù Raise up your situation on the 1st place to be viewed more
‚Ä¢ ‚úã Help people - share text-responses in an anonymous chat online
‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ Activate the subscription - make banner hidden and get 50% discount üòè

comments: This is a great app to get advice. It has helped me alot.

thanks for making a platform for people to support others. However, a few issues that i feel really needed 1. Privacy: chat history is saved at server which includes personal data (though it is annonymous). It should be on device only. 2. Bandwidth: It fetches data everytime from the server. server perspective, you'll be charged extra & bad UX due to slowness and high data use 3. Search: serach option in chat so that old info can be referred instead of asking to the user or scrolling all history

Loved the idea and the intention behind the creation of the app. The execution of it kind of lacked though. Just like Twitter, this could be a breeding ground for people seeking cheap online sympathy highs. And at some level I believe the app already has. Users that are really seeking help could potentially be given an advice by a person who only cares about making others feel good because it makes them feel good, and does not genuinely care one bit about the other person's wellbeing.

It's a good app. I like the concept however I believe people giving support should be above 20. There are people reaching out but having difficulty understanding situation of the person in trouble. This end up giving more unwanted pressure for the one needing help. Keep up the good work!

Thank you for your response to my review. But your response does not make sense. You cant keep a person in a app. I unstalled the app as it did not appeal to me. And plus I cant afford to pay for the subscription in order to set up profiles etc.

title: Rise Up: Eating Disorder Help
description:
Look no further! Rise Up + Recover is just the app for you if you are struggling with food, dieting, exercise and body image. Based off self-monitoring homework, a cornerstone of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), we designed a simple and convenient app that has been used millions of time around the world.

At Recovery Warriors our mission is to create empowering tools that will help YOU succeed!

With the Rise Up + Recover app you can:

‚Ä¢ Log your meals, emotions and behaviors from the privacy of your mobile phone
‚Ä¢ Export PDF summaries of your Meal Log and Check-In to share with your treatment team
‚Ä¢ Set custom reminders to inspire you to keep moving forward
‚Ä¢ Rest assured that your personal information is protected behind a pass-code
‚Ä¢ Share motivational and inspirational quotes, images and affirmations
‚Ä¢ Access a wide range of resources to build a strong recovery warrior mindset
‚Ä¢ Find support and professional treatment nearby


Rise Up + Recover is the perfect addition to your professional treatment for an eating disorder including anorexia nervosa (AN), bulimia nervosa (BN), obsessive eating disorder (OED), binge eating disorder (BED) and compulsive eating disorder (CED).

Learn more at https://www.recoverywarriors.com/

recentChanges:
Bug Fixes & Improvements
- fixed an issue for multiple Snack Meals added
comments: This app has some really good tools. However, I am not sure that all of the quotes used would be that helpful for someone struggling. One that I am directly referencing states something about critizim blocking the person from changing. Also, this app has not been updated in a long time because it keeps triggering a message on my phone saying that it was made for an older version of android and may not opperate correctly.
So far a good app but I hope it'll be updated at some point, 5 years is a long time to go without any updates.

I really like this app as it's been helping me keep myself accountable for my eating. it is rather personalisable, however I would very much like to be able to add "emotions" in the log meal section, and I also have to mention that my notifications have stopped working, which is honestly a shame because now I sometimes forget to use the app. except for these two points, the app is really great!

I'm feeling the benefit of using this app after just one week. I am always enticed by the control of logging all of my calories in diet apps, but this just makes my disorder worse. Rise Up offers a very helpful solution where you can log your meals manually and with no expectations. I think this helps me feel accountable to myself. Just taking this small action gives me some hope for improving my situation. As well as this feature are many journalling tasks which I've found a good way to focus my mind on non ED patterns. The app does not have a polished feel yet, and the motivational pictures after I log a meal seem rather generic. These are the only slight negatives.

Good app but some of the quotes are really unhealthy. 'you will not be punished for your anger you will be punished by your anger'. That's encouraging an unhealthy relationship with anger. Also the feedback email they give on the app doesn't work

title: Project Management Skills
description:
Project management is the application of processes, methods, knowledge, skills and experience to achieve the project objectives by using project management tools and project management software.
Project management is the process of organizing the way that changes are implemented efficiently within an organization, and this App will explain the project manager job description and project management certification.
Many businesses achieve their goals by completing projects that contribute to their objectives. Often, projects have a finite length, involve a number of activities and people, and have deadlines and fixed budgets. Project managers plan and monitor these, and take corrective action when appropriate.
No matter what your role, you may have to manage, or play an active role in, a project at some point during your career. It takes a great deal of skill to do this well, but the time you invest in building good project management skills can pay off enormously.
You contribute to meeting an organization's objectives by completing projects on time and on budget. This can produce real business results and enhance your reputation. And, when you know how to organize, schedule and delegate tasks, you can also reduce stress for yourself and your team members.
Project Management Skills App Features:
‚Ä¢	What Is Project Management? 
‚Ä¢	Crucial Project Management Skills. 
‚Ä¢	Project Manager Skills List and Examples.
‚Ä¢	competencies of a successful project manager.
descriptionHTML:
Project management is the application of processes, methods, knowledge, skills and experience to achieve the project objectives by using project management tools and project management software.
Project management is the process of organizing the way that changes are implemented efficiently within an organization, and this App will explain the project manager job description and project management certification.
Many businesses achieve their goals by completing projects that contribute to their objectives. Often, projects have a finite length, involve a number of activities and people, and have deadlines and fixed budgets. Project managers plan and monitor these, and take corrective action when appropriate.
No matter what your role, you may have to manage, or play an active role in, a project at some point during your career. It takes a great deal of skill to do this well, but the time you invest in building good project management skills can pay off enormously.
You contribute to meeting an organization's objectives by completing projects on time and on budget. This can produce real business results and enhance your reputation. And, when you know how to organize, schedule and delegate tasks, you can also reduce stress for yourself and your team members.
Project Management Skills App Features:
‚Ä¢ What Is Project Management?
‚Ä¢ Crucial Project Management Skills.
‚Ä¢ Project Manager Skills List and Examples.
‚Ä¢ competencies of a successful project manager.
summary: Project Management Skills The Complete Guide
comments: Provided helpful information about project management üáµüá¨üëç

comments: Just starting out with this but so far i think its great. It has all the things I've been looking for , for months in an app and after NUMEROUS free trials of various platforms. Though they were not bad services, they all seemed to lack one aspect or another that would require us to use a secondary program or software for what we need to do as a team. The goal was to have everything in ONE place. Simple, easy, effective. and I found it with LEADer it seems, plus BONUS that its free! We generate leads, track our progress with them, keept track of our customers, and our sales, and even helps with lead generation, all in one place. THIS is the app i have been looking for!!

It would be perfect if it had a section inside the customer profile maybe below "add notes" for something like "documents" where I could upload a picture to the app. It seems like this would be a function that the app already has but I just havent found it?? I am a roofing contractor and it would be great to have a picture of the paper contract as well in the customer profile folder. This app is great however, it's just that one thing that would be nice to have.

Really surprised to get so many invaluable features for FREE with LEADer's state of art one stop solution for all my CRM needs. Very interestingly can get in touch with leads, customers with my different SMS, Calls platforms availability that my life so much more easier. Really thank to this app developers. You have done an incredible job! Congrats!!!

Just Starting out the Freelancer Journey; A CRM solution is just for such activities; This was simple to setup and go; Great going so far; Hope to have a nice journey together. Would love to have more features in future too, for the sales pipeline.

As a small business owner and freelancer, I needed a tool that can simplify my lead generation. LEADer is a great app as far as customer relationship management (CRM) is concerned. This app makes it easy for small businesses to communicate with customers on the go. With this app, forget losing leads or sales opportunities as it will send a message to your customers after they have been with you on the call. Ops, even if they hit your voicail, they app will send a message. Keeping you in touch

title: 8fit Workouts & Meal Planner
description:
Change starts here. 8fit is the leading fitness app and your mobile personal trainer. Enjoy quick workout routines combined with a simple healthy meal planner tailored for you. 
Whether your goal is to lose weight, get fit or gain weight, join millions of 8fitters getting results and living a sustainable, happy, healthy lifestyle.


‚Ä¢ What‚Äôs in it for you?

8fit is not a diet. It‚Äôs not an exercise program. It‚Äôs a lifestyle change.Get fit and watch your confidence skyrocket! Let us help you become the best version of yourself.  

Skip the gym and realize your potential
Work out anywhere, anytime: at home, in the park, or at a hotel. No equipment required: use your own bodyweight to build muscle strength, increase endurance, improve cardiovascular fitness and lose weight without catabolizing hard earned muscles. The HIIT workout (high-intensity interval training) is one of our users‚Äô favorites because it is fast and more effective than traditional cardio workouts. 8fit‚Äôs workouts only take 5-20 minutes. From super moms to business travelers, burn more calories and get results even on a busy schedule!

Nutrition is 80% of your fitness goal equation. 
8fit is not another fad diet plan or a calorie counter, but a lifestyle coach to help you create daily habits by teaching you proper nutrition and giving you strategic at-home exercises. 8fit provides guidance with your meal planning and along your fitness journey, not just following a calorie tracker or generic gym workouts. 


‚Ä¢ How does it work?

8fit deliver results through tailored, easy to follow meal plans and workouts created by expert trainers. We teach you how to gain or lose weight with healthy diets and workout routines.

Most workout apps or weight loss apps give you a ‚Äòone-size-fits-all‚Äô plan and sends you off to navigate by yourself. 8fit is a personalized step-by-step guide accommodating everyone, from beginners to advanced fitness enthusiasts, providing:
- Fitness assessment to place you in your initial level
- Workout plans to challenge you and make you progress
- Customized healthy meals and diet plans
- Foods to eat and foods to avoid
- Healthy recipes and shopping list

8fit improves your nutrition and provides you with the healthy eating tools you need to reach your health and weight goals by:
- Organizing your week with a healthy meal plan app, accompanied by a grocery list
- Providing you with over 400 healthy recipes customized to your personal tastes or allergies
- Eliminating the hassle of keeping track of your daily calorie count
- Accommodating dietary preferences: paleo, vegetarian, vegan, pescatarian, low carb‚Ä¶
 
8fit helps you make exercise a part of your daily routine:
- Over 350 exercises with a variety of levels to progress through
- Time-efficient HIIT workouts including a tabata timer and countdown cues
- A strength test and a fitness tracker to measure your progress
- Daily motivation, fitness trainer tips and activity tracking
- Pedometer / step counter synced to Google Fit
- Sweat with challenging exercises
- Intensity of 8fit‚Äôs HIIT and Tabata Workouts are inspired by Crossfit & P90x
- Go at your own pace and improve your fitness at home.


8fit is free for everyone. To unlock exclusive workouts and complete meal plans, subscribe to the Pro version. You can turn off the auto-renewal at any time. When you cancel, access to the Pro features will expire at the end of the current payment period. 

Support: help@8fit.com
Privacy: https://8fit.com/privacy
Website: https://8fit.com

You talk, we listen! Consistent updates ensure a 5-star experience & results you will be happy with.


Fitness for the rest of us üí™üç≥
It's time to step out of your comfort zone and seize the day: start little habits for a big change. 
You too can tone your body, boost your confidence and become the best version of you. ‚úåÔ∏è

comments: I had a few glitches with this app, notably when casting to the tv. I like the routines but was dissatisfied that some of the workout classes you couldn't save to use again - apologies if you can, I couldn't work out how! The other issue I had is that like most other apps there is a lot of squat exercises, not good for me, and an alternative is often tricky to find. Sad that so much is only available to subscribers, I haven't renewed for the above reasons, and I'm not interested in the meal plan

I like the classes, but feel sad about not having them available on the weekends. The workouts are good too, but I am still trying to figure out how to create a routine for the week / month, that is complete and balanced. I found this app is not very good at providing that. The previous app I had was very good at setting up a 3 month program and I did not have to figure out what to do everyday, plus I felt I was working towards a more clear and oriented goal.
Great app! Changed my life :) got addicted to online workouts.. Good diversity, awsome trainers, you can choose the workout level and type easily. Highly recommended!!

I've tried alot of apps to help motivate and hold me accountable and 8fit is the only one that has worked for ME! I love that it starts your work outs at the level your at. It has alarms, recipes, and I can log my daily work outs to hold myself accountable. I use the free version right now but will upgrade when I reach my first weight loss goal!

I enjoy this app. It's good for keeping my workouts on a schedule and helps me stay motivated. I can track not just the guided workouts I've done through the app, but also the workouts I do elsewhere. I'm not even using the premium version, either. I likely will get it, though! The classes it offers look good, and being able to access recipes would be great.

title: Leadership & Management Skills
description:
What are the best skills to include on your resume? Which skill set will help you get hired? Do you know the difference between hard skills and soft skills? How can you share your skills, expertise, and accomplishments with prospective employers? As well as providing a history of your experience, your resume is the perfect place to highlight your strengths and abilities.

When you're adding skills to your resume or reviewing the skills required for a job you're interested in, there are two types of skills that are relevant.

Soft skills are the skills that apply to every job. These are your people skills - interpersonal skills, communication skills, and other qualities that enable you to be successful in the workplace.

Hard skills are the qualifications required to do the job. For example, computer skills, administrative skills, or customer service skills. Find out more about the difference between hard and soft skills and how to Include top skills employers want on a resume.

These are the skills that enable you to be an effective manager and lead a team or run a company.

What's new ?

Seller Job Description :

Seller Duties and Responsibilities
Seller Skills and Qualifications
Tools of the Trade
Seller Education and Training
Seller Salary and Outlook

Sales skills to master :

Product Knowledge
Strategic Prospecting Skills
Rapport Building on the Call
Buyer-Seller Agreement
Active Listening
Communication
Qualification Questioning
Time Management
Objection Prevention
Objection Handling

descriptionHTML:
What are the best skills to include on your resume? Which skill set will help you get hired? Do you know the difference between hard skills and soft skills? How can you share your skills, expertise, and accomplishments with prospective employers? As well as providing a history of your experience, your resume is the perfect place to highlight your strengths and abilities.

When you're adding skills to your resume or reviewing the skills required for a job you're interested in, there are two types of skills that are relevant.

Soft skills are the skills that apply to every job. These are your people skills - interpersonal skills, communication skills, and other qualities that enable you to be successful in the workplace.

Hard skills are the qualifications required to do the job. For example, computer skills, administrative skills, or customer service skills. Find out more about the difference between hard and soft skills and how to Include top skills employers want on a resume.

These are the skills that enable you to be an effective manager and lead a team or run a company.

What's new ?

title: Personality Test
description:
This free test, 16 personalities indicator, is an introspective self-report questionnaire with the purpose of indicating differing psychological preferences in how people perceive the world around them and make decisions.

This kind of test was constructed by Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter Isabel Briggs Myers.

It is based on the conceptual theory proposed by Carl Jung, who had speculated that humans experience the world using four principal psychological functions (sensation, intuition, feeling, thinking) and that one of these four functions is dominant for a person most of the time.

The theory of personality types contends that: An individual is either primarily Extraverted(E) or Introverted(I), either primarily Sensing(S) or Intuitive(N), either primarily Thinking(T) or Feeling(F), either primarily Judging(J) or Perceiving(P).
The possible combinations of the basic preferences form 16 different Personality Types:
‚Ä¢ Analysts: INTJ, INTP, ENTJ, ENTP
‚Ä¢ Diplomats: INFJ, INFP, ENFJ, ENFP
‚Ä¢ Sentinels: ISTJ, ISFJ, ESTJ, ESFJ
‚Ä¢ Explorers: ISTP, ESFP, ESTP, ESFP

Learning about our personality type helps us to understand why certain areas in life come easily to us, and others are more of a struggle.

Learning about other people‚Äôs personality types help us to understand the most effective way to communicate with them, and how they function best.

Practical Use

The knowledge of our and other people‚Äôs personality types help us in different areas:

Career - What types of tasks are we most suited to perform? Where are we naturally most happy?

Managing Employees - How can we best understand an employee‚Äôs natural capabilities, and where they will find the most satisfaction?

Interpersonal Relationships - How can we improve our awareness of other individuals personality type, and therefore increase our understanding of their reactions to situations, and know how to communicate with them effectively, on a level they best understand?

Education - How can we develop different teaching methods to educate different types of people effectively?

Counseling - How we can help individuals understand themselves better, and become better able to deal with their strengths and weaknesses?

comments: This is an interesting application of data that zones in on different personality types. The test categorized me as a INTJ and the accuracy of the test to me is about 95% correct. And I feel 5% INFJ. I feel in my youth INFJ was about a 50% fit and 50% INTJ. This app would seem to help with the decisions of making career choices as a suitable fit along with the understanding of your personality.

The sliding scale Interface was a difficult to understand at first, but once I understood, that you were rating how close you were to one charasteristic vs. The other, answering went smoothly. I would give 5 stars, because a scale is more accurate than simply choosing one or the other for the pare of traits. HOWEVER, the English translation of the results is really wacky. It's not unintelligible, but there a lot of weird coinages, missing auxiliary verbs and indefinite articles, etc.

Love the app, but I'm gonna be honest here. When I searched "personality test" I was really more just looking to find out what kind of bread I am. Still, I was very pleasantly suprised with this, as I believe the result to be very close to who I am as a person. 5/5

Some questions seemed vague but the result was a very good analysis of me - at least how I perceive myself. Well worth doing as it explained some of the quirkier side of my personality. I would estimate it around 97% spot on which I would think is pretty darned good for a quick, one-off test.

I really liked this! I feel like I got a lot of insight into myself; it's kind of fun reading descriptions that sounds like a narrator telling me who I am. -INFJ .. a lil bit of an INTJ? Yea ... okay üòå I am weird, and PROUD

title: Life Goals Collaborative Care
description: The Life Goals Collaborative Care application is a self-management and psychoeducational application for individuals with mood disorders. Life Goals is an evidence-based program that is designed to help individuals with mental health conditions improve their health through self-management sessions. This application is part of ongoing research and users of the application must be a consented participant to use the functionality.

title: Gratitude Garden
description:
This app will help you be happier!  It pushes you to think about what has gone right in your day, which has been shown to increase happiness.  Every time you note down what good things have happened (and there is always something), you receive points you can use to build up a garden and also a Gratitude Card with suggestions for further things you could do to increase your gratitude and happiness.  

Research shows that one of the most effective ways that people can become happier is to note down the good things that happen every day.  This shifts our focus onto what has gone right, rather than leaving us to ruminate about problems.

There is a huge amount of research indicating that the act of recalling and writing down what has gone well each day is one of the best way to increase your happiness.  One study found that gratitude journaling for ten weeks increased happiness by 25% over the people who didn't keep a gratitude journal.  Gratitude is also linked to high self-esteem, kindness, good health, energy and generosity.
  
The Gratitude Garden was designed by Izzy McRae, a coach and happiness teacher.  You can find out more information about her and her courses at www.izzymcrae.com. Neville Sattentau produced the beautiful artwork.  His website is www.nevart.co.uk.

recentChanges: Backup upload/restore issue was fixed
comments: EDIT 10/11/20 developer fixed the app! I need to try it for awhile before that 5 star and still wanted to thank her for the speed, personal attention, and thoughtfulness of her messages. Huzzah 10/6/20 I'm looking forward to a fix and reinstall! ORIGINAL REVIEW GG has been wonderful for years; it stopped saving and stopped being uploaded about 2 months ago. Too bad! I loved the garden, affirmation cards, and simplicity. It used to be so positive; now I'm just seeing lost gratitudes (the irony!)

Beautiful way to be reminded to document every days blessings .... I have been using it for a couple of years and every so often you get a gratitude reminder from the past and then you are doubly grateful that day ....

It's a great app because I am a very short tempered person and generally people don't like to connect with me. But, this app has definitely taught me to think about the good things that happen in life and to stay positive. Thank you so much...

This is a nice app, but I would prefer reminders to record my gratitude instead of being told what I previously wrote months ago. Also, when I fill in my calendar retroactively, I don't get any points. Overall, I find the illustrations beautiful, but I can't see what I have added because it blends into the background.

I love the simplicity of this app. Other gratitude apps I've tried have been too busy or new agey, and when I've started a gratitude journal in a physical notebook, I always lose track of it. This app is a great way for me to focus on the positive during a challenging period in my life. I like the inspirational cards: they are short and direct. I really like the analogy of the garden and the concept of gaining points to add to it. The only thing I would change is the visual design of the garden: if the base image was more muted, I would be able to see my garden filling with life more effectively. As it is I can't really tell how much stuff I have added. And I'd love to be able to add more animals and plants to more gardens someday. But that's a very minor quibble. Overall this app is fantastic and I highly recommend it.

title: Daily Positive Life Quotes & Sayings
description:
Research has shown that positive thoughts help with a brighter future. Now consider this, what if you could proactively change your pattern of thinking simply by reciting out load certain phrases or positive statements throughout the day do you think this would have an impact on your daily behaviours and mood? Of course! Having a more positive outlook in your mind will certainly translate to a more positive outlook in your life. Daily Positive Life Quotes and Sayings is best for person who is looking for more positivity in their lives. These quotes will bring positivity in every aspect of your life and help you succeed.


Positive Life Quotes app will help you achieve greatness in life, fight depression, overcome anger and succeed in relationships. Positive Motivation is so important in life, it helps you stop asking questions and align yourself towards your goals and aims.

description:
üèÜ Included in "The Essential Android Apps for 2018" list of the popular Lifehacker weblog.

Business Calendar 2 has everything you need in a calendar app: It provides an excellent overview of your appointments, it‚Äôs easy to use and it gives you powerful tools for planning and scheduling your events and tasks.

üéØ Your Personal Organizer
‚ñ™ calendar, schedule planner and task organizer in one app
‚ñ™ 6 clearly designed main views: month, week, day, agenda, year and tasks
‚ñ™ popup with event details directly in month view
‚ñ™ flexible daily and weekly planner, quickly adjustable to 1-14 days
‚ñ™ the calendar widget of your choice: agenda widget, month widget, week widget etc.
‚ñ™ sync with Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, Exchange etc.
‚ñ™ intuitive navigation with simple swipes between month, week and day
‚ñ™ quickly show and hide calendars with the favorite bar
‚ñ™ birthday calendar and public holidays calendar

üöÄ Quick Appointment Scheduler
‚ñ™ drag events to the right time swiftly
‚ñ™ convenient dialogs to enter event details hassle-free
‚ñ™ smart suggestions for title, location and attendees based on previous entries
‚ñ™ powerful voice input feature to add events, tasks and birthdays without any typing
‚ñ™ flexible recurrences

üîî Don‚Äôt Miss Anything
‚ñ™ status bar reminders or popup notifications
‚ñ™ snooze reminders, show map, write email to attendees or check tasks directly from notification

üé® Unique Widgets
‚ñ™ 7 professional calendar widgets
‚ñ™ agenda widget, month widget, week widget, day widget, task widget
‚ñ™ space-saving icon widget
‚ñ™ adapt each calendar widget to your personal needs

üåè Synchronized or Local
‚ñ™ sync of events with Google Calendar, Microsoft Exchange, Outlook etc. by using the Android calendar synchronization
‚ñ™ sync of tasks with Google Tasks
‚ñ™ you can also use our calendar app as local appointment scheduler and organizer if you want

üîß Always the Right Tools
‚ñ™ easily invite attendees to meetings
‚ñ™ view and answer meeting invitations in dedicated view
‚ñ™ heat map in year view to find free days quickly
‚ñ™ optional ongoing notification with event countdown
‚ñ™ live search in all views
‚ñ™ share your events and tasks easily

üéâ Add Emoticons
‚ñ™ add over 600 emoticons to your events and tasks (Emoji artwork provided free by EmojiOne: http://emojione.com)

üåü Premium Features
You can download Business Calendar 2 for free and use it free of charge as long as you want. Additionally you can unlock a lot of highly valuable premium features in our calendar app by doing a one-time payment:

‚ñ™ no ads
‚ñ™ attach files & photos
‚ñ™ integrated weather report in day, month and agenda view
‚ñ™ easily move, copy and delete events using drag&drop in our weekly planner
‚ñ™ move, copy and delete multiple events at once using multi-selection in agenda
‚ñ™ copy an event to multiple days at once, e.g. to place your work shifts in no time
‚ñ™ suggestions for locations based on the database of TomTom
‚ñ™ privately link a contact to your appointment
‚ñ™ easily create templates for new events and tasks
‚ñ™ repeating alarms
‚ñ™ individual ringtones for different calendars
‚ñ™ repeated tasks, subtasks and priorities for tasks
‚ñ™ 22 beautiful themes for the app (e.g. dark theme)
‚ñ™ additional widget themes and premium options to customize each calendar widget
‚ñ™ new calendar widget "Day Pro" showing everything that matters in one view
‚ñ™ print your schedule to PDF
‚ñ™ individually configurable font sizes
‚ñ™ import and export calendar data (.ical, .ics)

üíñ Developed with Energy and Passion
Business Calendar is developed by a small, dedicated team in Berlin. We‚Äôre completely self-sustained and only funded by the revenue of our calendar apps. By upgrading Business Calendar you will not only get a lot of professional premium features but also greatly support the continuous development of the app.

Read our tip of the week on Facebook: 
www.facebook.com/BusinessCalendar2

comments: My wait is over !!! Finally a calendar app that makes it easy to sync tasks and events and one that gives time to tasks. So far I love the appearance that I am able to create in the premium/pro version( for one time cost of only $7.49). Also the customer service is amazing . They quick to answer question. LOVE THIS APP!!!!

I've used this (Pro) version for years and it does everything I want, including syncing well with multiple Outlook and Exchange calendars. My only gripe is that if I need to make entries or edits to multiple appointments or events, the app freezes after a few entries and I either have to wait for several minutes (even if I kill the app), or reboot to get the calendar back. I've learned to live with it, but would give 5 stars if this was fixed.

This app has been mostly great, however in the last couple months the widget has stopped working. Sometimes I wake up in the morning, or check my calendar in the middle of the day and it says it's the previous day and none of the buttons will work. The only thing I can do is restart my phone. One plus 5. Edit: I am using stock launcher, and I have changed battery optimization to off we shall see if that fixes it. Thank you for the reply.

Great app. The free version offers all the features I need and more, integration with google calendars is seemless and I rarely have issues with the app. I'm not a fan of the new ad format, but I admit it was short sighted of me to initially give a 3 star rating because of that. I am changing it now to 5 stars, because this is still by far the best calendar app I've used!

Used it for a month or more, has all the extras I need. Agenda, tasks, events, all together and separate. I like you can push things forward on your calendar easily. You can set a time to complete a task so it tells you when its over due. So far so good, best one I have found.

title: Family5 - Activities, Goals and Parenting Tips
description:
Better parents, happier kids! Undivided attention for the kids through fun and development boosting activities - in as little as 5 minutes a day! 100% free and without ads! 

Family Five aims to improve the quality of today's busy family life. Parents and caretakers of kids aged 1 to 12 years old use will find inspiration for fun and development boosting activities, to do together, in the real world. They can also set goals for the family to create healthy new habits.

You will love spending meaningful time together in the real world. And even better, each of the activities contribute to the development of one or more of the 21st century most important cognitive and non-cognitive skills, such as: Creativity, Leadership, Collaboration, Critical Thinking and Perspective Taking. This way, spending quality time with your kids is not only fun, it may also improve their life outcome.

Some of the key features of the app:
- 600+ Fun and Development Boosting Activities to do with your family in the real world
- 100+ Goals to help develop Healthy Habits and Behavior
- 50+ Expert suggestions on how to handle common challenging family Situations
- Access for you, your partner and other caretakers, all in one account
- Personalized daily push notifications at the days and times most convenient for you
- Monthly tracking of over 40 cognitive and non-cognitive development areas linked to the activities
- Insightful information on key development areas of your children (and yourself)

Family Five is the practical parenting companion for young parents who don't have time to read a dozen books and magazines or browse hundreds of blogs and social media groups to find what they need. 

We would love to hear from you so please drop us a line at feedback@familyfive.app

Read more about our terms and conditions and our privacy policy here:
https://familyfive.app/terms-of-service
https://familyfive.app/privacy-policy
descriptionHTML:
Better parents, happier kids! Undivided attention for the kids through fun and development boosting activities - in as little as 5 minutes a day! 100% free and without ads!

Family Five aims to improve the quality of today's busy family life. Parents and caretakers of kids aged 1 to 12 years old use will find inspiration for fun and development boosting activities, to do together, in the real world. They can also set goals for the family to create healthy new habits.

You will love spending meaningful time together in the real world. And even better, each of the activities contribute to the development of one or more of the 21st century most important cognitive and non-cognitive skills, such as: Creativity, Leadership, Collaboration, Critical Thinking and Perspective Taking. This way, spending quality time with your kids is not only fun, it may also improve their life outcome.

Some of the key features of the app:
- 600+ Fun and Development Boosting Activities to do with your family in the real world
- 100+ Goals to help develop Healthy Habits and Behavior
- 50+ Expert suggestions on how to handle common challenging family Situations
- Access for you, your partner and other caretakers, all in one account
- Personalized daily push notifications at the days and times most convenient for you
- Monthly tracking of over 40 cognitive and non-cognitive development areas linked to the activities
- Insightful information on key development areas of your children (and yourself)

Family Five is the practical parenting companion for young parents who don't have time to read a dozen books and magazines or browse hundreds of blogs and social media groups to find what they need.

We would love to hear from you so please drop us a line at feedback@familyfive.app

Read more about our terms and conditions and our privacy policy here:
https://familyfive.app/terms-of-service
https://familyfive.app/privacy-policy
summary: Raising happy kids with positive parenting. Strengths-based and forward looking.
recentChanges: Improvements
comments: I absolutely love the learning about how to handle certain different situations and then using the activities to practice better parenting. My daughter is 10 and she told me she likes the activities that are suggested here in the app. It's definitely been helpful and I wish I would have had something like this when she was little!

Just setting up the app and reviewing the lessons provided I have realized the advice is given to, using sets of age groups. The age group this app seems to target are 1yr - 12yrs of age. My children are a bit older then that, for that reason I give two stars. I'll continue to fiddle through the app before uninstalling for good.

Not only does the app contain EVERYTHING it promises; it contains SO MUCH MORE! Step by step activities, realistic goals & situations, encouraging journal entries at beneficial times. ALL THIS WITH THE SUPERVISION & DIRECTION OF QUALIFIED PERSONNEL!
Love it!! This app has so many topics to learn. Activities to do with your child that promotes good behavior or learning skills as well as better parenting.
I've used this to give me ideas during quarantine, and I gotta say it's informative

comments: This app is great. One thing though. I just wish the consistency with the refacing was better. I feel it depends on the picture taken and used. Doesn't compketely replace the actosr face to resemble your face. Some of the clips seem like they do not change a bit. Is there a way to better the consistency of the refacing? If so, then I would give the app a 5 star rating. Thank you

I got the pro initially. After using it often I was told the unlimited was available. I was charged for both. Upset I emailed your customer service : Hello. As far as I understand, you're using an Android phone. You should try reinstalling the app, this usually helps On Sun, Oct 25, 2020 at 3:11 PM adavsamuel wrote: I signed up for the pro, but if I upgrade to unlimited will I be charged for both in a year. How can I just have the unlimited? Please advise, Ada

At first the app is fine and its fun to use. I didnt mind the fact I had to wait seven minutes to use it again but the second time I have to wait half an hour? The moment you open the app it already asks you to pay to use it which is annoying. I have no issues with how the app runs, but its how they try to make you pay for using it that annoys me.

I really love this app I'm having so much fun! My only problem is accessing my gallery. The lag time is RIDICULOUS I can only see about 20 pics and the rest are just black. Any suggestions? UPDATE: 10/30 After messaging a few times and Uninstalling and reinstalling the app I am really enjoying it. The longer videos are great!

Fun app but minus 1 star for two reasons... 1. Kept me up all night. Had I paid for the full version, I could have been sleeping most of the night but I had to support the app by watching 30 second ads before each reface. 2. I get the ads but maybe not before each reface, maybe every other one. At least change the ads up a little. Most of the time you're watching the same ad like that's going to make me buy the product. Anyway, it's a fun app. If you really like it, pay for it.

title: Action For Happiness
description:
