title: YNAB ‚Äî Budget, Personal Finance
description:
YNAB will help you break the paycheck to paycheck cycle, get out of debt, and save more money. On average, new users save $600 in the first two months, and more than $6,000 in the first year. Try it free for 34 days. 

KEY FEATURES:
Bank Syncing
Easily connect all your accounts in one place and import your transactions, so you always have up-to-date information.
Transaction Matching
Prefer to enter transactions yourself? You can! YNAB will match up imported transactions with those you enter yourself so your account balances are always accurate.
On the Go
Real-time access to all your budget data across multiple devices means you can budget with a partner and always have the info you need to make good spending decisions.
Goal Tracking
Go beyond an expense tracker. Set goals and immediately see when you'll be able to reach them.
Reporting Bliss 
Detailed, visual spending and trend reports help you measure progress and improve.
Personal Support
Our friendly support team is available around the clock via email, live chat, and offer 100+ free, live budgeting workshops every week.

You‚Äôve Never Budgeted Like This Before‚Ä¶
YNAB is unlike any personal finance app, expense tracker, or money management system you‚Äôve tried before, because it is based on our proven method‚ÄîYNAB‚Äôs Four Rules. The powerful combination of award-winning budget apps and our life-changing budgeting method means it actually works. Using YNAB, hundreds of thousands of people have learned how to get control of their finances, stop stressing, and live the life they want to live. You can be one of them!

A Proven Method‚ÄîYNAB‚Äôs Four Rules 
Rule One: Give Every Dollar A Job | Be intentional about what you want your money to do before you spend it. By tracking your expenses you will make better decisions.Rule Two: Embrace Your True Expenses | More than just an expense tracker, YNAB can help you prepare for the future. Break up larger, less frequent expenses into smaller, more manageable amounts. By budgeting monthly for insurance premiums, holidays, or car repairs, when the time comes, your money is ready and waiting to do its job.Rule Three: Roll With The Punches | When life changes, so must your budget. Make adjustments and move along. Flexible budgets succeed because they‚Äôre guilt-free, realistic, and sustainable. Good money management habits are ones you can stick with.Rule Four: Age Your Money | As you repeat the first three rules, you‚Äôll increase the time between the moment you earn a dollar and the moment you need to spend it. When your money is at least a month old, you‚Äôll have finally broken the paycheck to paycheck cycle for good. Your personal finances will never feel the same again. In a good way.Free for 34 Days
We don‚Äôt want your money unless you feel like YNAB is helping you gain control of yours. In fact, we offer a No-Risk, 100% Money-Back Guarantee. At any point, if you don‚Äôt feel like you have more control of your money with YNAB, we‚Äôll give you a full refund. No questions asked.
descriptionHTML:
YNAB will help you break the paycheck to paycheck cycle, get out of debt, and save more money. On average, new users save $600 in the first two months, and more than $6,000 in the first year. Try it free for 34 days.

KEY FEATURES:
Bank Syncing
Easily connect all your accounts in one place and import your transactions, so you always have up-to-date information.
Transaction Matching
Prefer to enter transactions yourself? You can! YNAB will match up imported transactions with those you enter yourself so your account balances are always accurate.
On the Go
Real-time access to all your budget data across multiple devices means you can budget with a partner and always have the info you need to make good spending decisions.
Goal Tracking
Go beyond an expense tracker. Set goals and immediately see when you'll be able to reach them.
Reporting Bliss
Detailed, visual spending and trend reports help you measure progress and improve.
Personal Support
Our friendly support team is available around the clock via email, live chat, and offer 100+ free, live budgeting workshops every week.

You‚Äôve Never Budgeted Like This Before‚Ä¶
YNAB is unlike any personal finance app, expense tracker, or money management system you‚Äôve tried before, because it is based on our proven method‚ÄîYNAB‚Äôs Four Rules. The powerful combination of award-winning budget apps and our life-changing budgeting method means it actually works. Using YNAB, hundreds of thousands of people have learned how to get control of their finances, stop stressing, and live the life they want to live. You can be one of them!

A Proven Method‚ÄîYNAB‚Äôs Four Rules
Rule One: Give Every Dollar A Job | Be intentional about what you want your money to do before you spend it. By tracking your expenses you will make better decisions.
Rule Two: Embrace Your True Expenses | More than just an expense tracker, YNAB can help you prepare for the future. Break up larger, less frequent expenses into smaller, more manageable amounts. By budgeting monthly for insurance premiums, holidays, or car repairs, when the time comes, your money is ready and waiting to do its job.
Rule Three: Roll With The Punches | When life changes, so must your budget. Make adjustments and move along. Flexible budgets succeed because they‚Äôre guilt-free, realistic, and sustainable. Good money management habits are ones you can stick with.
Rule Four: Age Your Money | As you repeat the first three rules, you‚Äôll increase the time between the moment you earn a dollar and the moment you need to spend it. When your money is at least a month old, you‚Äôll have finally broken the paycheck to paycheck cycle for good. Your personal finances will never feel the same again. In a good way.
Free for 34 Days
We don‚Äôt want your money unless you feel like YNAB is helping you gain control of yours. In fact, we offer a No-Risk, 100% Money-Back Guarantee. At any point, if you don‚Äôt feel like you have more control of your money with YNAB, we‚Äôll give you a full refund. No questions asked.
summary: Reach goals, easily track every expense, and gain total control of your money.
recentChanges: We fixed a bug which prevented some users from authenticating after following a link.
comments: A new update has made approving my transactions very confusing. Update: The issue seemed to disappear after a day or two. I've been using YNAB for over a year. It has provided a huge reduction in budgeting stress for me. 10/10, would recommend!

If you are using a bank other than those chosen by YNAB you will need to log into each account every time you use the app and sometimes while you're using the app. From that issue alone it's not worth it. I asked for a refund with no reply.
It is a top notch app but I agree that regional pricing is necessary. The monthly fee is what I would be able and willing to pay for an annual subscription. USD12 a month is 50 bucks here.

App has lots of potential. it doesn't link previous transactions to the day you start, make sure its the first day of the month when you start. The bad part is once it syncs with your bank it might not do it again for hours or days; my CC and banks are always off sync. Has serious problems staying linked to credit cards. Now it supports less banks. The customer service denies issues and gives the most useless "fixes", like "import it" or "enter by hand".

This app is a great way to get your finances under control, whether you're paycheck to paycheck or you have some savings and want to be able to allocate that savings. (If you have $1500 in the bank, you want to be sure you don't think that you have $1000 for home maintenance, $500 for auto maintenance, $500 for surprise medical bills, $500 to spend on Christmas, etc. This app can both get you through the week/month, and make sure you don't overcommit if you have future expenses to plan for.

title: Emotional intelligence
description: The main goal of this application is to help you have full awareness of your feelings. Self-awareness is the first step for those seeking a high level of emotional intelligence. Most of the time, we do not stop to think about how we are feeling. Be aware of your emotions helps you take action to change the situation. In the reports, you can view your progress (emotional balance) separated by months. So you will know yourself better. You will get motivated whenever necessary. You will have more empathy and will have better professional and personal relationships.
descriptionHTML: The main goal of this application is to help you have full awareness of your feelings. Self-awareness is the first step for those seeking a high level of emotional intelligence. Most of the time, we do not stop to think about how we are feeling. Be aware of your emotions helps you take action to change the situation. In the reports, you can view your progress (emotional balance) separated by months. So you will know yourself better. You will get motivated whenever necessary. You will have more empathy and will have better professional and personal relationships.
summary: How are you feeling? Self-awareness, anger management and emotional development
comments: we're obligated to fill up anxiety levels everytime and the minimum choice is one or half star, so we're always at least a bit anxious on our records? also, i saw my self reporting that I'm feeling good most of the time, perhaps we should have a "neutral" option for when we have no emotions? I'm uninstalling this app as it didn't really seem useful at all a while, and I'm just reporting a same thing (1 star of anxiety and Good).

I like the concept to keep track of anxiety levels and feelings. However, I am considering if I should uninstall it. The choices for emotions are not very useful to my situation. I guess I am very literal and could not find an option that would apply to me. Other than that, I have not found any other app that would match it in its simplicity and usefulness.
Somewhat useful. I am more mindful of my thoughts since using it. Not much depth beyond feelings and anxiety. Could use a "neutral" emotion option.

I like tracking my emotions. It would be nice to log a sentence or two about what my thoughts are at that time or what I am doing at that time. "I.e anxiety 5, stressed ---> I am at work. Caseload is heavy. I dont know how I'll get through my day."
It is a great app with the ability to track your emotions over time. However, the listed emotions are limited and users would benefit from a feature that allows one to customize emotions.

title: Emotional Intelligence
description:
Emotional intelligence is the ability to identify and manage your own emotions and the emotions of others. It is generally said to include three skills: emotional awareness; the ability to harness emotions and apply them to tasks like thinking and problem solving; and the ability to manage emotions, which includes regulating your own emotions and cheering up or calming down other people.
Emotional intelligence is a very important skill in leadership. It is said to have five main elements such as - self-awareness, self-regulation, motivation, empathy, and social skills. 

Let‚Äôs understand each one of them in detail. What is self-awareness? If you are self-aware of what you are going through, you would be in a better position to understand others, and affect people around you. It also means you are aware of your strengths as well as weaknesses. When you experience anger, hold that moment and think what made you so angry. Keeping a journal always helps. 

What are social skills? The last aspect is social skills and it is one of the important aspects. Social skills are all about communicating your point of view to. They are able to build a rapport with others which makes the relationship more comfortable.

title: Hours Tracker: Keep work log, work day timesheet
description:
Work Hours Tracker helps you track your work time and easily keep a work log. Simple, straightforward and organized.

The perfect work hours tracker and time clock for self-employed, freelancers, contractors, hourly workers and employees. Calculate your earnings, invoice or next pay stub.

Tracked work hours can be exported as an Excel time-sheet, submitted to payroll or used to draft your invoices.

Time Squared is not a free service. The free download allows a limited number of time entries to be tracked as part of a free trial. Healthcare and other essential services professionals or those negatively affected by the current economic downturn may opt-in to use the app for free (T&C may apply).

Key Benefits:
‚Ä¢ Save time and maintain accuracy with automatic hour tracker. Done via location/GPS. Turn ON/OFF as you see fit, or adjust when it'll activate.
‚Ä¢ Stay organized by keeping track of work hours and seeing reports by pay period, week or month
‚Ä¢ Earn your full due, by easily keeping track of daily and overtime hours and pay
‚Ä¢ Reduce the clutter and hassle in your life with simple one-click time calculator
‚Ä¢ View how long you've been working at a glance with notification widget

How it works:
You can use the app in two ways:
‚Ä¢ Punch in when you start workday and punch out when your work is finished. You can also track any breaks you take during this period.
‚Ä¢ Simply add a new time entry. Define the start and end and you're good to go.


Your work log hours are saved to your account and backed up to the cloud. This data is simply for your timesheet reference and not used by us for any other purpose.


Ideal work hour tracker for people that work with multiple clients or jobs, e.g: trades professionals, contractors, accountants, lawyers, self-employed, construction...

‚Ä¢ Flexible work hours tracker; time calculator for single or multiple jobs

When generating a time-sheet you can decide to export data for a specific project/job and a mixture of time periods: current workday, week, or pay period. Giving you the flexibility to export the work hours you want.

The generated file will include all information. It will also include times in decimal format.

‚Ä¢ Save time and reuse information

Information like clients, projects and hourly rates are saved and re-used automatically. Keeping your work log up to date has never been so easy.

‚Ä¢ View earnings:
- by month, week, workday, custom pay period (e.g: bi-weekly)
- as time-sheet for individual project
Daily and weekly overtime work hours and rates are tracked and applied automatically. Set up when overtime kicks in via the settings.

‚Ä¢ Sharable time-sheet

You can share your work log as an attachment. Email it, text or use a messaging app. You can also simply keep it as a spreadsheet file, used with Excel, Sheets or OpenOffice.

If you have Google Drive, Dropbox or similar apps installed on your phone, you can save your time-sheet straight to these services.

‚Ä¢ Safe backup with cloud sync

Your work log information is all automatically synced to the cloud, so you can work and get paid worry free!
Using your hour tracker for work but suddenly have to restart your phone? or run out of power? No problem! The timer will keep on running and you won't lose your work log no matter what!

‚Ä¢ Who is work hours tracker for?

Our hour tracker is for contractors, business owners, self-employed, hourly employees and freelancers, anyone who would need to track work hours using a work time clock app.

Hours Tracker is made by Time Squared co. Send us your feedback!

developerAddress: 2008 Rosser Ave, Unit 2106, Burnaby, BC, V5C 0H8, Canada
recentChanges: Fix freeze bug on Android 8 and 9
comments: I use this app to keep up with my own time and to verify that my paychecks are correct. In one month, it's already helped me catch an error that would have cost me about $150 in lost wages. I would have given it 5 stars, but I wish it was more customizable to a 3rd shift schedule. My work week does start on Sunday, but my Sunday starts on Saturday night and it splits my wages, so i have to trick it by putting all the hours after midnight.

I really like the app. Especially since it notifies me that I have to clock in clock out. You have to set it up though but I am glad it has that option I Hope to figure out how to do a different format on the timesheet part of it. But other than that it's a great app . And it be nice if it didn't quarter out where I'm at working if I'm there for a long period of time.

This app is fantastic. I just made the switch to full-time freelancing and have multiple contracts with different companies. This app makes it super easy to keep track of my hours and separate my rates and pay for my different contracts. The best part is being able to create a detailed timesheet for invoices with the press of a button. I know this sounds super advertisement-y, but these are my actual thoughts. I ain't no sheep.

It's almost perfect but there's one big problem. It doesn't have the option to select a pay period of bi-weekly. It has twice monthly but not bi-weekly which is unfortunate because it renders the app completely useless for people with schedules like that. Which happens to be the majority of the workforce of factory workers like me.

Edit: It's working Edit(10/13/2020): App has become completely unresponsive, after trying to get me to rate the app, which I have done. It would not let me access anything other then the homepage which is no better then a picture of what I could be doing Currently at time of posting, the app has become extremely slow and glitches out so badly it will crash or nothing will happen till you go to close the app. Please fix because the app itself has been super useful for me to keep track of my pay

title: Correlate - Health Diary and Life Journal
description:
Correlate is a smart life-journal app that helps you understand why are you feeling sick thanks to a scientific algorithm. It's very effective with flu symptoms, allergy symptoms and also gut health. 

How many times you said that you want to improve your health, or simply that you want to get rid of symptoms like:
- Flu symptoms: fever, nausea, vomiting, lassitude, bowel movements
- Allergy symptoms or skin issues: hay fever, pollen allergy, dust allergy, food intolerances
- Gut health: bowel movement, diarrhea, irritable bowel
- Mood disorders: stress, anxiety, depression, migraine, headache, bipolar disorder

The app has multiple usages:
üíä  health book / therapy journal / medication log: record your symptoms and medications
üçé  habit tracker / food diary: keep a daily journal of your habits or food
üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è  symptoms checker: like a medical journal, enter your sick days streaks and get a self diagnosis from correlations
ü§ß  specific uses: headache diary, flu tracker
üßò‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è  other: pain journal, mood tracker, allergy tracker, anxiety journal, event logger, sleep journal.

With Correlate you can now discover the origin of your illnesses, and improve health. It has been designed to help you manage pain, stress, and develop healthy habits: it's a perfect medical assistant always in your pocket. 

Are you striving for a symptoms analysis or a pain diagnosis? With this symptoms tracker you can easily analyze and track behaviors to discover symptoms related causes. The best symptoms checker among health apps and habits tracking apps.

When you can use it?
Many people are suffering from allergy symptoms, headaches, chronic pains, intolerances, mood disorders, stress symptoms, and they are feeling sick without a diagnosed cause. How often are you thinking: "I'm feeling sick and I need to discover my sickness origin?". With the help of a habit tracker (also a symptom tracker / activities tracker) you can track activities, symptoms, mood, habits, medicines, and understand how they are related to each other. You may find out that your chronic headaches causes is celiac disease, lactose intolerance, allergy to gluten, pollens, dust or other allergens, chrons disease, or that they are symptoms of stress (stress headaches). It's a food diary (diet journal), a symptom checker, a mood tracker, a food diary, a habit tracker, an activities tracker, a pain diary and a medicine logger all in one app.

Features:
- Calendar event tracker: Track habitual activities, record medical symptoms, log simple habits, check daily routines, track moods and keep a food journal all in one place. Different diaries allows you to record any event with a simple calendar.
- Statistics: analyze symptoms frequency, and perform triage on yourself: are you feeling sick very often? Did you forget a pill? Is your workout calendar on track? Are you developing good weekly or monthly habits? Are you eating health food often enough? Everything is under control.
- Correlation analysis: discover if you are allergic to anything, and how you can change habits to improve health, or improve pain management. Learn what makes you sick or give you issues and cut it from your diet / routine / habits.
- Export data: export your food log / pain journal / diet log / symptom diary, save it or share it.
- Develop healthy habits: when you track habits and you discover that they help you feel better, go for it! Improve your food management by reiterating healthy food habits, understand your headache symptoms and live a better life.

Warning: Correlate is just one of the many medical apps on the store. It does not substitute doctor visits, and it does not provide a professional diagnosis for your symptoms. However, Correlate can help you and your doctor to track your activities and better understand your symptoms.

- Export data: export your food log / pain journal / diet log / symptom diary, save it or share it.
- Develop healthy habits: when you track habits and you discover that they help you feel better, go for it! Improve your food management by reiterating healthy food habits, understand your headache symptoms and live a better life.

Warning: Correlate is just one of the many medical apps on the store. It does not substitute doctor visits, and it does not provide a professional diagnosis for your symptoms. However, Correlate can help you and your doctor to track your activities and better understand your symptoms.
summary: Health symptoms tracker: stop feeling sick and develop health habits
recentChanges: Don't just keep track of your life. Improve your health!
comments: Would be great if the app gave the option to track the time along with the date of the symptom. The time of day is just as important as the date itself and a pretty standard question providers ask when asking patients about their symptoms. I have to keep a time and date log while wearing a heart monitor so they can correlate the two but I don't see how to do that. I will be requesting a refund.

The app is quite good but you need to add more functions and more details, add stuff that would keep your customers motivated to use it. E.g if you use the app and enter data you have an animal that grows as you enter data every day. Once that animal grows you get another animal or plant or a garden or something that you'd care for while caring for yourself.
Quite impressed but the calendar could do with improvement, need to be able to set a time for items and have a repeat options. But all in all it seems pretty good.
Weird unintuitive interface, doesn't allow you to select more than 1 item e.g. when I add activity it deselect mood and it won't generate a list of items you've selected. Doesn't make any sense.

after playing with the app a bit more I'm going to have to pause in my use. I love the simplistic way of checking off symptoms as I have them and the ability to find correlations. how ever this would be helpful for gathering the frequency of my symptoms. I'm currently using the flexable journal app if that app would correlate like yours with more flexability in what and how you can correlate and link it would be an amazing program

title: Microsoft To Do: List, Task & Reminder
description:
Microsoft To Do is a task management app to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day. You can use Microsoft To Do to make shopping lists or task lists, take notes, record collections, plan an event, or set reminders to increase your productivity and focus on what matters to you. Microsoft To Do makes it easy to stay organized and manage your life.

Accomplish what's meaningful and important to you each day with My Day and Suggestions, your personalized daily planner tools. Intelligent suggestions recommend tasks from across your lists that may be relevant for the day. From grocery lists to housecleaning routines, daily tasks are simple with To Do. When you're quickly switching between contexts and tasks, it's important to have tools that help you achieve what matters. Microsoft To Do helps you quickly capture and retrieve your lists and tasks across devices and between multiple accounts.

Capture tasks from different Microsoft apps and services and sync them with Microsoft To Do. Flag emails as tasks in Outlook or any email account hosted by Microsoft, add to lists with Cortana, and see tasks assigned to you from Microsoft Planner. Get peace of mind knowing that your tasks and lists are hosted on the Microsoft 365 service ‚Äì one of the most reliable services with industry-leading security offerings.

Microsoft To Do‚Äôs modern, easy-to-use experience makes your lists unique, with customizable features like emoji in lists, colorful themes, dark mode, and more. Plus, shared lists help you stay connected and collaborate with family, friends, and colleagues.
 
Microsoft To Do features:

Daily planner
‚Ä¢ A daily planner personalized with suggested tasks: My Day
‚Ä¢ To do lists are accessible anywhere, on any device
‚Ä¢ Share lists and assign tasks with your friends, family, colleagues, and classmates
‚Ä¢ Task management features break your tasks into manageable steps
‚Ä¢ Take notes to add to any task
‚Ä¢ Group lists together by topic or project

Task manager
‚Ä¢ Add reminders, tasks and lists with the To Do widget
‚Ä¢ Daily organizer personalized with bold and colorful backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Reminders with one-time or recurring due dates
‚Ä¢ Make task lists and switch between school, work, and personal lists 
‚Ä¢ Attach up to 25 MB of files to any task

To Do lists for any purpose
‚Ä¢ Bill planner
‚Ä¢ Shopping list
‚Ä¢ Reminders
‚Ä¢ Task management
‚Ä¢ Take notes
‚Ä¢ And more

Office 365 integration
‚Ä¢ Sync reminders and task lists between Outlook and To Do
‚Ä¢ Lists and tasks are hosted with the security of Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Task lists are compiled from the apps and services across Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Add multiple Microsoft accounts 

Microsoft To Do helps you organize and simplify your plans, whether it's for work, school, or home.

To Do is free and available across the web and iOS, Mac, Android, and Windows devices.
 
Learn more: https://to-do.microsoft.com
Follow us on Twitter: @MicrosoftToDo
Have an idea or feature suggestion? https://todo.uservoice.com/
Need support? https://todosupport.helpshift.com/
By installing Microsoft To Do, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=842575

summary: Increase productivity! Make a daily to do list, create a reminder & share notes!
recentChanges: In this release we have made fixes to improve Sync in To Do.
comments: Love the app but have a few suggestions to make it even better. Have scheduled todo items show up on the Outlook calendar app; This would be awesome!! Have an option to hide certain lists from "my day". I have some lists I use as filler projects when there's free time and I don't want them taking priority over other necessary items I haven't scheduled yet. Thank you for a great app thus far!

For me, the best app for organizing your life. But some things should be improved though: 1. You can't set Monday as the first day of the week. 2. Having some of your notes appear both in Planned and Tasks and some in Planned but not in Tasks is bewildering. Besides Planned and Tasks there are two more lists - My Day and Important. Why so many overlapping lists? 3. You can't change fixed time for reminder alarm. For example, "tomorrow" is always at 9 a.m. You can't change that to, say, 10 a.m. 4. You can't set quick alarm. For example you can't type some note and then tap "remind me in half an hour" or in 15 minutes, in two hours etc. There's no such option. 5. You can't insert a photo or voice recording into your reminders. 6. You can't protect your reminders and notes with a password. Anyone can read them.

Redudant and limiting. There should be a way to share specific lists, but keep some private-a "Honey-Do"list; to be able to schedule minders for the 3rd level items and further break down tasks; to be able to reorder 3rd level sending completed to bottom; to be able to prioritize which list I want at the top and if I don't use Important, Planned, Tasks, then I want to move it down and pin what I want on top; to be able to set custom alarms, not notifications, for very important things...

Used to take the place of Wunderlist. Actually liking it much better. It would be helpful to see who created the task, who edited it and when. Also being able to add comments others would notice was an addition, or ask questions on it that would alert the creator there was a comment/question, would be super helpful. Other than that, very satisfied.

Granted, I just downloaded the app, but I have yet to find anything useful about it. Copy/pasting in and then reorganizing a basic task list took me about a half hour (seriously? No drag and drop?) and I haven't been able to figure out how to share a task list with someone else. If I can't share the task list, why is there an "assigned to me" toggle? Instructions on the MS website seem to be referencing a completely different version than the one I have. Utterly useless and frustrating.

comments: Omvana app is extremely easy to use, the fact that you can incorporate any background sound just takes this app to a different level. My morning routine has changed from Wake up - Brush - coffee to Wake up - Brush - Omvana - coffee :) The experience is absolutely spectacular...I strongly recommend to download this wonderful app. Thank you Vishen :)

Overall I enjoy this app. The content is great and the underlaying additional deep tones under the meditations are nice. Having said that: I am going to have to start taking stars away. Several bugs have become more and more noticable, prominent, and now: down right annoying. Meditations are consistently stopping mid way. Program utilized and or paid for are constantly disappearing from my library. The undertones also randomly stop. Really doesn't look good for a $70/yr app.

Access to my favorite courses/files fails very often. Playback is stopping in the middle of meditations even if the app has no system restrictions to use power or whatever. The app is updated to the latest versions always. Some sound files are with disturbing backround noises ... like recorded in a office, kitchen or where ever. I would love to use this app but this renders the app useless.

This app is so great, and thank god, there's lots of free learning, meditations of various lengths and complexity, and choice of wonderful collection of background ambient sounds, or silence. Thanks so much Vishen for making all of this available. I especially love the 6 Phase Meditation üíúüôèüíúü¶ã

Great app with so many different classes and meditations. Love that we can filter them. However, the circle makes it difficult to move back and or forth when it comes to lessons. Maybe having a button to press to go back 10 seconds?

title: Leadership Development
description:
Leadership is not something you are born with nor it is inherited. Our Leadership Development Course will teach you how to identify your strengths and utilize them to influence others, allows you to understand the importance of being a leader and how you can motivate others to do better. 

It is important to develop leadership qualities, especially in the work force. It gives your boss a reason to put you in charge and to promote you to better positions. The important thing is to understand that there are several types of leadership styles and to use one that matches the corporate culture you are in. 

Included in our Leadership Development Course:

* What is leadership 
* What is the difference between a leader vs manager
* What are the characteristics of a leader
* How to Lead and Influence People
* Getting the Most from your Team
* What is the most effective leadership style
* What leadership traits are valued in the workplace 
* 10 Ways to be a Better Leader

Once you practice and perfect the Leadership skills demonstrated in this course you will be ready to take on new challenges both in your personal and professional lives. Don't stop here, download our FREE Leadership Development Course today and start learning the skills you will evidently need in your future.

Being a good leader ties into your self confidence and self esteem. It is important to have a good self image in order to be a great leader. We have numerous bonus apps included in our guide. Check out our Finding Your Confidence app for more information on improving your self esteem and self confidence.

It's a really good book, with a wonderful introduction. I am already in love with the book although I have not yet read it to the end. title: ClientiApp - Client management
description:
A powerful CRM app for salesman, self employed, and in general anyone who need to manage clients. Client registry, Google maps, GPS navigation, activity logs, paper document archiving.

Customer registry
Adding a new customer is easy and straightforward, insert only the fields you need (even just the name). You can add custom fields if the default ones are not enough. You can also add customers while on the go, the GPS will set the location automatically.
You can also assign tags and zones, search by name, search by address or any other field you've specified.

Plan your visits
Find your customers on the map and get street directions to them

Keep track of all the things you've done with your customers

Each customer has its own "activity log" in which you can write small notes, events, reminders, everything you may need to remember and record. You can also take picture of paper documents 

Online synchronization (PRO ONLINE version)

Keep your data synchronized across multiple devices. Access the online web service via any modern browser where you can manage the customers exactly as you do on the app

Other features available on the PRO and PRO ONLINE versions

‚Ä¢ Migrate all your data on another device moving just one single file
‚Ä¢ Make backups of all your data and store them safely on another media
‚Ä¢ Take pictures of documents, archive them and share them!
‚Ä¢ Create sale notes and generate sales reports!
‚Ä¢ Import clients from a CSV file
‚Ä¢ Search customers by name, phone, address or any other fields. Search notes as well
‚Ä¢ Categories for notes
‚Ä¢ Integration with Google calendar

comments: I have tested nearly every CRM out there and i HATE THEM for charging a monthly fee - what you only find out after you have registered with them. Clienti was the first app i found that i can use without the need of a registration, though there is such an option where you can pay 4 EUROS per month to backup your data, what i do not need and like but that is my own opinion.  One main reason why i do not wanted to register with the other big CRM players is the data - nobody knows that they do with the data that you enter and specially the amount of money and sensitive contact information. And they also lack, just like clienti a bit, in having no "open" import or export option. Thats obvious because they do not want you to move from one service to other and take your data with you.  Otherwise i love the ClientiApp, though these few things might be hopefully changed in the near future:  IMPORT FUNCTION To import your data you need to upload a CSV file to the clienti website. As i mentioned above, i want my data to be secure and kept with me.  MANUAL There is a "Group" option where you can create a group but i have not found out what this is good for.
Perfect for what I need. I would give it 5 stars if there was a mileage tracker. Otherwise, it should be every subcontractor's go to app!

This app is perfect for my needs. As a canine massage therapist, I can list clients and their dogs as well as specific conditions and session notes for each individual dog. I tried quite a few other apps and none of them could deliver like this one. Thanks for a great app!
Really useful customer database. Can run a small business with this CRM. Well done and keep up the good work.
Absolutely wonderful app for my Dog Business. The Tags are great and make organizing my clients easy. Would definitely recommend and I'm definitely buying the Pro version!

title: Client Records: CRM, Customer Contacts & Leads App
description:
CRM Software to manage client contacts, notes, appointments and bills on the go. Calendar, Assistant and messaging integration. SMS  and Email notification for appointments and billing reminders. NO Internet, NO Data Plan, NO Mobile network needed.  Design your App with custom fields.  App works in offline mode on both tablets & phones.  Have client in your pocket! Grow your business with effective customer relationship management while on the go.

** We do NOT have access to your private customer data
** Free Trial for 2 weeks

FEATURES
-  Mini, Micro B2C Enterprises such as Caterer, Bakers, Sellers, Newspaper stand dealers & distributors can customize database form fields to design their own app

- Create Customer database groups for  tagging, labelling, linking clients, workflow stages, etc. Send SMS Broadcast to groups. View Group Client Map to optimize your travel. Use location insights to grow your business. Useful for Repair Shops,Seamstresses, Rental Shops etc.

- Self-employed Freelancers or tutors in the business of teaching Dance, Karate, Piano, Saxophone, Music or Yoga can view historical activities entered for the student contact. Import Clients directly from existing contacts

- Automatic Leads Generation from phone calls. Track leads & prospects

- Automatic Birthday Reminders : Useful to Astrologer, Tarot Reader & Baby sitters

overall very happy with the app and its features however when I switched to a new phone I downloaded the app and realized there is no way to switch my data from my old phone to this one which has a cracked screen and now I lost / 136 client files and can't for the life of me figure out how to get them back if there's a solution for this that'd be great I don't understand I paid for the app yet there's no way for me to get my client data

Worst app ever it's just a scam to get your money for a very limited tool not usable for my field and despite reaching out immediately after 100 dollars was take form me they have refused to give me any refund at all even partial one. It is not capturing leads whenever a call comes

title: Management: Lord of Dungeons
description:
Lords of Dungeons: Raid Contents Updates
Behold! At last, the hidden new secrets are revealed!
Discover New Companions, New Bosses!
New Dimension rift with Stronger Powerful challenges!
Are you ready to take a new journey? Check it out now!

„ÄìFeatures„Äì
‚òÖ More than 400 companions, capture monsters!
Player manages 'Battle, Exploration, Station, Monster' systems and fosters more than 400 companions with 30 kinds of the job such as Archer, Shield Knight, Mage, Adventurer, Healer, Blacksmith, Toolmaker, Treasurer, Tax collector, Glacier explorer, Mountain explorer.
It will fulfill that the intellectual desire of player who likes ‚Äòthinking and strategy' by accomplishing the missions such as 'Battle, Exploration, Station, Monster' with assembling more than 10 companions.

‚òÖ Various missions and Free Resources.
'Dimension Cubes' - Five wild boss monsters await you! The huge and outrageous 'Field Boss + Alliance World Boss' touch your self-esteem and test the personality of the members of the Alliance! Test your party's abilities through the 18 floors‚Äô hell and the 12 gates in the "Crack of the Dimension!"

‚òÖ 100 exploration areas, more than 170 dungeons! 24 hours are not enough to play!!
'Lord of Dungeons' is a new concept 24-hour dungeon management simulation game that allows you to manage over 100 exploration areas and more than 170 dungeons. Explore the new area, fight with players over the world, complete for the most powerful lord‚Äôs throne. A player can greet or capture the monsters for increasing combat power when a player meets a monster.

‚òÖ A game to learn about town management, profit research, personnel, and economy!
Build and develop various facilities such as 'bank, tavern, restaurant, hospital, market, bathhouse, university, parks, general store, and library in town. Trade on the auction, collect enormous wealth, recruit companions and expand your dungeon with gold and resources of the facilities.

‚òÖ Various fostering contents, Let's become emperor of all!
A player can increase the quantity and profit of the facility by expanding the town and can save time and resources by establishing an "Association" when all conditions are met.
Become an 'Emperor' who cannot be overlooked by anyone, as Improving your research, construction, education, management, and trade abilities with 'Industry' system while raising your ‚ÄòTitle‚Äô.


„ÄåLoad of Dungeons„Äç Playable Device
- Android 5.0 or higher
- RAM: 1GB or higher (2GB or higher recommended)
- Recommended Quad-Core CPUs
 * Performance may vary depending on the model.
 * Some models are not supported.
 * The SIM free device is not supported.


Brand New Dungeon Management Game
Lord of Dungeons!

comments: Still some recon issues but it's manageable now. If you're into characters collection and management then this one is perfect for you. This game will keep you playing all day. Very easy to play, but you'll have to read lots of stuff to fully grasp your companions' full abilities. Same with gears and items needed to rank them up. Love the events and updates. Please add an option to view the 'Books' in menu with 'Next' button. Also add the 'Lock/Unlock' button when long-pressing companions. Thanks

Updated review. I really like this game but the developers have been making choices towards forcing players to buy things. Not in small quantities either. Hopefully speaking out makes them change some things. I'd happily change my review if they start doing things for their players instead of creating artificial paywalls to try to milk people.

[NEW REVIEW] Developers have newly moved towards p2w models for endgame. Dont waste a year in f2p heaven only to realize you're hundreds of dollars behind the top50 and no amount of time will matter. MASSIVE ENDGAME PAYWALL. DONT BOTHER PICKING THIS UP. [MY OLD REVIEW] F2P Heaven. Barely any ads necessary, rly only 3x a day. Rewards loyalty by releasing limited items only once. Always makes that item truly available to F2P players.

Good game. Not for totally beginner. Too much details right at the start and many things to consider made this game confusing. Although theres a fanmade walkthrough that can guide players in to the right direction but its much better if they add more inside the game.

One of the most underrated games I have ever seen. The translations are hilariously bad, but you don't need them. The gameplay is rich, fulfilling, active and engaging. If you like build sims, management sims, hero collection games, deep systems and a ton of depth, give this game a week of your time, and find a new favorite.

title: Cara Care: FODMAP, IBD, IBS Tracker, Poop Tracker
description:
Cara Care takes the mystery out of your digestion. It‚Äôs the easiest way to holistically manage and track GI issues like IBS, IBD, GERD, Celiac, dyspepsia, or food intolerances.

Track and log your poop, stress, food, pain, and other symptoms (e.g. from IBS) with just a few taps. 

The app shows you what your food and symptoms are on your best and worst IBS days.

Start making connections between your diet, your gut, and your overall well-being.

Cara Care‚Äôs premium 12-week IBS program is your personalized guide to following the low FODMAP diet. You‚Äôll get unlimited text chat with a personal dietitian helps you every step of the way in navigating your IBS and beginning low FODMAP. Based on 5,000+ hours of nutritional counseling with people who have IBS. 

-------

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO OUR BEST IN CLASS IBS TRACKER AND POOP TRACKER

üçú Food Tracker: Save time by adding your favorites and photos if you follow low FODMAP, gluten free, or other diets
üßª Poop Tracker: Log different types of bowel movements
üìã Symptom Tracker: Track bloating, constipation, diarrhea, pain, and other IBS symptoms
ü©∫ Medical Log: Record important information about your period, skin, workouts, sleep, pain, and medication

PERSONALIZED ANALYSIS

‚úÖ Food on your best and worst days is shown in your dashboard 
‚úÖ Share your app data easily with your primary care provider or gastroenterologist
‚úÖ Access a library of actionable, science-based tips for living with IBS
‚úÖ Low FODMAP recipes

MAKE LIFE WITH IBS EASIER: JOIN A 12-WEEK IBS LOW FODMAP PROGRAM

üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Free unlimited text chat with your personal dietitian
üìä Get personalized analysis on your symptoms and diet from your dietitian
ü•£ Follow a self-paced, 12-week action plan for the low FODMAP IBS diet  
üî¨ Get science-backed tips on managing IBS, with actionable takeaways at every step
üìù Track your progress with medically-validated questionnaires 

CARA CARE USER PHOEBE SAYS:

"With Cara Care, for the first time I had the feeling that someone wanted to help me. Thanks to the program, I felt much better! Of course there are problems here and there, but I have made a lot of progress and can enjoy eating again." ‚Äì Phoebe

NOT JUST FOR IBS. 

Cara Care is designed for people with chronic gut conditions such as irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), and IBD (Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis and microscopic colitis). But Cara Care‚Äôs symptom tracker can also help you with:

‚Ä¢ Bowel problems such as acid reflux, dyspepsia, nausea, chronic abdominal pain, bloating, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) with symptoms such as chronic bloating, abdominal pain, constipation and diarrhea
‚Ä¢ Short bowel syndrome, small intestinal bacterial overgrowth (SIBO), gastritis, celiac disease
‚Ä¢ Diets such as gluten-free, fructose-free, histamine-free and lactose-free, clean eating, healthy eating, keto
‚Ä¢ Food intolerances and sensitivities such as dairy, lactose, cow's milk allergy, fructose, histamine, gluten/wheat
‚Ä¢ Leaky gut syndrome & Candida albicans
‚Ä¢ Period/menstrual cycle-related digestive problems

We would ‚ù§Ô∏è to hear from you.

Send your questions, suggestions, and feedback to hello@cara.care
Find us on: https://cara.care

comments: Great While It Lasted. I really thought I had found the perfect app to track my symptoms. I spent a huge amount of time entering info. Then, I made the mistake of logging out. Now it won't let me log back in. It says it's sending me a confirmation email to restore my data. But I'm not getting it. I've tried a dozen times & checked my spam/junk folder a hundred times. I'm not receiving the email. I'm so very disappointed. I haven't found another app that covers so much detail. :-(

Adding food and meds can be tedious as a lot of options aren't available. This makes sense as the developer is based in Germany and I live in the US. I also don't add each ingredient, because so many foods have some degree of salt or oil, and those show up in the "best/worst ingredients," even though I know those aren't my triggers. I think the most irritating part is that when I add "no poop" so I can log symptoms, it shows in the report that I pooped. Still a mostly useful app.

I like the idea of this, especially the food tracker to see what foods may be causing me trouble. The only really frustrating part is also the food tracker. They only seem to have half the things I try and put in and it really isn't that user friendly with that function either. The rest of it works pretty well so, despite the food tracker being what I really wanted, I mostly just record symptoms which, in itself, is still helpful.

Great app and is very detailed with a nice user interface. My only critism is when adding pictures to food - it automatically offers to crop or zoom in a landscape rectangle and you can never get the full thing you want in the picture as you can only get part of it. It would be better if it was free crop or zoom within a certain squared area, not a landscape rectangle. An option to export to excel would also be great.
The UI experience is bad and not intuitive. I found it frustrating to use.

title: Motivation 365 : Daily Motivation & inspiration
description:
Motivation 365 is an Ultimate Tool ‚ù§Ô∏è for boosting your productivity and building lasting habits. It comes with a Habit tracker, Task tracker & Event countdown timer. 

*************Developer Note***************
"And I am no longer a slave..."

Hi guys, I have been banging my head since 4 days thinking how to thank you guys for all your love. It has been a crazy 5 years. I was stuck in a job I hated, doing things I didn't like. I always had this urge to create, work on something which I can leave down as a legacy. Developing apps was just the right instrument to give a physical form to that urge (to create). 

Started as a 20 year old college student, studying electronics, who just wanted to experiment and learn, these apps have become my bread and butter now. Everyday I wake up feeling grateful, realising I am doing exactly what I wanted to do. Support from you guys motivates me to push harder and make better apps. 

I promise you, you can expect the highest quality when you download my apps and I would never leave you hanging, email me anytime at kartik@ksharkapps.com for any queries and I would reply within 24 hrs. Also, If you feel a little generous, please buy the pro versions, to fund my late nights of work. 

The only thing I want, is for you to have a great experience when you use my apps. I won't lie, It really feels great when you guys share your love in reviews. You guys are like my extended family, love you! P.S : You can always reach out to me if you can't afford pro versions, I would be happy to share a promocode with you.
**********************************************

comments: OMG the ads are obnoxious. I just downloaded it and love the concept but the number of ads make it virtually non-functional for its purpose. I looked at premium, will consider if the notifications seem helpful, but still 35 bucks for lifetime is steep, especially when I don't know if it's good yet, and feel like I won't enjoy it regardless due to the ads. Ugh I have no other app with this frequency of ads.

Love the app functions, and find the count down feature works well to add a sense of urgency to future but approaching tasks/deadlines etc. Would be 5 star. But, habit tracker and the count part of the app crash the app when I open them. It didn't happen immediately and I tried a reset, delete cache etc in settings. I then gave in deleted reinstalled and sadly it's happened again a week into using the app. The tasks bit on its own is less unique. Please fix the crashed so I can use the app :)

A very good app with simple material design look, quotes and stories are updated everytime lunching the app. My only request to the developer is to categorize the quotes and stories according to the topics and add search function. It would legit help us find what we want to read rather than reading unwanted stuff :)

Damn! So useful, it used to be just a wallpaper and quotes app before but with the new update they have really amazed me, habit tracker is so handy! The motivation feed has awesome curated articels, no joke, i owe 1000 bucks to these guys, one of the article i read was so key to closing a client! Happy to support the developers $2.99 is nothing when you get a 500x the ROI, thanks for this app guys üôè

I've used this app for quite a while and I really liked it, until it stoped loading content .... nothing appear on it no matter the strength of my Wi-Fi single .... it just stopped .. so pretty please try to fix it 'cause your app has been such an inspiration to me. Thank you

title: Bring! Grocery Shopping List
description:
Bring! simplifies grocery shopping for millions of shared households.

With the help of shared shopping lists, integrated recipes, loyalty cards and individual shopping suggestions, Bring! will help you save time, money and energy while organising your grocery shopping and accompanies you through the entire shopping process ‚Äì from the inspiration to the joint planning until the final purchase.

Try it out now ‚Äì it's free! 

WHAT‚ÄôS IN IT FOR YOU:

- Create your shopping list easily with just clicks.
- Manage multiple shopping lists with everybody in your household. 
- Leave your heavy wallet at home and save all your loyalty cards in your Bring! wallet instead.
- Get inspired by seasonal, special featurings and tons of other cool food content every day.
- Easily import the recipes and ingredients from your favorite recipe platforms and food blogs.

BETTER PLAN TOGETHER
Create and share shopping lists with your family, colleagues and friends and personalize them for any occasion or store ‚Äì at home, in your office, holiday cabinet or for travels with friends. Manage your shopping lists together via smartphones, tablets and your smartwatch and the voice assistants of Amazon Alexa and the Google Assistant. Send clever, ready-made messages to inform your contacts that you are going shopping or have changed the list. Add your own photos to the items on your shopping list to always let your friends know what brand to buy. You will also get individual shopping suggestions and reminders tailored to your needs ‚Äì so there's always milk for coffee in your fridge.

GET NEW FOOD INSPIRATION
Find daily cooking inspiration, as well as tips and tricks in the Bring! Inspiration Stream. Get inspired by seasonal, special featurings and tons of other cool food content every day. Easily import the recipes and ingredients from your favorite recipe platforms and food blogs on the web via the share extension of your browser. Like your favourite recipes and save them in your own collection. See what‚Äôs trending now and which recipes and food blogs other users love. Check out our inspiration stream and new tools now to have more fun & be more efficient while planning your meals and grocery shopping with others:
- Quantity calculator & item predictor for recipes
- Like and share your favorites recipes with others
- See what food trend you can't miss

WHY BRING!?
The Bring! app can be downloaded for free. 
Quick and free registration via Google and Facebook accounts.

YOUR FEEDBACK
Your inputs will help us steer Bring! in the right direction and create the best shopping experience for you and millions of shoppers around the world. 
Contact us: feedback@getbring.com

We can't wait to hear from you,
Your Bring! Team

recentChanges:
3.55.0:

If you like Bring! please tell your friends and rate us in the Play Store. Thanks!
comments: Great system, really handy for the whole family!!! It would make more sense though if you had to tap and hold the items to remove them from the list and just tap once to edit... So basically the other way around. Because the way it works now it happens to us quite often that we accidentally remove items from the list. But other than that, super happy with the app :)

Okay so I've used it for the first time for shopping yesterday, and yeah random things did get added to my list. It was frustrating because it was items that we go through regularly and it made us doubt if we actually needed it or not. Also I wish the inspiration page was bigger. I wish there were 100s of recipes you could search for rather than there be the same 5 recipes on a list. Over all I love the idea of this app, but it needs some work. I'll keep using it for now.

Great app and would normally give it five stars but recently the Wear OS app doesn't seem to be sending notifications? It's strange as I can get notifications from Bring! to my phone when the Wear OS app isn't installed but obviously can't view my list on my watch without the app. But when I install the Wear OS Bring! app on my watch the notifications no longer come through. Any ideas? Have made sure all relevant notification permissions are set up on both the Watch and Phone apps so I don't think the issue is there.

Great app. We live far from town and sometimes one of us will head out to do the shopping. Anything I miss from our shopping list can be sent automatically from my wife's list and vice versa. This is how web based apps should all work.

Amazing grocery/shopping list app.. why? 1) Share lists easily for others to add to 2) Google assistant integration for hands free operation 3) WearOS support 4) stores your loyalty cards in one place 5) clean and intuitive interface 6) responsive development team 7) always improving and incorporating user feedback.

title: Eventbrite Organizer
description:
Eventbrite Organizer (formerly Entry Manager) is the one-stop shop for event management on your Android device. Event planners can now create and edit events, monitor real-time ticket sales, check-in attendees, track attendance live, and quickly accept, secure payment for tickets and merchandise on-site. Get more details below or visit: https://www.eventbrite.com/l/Organizer-check-in-app/

With Eventbrite Organizer app event management is a snap. You can:
* Create events directly in your mobile app.
* Edit key event details (like your event description, ticket types and quantity and more) on-the-go ‚Äî perfect for the busy event planner lifestyle.
* Take control of your ticket sales with access to real-time data.
* Easily edit your event listing from anywhere.
* Rely on easy-to-use ticket scanning and check-in to give guests a flawless entry experience.
* Keep your finger on the pulse of your event with live attendance tracking.
* Quickly accept secure payment for tickets and merchandise on-site and never miss a chance to sell.


Key Event Management Features:
* Edit from Anywhere: Make updates to your tickets or event listing seamlessly from your mobile device (which automatically syncs with the Eventbrite database) so you can stay in control of your event listing, no matter where you are.
* Check-in That Works: Reliably and efficiently check-in attendees by scanning tickets with the camera on your mobile device. Or, simply look up your guest‚Äôs name directly with a quick search of your guest list. Say goodbye to check-in headaches with our easy-to-use entry manager technology.
* Mobile Box Office: Accept all major credit cards, track cash transactions, print tickets and receipts on the spot, and send mobile and print-at-home tickets. Take your box office to the next level with easy-to-use accessories like our card reader and ticket printer.
* Solve Customer Requests Fast: Quickly look up orders, and reissue, cancel, or refund orders on the spot. 
* Real-Time Data: All sales and check-in data is synced with Eventbrite‚Äôs servers, so you can use multiple devices at different entry points without missing orders or duplicating tickets. 
* Multi-lingual? No problem: Organizer is also available in German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, and Spanish. Ol√®!

Thanks for all the great feedback ‚Äì we can‚Äôt get enough! Keep it coming at mobilefeedback@eventbrite.com. And if you‚Äôre loving the app, drop us a rating (and don‚Äôt be afraid to gush).

What is Eventbrite?
Eventbrite is the world‚Äôs largest self-service ticketing and registration platform, hosting a vibrant collection of live experiences to fuel people‚Äôs passions and enrich their lives.

summary: Manage events on the go - create & edit, track & sell tickets, & check-in guests
comments: Navigating to specific events that you have created is a little annoying but not a deal breaker. As an organizer, the app is quite good.
Why do you need a separate apps to monitor your event and a separate app to view and buy for other events. Why can't one app do both?
Overall I am satisfied with the app. There should be a better picture cropping option.
After update the app cant be lauch. Niw worse,cant even log in,the app not able to open.

Would not load the guest list on my Android devices for check in but worked on my colleague's iPhone. Very annoying. Watch out if you have volunteers planning to use this to check in guests and they have an Android phone.

title: Home Remedies+ : Natural Cures
description:
Advanced version of popular Home Remedies (Lite) App.

This is Official App of https://HomeRemedies.Org. This app is only in English Language.

Our App is recommended by 90+ U.S.-licensed doctors on HealthTap.
https://www.healthtap.com/apps/11845

title: JEFIT Workout Tracker, Weight Lifting, Gym Log App
description:
Tracking workout training routines using JEFIT gym log is easy. Programs from bodybuilding, 3 day splits, 5x5 & strength plans to home exercises & body weight lifting.

‚òÖ Google Play Editor's Choice ‚òÖ Men‚Äôs Fitness - Best Fitness and Health Apps ‚òÖ USA Today - New year, new you

Over 8 million people use JEFIT to track their workouts and transform their bodies.

JEFIT, the number one workout tracking planner app, provides free fitness program database to help you stay fit, make progress and get the most out of your gym or home fitness sessions. From beginner programs like 5x5, 531, stronglifts, 3 or 4 day splits, starting strength to advanced bodybuilding, weightlifting, powerlifting or kettlebell routines to programs using bodyweight, limited space or specialized equipment, JEFIT is the only workout app you need.

Who is this app for?
If you‚Äôve logged your workouts in a journal, planner or just love training at the gym on your own schedule, JEFIT will help you reach your strength, weight and fat loss, and training goals from beginners to advanced lifters. We‚Äôve made the app to motivate you by rewarding you for consistency, pushing yourself to new personal records and committing to challenges with the community. 

Top Features
‚óè Web or App - Track with the app and edit routines on our web app.
‚óè Track Workouts - Set your exercises, track weights and reps and we‚Äôll show you the results of your training
‚óè Exercise Instruction Database - Over 1300+ demonstrations and variations with HD video from experts
‚óè Intuitive Tools - a Swiss army knife for training tools, including rest timer, superset, interval timer, body measurements system, and most importantly, workout routine planner.
‚óè Training Programs - Customized workout programs made for 3, 4 or 5 day splits, fat loss, stronglifts, 5x5, starting strength, bodybuilding, 531, weightlifting, powerlifting, GZCLP, Greyskull, or build your own
‚óè Stay Motivated - Join our monthly fitness challenge with cash prizes and get support from other gym goers in the community. Also add your gym buddies to compare routines and lifts so you can reach your goal of improving strength, getting lean, toned or just staying active
‚óè Set Goals - Want to lose weight, get lean, get stronger or exercise consistently? You can build that in JEFIT‚Äôs custom journal
‚óè Add Friends - Find new fitness buddies in our community. Whether it‚Äôs someone to spot you at the gym or to compare bodybuilding tips.

Programs for any fitness level with full instruction database
‚úî Beginner Programs - Stronglifts, 5x5, Starting Strength, 3 day splits
‚úî Advanced Programs - Powerlifting, bodybuilding, 531, GZCLP, Greyskull
‚úî Target Programs - Abs, Arms, Glutes, Fat and Weight Loss, Toning
‚úî Personal Training - Get routines built by your personal trainer
‚úî Sports Training - Baseball, Space
‚úî Equipment Focused - Squat Racks, Barbells, Kettlebells, Dumbbells
‚úî Bodyweight or Minimal Equipment - Bands, Mats, Machine Only, Core Focused
‚úî Kettlebells, Cardio, Circuit Training, Space Limited Routines
* Or build your own custom workout routines or schedules

Special tools and features
‚úî Access from Desktop and Web
‚úî Rest Timer - Set custom times to remind when to lift
‚úî Supersets and circuit training routines supported
‚úî Interval Timer, Set Notes and 1 Rep Max Calculator
‚úî Body Measurements and Weekly Planner for Scheduling
‚úî Social Feed and Community Contest
‚úî Store Workouts in the Cloud and share with your personal trainer

1,300 exercises supported with full HD videos in our database
‚úî Barbell, Dumbbell, Machines, Cable, Band
‚úî Cardio, Elliptical, Rowing, Bike, Swimming
‚úî Static Movements, Planks, Stretching, Abs
‚úî Bodyweight, Kettlebell, Core
‚úî Create custom exercises

Benchmarking, analysis and instructions
‚úî Personalized charts for lifting volume
‚úî Benchmark against other users or gym buddy
‚úî Weekly summaries of progress
‚úî Personalized Record PR tracking

recentChanges:

comments: Used this apps for a couple of years and the latest updates are a backward step. The UI no longer displays the interval time but been replaced with an incremental number for those who can't count sets. I use to enter the weight for my next set during the interval however the keyboard won't appear while the interval timer is on. Also none of the graphics for the exercises display anymore which has caused me confusion. I hope the latest updates are reconsidered

Been using this app since the early days. I love the ongoing support but it wouldnt hurt for devs to stick to one UI and stop moving things around every other update. The latest update to intervals is just lazy. The timer auto-starts even if you dont want/need it and is always logged. A better approach would be to disable the time+logging if interval is set to 0, otherwise there is a x second delay before timer starts. Also the ability to set the main page under excerise history would be great.

Nice app an community. There must be a bug with the points earned: with the latest versions my sessions are not counted anylonger (and I do train every day almost...) Would be nice to get it resolved (I am in the contest, and it gives motivation ;) Overall, is a very good develooment, kudos to the team.

It's a good app, but it can be hard to use. I also couldn't find a way to contact them from the app and I feel like if you're going to charge people money you have to put a way to contact you if they have a problem or question. My husband just wants to know if there is a weekly report for reps like the other stats, but it makes me nervous that if something goes wrong I can't find a way to contact them about it.

Great app!!! Have been using for years. Really enjoy the improvements made over the years. Unfortunately, body stats page/functions have been very buggy and don't even work the last few updates. Weight doesn't record. Graph has goal weight posted way off in future. Weight no longer sync's w Google Fit. Could be 5star app. -2stars until fixed.

Work out at home with the top trainers and millions of women worldwide in the Tone It Up Community! Achieving amazing results has never been easier! Katrina Scott, Karena Dawn, and the top personal trainers have designed workout plans to help you feel fit, strong, and more confident.

comments: Been a member on the plans for a long time. But the app is great when it works. However I am constantly having to log in and it doesn't stay logged in. Also the reminders rarely happen when they are scheduled. It is the latest and even when it says I should be getting reminders they don't actually come thru most of the time. But thanks for the input

I love this app and use it all the time. Would love: 1) to be able to use it on my Chromebook. Having to choose between the tiny phone screen and our tv (which is in high demand) isn't ideal 2) to be able to save check-ins on the app itself. The sharing tool doesn't always work and then I have to either fast forward through the workout to get my picture back (which messes up my count for my badges) or I lose out on the check in.

Love this app! So many workout styles, trainers, equipment, and durations! I'm a mom of two so it's great for quick, but effective workouts! Also love that it includes the nutrition plans! I can always easily find the recipe I'm looking for! I highly recommend for women looking to be challenged, uplifted, encouraged, and understood! üíóüíïüíó

I remember when this app was busy and some features wouldn't work. But it looks like a lot work was put into it to improve it! Easily shareable, reminders to keep you accountable, and you can simply cast to your tv (If you have the corresponding device lol) It's awesome and motivating! I find myself always signing up for the new programs

I was really disappointed that the programs are so cumbersome. You can't stream the workout on your computer which is how I normally follow workouts in that garage and I wasn't abe to cast them to my tv either. If you want to print material I would have to download on my phone email to myself to keep or print from my computer. I'm sorry I dont want to follow a workout on a phone

title: SMART-IBD
description: The SMART app incorporates evidence-based self-management intervention that will help you manage your IBD. SMART was created by a team of experts in adherence and self-management. It is designed to help you track your symptoms like mood and pain in daily diary entries. You can also conveniently track and receive reminders for your medications and doctor visits. The SMART app will allow you to view your responses and medication adherence over time in easy to understand graphs.

title: T2 Mood Tracker
description:
T2 Mood Tracker is designed to help you track your emotional experience over time and to provide you with a tool to share this information with your health care provider.

This app comes with six pre-loaded issues: anxiety, depression, general well-being, head injury, post-traumatic stress, and stress. You can also add customized scales on any topic (e.g., a pain scale). You use simple sliders to rate yourself on these behavioral categories and the app automatically graphs your inputs. You can also make notes describing things that happened during the day that may have affected your moods. This provides you and your health care provider with a complete tool to help you uncover patterns in how you are feeling. It may also help you to evaluate the impact of daily events or the effects of treatment on your mood. 

T2 Mood Tracker was developed by DHA Connected Health, the Defense Health Agency‚Äôs primary agency for applying innovative technology to issues of psychological health and traumatic brain injury

‚Ä¢ Report generator makes sharing results simple! Generate PDF or CSV reports to print or email to your health care provider.
‚Ä¢ Backup database saves all your data on the SD card. Easily move your T2 Mood Tracker results to a new phone or save a backup off-phone, so you don‚Äôt lose your data if you lose your phone.
‚Ä¢ Locate psychological health support in your area via the Outreach Center link.
‚Ä¢ Program the reminder to update your moods as often as you like - weekly to several times a day.
‚Ä¢ Pre-loaded with six common issues. Customize with ANY feeling or issue you want to track.
‚Ä¢ Results display in easy to read color graphs with pinch zoom, customizable symbols, and options to display as much or as little data you desire.

recentChanges: Added Security Pin and Biometrics support. Fixed some minor bugs
comments: Good app, however a couple of things. It only allows or acknowledges 1 entry per day, I need to enter AM and PM and even midday if possible. The notes are not sorted descending from most recent down. The notes dont keep the syntax in the reports, no RTF? Maybe? Just one huge run on sentence...support the formatting as typed. And somehow now I'm getting google ads everywhere about anxiety, mental health, etc. I always use Tor searching anything related to that for my privacy. But google is evil.

I wish you could post different notes on days and be able to see those represented in the graphs. Also I'm not sure if it's possible to sync data, but any time I've had to reset or upgrade my phone, I've lost all the data I'd previously logged which is annoying

This is exactly what I have been needing. I have a tendency to forget when I have had good moments when I'm in a bad mood and vice versa. This has really helped to keep an eye on and better monitor my mental health. However the app is clearly a really rough one. It isn't pretty and that's okay but some of the functionality is frustrating. I wish the graph would let me toggle to something shorter than 30 days as the graph can be hard to read. Additionally, it doesn't start the graph where you started (day 1 is not the day you downloaded but seemingly 30 days before you downloaded). While you can submit multiple entries per day it is really difficult with the graph and really is difficult to see. If this was improved the app would be perfect for me.

Love the concept, especially the personalization and the ability to track fluctuations over the course of a day, but it's way too buggy. The majority of the time, the graph doesn't work, which means I get no data output to look at. Also, I have not been able to get it to connect with Fitbit, so don't get this app if you want it for that feature. It just does nothing.

been using this app for about a year now. in that time it's worked well aside from a crash that lost all my input up until that point which caused me to stop using it for a little while. definitely needs a backup solution, or at least one that is more obvious(?) The last update also made the graphing system unoperable for me. it shows at least one line for a moment before seeming to zoom way out on just the graph lines with no way to zoom back in.

title: Talkspace Counseling & Therapy
description:
Talkspace is the most convenient and affordable way to improve your mental health. Get matched with a licensed therapist in your state from the comfort of your device, and message via text, audio, and video.

Unlike in-person therapy, which typically costs $150 for each weekly session, Talkspace is a subscription service, starting at only $65/week (billed monthly). All plans come with unlimited messaging, and you can even choose to add live video sessions. We also offer unlimited messaging therapy to teens ages 13-17 and special services for couples therapy. You can change therapists or stop subscription renewal at any time. 

HOW DOES TALKSPACE WORK? 

Tell us your preferences for therapy, and match with one of our therapists in your state the same day. Send your therapist unlimited text, audio, picture, or video messages from anywhere, at any time ‚Äî you‚Äôll hear back at least once a day, 5 days per week. 

IS TALKSPACE EFFECTIVE? 

Talkspace has been shown to be as effective as face-to-face therapy. In one recent study, 81% of participants felt Talkspace is as effective or better than in-person therapy. In another, individuals who used Talkspace for only 2 months significantly improved symptoms of depression and anxiety. Talkspace has been featured in The Wall Street Journal, CNN.com, Business Insider, and more. 

For more research data, visit research.talkspace.com. 
For more of our press coverage, visit talkspace.com/online-therapy/press/

WHO ARE THE TALKSPACE THERAPISTS?

The Talkspace provider network has thousands of licensed therapists across the 50 U.S. states who have been vetted and accredited according to NCQA standards. They have experience treating the most common mental health issues, including depression, anxiety, substance use, stress, relationships, PTSD, and more.

IS TALKSPACE SECURE?

Your safety and security are our #1 priorities. Our technology is protected using banking-grade encryption and externally audited in compliance with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA). For more information, find our complete Privacy Policy at talkspace.com/public/privacy-policy.

CONNECT WITH US!

We‚Äôre always happy to connect with users and receive feedback.
Email us: support@talkspace.com 
Check out our website: talkspace.com 
Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/Talkspace 
Follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/talkspace
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/Talkspacetherapy
